scn aaBounties02QuestScript
Short EthanGreeted Short WantedPosterRead Short GustavGreeted Short JanieDiscovered Short IkeShot Short DocGreeted Short CJGreeted Short ShadowGreeted Short ShadowAlarmed Short JackalNotePickedUp Short ConradDillonGreeted Short ConradDillonKilled Short ConradDillonAlive Short MatherSurvived Short CharlieMessaged Short JulyGreeted Short FiendAmbushed Short AltarNoteRead Short CultGuardGreeted Short SpeechGiven Short FlaggGreeted Short FlaggSpoken Short FlaggKilled Short FlaggCaptiveFreed Short SacrificeDone Short PenanceDone Short CultJoined Short CaptiveFreed Short PollyGreeted Short RedBearGreeted Short RedBearKilled Short RedBearCaptured Short Captive1Freed Short Captive2Freed Short Captive3Freed Short PollyNoteFound Short RedBearBribed Short GetControlsDone Short JackalNoteAcquired
Begin GameMode
If aaGustavRef.GetDead == 1 If GetStage aaBounties02 < 10 Setstage aaBounties02 10 endif Endif
If aaSladeRef.GetDead == 1 If Player.GetDistance aaJanieParkerRef1 < 250 If aaBounties02.JanieDiscovered == 0 showmessage aaJanieDeadMessage set aaBounties02.JanieDiscovered to 1 endif endif endif
If aaIkeRef.GetDead == 1 If aaBounties02.GetControlsDone == 0 enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaBounties02.GetControlsDone to 1 endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 25 If Player.GetDistance aaBounties02Stage25Marker <= 500 showmessage aaJackalRawDealMessage setstage aaBounties02 26 endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 26 If aaBounties02.JackalNoteAcquired == 0 If Player.GetHasNote aaDeadJackalNote aaConradDillonRef.enable setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 26 1 set aaBounties02.JackalNoteAcquired to 1 endif Endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 < 30 If Player.GetHasNote aaConradDillonNote setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 27 1 setstage aaBounties02 30 endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 30 If Player.GetDistance aaMeetConradDillonMarker <= 500 If aaBounties02.ConradDillonKilled == 0 setstage aaBounties02 31 endif endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 30 If Player.GetDistance aaMeetConradDillonMarker <= 500 If aaBounties02.ConradDillonKilled == 1 aaMatherRef.enable setstage aaBounties02 32 endif endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 <= 36 If Player.GetHasNote aaMatherRedBearNote setstage aaBounties02 40 endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 40 If aaBounties02.CharlieMessaged == 0 If Player.GetDistance aaBounties02Stage40Marker <= 250 showmessage aaCharlieHalfcockedMessage set aaBounties02.CharlieMessaged to 1 endif endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 40 If Player.GetHasNote aaCharlieSetupNote setstage aaBounties02 45 aaCharlieHalfCockedRef.enable aaCharlieHalfCockedRef.startcombat player endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 46 If Player.GetHasNote aaCharliePlansNote setstage aaBounties02 50 endif Endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 50 If Player.GetHasNote aaMattJacksonDeadNote setstage aaBounties02 55 endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 55 If Player.GetDistance aaBounties02Stage55Marker <= 500 showmessage aaBounties02Stage55Message setstage aaBounties02 56 endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 == 57 If Player.Gethasnote aaHonchoNote setstage aaBounties02 60 endif endif
If aaBounties02.SpeechGiven == 0 If Player.GetDistance aaFlaggSpeechMarker <=1000 ;DisablePlayerControls 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 aaAaronFlaggRef.Say aaBounties02AaronFlaggSpeech endif endif
If GetStage aaBounties02 < 100 If Player.GetHasNote aaFlaggRedBearSafeNote setstage aaBounties02 100 setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 70 1 endif endif
If aaRedBearRef.GetDistance aaLarryScullRef <= 1000 If aaBounties02.RedBearCaptured == 1 showmessage aaBounties02RedBearTurnedInMessage aaRedBearRef.disable set aaBounties02.RedBearCaptured to 2 setobjectivedisplayed aabounties02 120 1 endif endif
If Player.GetHasNote aaRedBearPollyNote If aaBounties02.PollyNoteFound == 0 if aaEthanRef.GetDead == 0 set aaBounties02.PollyNoteFound to 1 set aaBounties02.EthanGreeted to 10 showmessage aaPollyNoteMessage endif endif endif
End

scn aaEncountersQuestScript
Short JacobCobbGreeted Short AgrippaEnabled Short AgrippaGreeted Short PussyGreeted Short GoldFound Short FiendsAmbushed Short SniperEnabled Short BurnsAmbushed Short CultAmbushed Short CoyoteUnleashed Short CodrumAlerted Short CodrumEnabled Short QuintusGreeted
Short EpilogueEnabled
Short StartDay Short State
Short CalhounCount Short AdamCalhounGreeted
Short EncounterCount; used to kill quest if criteria is met
Begin Gamemode
If State == 0 && aaEncounters.GoldFound == 1 Set aaEncounters.StartDay to GameDaysPassed Set aaEncounters.State to 1 ElseIf State == 1 if GameDaysPassed - StartDay >= 5 Set aaEncounters.QuintusGreeted to 1 aaQuintusFabiusRef.enable aaQuintusFabiusRef.evp set EncounterCount to EncounterCount + 1 Set aaEncounters.State to 2 EndIf EndIf
If aaEncounters.QuintusGreeted == 15 If aaQuintusFabiusRef.GetDistance aaQuintusFabiusDisableMarkerRef <= 2000 aaQuintusFabiusRef.disable aaQuintusFabiusRef.markfordelete set EncounterCount to EncounterCount + 1 set aaEncounters.QuintusGreeted to 16 endif endif
If EpilogueEnabled == 0 If GetStage aaFinal == 190 aaFiskFiendParentRef.enable aaEmmettCurryWantedPoster01Ref.enable aaGeorgeHardinWantedPosterRef.enable aaHardinPosterKnifeRef.enable aaBillyJackPosterRef.enable aaBryanClaiborneWPRef.enable set EncounterCount to EncounterCount + 1 set EpilogueEnabled to 1 endif endif
If EncounterCount == 3 stopquest aaEncounters set EncounterCount to 4 endif
End

Scn VERT4AntSVScript
; This script handles a mini-event in one of the game's secondary locations. Its code works in tandem with another scripts (VERT4AntSVTrigger), setting the failsafe variables (bPlayerEnters and bAntsAlarmed) through trigger volumes that react to players progressing through the setting. ; - Jorge
Short bPlayerEnters Short bPlayerMidWay Short bAntsAlarmed Short bAntsKilled Short bAntsGoners Short iCount
Float fDaysPassed
Begin OnLoad Set bPlayerEnters to 1 End
Begin OnReset Set bPlayerEnters to 0 End
Begin GameMode
If bAntsGoners == 1 If GameDaysPassed >= ( fDaysPassed + 14 ) ;enable new creatures, or the Ants again ;Set bPlayerEnters to 0 ;Set bAntsAlarmed to 0 ;Set bPlayerMidway to 0 ;Set bAntsGoners to 0 ;Set bAntsKilled to 0 ;Set iCount to 0 Endif Else If bPlayerEnters == 1 If bAntsAlarmed != 1 If bPlayerMidway == 1 Set bAntsAlarmed to 1 Endif Else If VERFireAntQueenSouthVegasREF.GetDisabled == 1 && iCount < 1 VERFireAntQueenSouthVegasREF.Enable Set iCount to 1 Elseif VERFireAntSoldier01SouthVegasREF.GetDisabled == 1 && iCount == 1 VERFireAntSoldier01SouthVegasREF.Enable Set iCount to 2 Elseif VERFireAntSoldier01SouthVegasREF.GetDisabled == 1 && iCount == 2 VERFireAntSoldier02SouthVegasREF.Enable Set iCount to 3 Elseif VERFireAntSoldier01SouthVegasREF.GetDisabled == 1 && iCount == 3 VERFireAntSoldier03SouthVegasREF.Enable Set iCount to 4 Elseif VERFireAntSoldier01SouthVegasREF.GetDisabled == 1 && iCount == 4 VERFireAntSoldier04SouthVegasREF.Enable Set iCount to 0 Endif If bAntsKilled !=1 If VERFireAntQueenSouthVegasREF.GetDead == 1 Set fDaysPassed to GameDaysPassed Set bAntsKilled to 1 Set bAntsGoners to 1 Endif Endif Endif Endif Endif
End

scn aaMeetPressQuestScript
Short PaperCount; Master Count used to kill script, current count = 9 Short Stopped
Short StyleDetermined; 0 is dead, 1 is hostile, 2 is positive Short AmbroseGreeted; can be indicative of mood Short AmbroseBribed Short NoteFound Short IntroPublished Short RedBearPublished Short SergioPublished Short MongolPublished Short PowersPublished Short BurnsPublished Short KellyPublished Short LoboPublished
Short InheritancePublished Short ZuluPublished Short BloodHammerPublished Short EstherPublished Short RonniePublished
Short RussellPublished
Begin Gamemode
If aaMeetPress.NoteFound == 0 If Player.GetHasNote aaAmbroseMoneyNote set aaMeetPress.NoteFound to 1 endif endif
If aaMeetPress.IntroPublished == 0 If GetStage aaIntroduction >= 10 aaCoyoteCourierIntro01Ref.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.IntroPublished to 1 endif endif
If IntroPublished == 1 && StyleDetermined == 0 stopquest aaMeetPress set IntroPublished to 2 endif
If aaMeetPress.RedBearPublished == 0 If aaBounties02.RedBearKilled >= 2 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteRedBearNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.RedBearPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.RedBearPublished == 0 If aaBounties02.RedBearKilled >= 2 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteRedBearPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.RedBearPublished to 1 endif endif endif
if aaMeetPress.SergioPublished == 0 If GetStage aaFinal == 190 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteSergioNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.SergioPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.SergioPublished == 0 If GetStage aaFinal == 190 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteSergioPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.SergioPublished to 1 endif endif endif
if aaMeetPress.MongolPublished == 0 If aaSecondary01.MongolKilled == 2 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteMongolNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.MongolPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.MongolPublished == 0 If aaSecondary01.MongolKilled == 2 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteMongolPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.MongolPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.PowersPublished == 0 If GetStage aaSecondary12 == 190 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyotePowersNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.PowersPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.PowersPublished == 0 If GetStage aaSecondary12 == 190 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyotePowersPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.PowersPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.BurnsPublished == 0 If aaSecondary18.GrandmaKilled >= 1 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteBurnsNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.BurnsPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.BurnsPublished == 0 If aaSecondary18.GrandmaKilled >= 1 If aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteBurnsPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.BurnsPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.KellyPublished == 0 If GetStage aaSecondary19 == 190 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteKellyNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.KellyPublished to 1 endif endif endif
if aaMeetPress.KellyPublished == 0 if GetStage aaSecondary19 == 190 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteKellyPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.KellyPublished to 1 endif endif endif
if aaMeetPress.LoboPublished == 0 If GetStage aaSecondary17 == 170 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteLoboNegativeRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.LoboPublished to 1 endif endif endif
if aaMeetPress.LoboPublished == 0 If GetStage aaSecondary17 == 170 if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteLoboPositiveRef.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.LoboPublished to 1 endif endif endif
If aaMeetPress.InheritancePublished == 0 If SomeguyMaster.ZimmerStatus == 1; Zimmer is dead if aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 1 aaCoyoteInheritanceNegativeREF.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.InheritancePublished to 1 elseif aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined == 2 aaCoyoteInheritancePositiveREF.enable set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.InheritancePublished to 1 endif elseif SomeguyMaster.ZimmerStatus == 2; Zimmer is alive, but must update papercount variable to prevent script from running set PaperCount to PaperCount + 1 set aaMeetPress.InheritancePublished to 1 endif endif
;;; UPDATE THIS, YOU STUPID BASTARD! If PaperCount == 9 aaJaysonAmbroseRef.disable aaJaysonAmbroseRef.markfordelete stopquest aaMeetPress set PaperCount to 100 endif
End

scn aaFiendCaptiveScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && ( DoOnce != 1 ) ;RemoveFromFaction FiendsFactionNV ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load setRestrained 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaFiendCaptiveMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaFiendCaptiveMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) setRestrained 1 set DoOnce to 2 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 RemoveFromFaction FiendsFactionNV removescriptpackage FFSupermutantCaptiveCaptured addscriptpackage aaFiendCaptiveFleePackage evp set SpecialFreed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance ArcadeHomeMarker <= 10000 set disabled to 1 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif

END

scn aaClownTrapTriggerScript
short StartUp ;1= Player has tripped the trigger zone short EndStartUp float TimerA float TimerB float TimerC float TimerD float TimerE float TimerZ ;Added for first timer to trigger player teleportation
short bTimerZDone
BEGIN OnTrigger player
; get the player set up to be knocked out. if (StartUp == 0) && (GetStage aaEpilogue07 == 15) aaTrapGnomeRef.placeatme MQ08FlashBangExplosion SetStage aaEpilogue07 20 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 aaClownSpeaker03Ref.sayto player aaEpilogue07ChucklesIntercomIntro03
Set TimerA to 1 Set TimerA to .2 Set StartUp to 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier ExplosionInFace
;PlaySound QSTNVDLC01OpeningStinger ;PlaySound QSTDLCTrap
endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
; Player gets gassed.
if ( StartUp == 1 )
if ( TimerZ > 0 ) && (bTimerZDone== 0) Set TimerZ to ( TimerZ - GetSecondsPassed ) else set bTimerZDone to 1 Player.Moveto aaClownTrapStartMarkerRef endif
if ( TimerA > 0 ) Set TimerA to ( TimerA - GetSecondsPassed ) else player.AddScriptPackage aaClownCapturePackage PipboyRadioOff Set TimerB to 2 Set StartUp to 2 endif endif
; Player hits the ground, dazed.
if ( StartUp == 2 ) if ( TimerB > 0 ) Set TimerB to ( TimerB - GetSecondsPassed ) ;BeginFX aaClownTrapParentRef.enable ;EndFX else Set TimerC to 8 Set StartUp to 3 endif endif
; Player slowly passes out.
if ( StartUp == 3 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else player.RemoveAllItems aaClownGearLockerRef imod FadeToBlackPermanent Set TimerC to 5 Set StartUp to 4 endif endif
; Player wakes up. if ( StartUp == 4 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else ;StartQuest NVDLC01Intro Set TimerE to 5 Set StartUp to 5 endif endif
if ( StartUp == 5 ) if ( TimerC > 0 ) Set TimerC to ( TimerC - GetSecondsPassed ) else Player.RemoveScriptPackage Set StartUp to 6 ;DisableFX aaClownTrapParentRef.disable aaClownTrapParentRef.markfordelete ;DisableFX player.moveto aaClownPlayerCaptiveMarkerRef ;showmessage (INSERT BLITHE UPDATE MESSAGE) EnablePlayerControls ;aaClownSpeaker04Ref.sayto player aaEpilogue07ChucklesIntercomIntro04 endif endif
END

scn aaPGCaptiveScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && (DoOnce != 1) ;RemoveFromFaction FiendsFactionNV ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load setRestrained 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaPGCaptiveMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaPGCaptiveMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) setRestrained 1 set DoOnce to 2 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 RemoveFromFaction aaPGCaptiveFaction removescriptpackage FFSupermutantCaptiveCaptured addscriptpackage aaFiendCaptiveFleePackage evp set SpecialFreed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance ArcadeHomeMarker <= 10000 set disabled to 1 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

scn aaInfiniteTargetSCRIPT
short deadstate short deadstartday
short captured short Button
short failcheck
Begin OnLoad
If failcheck == 0 if GetStage aaInfiniteQuest == 200 set failcheck to 1 disable markfordelete else set failcheck to 1 endif endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaInfiniteQuest < 10 additem aaInfiniteFinger 1 setstage aaInfiniteQuest 10 endif
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin OnActivate
If GetAV Fatigue <= 0 if captured == 0 ShowMessage aaLiveBountyMessage endif else activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( captured == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed if ( button == 1 ) ;RemoveFromFaction SlaveFaction ;removescriptpackage FFER19SupermutantCaptiveCaptured removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxWeaponDrawnEditorLocation512 addscriptpackage aaGenericTurnMyselfInPackage additem aaBountyCollar 1 equipitem aaBountyCollar 1 1 set captured to 1 ;reset fail timer set aaInfiniteQuest.Countstate to 1 ; ai shit ignoreCrime 1 setav aggression 0 setav confidence 0 modav fatigue 100 ResurrectActor 1 evp sayto player flee endif endif
If captured == 1 If GetDistance aaBCJInteriorMarkerRef <= 2500 ;target turns himself/herself in showmessage aaUnmarkedTurnIn set aaInfiniteQuest.LiveBounty to 1 setstage aaInfiniteQuest 177 set captured to 2 disable markfordelete endif endif
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 1 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaInfSlaveCaptiveScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
short deadstate short deadstartday
short failcheck
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END
BEGIN OnLoad
If failcheck == 0 if GetStage aaInfiniteQuest == 200 set failcheck to 1 disable markfordelete else set failcheck to 1 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && (DoOnce != 1) ;RemoveFromFaction FiendsFactionNV ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load setRestrained 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaSlaveCaptiveMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaSlaveCaptiveMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) setRestrained 1 set DoOnce to 2 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 RemoveFromFaction SlaveFaction removescriptpackage FFER19SupermutantCaptiveCaptured addscriptpackage aaFiendCaptiveFleePackage evp set SpecialFreed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance ArcadeHomeMarker <= 10000 set SpecialFreed to 2 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

scn aaInfiniteQuestSCRIPT

short LiveBounty short LiveBountyHigh
short Countstate short Countstartday
Begin Gamemode
If Started == 1 Set Countstate to 1 set Picked to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 22/100 ; 22 If Picked == 1 ; Fiends startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 2 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup02 set aaInfiniteSetup02.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 3 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup03 set aaInfiniteSetup03.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 4 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup04 set aaInfiniteSetup04.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 5 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup05 set aaInfiniteSetup05.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 6 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup06 set aaInfiniteSetup06.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 7 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup07 set aaInfiniteSetup07.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 8 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup08 set aaInfiniteSetup08.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 9 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup09 set aaInfiniteSetup09.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 10 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup10 set aaInfiniteSetup10.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 11 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup11 set aaInfiniteSetup11.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 12 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup12 set aaInfiniteSetup12.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 13; startquest aaInfiniteSetup13 set aaInfiniteSetup13.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 14 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup14 set aaInfiniteSetup14.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 15 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup15 set aaInfiniteSetup15.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 16 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 17 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup03 set aaInfiniteSetup03.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 18 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 19 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup12 set aaInfiniteSetup12.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 20 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 21 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif If Picked == 22 ; startquest aaInfiniteSetup set aaInfiniteSetup.Setup to 1 set Started to 0 endif endif
If Countstate == 1 Set Countstartday to GameDaysPassed Set Countstate to 2 ElseIf Countstate == 2 if (GameDaysPassed - Countstartday >= 3) && (GetStage aaInfiniteQuest < 15) showmessage aaInfiniteFailMessage setstage aaInfiniteQuest 200 Set Countstate to 0 EndIf endif
END

scn aaInfiniteWantedPosterSCRIPT
short Activated
Begin OnActivate Player
If Activated == 0 showmessage aaInfiniteProcessMessage resetquest aaInfiniteQuest startquest aaInfiniteQuest set aaInfiniteQuest.Started to 1 set Activated to 1 endif
END

scn aaInfiniteFingerSCRIPT
Begin OnAdd Player
SetStage aaInfiniteQuest 15
END

scn aaInfiniteTimerSCRIPT
short state float fTimeStart float fTimePassed
Begin Gamemode
If state == 1 Set fTimeStart to GameDaysPassed Set state to 2 ElseIf state == 2 if fTimeStart == 0 set fTimeStart to GameDaysPassed endif set fTimePassed to (GameDaysPassed - fTimeStart) * 24 if fTimePassed > 24 aaInfiniteWPREF.enable set aaInfiniteWPREF.Activated to 0 Set state to 0 stopquest aaInfiniteTimer endif endif
END

scn aaInfiniteTargetHighSCRIPT
short deadstate short deadstartday
short captured short Button
short failcheck
Begin OnLoad
If failcheck == 0 if GetStage aaInfiniteQuest == 200 set failcheck to 1 disable markfordelete else set failcheck to 1 endif endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaInfiniteQuest < 10 additem aaInfiniteFingerHigh 1 setstage aaInfiniteQuest 10 endif
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin OnActivate Player
If GetAV Fatigue <= 0 if captured == 0 ShowMessage aaLiveBountyMessage endif else activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( captured == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed if ( button == 1 ) ;RemoveFromFaction SlaveFaction ;removescriptpackage FFER19SupermutantCaptiveCaptured removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxWeaponDrawnEditorLocation512 addscriptpackage aaGenericTurnMyselfInPackage additem aaBountyCollar 1 equipitem aaBountyCollar 1 1 set captured to 1 ;reset fail timer set aaInfiniteQuest.Countstate to 1 ; ai shit ignoreCrime 1 setav aggression 0 setav confidence 0 sayto player flee ResurrectActor 1 evp endif endif
If captured == 1 If GetDistance aaBCJInteriorMarkerRef <= 2500 ;target turns himself/herself in showmessage aaUnmarkedTurnIn set aaInfiniteQuest.LiveBountyHigh to 1 setstage aaInfiniteQuest 177 set captured to 2 disable markfordelete endif endif
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 1 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaInfiniteSidekickScript
short deadstate short deadstartday
short failcheck
Begin OnLoad
If failcheck == 0 if GetStage aaInfiniteQuest == 200 set failcheck to 1 disable markfordelete else set failcheck to 1 endif endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
end
Begin Gamemode
ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 1 Set deadstate to 2 disable markfordelete EndIf endif
END

scn aaInfNightkinGenSCRIPT
short DoOnce short combatcheck short soundcheck float timerEffect
int Cloaked ; 0 = Stealth Boy effect not on ; 1 = Stealth Boy effect on ; This var is meant to ensure we never try to remove ; the effect when it's not already on.
short deadstate short deadstartday
short failcheck
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 Set deadstate to 2 disable markfordelete EndIf endif
END
begin onLoad
ModActorValue sneak 100
; Add the effect, update the flag if Cloaked == 0 addspell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ;ShowWarning "Cloaking on load!" set Cloaked to 1 endif
set soundcheck to 0 set timerEffect to 0
If failcheck == 0 if GetStage aaInfiniteQuest == 200 set failcheck to 1 disable markfordelete else set failcheck to 1 endif endif
end
begin OnSTARTCombat set combatcheck to 1 end
begin OnCombatEND set combatcheck to 0 ; ShowWarning "Combat ending!" end
begin OnDeath set combatcheck to 0
; If the nightkin is currently using the Stealth Boy effect, remove it if Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 endif
end
begin GameMode ref refvar set refvar to this
;if GetDetected player ; startcombat player ;endif
; Backup check to decloak nightkin after death if (GetDead == 1) && (DoOnce == 0) && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
if combatcheck == 1 ref mytarget set mytarget to refvar.GetCombatTarget else ; If not in combat, use Stealth Boy again if refvar.GetDead == 0 && Cloaked == 0 addspell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ; ShowWarning "Not in combat, cloaking!" set Cloaked to 1 set soundcheck to 0 endif endif
; Have nightkin decloak when they attack if GetAnimAction == 2 && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 PMS NightkinCloakFXShader 1 if soundcheck == 0 refvar.PlaySound3D OBJStealthBoyActivate set soundcheck to 1 endif endif
end

scn aaInfNightkinHighSCRIPT
short DoOnce short combatcheck short soundcheck float timerEffect
int Cloaked ; 0 = Stealth Boy effect not on ; 1 = Stealth Boy effect on ; This var is meant to ensure we never try to remove ; the effect when it's not already on.
short deadstate short deadstartday
short failcheck
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaInfiniteQuest < 10 additem aaInfiniteFingerHigh 1 setstage aaInfiniteQuest 10 endif
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 Set deadstate to 2 disable markfordelete EndIf endif
END

end

; Backup check to decloak nightkin after death if (GetDead == 1) && (DoOnce == 0) && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
if combatcheck == 1 ref mytarget set mytarget to refvar.GetCombatTarget else ; If not in combat, use Stealth Boy again if refvar.GetDead == 0 && Cloaked == 0 addspell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ; ShowWarning "Not in combat, cloaking!" set Cloaked to 1 set soundcheck to 0 endif endif
; Have nightkin decloak when they attack if GetAnimAction == 2 && Cloaked == 1 RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 PMS NightkinCloakFXShader 1 if soundcheck == 0 refvar.PlaySound3D OBJStealthBoyActivate set soundcheck to 1 endif endif

scn aaBountyBatonSCRIPT
Begin OnHit
Ref BoxingGoldenGloveTarget Set BoxingGoldenGloveTarget to GetOwnerLastTarget
If (BoxingGoldenGloveTarget != PlayerRef) && (BoxingGoldenGloveTarget.GetIsCreatureType 6 != 1) BoxingGoldenGloveTarget.damageav Fatigue 40 Else BoxingGoldenGloveTarget.damageav Health 10 EndIf
End

scn aaValleTunnelTriggerSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If GetStage aaFinal < 8 setstage aaFinal 8 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaValleEntranceTriggerSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If GetStage aaFinal < 10 setstage aaFinal 10 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaCCBackpackSlaveScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && ( DoOnce == 0 ) ;Break Legs Setactorvalue LeftMobilityCondition 0 Setactorvalue RightMobilityCondition 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveMinerMessageBoxM elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveMinerMessageBoxF endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) ;SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 removeitem slavecollar 1 removeitem NVSlaveBackpack 1 RemoveFromFaction NVCCSlaveFaction Addtofaction NCRFactionNV 1 removescriptpackage FortSlaveBackpackPatrol addscriptpackage aaCCSlaveFleePackage Setactorvalue LeftMobilityCondition 100 Setactorvalue RightMobilityCondition 100 evp set SpecialFreed to 1 set aaNVBIISomeguy02.SlaveCount to aaNVBIISomeguy02.SlaveCount + 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance aaCCSlaveEscapeMarkerRef <= 512 set aaNVBIISomeguy02.SlaveMadeIt to aaNVBIISomeguy02.SlaveMadeIt + 1 set SpecialFreed to 2 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

scn aaPGMapScript
Begin OnAdd Player
If GetStage aaNVBIISomeguy02 == 30 showmessage aaPGBookMessage SetStage aaNVBIISomeguy02 35 endif
END

scn aaBentleyNote02Script
Begin OnAdd Player
If GetStage aaNVBIISomeguy02 == 39 showmessage aaBentleyNoteMessage SetStage aaNVBIISomeguy02 40 endif
END

scn aaSomeguy02StartTriggerSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
If (aaNVBIISomeguy02.JoaquinGreeted == 0) && (SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus == 1) if GetStage aaFinal >= 190 set aaNVBIISomeguy02.JoaquinGreeted to 1 aaJoaquinREF.evp disable markfordelete endif endif
END

ESP.TRADUIT: 奥尔沃德的疯狂婆罗门

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
In a time marked by barbarism, treachery, and strife, true heroes are scarce. However, the Mojave now has a veritable champion wandering its lawless expanse, &PCName;. The title of "Bounty Hunter" doesn't do this person justice, as they've single-handedly reversed the insidious onslaught of organized criminality in the region. Recently &PCName; conducted a laborious pursuit of "Red Bear", a ferocious killer and slave trader. Despite seemingly insuperable obstacles and the murderous machinations of his prey, &PCName; persevered and terminated Red Bear; the decision to utilize lethal force was made only after strenuous efforts to capture the criminal alive and render due process proved unsuccessful. It is only fitting that Red Bear met a violent end after ferrying so many innocents to an untimely demise.
I wish to commend &PCName; for this accomplishment, and I hope the NCR will consider augmenting the bounty hunter's compensation. We are seldom blessed by such intrepid souls who are willing to brave the feral hazards beyond civilization, ergo it is necessary to reward their sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
在一个充满野蛮与暴虐、背叛与变节、争斗与冲突的时代，英雄，是极其稀少的。然而莫哈维是如此得幸运，拥有一名英雄气概的真正的守护者，不遗余力地为正义而战，他有一个响亮的名字--&PCName;。这位自称为“赏金猎人”的英雄为这片废土抛头颅洒热血，流尽了每一滴汗。最近，他费尽心血终于终结了一个废土“红熊”，这个家伙是一个穷凶极恶的杀手和丧心病狂的奴隶交易贩。尽管在追击途中面临一系列艰难险阻，但&PCName;以坚韧的毅力顽强地战胜一切困难，最后终结了红熊的生命。再使用致命武力之前，他仍然试图为法律的实现活捉红熊，但在红熊坚强的抵抗和严峻的形势下，他不得已采取了以保卫人民生命财产为优先的最终选择。他的选择是明智的，他的选择是伟大的。
考虑到&PCName;在追击过程中的艰险重重，我强烈建议NCR当局对我们的英雄做出物质或财力上的补偿。我们需要改变，我们需要重新审视&PCName;为我们带来的这一切的价值。不要让我们的英雄受苦受累，因为他为我们付出得太多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Adam Rzeznik. He is wanted for conducting slavery and human trafficking. He was last sighted near Wolfhorn Ranch. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Adam Rzeznik or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 亚当·泽尼克。他因为经营奴隶和人的非法贸易被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在狼角农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ambrose,
On behalf of the syndicate, thank you for your flexibility in the recent coverage of &PCName;'s actions in the Coyote Courier. You can count on my full support as long as you continue to expose the aforementioned bounty hunter's misdeeds.
Sincerely, Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
安布罗斯,
我代表我们财团向你近期在山狼快递处揭露&PCName;的罪恶行为表示感谢。只要你继续监视&PCName;的行为并及时提供报告，你就可以得到我们财团大力支持。
真诚的, 菲斯克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources report that &PCName; has assassinated Sergio Booth, mayor of Valle del Hierro, respected entrepreneur, and musician. Before murdering the town's democratically elected leader, &PCName; slaughtered the entire population of Valle del Hierro, leaving over twenty three dead and countless wounded behind. "It was a fucking massacre, and that bounty hunter didn't even try to talk... that crazy fuck just came in guns blazing! All my friends are dead," said Joe Silver, a surviving citizen who suffered a leg wound.
After finding Valle del Hierro a derelict ghost town, Booth successfully transformed the dusty shell into a bustling hub of free commerce, unencumbered by government regulation or interference. Now his dream is another victim of &PCName;, who has served to undermine justice, civility, and commerce at every opportunity.
Thanks to this new class of bounty hunters, life is cheapening in the Mojave. I fear these depredations will soon be at the doorstep of the average citizen, and not just those at the fringes of government reach. Perhaps the NCR will begin dispatching their assassins for offenses like loitering, jaywalking, and other misdemeanors.
To employ these bloody rogues is not the act of a reasoned government, but a paranoid police state. Caesar's Legion will find the Mojave warm and receptive if this naked oppression persists.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
消息报告说，&PCName;涉嫌谋杀瓦尔德耶罗的市长、杰出的企业家和音乐家--塞尔吉奥.布斯。在杀害这名由当地民主选举推选出来的领导人之前，&PCName;血洗了整个小镇，一路留下了超过23具尸体和数不胜数的伤员。“这简直就是场大屠杀。从头到尾他连眼都没眨。我的朋友都死了！”乔.席尔瓦说。乔虽然幸存下来了，但是只剩下了一条腿。
在发现瓦尔德耶罗这座被遗弃的鬼城后，布斯成功地将这座空荡荡的小镇变得人声鼎沸，热闹非凡。他通过杰出的领导才能在当地建立了有效的司法系统，是整个小镇逐步走上复兴的轨道。
由于赏金猎人这个阶级的出现，人命开始变得越来越不值钱，我担心有一天他们会把枪口对准无辜的平民。他们现在看起来道貌岸然，其实背地里都是贪婪金钱的亡命之徒。也许将来NCR有一天会发现，他们在这条路上已经走得太远了而无法回头。
雇佣这些嗜血之徒不该是一个理性政府的所作所为，除非他们对局势的控制已经无能为力。如果再这样持续下去，相信不久，凯撒军团一定会发现这个地区对他们的到来会非常欢迎和包容。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mather,
After you're finished with &PCName;, get rid of Dillon. He's a treacherous bastard, and I don't like his moustache, so slit his throat. Meet me outside the Sunset Sarsaparilla Headquarters like we agreed. When you show me &PCName;'s head, I'll deliver the payment.
- Red Bear
ESP.TRADUIT:
马瑟,
一旦你干掉了&PCName;，尽快也搞定迪伦。他是个奸诈的混蛋，而且我不喜欢他的胡子，一定要把他的喉咙割断。在日落沙士汽水中心见我。把我一看到&PCName;的头，我就会立刻付给你赏金。
- 红熊

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Red Bear DOB: c. 2240 Place of Birth: Unknown Sex: Male Allegiance: Independent Raider
Assessment: Formerly an accomplice of Marko, Red Bear has ruthlessly established himself as the premiere slave-catcher in the Four States Commonwealth over the past decade. He commands a gang of roughly two dozen renegades at any given time, and trades in captives with several factions in the Mojave. Our current trade arrangement is profitable and strategically advantageous, but he should be monitored closely during any transactions. He is just as cunning as his mentor, though not as dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名: 红熊 出生时间: 公元 2240 出生地址: 未知 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立强盗
评估: 红熊以前曾是马尔科的同谋，他以残暴奴隶主的身份在“四洲合众国”闻名于世。他手下有一帮匪徒听他指挥，帮助他在莫哈维个大集团之间展开大笔奴隶交易。我们目前的贸易和商业还是有利可图的，但要时刻警惕这个家伙。虽然他现在还不构成危险，但须要防患于未然。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
Fuck that fucking goddamn ghoul in the ass!
Doc Friday killed two of my men yesterday, just as they were robbing some bitch on the road. Word has it that he was, "Defending her honor". What a fucking sap! I should head down there and crush his ugly fucking skull into bits.
He's bad for business, and yet nobody has the balls to take him down. Gustav is fucking useless, along with most of this crew. The only way the Vipers are going get a piece of the action is if we stop taking shit from clowns like this ghoul "gunfighter".
Of course, I'd take him on myself, but I have urgent, pressing matters here at the camp - like supervising these idiots around me. If I leave for more than 5 minutes, this place falls apart.
I'll write ya' next week. Red Bear's bringing a shipment in, so I gotta wrap this up.
- Slade
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
草，操死那个食尸鬼混球！
“星期五”医生昨天杀了我两个人，就因为他们在路上抢劫一个婊子。他说什么“保护她的尊严”......操他妈的，我真该赶快到现场给他两枪！
他对我们的生意造成影响，现在还没人有胆找他的事。古斯塔夫就一妈逼懦夫，他和他的人一样没用。我们现在在这件事上毫无进展，拿他一点办法也没有。
当然，如果必须的话，我会亲自干掉他，但我现在有更紧急的事--这里现在乱成一团，如果我离开超过5分钟的话，这个地方一定会闹翻天的。
我下星期再给你写信。红熊马上就要带着货物来了，我要先搞定这件事再说。
- 斯雷德

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chingate, pinche mercenario hijo de puta!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶奶的，赶快带些雇佣兵干掉这个混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Boss,
We looked all over that bunker but we couldn't locate Fisk's safe. An NCR patrol was bearing down on us, so we had to make our exit before we could conduct a thorough search. We found the key to his safe, though, and I did like you instructed. It's hidden in your house and "under guard" so to speak. I'll make sure the boys are posted up in the towers. Once &PCName; is dead, we'll have to rig up another display to match the ranger's.
- Mike
ESP.TRADUIT:
老板,
我们搜查了整个地堡，但我们就是找不到菲斯克的保险箱。由于有一支NCR巡逻队正在向这里靠近，我们不得不取消彻底搜查的计划撤出这个鬼地方。但我们找到了他保险箱的钥匙，我很感激你之前的指点。现在它藏在你的屋子里，被我的人“守卫”着，我已经安排他们都聚集在塔楼上了。一旦&PCName;死亡，我们会赶快找另一具尸体，然后把它打扮得和那个赏金猎人一模一样。
- 麦克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brad,
Fat Charlie told me one word about where that Legion gold is stashed:
"Scavenge"
I don't know what that lardass was thinking of, cause that doesn't tell me shit about where he stashed that gold. For six hours I worked that bastard, cutting his skin, stabbing his balls with an icepick... he didn't say anything until I put his head in a workbench vice and squeezed out an eyeball. Jesse and I failed to notice that Charlie had been bleeding out - he had managed to cut his wrists while we were working the vice.
It's probably Charlie's private little joke on us while he was in his death throes. Regardless, you better pull your shit together, cause you haven't made a score in a few weeks, and the boys are apt to get restless if you don't get some income.
On top of all that, the Legion is bound to be sending men after that lost shipment, and word has it that some Regulators have drifted in and are on the prowl. Oh, and just to make things interesting, that bounty hunter from Randall & Associates is now taking on work for the NCR, which means you'll inevitably get in his crosshairs (or was it a her?).
If you find that stash, Fisk is gonna set you up for life, guaranteed. He's got the damn key, all he needs is the location, and we get paid.
- J.D.
ESP.TRADUIT:
布莱德,
胖子查理关于军团金币的藏匿处只告诉我一个词：
“拾荒者”
我不知道他在说什么狗屁东西，因为他事实上什么也没说。我整整花了6个小时在这家伙身上，先是割肉，然后且他JJ......他还是什么也不说，直到我用工作台把他一颗眼球挤爆为止。因为我和杰西忽然发现，他已经流血过多身亡。
这很有可能是查理跟我们开的小玩笑，因为他知道即使告诉我们他还是要死。总之接下来你尽快去寻找线索，我们已经有几个星期毫无进展了，在这样下去小伙子们要闹翻天的。
最要紧的是，军团已经派人开始四处搜寻了。此外，我还听说，有些监管员已经悄悄进入莫哈维。哦，对了，之前那个兰道尔同伙会的赏金猎人现在正在为NCR工作，这很有可能意味你会进入他（她？）的十字准心。
只要你找到了那堆金子，菲斯克就会重重奖赏你，从此你的下半生就可以无忧无虑了。他有那个箱子的钥匙，事成之后确定好会见地点，然后我们拿好钱就直接走人。
- J.D.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials reported that &PCName; has slain Sergio Booth, the kingpin of Valle del Hierro, and an aspiring warlord. Booth's death was the culmination of a dangerous operation outside NCR territory, as Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail, said, "This was a high-risk operation, so I sent in the very best, &PCName;." Despite a rampart of countless raiders and bloodthirsty miscreants, the gallant bounty hunter stormed the town and felled the devious Booth.
In recent months Valle del Hierro burgeoned as a nest for the collective slime of the wastes - raiders, slavers, outlaws, and other parasites flocked to the festering enclave in the Sheep Range. "They was like flies to dogshit. Should've hanged em," said an unnamed NCR ranger. Their reunion was no accident - Sergio Booth masterfully engineered the town's growth, all while consolidating his power in the region's underworld. If not for the acts of &PCName;, Booth's nefarious ascent would have gone unchecked.
Citizens were relieved to hear about the news. "I hope that bounty hunter kills them all, goddamit! Raiders made my dog into jerky," said Joe Parmley, prospector. The collapse of Valle del Hierro capped off a broad decline in organized crime in the Mojave since &PCName; began making inroads against villainy.
Sergio Booth had long marauded through vast territories between Nevada and the Great Plains, and was reputed to be of relation to the shadowy mass murderer known as "Marko", whose whereabouts are unknown. We can hope that &PCName; will continue this righteous crusade and root out the furtive evildoers lurking in our midst.
OBITUARIES Lt. John Ramsey, 29, died in service of his country at Valle del Hierro, Nevada.
At his request, no service will be held.
Lt. Ramsey was born May 30, 2252, in Cloudcroft, New Mexico. At a very early age, his family was killed and he was enslaved by Caesar's Legion. He managed to escape at age 14 and join the Desert Rangers.
Lt. Ramsey served in the New California Republic Rangers for over ten years as a scout/sniper, operating in multiple theaters. He spent 8 months at Firebase Zulu, where he distinguished himself in combat and earned a battlefield commission. In 2281, Lt. Ramsey was transferred to the Boulder City Jail.
He is survived by a son, Abraham.
Condolences may be sent to the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
NCR官方报告，&PCName;已经杀死了瓦尔德耶罗的领主--塞尔吉奥.布斯。刺杀塞尔吉奥的行为是NCR最近几年在地区之外执行的最危险的任务。巨石城上尉拉里.斯科尔说：“这项行动具有极高风险，因此我们派了我们最好的部下&PCName;前往执行命令。”尽管那里有无数的强盗和数不尽的嗜血佣兵，英勇的&PCName;还是像秋风扫落叶一般轻松扫荡整个城镇，并当场致塞尔吉奥于死地。
回首最近几个月，瓦尔德耶罗逐渐成为一个新的犯罪分子聚集地--那里汇集了来自各地的强盗、土匪、奴隶、逃犯以及各种被常规社会所抛弃的人。“他们就像涌向狗屎的苍蝇，真该把他们绞了。”一位匿名NCR游骑兵说。这群人重新聚集在塞尔吉奥身边，企图继续加强自己的实力，吸引更多的邪恶之徒前来此地。但这一切计划在&PCName;到来之后都成了泡影。
公民们听到这条消息一定会感到很轻松。“我就知道那个赏金猎人没问题！草，早知道我就把我的狗推荐给他了。”探险家乔.帕姆雷说。瓦尔德耶罗的覆灭大大降低了莫哈维边境的犯罪现状，&PCName;重新为这片土地带来了安定的曙光。
塞尔吉奥长期在内华达和大平原之间流窜犯案，他与一个叫“马尔科”的影子一般的杀手有着千丝万缕的联系，而那个家伙至今行踪不明。我们希望&PCName;能够继续他追寻正义与和平的旅程，为莫哈维的和平与稳定做出自己的贡献。
讣告
中尉. 约翰.拉姆齐, 29, 死于执行任务过程中, 地点：瓦尔德耶罗, 内华达
按他生前所愿，不得举行任何典礼仪式。
拉姆齐中尉于2252年5月30日，在新墨西哥的克劳德克罗夫特出生。在他很小的时候，他的家人就被凯撒军团所杀。他在14岁的时候从军团脱离，加入了沙漠游骑兵。
拉姆齐中尉，于新加州共和国游骑兵军队里，驻守过多个区域，累计担任10年狙击手和侦察兵。在祖鲁火焰基地，他赢得了一场战斗的胜利，为自己和NCR赢得了荣誉。2281年，他被转入巨岩城监狱。
他就像你的孩子一样，亚伯拉罕，请收留他。
吊唁请寄往巨岩城监狱。谢谢。
大汗帮激进主义者被杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed "The Mongol Kid", leader of The Mongols, a Khan activist organization. The insensate bounty hunter resisted the kid's pleas for mercy, and instead executed the hapless youth. "The kid might have been a punk, but he didn't deserve that," said an unnamed source within the Khans.
Of course, the NCR is mum about the actions of &PCName;, who continues to flout the boundaries of law and morality for personal profit. It's a repulsive state of affairs when our leaders are utterly insouciant about utilizing such dregs in the name of justice. I call upon our elected officials to put a halt to this practice, and bring fitting charges against &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出&PCName;最近杀了蒙格尔.基德，他是蒙格尔帮的首领。这个没有丝毫怜悯心的赏金猎人拒绝了基德宽恕的请求，无情地结束了他可怜的生命。“尽管基德不是一个好人，但他不该遭受如此的下场。”一位来自大汗帮的匿名人士说。
当然，现在的NCR就是&PCName;前的一道屏障，尽管这个家伙的所作所为都是为了个人利益，但任何对他的指责都动摇不了NCR对他的支持。我强烈呼吁，现在是到了我们重新审视当前态势的时候了，有关当局应立刻停止这种百无利而存弊的做法，针对&PCName;之前犯下的所有有关罪行提起诉讼。.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials stated that &PCName; recently terminated the outlaw known as "The Mongol Kid", a known felon wanted on charges of kidnapping and murder. "Freak was too big. Cut his head off," said an anonymous NCR ranger.
The Mongol Kid developed a reputation as a fearsome kidnapper prone to kill his victims regardless of ransom payment, and as such was ejected from the Khans. Consequently the kid formed a radical group called "The Mongols" which targeted NCR citizens.
While the precise circumstances surrounding the Mongol Kid's death are unknown, sources indicate he obstinately resisted offers to surrender, and remained bent on a violent death, which &PCName; grudgingly provided.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方宣称&PCName;最近终结了一个叫“蒙格尔.基德”的罪犯，这家伙被指控犯有绑架和谋杀。“这家伙个头太大。把头直接割了了事。”一位匿名NCR游骑兵如是说。
蒙格尔.基德以恐怖的绑架闻名，因为他会不管被害者已提交的赎金，照杀不误，而这种做法在可汗帮自己人看来也无法接受。所以最终他不得不被迫远走高飞，成立自己的分支“蒙格尔人”，专门绑架NCR公民。
尽管关于他的死详情不明，但有消息说，因为他拒绝投降，所以被&PCName;绳之以法，就地处决。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate the NCR's head bounty hunter, &PCName;, recently assassinated Jacob Powers, head of the Ghoul Liberation Army, a centre-left organization dedicated to protecting the civil rights of ghouls through nonviolent means. "Jacob Powers is a hero to ghouls everyone. He will be remembered as a hero and a martyr," said Nathaniel Keller, a ghoul merchant.
NCR Officials had accused the GLA of unorthodox recruitment methods, and utilized the spurious charges to legitimize their efforts to snuff out Powers' strident dissent. "He never hurt anyone," said Mary Lang, ghoul, "And this goes to show how the NCR really views its ghoul population. It makes me wonder if we'd be better off on our own, away from human bigotry."
In addition to wanton vigilantism, &PCName; can now add political terrorism to the list of offenses. As we approach the centennial of our fair republic, we should reflect on some of its founding principles: liberty, equality, and opportunity. I believe that President Tandi would shudder at the widespread use of mercenaries and assassins to subjugate the Mojave. Our leaders should be ashamed.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出，NCR的头号赏金猎人&PCName;最近暗杀了雅各布.鲍尔。鲍尔是食尸鬼解放联盟的领袖，这个组织意在以非暴力和平方式争取整个莫哈维地区食尸鬼的公民权利。“雅各布.鲍尔斯是每一个食尸鬼的英雄，他是一名烈士，他是一个传奇。”食尸鬼商人纳撒尼尔.凯勒说。
NCR官方指责GLA的招募士兵行为，称这对地区的和平安全造成严重损害。“他从来不伤害任何人，”食尸鬼玛丽.朗说，“这彻底揭露NCR对食尸鬼群体的态度。这让我怀疑我们是否还有必要和人类生活在一个屋檐下。”
除了威胁社会治安，&PCName;现在又开始涉嫌政治恐怖主义。随着我们纪念共和国百年庆典的到来，我们应该回顾当初我们成立的基石：自由、平等、机会。我相信我们的丹迪总统会为目前在莫哈维横行的暗杀行为和拜金主义战栗的。我们的领导人应该为此感到羞耻。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials recently confirmed that the Mojave's sterling champion, &PCName;, managed to kill Jacob Powers, a known kidnapper, murderer, and communist. For years Powers had overseen the kidnapping and ghoulification of defenseless humans from across the Mojave.
Based in an underground compound beneath the old test site, Powers was protected by an army of feral ghouls and heavily-armed militants. Braving heavy radiation and hordes of ferocious zombies, &PCName; successfully infiltrated Powers' compound and terminated the foul terrorist. "This was a remarkable operation - no other bounty hunters considered Jacob Powers to be a feasible target. I should've learned by now not to underestimate &PCName;," said Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
Powers' organization was responsible for over thirty kidnappings; most of the victims were children. Ghoul and human alike were pleased to learn of his death, as Stephanie Hicks, ghoul, said, "I hope humans understand that Powers was not indicative of ghouls in general. He was a hateful fanatic, and all right-minded ghouls are glad to see him go."
The Coyote Courier would again like to challenge NCR officials to augment &PCName;'s compensation for the hazardous work and personal sacrifice required to bring such nefarious outlaws to justice. If the NCR can afford the assortment of pusillanimous plutocrats that litter its territories, certainly it can properly reward a valiant soul like &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方最近证实，莫哈维的守护神&PCName;已经成功杀死集绑架、谋杀、密谋叛乱于一身的雅各布.鲍尔。这些年鲍尔从莫哈维绑架了大量毫无防御力的平民，并将他们人工转化为食尸鬼。
鲍尔把基地建立在一个旧核试验测试中心的地下，那里武装着大量食尸鬼。迎着严重的核辐射危险和大量武装部队的迎面痛击，&PCName;成功侵入到鲍尔基地内部，将那里所有的恐怖分子扫荡一空。“这真是一件壮举！没有任何人能比得上&PCName;，而我也学到了不要轻易低估任何一个人的实力。”巨石城监狱的长官，拉里.斯科尔上尉说。
鲍尔的组织要为超过30起绑架案负责，其中大部分受害者都是儿童。不论是食尸鬼还是普通平民都为他的落网感到高兴，正如一个食尸鬼斯蒂芬妮.希克斯说的，“我希望人们相信，鲍尔并不能代表我们这一类所有人的意志。他不过是个妄想狂徒，所有心智正常的食尸鬼都希望他早点死。”
山狼快递处依然要向NCR官方挑战他们对&PCName;的补充，就这么一点奖赏是远远不够弥补&PCName;为了完成任务所要冒的风险的，更何况遭受大量核辐射还会对&PCName;的身体产生严重影响。我们强烈要求NCR官方正面回复我们的质疑。现在在莫哈维，还有谁能质疑&PCName;为我们所有人做出的贡献呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Some gnomes are loyal. They always tell the truth.
Some gnomes are knaves. They always lie.
Others are dastardly spies. You must punish them!
Gnomes do not abide injustice - should you mistakenly kill a loyal gnome or a hapless knave, the consquences will be dire.
ESP.TRADUIT:
有些侏儒很诚实。他们总是说实话。
有些侏儒是无赖。他们总是说谎。
其他人则是卑鄙的间谍。你必须惩罚他们!
地精不会容忍不公正--如果你错误地杀死了一个诚实的地精或一个倒霉的无赖，将会有可怕的后果。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I want to commend you for assisting the NCR as a bounty hunter. Many of the targets you dispatched and/or captured were dangerous miscreants that had long eluded justice. I doubt that anyone will match your accomplishments as an agent of the criminal justice system.
With that said, I want to inform you that a new opportunity exists - both for personal profit and in assisting the republic. As it so happens, a high-profile prisoner is offering to divulge valuable intelligence, though she refuses to speak with anyone but you. I urge you to meet with me posthaste, so that we may discuss the details.
You can find me at our safehouse, located beneath Buchan's Odds and Ends, a general store near our sharecropper compound.
Sincerely, J. Wickham
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName,
我想表彰你作为赏金猎人对NCR的协助。你所消灭&抓获的许多目标都是长期逃避司法审判的危险的恶棍。我怀疑没有人能比得上你作为刑事司法系统代理人的成就。
话虽如此，我还是想告诉你，现在有一个新的机会，既可以为个人谋取利益，也可以帮助NCR。碰巧，一个高调的囚犯提出要泄露有价值的情报，但她拒绝和除了你以外的任何人说话。我恳请您尽快与我会面，以便我们可以讨论细节。
你可以在我的安全屋找到我，它就在我们的佃农大院附近的布坎杂货店下面。
真诚地,
j .维克汉姆

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed the geriatric matriarch of the Burns family in a raid on the clan's private distillery. NCR Officials declined to comment on the incident, deigning only to state that the Burns were suspected of running an illegal bootlegging operation, and that &PCName; used "Reciprocal Force". Given &PCName;'s track record, this claim is specious at best.
Saul Burns, husband to the murdered Elza Burns, said, "That pig didn't even give my darling a chance. He just up and killed her along with the rest of them. All this bloodshed is gonna come back and bite that bounty hunter in the ass. Mark my words." NCR officials refused to comment on the Burns' lawsuit against the state.
This marks a new low for the NCR and its chief cutthroat, &PCName;. Is the republic so desperate that it must outsource the targeted killing of old ladies? I sincerely hope the Burns' civil suit finds traction in court, and that the officials responsible are ultimately forced to answer for this gross malfeasance.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出&PCName;最近参与了一起针对彭斯家族族长的谋杀。NCR官方拒绝就此评论，只是不断强调彭斯家族正在从事某些违法经营活动，而&PCName;据此采取了“适当的措施”。根据&PCName;以往的行动记录，我对此表示非常怀疑。
萨尔·彭斯，被谋杀的艾尔扎·彭斯的丈夫，说：“那头猪根本就没有给她任何解释的机会。一个软弱的女性就这样残忍地死在他手里。屋子里到处都是鲜血的痕迹。”NCR官方对这番话依然沉默无声。
这是否说明了NCR理屈词穷？难道我们的共和体连这样一个可怜的老人都不放过？让我们大声问问&PCName;，你到底还有没有良心？我真诚地希望他们中能有任何一方勇敢地站出来，给生者一个交代，好让死者放心远去。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials confirmed that &PCName; successfully terminated Elza "Grandma" Burns, head of the Burns clan and the chief conspirator behind the brutal murder of Captain Gary Winstone and his family. "Some people operate beyond the confines of civilization and common morality, so extraordinary measures are necessary to effect justice. We're proud to report that &PCName; was able to collect the bounty on both Jake Burns and Grandma Burns," said Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
We should take heart in the relentless pursuit of justice by &PCName;, as well as the probity, courage, and leadership that mark this bounty hunter's every deed. The NCR needs more people like &PCName;, who elect to follow a path rife with obstacles, personal hazard, and endless sacrifice. Perhaps this bounty hunter will eventually move into the field of politics - &PCName; can certainly count on the Coyote Courier's endorsement.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方证实，&PCName;成功剿灭艾尔扎“祖母”。她是彭斯家族的族长，加里·温斯顿上尉一家惨案的缔造者。“有些人把法律当儿戏，把当局不放在眼里，任由自己的行为对社会文明秩序造成严重冲击。我们现在很自豪地向大家报告，&PCName;已经肃清了这帮捣乱分子。”巨石城监狱的负责人--拉里.斯科尔上尉说。
我们要用心牢记&PCName;对正义孜孜不倦的追寻，以及他的正值，勇气和独有的领导才能。NCR需要更多像&PCName;这样勇于自我奉献，勇于自我牺牲的人。这个杰出的赏金猎人将来有一天一定能步入政界，不过请他记住来我们自山狼快递的赞美之词。
通缉: 艾伯特.奎斯琳

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1,000 caps for the capture of Albert Quisling. He is wanted for High Treason and sharing state secrets with Caesar's Legion. He was last sighted at Cottonwood Cove. He should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Albert Quisling or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以1000个瓶盖悬赏 艾伯特·奎斯琳。他因为叛国、通敌和向凯撒军团投降被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在科顿伍德洞穴。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed "Red Kelly" and the entirety of the Kelly family in a serpentine ambush near Spring Mountain Ranch State Park. The slain include five unarmed adults, two infants, and a helpless puppy. NCR officials declined to comment, and ostensibly no charges will be filed against &PCName;, who has once again flouted justice with these monstrous acts.
The Kelly family had subsisted in the wilderness in recent months, forced out of their home by the avarice of politicians. Fearing for their lives, the Kelly family spent most of their existence underground, only venturing out to scavenge supplies and gather food. By all accounts they were harmless. "They never hurt nobody," said Gary Straight, prospector, "And the damn government just kept shitting all over them, just like the rest of us. Goddamn taxes and bureaucrats. Maybe Caesar should take over!"
Suspected of committing misdemeanor robbery and vandalism, the Kelly family soon found themselves in the sights of &PCName;, who capitalized on the opportunity to supplant an ever-growing body count of innocents. "That bounty hunter just stomped that baby to death, then fed it to coyotes," said Bart Thompson, merchant, "And it just made me want to vomit. Of course, I didn't say nothing cause &PCName; would sure as slit my throat if I did!"
The NCR now has the blood of the Kelly family on its hands, thanks to the ongoing support for misanthropic animals like &PCName;. After due research I unearthed a quote from a tribal chieftain of the old world, Thomas Roosevelt, who said, "For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed lunatic fringe, enthroned an invisible government owing no allegiance and acknowledging no responsibility to the people is required." We should bear this in mind when considering the actions of &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出，&PCName;最近在春泉山农场国家公园屠杀了“莱德.凯莉”和他整个家族。受害者包括5名成年人、两给小孩和一只可爱的小狗。NCR官方拒绝就此评论，看起来&PCName;不会受到任何指控，他又一次成功地逃脱了法律的制裁。
凯莉一家最近几个月一直在荒野求生，他们之前因为一些政治家的贪婪被赶出了自己的家园。为了坚强地生存，他们被迫活在地下，只是偶尔出来寻找一些补给和食物。种种迹象表明，他们完全是无辜的平民。“他们从来不伤害任何人。”探险家加里.斯威特说，“可恶的政府相对野狗一样对待他们，我们也是。可恶的税收和愚蠢的官僚，要是凯撒能接管这里该多好！”
由于涉嫌小型抢劫和艺术品破坏，凯莉一家被&PCName;盯上。“那个赏金猎人只会把小孩摔在地上，然后扔去喂野狼。”商人巴特.汤姆森说，“他的行为让我感到恶心。我永远也不想再提起这个让我倒胃口的名字！”
现在NCR的手上沾满了凯莉一家的鲜血，这完全是由于那个反人类的野兽&PCName;造成的。在经过一番调查，我找到了一位来自旧世界的部落首领，托马斯.罗斯福，他说：“水能载舟，亦能覆舟。”我们要牢记他的格言。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR officials confirmed that &PCName; has accomplished another daring act in the tireless pursuit of justice and philanthropy. Recently the plucky bounty hunter confronted the devilish, inbred rogues comprising the Kelly Gang, a terror squad committed to sowing havoc at every opportunity. Despite repeated offers for the terrorists to surrender in peace and accept a plea bargain, "Red Kelly" and his heathen relatives would have nothing of it. "They were a bunch of bloodthirsty bastards," said Fred Pharcas, medic, "And the Mojave is a better place without them. Every loyal citizen of the NCR is glad to see them dead."
Disgruntled by a petty land dispute, the irascible Kelly family took to banditry and murder as a means of protesting the NCR's presence in the Mojave. "It was nothing, as I recall," said Richard Sibelius, brahmin herder, "And they got butthurt real quick, then turned to murdering anybody with an NCR patch on them. I could tell from the start they was freaks."
Recently members of the Third Church of the Desert conducted a prayer service in honor of &PCName;. "&PCName; will lead us to the higher plane, so we pray for this sacred instrument of justice," said Heather Glenn, priestess, "And in time we may cleanse this land of taint and wickedness!"
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方证实&PCName;又完成一项艰巨而勇敢的任务，正义和仁爱有一次得到弘扬。最近，这为英勇的赏金猎人单枪匹马干掉凯利帮。这是个恐怖主义团伙，他们在这片和平的土地上到处制造创伤。在要求他们和平投降的提议被拒绝后，莱德.凯莉和他的人终于收到了英雄的制裁。“他们就是一群嗜血的混蛋，”军医弗雷德.哈卡斯说“莫哈维如果没有他们会变得更好。每一个莫哈维正值的公民都会对他们的死感到高兴。”
由于陷入与NCR的土地纠纷，凯莉家族将对NCR的仇恨撒播到整个莫哈维。“我记得完全是他们的问题，”双头牛放牧人理查德.西贝里斯说，“简直就是无理取闹，他们后来以向NCR复仇的名义骚扰在这一片所有的莫哈维公民。从一开始他们就疯了。”
最近，沙漠第三教堂的成员聚集在一起为&PCName;唱赞颂诗-- “&PCName;会带领我们走向新生活的曙光。我们为他祈祷，我们为正义欢呼，”海瑟.格伦神父说，“只有他才能帮助我们在这里建立起以一片神圣的乐土。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Cobb,
As you requested, I conducted an inquiry into the identity of your brother's killer. It is none other than &PCName;, the troublesome bounty hunter who is now employed by the NCR. As this person is disrupting my own interests, I have an offer: if you terminate &PCName;, I will forgive all outstanding debts owed by the Powder Gangers to the syndicate. Unless otherwise notified, I will assume this offer is accepted, and thus I eagerly await news of &PCName;'s death.
Sincerely, Mr. Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
柯布先生,
应你的要求，我仔细调查了一下有关杀死你兄弟的凶手身份。不是别人，正是&PCName;干的，而这个家伙就是那个名声显赫的赏金猎人，他现在正在为NCR工作。同时，这人现在与我也有点小矛盾，如果你想要干掉&PCName;的话，我会尽我可能向你提供帮助，并免除炸药帮之前与财团的一切负债。我相信你会接受这份建议，现在我已经急切地希望听到&PCName;死的消息。
真诚的, 菲斯克

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the capture of "Uncle Chuckles". He is wanted for kidnapping, cannibalism, and murder. He was last sighted near Freeside. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Uncle Chuckles or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR悬赏1000瓶盖捉拿“丘克尔斯叔叔”。他因绑架、食人和谋杀而被通缉。最后一次看到他是在自由城附近。他应该被认为是有武器的危险人物，只有有武器的专业人员才能追捕他。为了获得赏金，把咯咯笑叔叔或他死亡的证据交给巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Atticus,
Salve!
The traitor has been processed and assigned to the underground lab. Caesar has some specific duties lined up for him, but I can't imagine any purpose that profligate turncoat could serve. I despise the intellectual pretense and his clear disdain for combat. He would be better served by picking up a gladius and killing some of those NCR scum. I can't imagine how his brother turned out so differently. Anyway, Si vales, bene est, ego valeo.
Vale, Aurelius
P.S. And thank you again for that delicious meat pie recipe!
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿提克斯,
神圣的主!
叛徒已被处理，他已被派到地下实验室去。我非常怀疑这么个软蛋如果到战场上去的话能有什么作为？他最好只负责去帮忙清扫战场，收拾那些NCR的尸体。实在无法想象他和他的兄弟差别竟然如此之大。不管怎样，这是我跟人的想法。
告别, 艾瑞利尔斯
P.S. 再次感谢你给我的美味鲜肉派配方！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Pancho Cortina. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near the southern passage. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Pancho Cortina's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 潘乔·科迪纳。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在南方通道附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
I swear Red Bear just straight screws us with some of these captives. Take this blonde girl, for example. She should've been worth at least a few thousand caps to the legion as a "comfort girl" as they call them. Red Bear told me she was, "docile and horny", and as soon as he leaves camp, that bitch goes haywire. I had to beat her for an hour straight before I could get inside her crazy ass!
That's not the half of it - as soon as we doze off, she runs away, apparently not giving two shits about the proximity device in her slave collar. I managed to catch her, and just to keep her in line I give her a 'tap' with the old super sledge. It must have broken her back or something, cause she couldn't move shit afterwards. She's damaged fucking goods now, no thanks to Red Bear. He's supposed to beat these bitches into submission before delivery, but it must have slipped his mind. Or maybe the little girl just had more heart than the average slave. You never know. Either way, that's a couple thousand down the tubes.
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
我发誓，红熊送来的那几个奴隶几乎快把我们搞垮了。就拿那个金发女孩来说，她再怎么说卖给军团当“慰安妇”的话至少也值几千个瓶盖。当时红熊告诉我，她“温顺而淫荡”。但他妈的他一走，这女孩就跟疯了似的。我花了整整一小时不停地揍她，才把我那玩意儿顺利插到她屁股里！
这还没完，我一完事，她撒腿就跑，她脖子上那个项圈简直就是个屁。我费了好大的劲才抓住她，然后想用老式的铁锤教训教训她。一不小心，好像打到她背了，现在她一步也走不动了。她的背好像伤得挺厉害的，这都亏了那个红熊。要不是他当初不好好管教这些奴隶，他们现在怎么会这么不听话？除非这个女孩就是个特例。反正我们也不知道。不管怎么说，至少几千个瓶盖没了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Jake Burns. He is wanted for the murder of an NCR Ranger. He was last sighted near Crescent Canyon. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Jake Burn's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail. Bounty Hunters are strongly advised to consult with Captain Scull before undertaking this bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 詹克·彭斯。他因为杀害一位NCR游骑兵被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在新月峡谷附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。强烈建议赏金猎人在执行任务前先向斯科尔上尉进行必要的咨询。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of "Prometheus". He is wanted for terrorism, sedition, murder, and numerous felonies. He was last sighted at Black Mountain. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 普罗米修斯。他因为恐怖行动、煽动骚乱、谋杀和其他大量重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在黑山。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The new motion sensor is in place, which puts my mind at ease. Some of the men are bitching, but I think it's a good measure. The NCR is indifferent to us, but there are plenty of enemies out there who'd love to bury this place.
This is terrific technology, as anyone or anything that penetrates the barrier will unleash ED-211 and those damn dogs. I think Mr. Joshua is putting steroids in their food, which tends to make them... erratic. Commander Meston insists on keeping the dogs, as he is reluctant to embrace technology. He's a hard bastard, but sometimes that "I'm a hidebound Spartan badass" routine gets old.
ESP.TRADUIT:
新的行动感应器已经就位，我现在已经稍稍放了心。有些人老是发牢骚，但我觉得这玩意儿很棒。NCR对我们漠不关心，但外面依然还有很多人希望把这里夷为平地。
这项科技非常尖端，只要一有什么东西触动它，会立刻启动ED-211和释放那些疯狗。我觉得约书亚先生可能在它们的食物里加了类固醇，这样会令它们性格变得更加暴虐。梅斯顿长官坚持要求继续饲养这些狗，因为这个老家伙对新型科技的接受程度极低无比。虽然他原本是个强硬的老混蛋，但在地下呆的久了也会憋成一坨屎。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Grandpa
We're gonna get &PCName;, that's the name of the fucking ape who killed grandma. I hear that bounty hunter sure has a pretty mouth. I reckon we'll have some fun before we kill that bitch.
-Reuben
ESP.TRADUIT:
祖父,
我们一定要抓住&PCName;，就是这个混蛋家伙杀了我们的祖母。我听说这个赏金猎人有一张漂亮的嘴。我想在我们把他干掉之前一定会先玩得非常开心
- 雷本

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Joshua,
For the last time, I want no posters or paraphernalia in the barracks or anywhere in this facility. We're here to work, study, and rest, nothing more. I'll tolerate the gambling and what not, but I don't want to see pussy galore draped across the walls when I inspect the men's quarters, understood? These men need to spend more time cleaning their weapons, and less time jerking off.
- Commander Meston
ESP.TRADUIT:
约书亚先生,
我想最后一次提醒你，兵营或其他地方决不允许再让我看见任何有关女性的海报和成人用品。我们来着是工作、学习和修身养性，仅此而已。我可以容忍赌博或别的什么东西，但不要让我再看见那些遍布墙上的裸体女郎海报，明不明白？这些人需要花更多时间擦拭他们的武器，而不是被那些色情图片分心。
- 指挥官 梅斯顿

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ricky,
I want you to know that I'm doing alright. I made it past the initiation, and I've got a few bruises to show for it. I'm definitely in better shape. I always assumed that exercise was a lost cause as a ghoul, but the NCO's have taught me otherwise. "Mens sana in corpore sano," is what one of the sergeants keeps repeating. I think he used to be with Caesar's Legion, but we don't talk about our old lives.
Ghoul #1 runs a tight ship, but we never see him. He stays down in that lower cavern, where they take most of the captives. I heard someone say there's an even deeper level, where all the ferals stay. I can hear them at night sometimes, always scratching, hacking, and screeching. Ghoul #1 calls them brothers and sisters, but I'm uncomfortable around them.
The main reason I wanted to write you is because I want you to stay away. I know we get treated like shit by a lot of the smoothskins, but I don't think this will help. We've done things that I'm ashamed to mention, supposedly for the sake of ghouls. We're forcing them to become ghouls, at least the ones that survive the radiation. A lot of them lose their minds and go feral right away.
I've made a commitment, and I intend to honor it, for better or worse. All I ask is that you honor my wishes and stay home. I've got a feeling that we're headed for trouble. Ghoul #1 claims that we're invincible, but I know better.
Take care of yourself, and look after Bart.
Your friend, Zack
ESP.TRADUIT:
里奇,
我想让你知道我在这里一切都好。我已经通过加入仪式，成为这里正式一员，但目前的身份还是新兵。我的长官教了我很多东西，他跟我谈了很多在战场上的作战技巧。我猜他以前是凯撒军团的人，因为我们对自己的生活一直是闭口不谈。
食尸鬼#1管理着这里的一切，但我们从来没有见过他。他一直呆在那个小屋里，那里都是被他们抓来的俘虏。我听说地下还有更深的一层，里面都是野生食尸鬼。有时在夜里我可以听到他们发出的嘶嘶叫声，挠墙声，喧嚣声。食尸鬼#1称那些都是我们的兄弟姐妹，但我还是感觉浑身不舒服。
我给你写信的主要原因，是因为我希望你走得越远越好，我有种不好的预感。我们在这里干的一切令我感到羞愧。我们强迫他们接受辐射，很多人瞬间就完全丧失了心智。
我已经做出过承诺，我要遵守自己的誓言，不论生或死，不论成与败。我所希望的就是，你尊重我的想法，好好呆在家里。我觉得我们离某种危险越来越近。食尸鬼#1说我们是不可战胜的，但我自己心里清楚我们的分量。
好好照顾你自己，帮我问候巴特。
你的朋友, 扎克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ghoul #1,
The next set of captives have been placed in detainment. Out of the last collection we gained one initiate and two ferals. The remaining ten succumbed to radiation poisoning.
We will continue with the organized beatings, sleep deprivation, and broadcasts as you instructed. Thank you for permitting the men to take liberties with the smoothskin women. The practice has augmented morale and further serves to objectify the captives, so the rank and file are reluctant to sympathise with the bourgeois scum.
Respectfully, Ghoul #4
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
我发誓，红熊送来的那几个奴隶几乎快把我们搞垮了。就拿那个金发女孩来说，她再怎么说卖给军团当“慰安妇”的话至少也值几千个瓶盖。当时红熊告诉我，她“温顺而淫荡”。但他妈的他一走，这女孩就跟疯了似的。我花了整整一小时不停地揍她，才把我那玩意儿顺利插到她屁眼里！
这还没完，我一完事，她撒腿就跑，她脖子上那个项圈简直就是个废物。我费了好大的劲才抓住她，然后想用老式的铁锤教训教训她。一不小心，打到她背了，现在她一步也走不动了。她的背好像伤得挺厉害，草，都因为那个红熊。要不是他当初不好好管教这些奴隶，他们现在怎么会这么不听话？除非这个女孩就是个例外。反正我们也不知道。不管怎么说，至少几千个瓶盖没了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I get out of this chickenshit outfit?

Hicks,
Did you hear about the new order on posters and pornography? The fucking XO, Mr. Jackass himself said that there's supposed to be no girly magazines or anything, not even a goddamn centerfold! What kind of candy-ass unit doesn't let red-blooded men enjoy the sight of a beautiful woman when he's off duty? This is such bullshit... I should've stayed in the NCR.
Anyway, my tour's almost up. Two more weeks and I'm outa here! I heard that bounty hunters are making good money these days, so I may try my hand at that profession.
- Hudson
ESP.TRADUIT:
希克斯,
你听说了关于大幅海报和照片的新命令了？太你妈操蛋了！那坨废物居然认为这里什么都不该有，草！一个正常的男人在执行完任务后回来，他妈的连个看看女人照片的权利都没有，草他妈啊！……早知道还不如就呆在NCR。
总之，我在这下面的“观光”快结束了。再过两周我就可以出去了！我听说现在赏金猎人挺好赚钱的，我也想亲自尝试一下，或许换个职业也不错。
- 哈德森

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ghoul # 1,
The first part of the northern reconnaissance and scavenging mission was successful. We easily avoided the drug-addled fiends and the inept NCR conscripts. However, we did engage another unit in the Sheep Range, up near Hayford Peak.
The opposing force consisted of roughly five humans and at least one ghoul, all in prepared positions. We were utterly surprised and lost three comrades in the initial exchange of fire. As soon as we found cover and set up to return fire, the enemy had absconded. It was dusk, and we were unfamiliar with the rugged terrain, so I elected not to attempt any pursuit. However, I did conduct a brief inspection of their position, and a strange hat with a symbol from the old world - it looks like some type of bird hovering over a planet, with a crude pickaxe in the background. I will submit it along with the report.
We left the dead and made a hasty return to the valley. Aside from a close call with a Legion patrol, it was an uneventful trip. I accept full responsibility for the death of our comrades.
Respectfully, Ghoul # 9
ESP.TRADUIT:
食尸鬼 #1,
我们在北部的侦查行动第一阶段顺利完结。我们轻松避开了喜欢嗑药的恶魔帮和傻逼一般的NCR。但是，我们在绵羊山脉的海弗峰遭遇了一支敌军单位。
对方有5个人和一个食尸鬼，都处于警备状态。我们被突袭，在初次交火中损失了3个战友。找到隐蔽处后我们开始还击，对方立即崩溃。因为天已近黄昏，我们对那一带也不是很熟悉，所以我没有命令追击。但是，我确认了他们的逃跑方向，并且发现一个源自旧世界的奇怪标记--看起来像某种鸟，围绕着一个星球，背景还有一把尖嘴锄。我会把它随报告一起提交。
我们没有处理尸体就匆忙赶回来了。除了中途与一支军团的巡逻队擦肩而过外，一路顺利。我要对我手下阵亡的战友承担全部责任。
向您表示尊敬, 食尸鬼 #9

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Frank Elko. He is wanted robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near the Emergency Service Railyard, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Frank Elko's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 弗兰克·埃尔科。他因为抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在紧急服务铁路广场附近，身边还有别的同伙。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Emmett Curry, a known leader in the Vipers organization. He is wanted for murder, armed robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted at El Dorado Gas & Service, along with several Vipers. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Emmett Curry's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 埃米特·卡里，他是一个毒蛇帮组织的头。他因为谋杀、军火抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人在某个汽修站见到。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有拥有执照的专业人士才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brad,
I know that Commander Meston wants to deter us from going to sick call, but for fuck's sake, I wouldn't use that doctor even if I was on the verge of death!
A couple weeks back, Henderson went in for a toothache, and later I could hear him screaming in there, and all Dr. Szeller would say was, "Is it safe?"
What kind of shit is that? I hear he used to work for the Enclave, and that's why he's with Shadow Company now, but it's probably scuttlebutt.
So, the moral of the story is: don't get sick when you're working for Shadow Company!
- Jones
ESP.TRADUIT:
布莱德，
我知道梅斯顿指挥官想阻止我们去请病假，但看在他妈的份上，即使我快要死了，我也不会使用那个医生！
几周前，亨德森因牙痛去了医院，后来我听到他在里面尖叫，塞勒医生只会说，“安全吗？”
那是什么狗屎？ 我听说他曾经在英克雷工作，这就是他现在在暗影公司工作的原因，但这可能是天方夜谭。
所以，这个故事的寓意是：在暗影公司工作时不要生病！
- 琼斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We, the representatives of the Consul Officiorum, have this day bargained and purchased from Slade of the Viper Encampment the exclusive rights to ownership and sale of the slaves Jessica Smith, Debbie Weaver, and Andra Foster for the sum of five thousand bottle caps. We warrant the slaves to be sound, healthy, and slaves for life. We covenant with the said, Slade, that we have full power to bargain and sell said slaves.
M. Scribonius Libo Drusus et al. Administrators of M. Licinius Crassus, Consul Officiorum ab Famulatus
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们，作为奥菲希罗执政官的代表，今天在这里向毒蛇帮营地的斯雷德，以5000瓶盖的总价，购买奴隶杰西卡.史密斯、黛比.韦弗和安德拉.福斯特的所有权和交易权。我们保证这几名奴隶健全、健康，终身为奴。我们与斯雷德签订合约，公证以上所说的全部誓言。
M.思科博尼斯.里博.德拉瑟斯 等 长官 M.李锡尼厄斯，奥菲希罗执政官 副手

我看见你了。
要跑就快点。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Charlie Halfcocked DOB: c. 2245 Place of Birth: New Reno (Speculation) Sex: Male Allegiance: Independent Contractor
Assessment: While Tom Quigley was long touted by the NCR to be the greatest marksman in the region, most operators agree that Charlie Halfcocked is the most gifted shot in the Mojave. He has over 200 kills to his name, and possesses a customized Anti-Material Rifle called "The Penetrator" in honor of his illustrious member.
Halfcocked is rumored to have learned his craft from an individual known simply as "Vasily", whose whereabouts are unknown.
Charlie's real name is unknown, but the title "Halfcocked" derives from his intemperate nature, and the combat wound which severed his penis in half. He is reliable, efficient, and not to be underestimated. If you need one shot and one kill, then Charlie is the man for the job.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名:“半截屌”查理 出生时间: 公元 2245 出生地址: 新里诺（推测） 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立合约者
评价: 在汤姆·奎格雷被NCR宣扬成这片地区最厉害的枪手时，大部分行家却一致赞同“半截屌”查理是莫哈维最天才的神射手。他一共完成过200多次击杀，有一把专门定制的反器材步枪--“渗透者”以纪念自己的荣誉。
“半截屌”查理的精湛枪法据说是跟一位叫“瓦西里”的人学的，而那个家伙现在行踪不明。
查理的真名没人知道，倒是他的别名挺有一番味道。凡是中了他的枪的人，一般阳物都只剩下一半。他人可靠，办事高效，绝不能小瞧。如果你需要你的目标一击毙命，那么查理一定就是你梦寐以求的那个家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The left door leads to a swarm of deadly Cazadors.
The middle door leads to a throng of feral ghouls.
The right door leads to Deathclaws that haven't been fed in six months.
Which door will you choose?
ESP.TRADUIT:
左边的门通向一大群致命的猎蜂。
中间的门通向一群凶猛的食尸鬼。
右边的门通向六个月没吃过饭的死亡爪。
你会选择哪扇门?

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: The Mongol Kid DOB: c. 2260 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Former Khan; leads an offshoot called "The Mongols" Poster Location: Boulder City Jail
Charges: - Aggravated Assault, 07/14/2275 - Possession of Jet with intent to distribute, 01/24/2276 - Kidnapping, 05/02/2280 - Kidnapping, 06/13/2280 - Kidnapping, 10/15/2280 - Murder, 02/11/2281 - Extortion, 03/25/2281 - Kidnapping, 08/20/2281 - Kidnapping, 09/25/2281
Bounty: $250 Alive, $100 Dead
Notes: Once a valued member of the Khans, The Mongol Kid recently left the gang to form a radical splinter group known as "The Mongols". Their primary pursuits are drug trafficking, kidnapping, and gun running. The kid is reputed to be a charismatic leader, although sources within the Khans are skeptical of his abilities, citing a lack of physical courage. One informant indicated that The Mongols are operating near the site of Lone Wolf Radio. The Mongol Kid has personally overseen the kidnapping of at least a half-dozen individuals, usually taken from families with property. Ransom was paid in five cases; one victim (a child) was returned alive, while the other four were murdered despite payment by the victim's family.
Tactical Considerations: The Mongol Kid is physically robust and rumored to be adept with the Bumper Sword and other melee weapons. Nonetheless, rumors indicate he has a limited tolerance for pain, so inflicting injuries might prompt him to surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 别名: 蒙格尔.基德 出生时间: 2260 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 前可汗帮; 领导一支分支“蒙格尔人” 布告地点: 巨石城监狱
指控: - 袭击, 07/14/2275 - 非法占有杰特, 01/24/2276 - 绑架, 05/02/2280 - 绑架, 06/13/2280 - 绑架, 10/15/2280 - 谋杀, 02/11/2281 - 敲诈, 03/25/2281 - 绑架, 08/20/2281 - 绑架, 09/25/2281
赏金: $250 活捉, $100 死亡
备注: 蒙格尔.基德以前是可汗帮的一个重要人物，最近他离开可汗帮成立一支分支，他称其为“蒙格尔人”。他们的主要违法行为包括非法交易、绑架，以及枪支走私。这家伙据说是个有魅力的领导者，但有消息指出他其实只是个懦弱的软蛋。蒙格尔人在独狼电台附近活动。他们最近已经至少参与了6场绑架活动。有5件案子的赎金已经支付，其中1个受害者（一个小孩）已经返回，剩下4个受害者依然被杀害。
战术布置: 蒙格尔.基德身体强壮，手舞巨刀。但有谣言说他中看不中用，在战场上一点小伤就容易令他投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear &PCName;,
It's me, Randall.
I'm sorry it took so long to contact you. For a while I wanted to be sure you weren't in on my assassination attempt, but I've ruled that out. Besides, everyone has heard of how you smoked Sergio in that street. It made me proud to hear that you were still hunting down those bastards.
In case you're wondering, I'm in fair health, all things considered. I'm glad you plugged Sugar, but deep down I'd give anything for a shot at that motherfucker for what he did to me. To make a long story short, I've been buried, irradiated, tortured, enslaved, and ghoulified... that's right, I'm a goddamn zombie now.
There's a lot to explain, but I'm short on time. I'll leave you with this - I'm up in Utah, trailing a lead on Marko. I might not have much time left on this shithole planet, but I'll spend every last minute making sure he faces justice. I suspect he's holed up in an outlaw town way up in the mountains, a place called Frosthilll. It will take some planning and firepower to clean that place out, so I'll send for you when the time is right.
Your Friend, Steven Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的&PCName;,
是我，兰道尔。
我很抱歉，隔了这么久才联系你。之前我一直担心你被卷入刺杀我的行动，都是我把一切搞得那么糟。此外，现在到处都有人在讨论，你把塞尔吉奥打得冒烟的故事。你能继续追踪那些可恶的混蛋，我为你感到自豪。
你不要为我担心，我现在一切都好，一切正常。我很高兴你把“糖”干掉了，但一想到那天他对我做的一切，如果能给我机会的话，我愿意不惜一切代价亲手让那个混蛋脑袋开花。长话短说，我后来被他埋了，受到辐射，遭受折磨，身体发生变化......然后就变成食尸鬼了。恩，我现在就是个僵尸。
要跟你说的东西太多了，我现在可能还没这个功夫。我要告诉你的是--我现在正在前往犹他的路上，追踪一条导向马尔科的线索。我能活着见到他的时间可能不多了，但即使只剩下最后一秒，我也要让他接受法律的制裁。我觉得他目前可能在一个叫冰霜山岭的地方，那是一个与外界隔离的小镇。要清理那里可不容易，所以时机合适的时候我会和你联系。我觉得现在是开启审判者之章的时候了，正义与法律现在需要我们。
你的朋友, 斯蒂文.兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Sam Burrow. He is wanted for Robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Mountain Shadows Campground. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Sam Burrow or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 山姆·伯罗。他因抢劫、和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在山影野营地附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm being held captive by the Vipers, so I'm writing this at night. They're all drunk right now, and tired from... using me. I'd run, but this slave collar will blow me to bits if I get more than 50 meters away from Slade. He bought me from Red Bear for 10 bottles of whiskey... I guess that's what I'm worth out here.
As bad as Slade is, he's still an improvement over Red Bear. At least they give me food and water, and they don't beat me as much. They mainly just... well, you know...
Don't tell my family about the bad stuff if you find this. Just tell them I'm alive, that's all. They don't need to hear anything else. God willing, I'll make it through this. Slade is taking me to their camp, though I don't know where it is. I'm so scared... I think they're going to just use me up and then do away with me. I have to stay strong. Tell Ma and Pa I love them.
Please help me, Janie Parker
P.S. They kept saying something about "The 95" when they mentioned where we're going.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我被毒蛇帮的人俘虏了，这封信是我在黑夜里写的。他们现在喝醉了，而且累了……用我用累的。我想跑，但只要我离那个斯雷德超过50米，我脖子上的项圈就会把我炸成碎片。他从红熊那用50瓶威士忌买了我……我现在大概也就只值这些了。
虽然他也很坏，但至少比红熊好那么一点。至少他们给我食物和水，而且很少打我。他们只是……额，你知道……
如果你发现这封信，不要告诉我的家人在这里发生的一切。只要告诉他们我还活着，就行了，他们不需要听到别的。上帝保佑，我一定要挺过来。斯雷德要把我带到他的营地去，我不知道那是哪，我很害怕……我想他们就是想每天弄我方便。我一定要坚强起来。告诉我的妈妈和爸爸，我爱他们。
请帮助我, 珍妮.帕克
P.S. 当他们谈到要去的地方时，他们一直说什么“第95”。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
Red Bear just delivered his captives, but he said he's not going back to the wilderness. He said he wants to, "Check out New Vegas", which probably means his usual raping and pillaging.
