I don't know how long he's going to be in the area, but I don't have to tell you that you should keep your distance. When he and that gang are on the loose, nobody, not even the Khans or the Fiends will put up a fight. Keep your merchandise hidden, and if he comes to trade, just accept his terms, ok? You're a good business partner, and I don't want to lose you. Red Bear has a way of popping up when you least expect it, so keep your eyes open, comprende?
Otherwise we're making good money off the legion. They might act high and mighty, but they've got needs like everyone else, but at least they always pay up front. We supply the captives, and they give us their weird currency.
I'll keep you posted on Red Bear. We go back a ways, so he'll let me know when he's heading back north.
-Slade
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
红熊已经递交了他的俘虏，但他说他再也不会回来了。他说他想“离开新维加斯”，这可能意味着他是想操起他的老本行，强奸和抢劫。
我不知道他什么时候才能到，但我要提醒你，你要跟他保持距离。即使他的人已经开始松散，但无论是大汗帮还是恶魔帮都不敢轻易向他挑战。让你的雇佣兵隐藏好，如果他来了，提出的条件尽管接受，好么？你是一个好的伙伴，我不想失去你。红熊总能在你最松懈的时候给你出其不意，所以时刻睁大你的双眼，记住了？
否则我们就会和军团做生意。他们很强很有势力，但也像任何人一样有需求，而且他们总是先行支付。我们提供俘虏，他们提供古怪的货币。
我会继续和你联系的。我和红熊走的是一条路，所以他会让我知道他计划什么时候出发向北出发。
- 斯雷德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Nathan,
I heard ya'll were stocking up on stimpaks, seeing as to how the locals are extra paranoid about &PCName;, who they expect to raid the town at some point.
That's a load of horseshit - no lawman or bounty hunter is stupid enough to roll into Valle del Hierro, at least not without a company of rangers backing them up. It's one thing to kill Tony Idaho or some strung-out fiends, but to come up here? That's ridiculous.
I also saw you hired Big Bob the other day. Just make sure you don't let that simple bastard drool on the merchandise. He's a mean fuck, I'll give him that. One time I saw him spend an entire afternoon decapitating dogs with that axe. I guarantee the junkies won't fuck around in your shop.
- Doc Hayes
ESP.TRADUIT:
内森,
我听说你储备了大量的治疗针，因为这里大部分人都对&PCName;怀有莫名的恐惧，生怕他一瞬间屠掉整个小镇。
这完全是杞人忧天--没有哪个家伙或是赏金猎人能愚蠢到，在没有整整一个排的部队支援下，敢和整个瓦尔德耶罗作对。就那家伙，干掉托尼.爱达荷这种恶魔帮的白痴还可以，但到这来？痴心妄想。
我还看见你招募了大鲍勃。你要小心，这家伙可不是省油的灯。有一次我看见他花了一下午用一根斧头不停地砍狗头。我向你保证，这种家伙如果出现在你的店里，绝对会搞得一团糟。
- 医生 海耶斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Johnson,
I thought Arthur Ribben was long since gone, but I could've sworn I saw him outside Novac last week. It couldn't be him, right? He'd have to be crazy to stay in NCR territory - they'd hang him on the spot for what he did at the oil rig! I'm interested to hear back from you on this.
- Carter
ESP.TRADUIT:
约翰森,
我之前一直以为阿瑟·里本已经死了，但我发誓我上星期在诺瓦克外看见他了。不过我不确定，他一定是疯了才会呆在NCR的地盘--他们要是知道了一定会把他扔到河里的！我很期待能听听你的看法。
- 卡特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fisk,
One of my constituents insists that she saw her former captor and tormentor, Arthur Ribben. That senile cow was practically hysterical, as if the devil himself had moved into the Mojave!
I blew her off, naturally, but since she was so damned earnest about it, I have to ask: is Arthur Ribben really here? I know you're going to laugh at my question, but that old fool almost has me convinced. Furthermore, she claimed he lived in Novac! Preposterous!
Anyway, your last "donation" will be fine for my campaign fund. Thanks for your help.
Best, Clay
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲斯克,
我的一个委托人坚称，她看到以前逮捕并折磨她的家伙，阿瑟.李本。这头老牛都快成历史传说了，她说得似乎恶魔真的来到莫哈维似的！
很自然我把她赶走了，但她说得如此信誓旦旦，我不得不问一下：阿瑟·里本真的在莫哈维吗？我知道你会嘲笑我这愚蠢的问题，但那头蠢猪差点让我信她。此外，她还说他就住在诺瓦克！太荒谬了！
对了，你上次的“捐赠”非常慷慨，现在我的活动基金非常充裕。非常感谢你的帮助。
祝福, 克雷

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: Red Bear DOB: c. 2240 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independent Raider Poster Location: Goodsprings General Store
Charges (Only those documented in NCR territory): - Kidnapping (eight counts), 05/22/2268 - Slavery (five counts), 03/21/2271 - Murder (three counts), 03/21/2271 - Murder (five counts), 08/03/2274 - Slavery (seven counts), 08/03/2274 - Murder (eight counts), 11/14/2279 - Kidnapping (three counts), 11/15/2279
Bounty: $2500 Alive, $1000 Dead
Notes: Red Bear is the most notorious kidnapper and slave-trader to ever have entered the Mojave. Fortunately, he conducts most of his operations outside NCR territory, only entering the region every few years for specific business interests. He is known to arbitrarily murder, pillage, and kidnap during his treks through the wasteland. He is also suspected of murdering at least three NCR personnel and over a dozen members of the Khans.
Tactical Considerations: Red Bear is perhaps the most accomplished knife-fighter alive, having outdueled countless Khans, legionaries, and captured rangers. He is known to practice duels with "worthy" captives that may offer a proper challenge, though ostensibly he has never lost a match. Even though he's aging, Red Bear possesses uncanny reflexes and hand speed - personnel are strongly advised to resist any offers of a knife duel should they find themselves in captivity.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 绰号: 红熊 出生时间: 2240 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立强盗 布告地点: 清泉镇综合商店门口
指控（仅包括在NCR领地上的罪行）: - 绑架 (人数：8), 05/22/2268 - 奴役 (人数：5), 03/21/2271 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 03/21/2271 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 08/03/2274 - 奴役 (人数：7), 08/03/2274 - 谋杀 (人数：8), 11/14/2279 - 绑架 (人数：3), 11/15/2279
赏金: $2500 活捉, $1000 死亡
备注: 红熊是从外面来到莫哈维的混蛋里最臭名昭著的家伙。幸运的是，他的大部分奴隶交易活动都在NCR领地之外，每隔几年才会为了特别的商业利益来到莫哈维。他以肆意谋杀、武装抢劫及绑架人质在废土恶名远扬。他也被怀疑杀害了至少3名NCR人员和数十名可汗帮成员。
战术布置: 红熊也许是最熟练的刀具专家，他已经干掉了无数的可汗帮人、军团的人，并俘虏了大量的游骑兵。他总是寻找任何可以决斗的对象，并且从来没有输过一场对决。即使年纪已经不小，但他的反应依旧十分机敏，建议任何单独面对他的合约者尽量避免以他的方式进行决斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
In recent times, the Mojave has transformed from an idyllic haven for placid tribals into a burgeoning hub of avarice, bloated with greedy outsiders that have exploited its underclass for their monetary gain. Amidst this gross disparity in class and wealth, many of the poor and downtrodden have turned to drugs in an effort to blot out their despair and misery.
Instead of properly addressing the needs of its most vulnerable citizens, the NCR has dubbed this ilk of hapless addicts "Fiends", and built a stupendous myth of criminality and bestial aggression around these desperate souls.
Normally, hateful slander and reductionist appellations would suffice for the NCR's slimy bureaucrats, but not in the Mojave. Here they call upon &PCName;, the bane of the Mojave's underclass! With gelid nerves and a black heart, this so-called bounty hunter preys on New Vegas' underprivileged, underfed, and unwanted.
In recent months these "Fiends" managed to rally around a handful of charismatic leaders who energized their ranks, and stoked the flames of revolution, only to be snuffed out by that plutocratic tool, &PCName;. Most recently the "Fiends" arranged a conference with &PCName; at Zapp's Neon Sign in order to promote an exchange of ideas and possibly cement a peaceful understanding.
Sources indicate that &PCName; abruptly rejected any notion of discussion, and instead elected to shoot and bludgeon the defenseless addicts at will. Their stalwart leader, "Lobo", attempted a desperate defense in order to shield several small children who had fallen under &PCName;'s merciless blade, but to no avail. Over a dozen individuals were slain, including three children.
A witness reported &PCName; could be heard shouting, "I'm gonna kill you, puppies!" and "Barbacoa is delicious!" repeatedly. This is a dark day indeed for New Vegas' honest citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
最近一段时间，莫哈维已经从一个平静的天堂变成一个混乱的中心。各种外来者蜂拥一般涌入这个地区，不仅造成社会动荡，而且几乎且灭了人们对平静生活的渴望。于是，大量的人开始靠吸食毒品，试图找回藏匿于内心深处的净土乐园。
然而NCR不仅没有对当前社会动乱采取任何措施改进，反而采取以暴制暴的方法，在称呼那些人为“暴民 恶魔帮”的同时，派遣部队血腥镇压这些绝望的灵魂。
通常，民众的强烈反应都会对当局造成压力，但可惜这里莫哈维，他们找来了&PCName;，这个莫哈维真正的恶魔！这个有着一副冷峻面孔和冰冷内心的赏金猎人令整个莫哈维的民间社会动荡不已。
最近一段时间，这群“恶魔帮”的人中间出现了几位极具魅力和远见的领导人。他们点燃了复兴的星星之火，相信凭他们的努力可以燎原。他们邀请&PCName;到乍普的霓虹灯工厂会面，计划相互交换意见以达成和平共处的共识。
但有消息说，&PCName;粗鲁地拒绝了他们的提议，相反在现场对那些手无寸铁的人展开了一场屠杀。所有的人都倒下了，包括他们杰出的领袖“洛勃”，为了保护几名无助的孩子而惨死在&PCName;的刀下。最终，死者共计数十人，包括3个孩子。
有目击者报告，听到&PCName;的大声喊叫，“我要杀死你，你这只狗！”以及“蠢货，你的血还不够擦我的鞋！”这是莫哈维最黑暗的一天，足以载入史册。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
The title of "Fiend" has developed into one that evokes fear, disdain, and pure hatred from the honest citizens of the Mojave. Not content to merely poison themselves with narcotics in a lifelong fit of self-pity, they turn their addiction into a vehicle for aggression and wanton destruction, preying on innocents at every turn. For years, the NCR was at a loss as to how to undo their relentless grip on Vegas' ruins and Vault 3 - until &PCName; arrived.
Thanks to this gallant bounty hunter, the Fiends have found themselves on the defensive, their leaders repeatedly brought to justice by &PCName;'s daring actions. So used to acting as the terrorists, it was foreign for these shiftless barbarians to find themselves suddenly terrorized, and it has shown. Unfortunately, a new leader recently emerged: Lobo.
The lupine maniac managed to rally the Fiends and urge a new offensive, wreaking havoc on convoys, caravans, and other innocents. He was rumored to throw puppies and severed heads off the roof of Zapp's Neon Signs as a source of amusement.
Knowing that &PCName; would eventually come calling, Lobo set a devilish trap in the old neon sign factory, confident the bounty hunter would finally be felled by feral cunning and deception.
Instead, the intrepid hunter broke through the ambush, and ultimately disemboweled the nefarious Lobo with his own chainsaw. As it now stands, the Fiends are on the brink of annihilation, having sunk to the depths of the lowly Jackals and Vipers. We can hope that time and their innate disorganization will hasten their collective demise.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
恶魔帮，现在已经成为制造恐惧、高傲自大和撒播仇恨的代名词。不用说他们荒淫无尽的生活充满了腐烂和罪恶，对毒品的上瘾和滥用也令他们的身躯走向狂暴与自我毁灭。他们在莫哈维的每一个角落制造混乱，所过之处断壁残垣伤痕累累。NCR在维加斯的边缘废墟和3号避难所与他们的战斗中损失惨重。然而，随着&PCName;的到来，一切出现了转机。
由于这位豪侠一般的赏金猎人的出现，恶魔帮突然发现他们已经处于防御态势，他们的领导人一次又一次地命丧黄泉。以前他们一直扮演恐怖分子的角色，现在他们反而成了恐怖分子&PCName;的受害者。关键时刻，一个新的领导人最近站了出来，他名字叫洛勃。
这个凶残的疯子重新聚集起了恶魔帮，行成一股强壮的力量，再次对莫哈维的安全造成威胁。有谣言说，他喜欢把狗头钉到霓虹灯上，因为他喜欢这样消遣。
由于清楚&PCName;一定会有所反应，洛勃在老霓虹灯工厂设下了一个致命的陷阱。他相信自己的狡诈，自信可以轻松等待&PCName;自投罗网，然后让他命丧此地。
然而，我们无谓的勇士突破了埋伏，将洛勃等一干人马全数歼灭。自此一役，恶魔帮元气大伤，处于崩溃边缘。他们退居废墟深处，隐藏在豹狼帮和毒蛇帮之后。此一新维加斯大患终为&PCName;所灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of John Dunn. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Lucky Jim's Mine, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of John Dunn's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 约翰·杜恩。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在幸运吉姆矿场附近，身边有多名同伴随行。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jesse,
Bentley says his contact is offering extra for captives, so try to take them all alive. Use the stun grenades and bean bags to take them down, it should be easy pickings after that.
We've finally managed to get settled into this cave. Since you're a forgetful fuck, I'll remind you - it's located northeast of the northern encampment.
Mind the charges on your way in. Bentley doesn't play around.
- Eric
ESP.TRADUIT:
杰西,
宾利说他的线人提供额外的奴隶，所以试着把他们都活捉。使用眩晕手榴弹和沙包来拿下他们，之后应该很容易挑选。
我们终于在这个山洞里安顿下来了。因为你是个健忘的家伙，我提醒你，它位于北部营地的东北方向。
进来的时候小心点。宾利可不是闹着玩的。
--埃里克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
Did you hear that someone plugged "The Judge"? Is that bullshit or what? I wasn't sure if he even existed, but the word is that some stone-cold killer strolled into his bunker and cleaned them out! You know how the wasteland is - it's probably just horseshit propagated by the NCR is scare us. I think it was Gustav who told me about it... figures.
-Slade
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
你听说有人干掉审判官了吗？这他妈是真的还是谣传？虽然我不确定到底是否有这么个人，但据说那个石头一样的杀手扫荡了整个地堡！你知道废土是什么样，就是一帮NCR傻逼一天到晚找我们麻烦，现在看来又多了个麻烦的家伙。
这条消息是古斯塔夫告诉我的。
- 斯雷德
通缉: 马洛·巴克斯代尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 150 caps for the termination of Marlo Barksdale. He is wanted for drug trafficking, murder, conspiracy, and numerous felonies. He was last sighted outside Westside. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以150个瓶盖悬赏 马洛·巴克斯代尔。他因为非法毒品交易、谋杀、和其他大量重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是西区外。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Charlie,
I'm heading north to see what I can find outside Westside. Most of the caravans are lightly guarded or just packs of settlers, so it will be easy pickings. I'll put a good word in for you with Marko, since he's always scouting new talent for his crew.
- Red Bear
ESP.TRADUIT:
查理,
我正向北走，看看在西区外能不能找到什么东西。大部分商队都已配备护卫，但那些护卫都是由些毫无经验的游民组成，所以依然很轻松。我会在马尔科面前为你说好话的，因为他一直在发掘新人成为他的部下。
- 红熊

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Doug Rude. He is wanted for manslaughter resulting from dueling. He was last sighted near Goodsprings. He is to be considered armed and extremely dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Doug Rude or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 道格·鲁德。他因为在决斗中杀人被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在清泉镇附近。他持有武器，是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bentley,
I trust the new location is suitable for you and your men. The first batch of slaves has been transferred to my trader, who was very pleased with the merchandise. You can expect a bonus of caps to sweeten the usual shipment of armament and supplies.
Should you require a meeting, I will be in Goodsprings, using the alias "Blake".
Vale, Proculus
ESP.TRADUIT:
宾利,
我相信这个新地方适合你和你的人。第一批奴隶已经转给了我的商人，他对货物非常满意。你可以期待一些额外的瓶盖来增添装备和补给。
如果你需要见面，我会在清泉镇，化名为布莱克。
再会
普罗库鲁斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the capture of George Hardin. He is wanted for murder and other felonies. He was last sighted en route to Valle del Hierro. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit George Hardin or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以1000个瓶盖悬赏 乔治·哈丁。他因为谋杀和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在瓦尔德耶罗。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Slade,
You've been a reliable business partner in the slave trade for years, and I respect your loyalty. Nonetheless, I've heard some troubling rumors about bounty hunters in the Mojave. It seems a certain individual, &PCName;, recently made waves by terminating several of our contacts, including Kurt Katil, Chuck Bowdrie (our favored inside man in the rangers), and possibly others.
It all sounds preposterous, but my sources are vehemently supporting these claims. Keep them in mind and stay vigilant.
Sincerely, Norman
ESP.TRADUIT:
斯雷德,
这些年你一直是我们信赖的生意伙伴，我很尊重你的忠诚。但我最近听到一些关于一个叫&PCName;的莫哈维赏金猎人，的震惊谣言。这个家伙似乎已经掀起了一场波澜，我们的数个合同对象科特.卡迪尔、恰克.博迪莱，可能还包括别的什么人，都已经死于他手。
这听起来有些不可思议，但我的消息源一向非常可靠。所以谨记我说的话，时刻保持警惕。
真诚的, 诺曼

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm dying now... I can feel it. They all got drunk and used me, and last night I tried to run away. That's when Slade hit me with his hammer, and something just broke inside of me. I couldn't move my legs or feel anything down there, so Slade said I was, "useless" and he left me out here in the sun.
It hurts so much... I just want it to end. I'm going to have to face my own death. I think I'm prepared. I love you, Mom and Dad.
- Janie Parker
ESP.TRADUIT:
我要死了……我能感觉到死亡。他们都是恶狼，不停地侵犯我，于是昨晚我试图逃跑。但斯雷德用什么东西打了我，我的后背现在一点知觉也没有。我的腿也动不了了，我听他说我已经没有了，我现在就这样被晾在太阳下。
背好疼……真希望这一切能快点结束。爸爸，妈妈，我想你们，我一会儿就来见你们了。我爱你们。
- 珍妮.帕克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Colleen,
I can't fully explain my urge to write this letter. I've got a feeling that this is all coming to a close. I've been living with this all-consuming rage for so long that I'm spent. After the hate runs out, I'm afraid I'll have nothing left.
It doesn't matter. They're sending &PCName;, so I'm as good as dead. I'll keep a brave face, since the others refuse to quit. Maybe I can convince Fergus and the other lads to give this up. I blame myself for leading them to this end, with all my bombast and rhetoric. Damn this place. Damn the NCR. Damn it all. I can't let go, Colleen. I'm tired, but I'm fated to die here. It's the only honorable thing left. I'll wake up from this nightmare soon enough.
Love, Padraic
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的科林,
我无法解释现在要写这封信的急切心情。我有种感觉，一切都要结束了。我怀着充满愤怒与憎恨的心活得太久了，忽略了太多不该忽略的东西。当所有的愤恨消失殆尽时，我觉得自己的全身好像突然空了似的。
不过不要紧，他们已经派&PCName;来了，我不会死得毫无价值。我还要保持一副勇敢的面孔，因为其他人都不愿退缩，不过或许我该说服费格斯他们赶快跑。我责备自己的无能，带领他们一起走到当前这个境地。可恶，可恶的NCR，可恶的莫哈维！我无法放开，科林。我已经疲倦了，但我注定要死在这里，因为这里是唯一还能包容我的地方。希望这只是场噩梦，我能赶快从噩梦中醒来。
爱你的, 帕德里克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Violet. Cook-Cook. Driver Nephi. Eileen. Kurt Katil.
Payback's a bitch.
- Lobo
ESP.TRADUIT:
紫罗兰。 库克大厨。 尼法。 艾琳。 科特.卡迪尔。
丑婊子，我要让你血债血偿！
- 洛勃

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Palo Peto. He is wanted for murder, arson, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Monte Carlo Suites. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Palo Peto's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 帕罗·佩托。他因为谋杀、纵火和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在蒙特卡洛宾馆附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Commander,
A reliable source has indicated a rival firm may be entering the Mojave soon. Operating under the title "Martin's Marines", the company may eventually pose a threat to our business interests. The source stated that the firm is led by a ghoul named Martin, a former Marine of the old world who has utilized his knowledge to develop a unit of competent mercenaries. Formerly based near New Reno, the reasons for their relocation are unclear. Interestingly, the firm clings to the mannerisms, customs, dress, and even speech of the long-dead Marine Corps.
If you'll forgive my candor, it sounds like this Martin is an anachronism trying to revive a martial dinosaur. If you give approval, I'm confident we'll dispatch them with ease.
Respectfully, Mr. Joshua
ESP.TRADUIT:
指挥官,
有一条可靠消息说，有一个潜在对手公司现在已经进入莫哈维。这家名叫“马丁的陆战队”的公司迟早会与您的商业利益发生冲突。消息还说，这家公司由一个叫马丁的食尸鬼领导，这家伙在战前是个真正的海军陆战队员，现在他利用自己的知识和经历组建了这么一个新的竞争力很强的雇佣兵公司。之前他的基地位于新里诺，至于他们为什么会搬到莫哈维原因不明。有趣的是，这家公司的员工与雇佣兵都完全遵循海军陆战队的模式和服装。
请原谅我的坦率，这个马丁看起来是个怀念旧时代的顽固不化的家伙。如果你愿意，我们能很快解决这帮人。
向您致敬, 约书亚先生

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bobby,
Now that Cullen's dead, it's my turn to run this crew. I don't give a fuck what they say about Red Bear, he's gonna bend to our demands on this negotiation. If he tries to get tough, we'll let the dogs on that half-breed sonofabitch.
Just wait for my signal - if I scratch my head, then the deal is good, and we get the improved price. If I scratch my nose three times, then let the dogs loose.
We've got to show everybody that we've got balls, or nobody will take the Jackals seriously. The first step is letting Red Bear know that we won't take his shit anymore.
- Zack
ESP.TRADUIT:
鲍比,
现在卡伦死了，轮到我来掌管这帮人了。我才不管他们怎么说那个红熊，这次谈判一定要以我们的利益为核心。如果他试图强硬，我们就放狗去啃那个婊子。
你等我的信号--如果我挠头，就说明交易成功，我们赢得更有利的价格；如果我挠鼻子3下，直接放狗。
我们得展示给别人看，我们还是有种的，没人可以小瞧豹狼帮。这迈出的第一步，就要从红熊知道，我们才不管他那一套。
- 扎克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fergus,
We're going to hit an NCR caravan outside of town, and hopefully we'll pick up some munitions if the information is right. You did fine work putting that armor together, so expect a bigger cut from the take. We'll be back shortly.
- Red
P.S. I hope you got that Anti-Material Rifle sighted in. I've got a feeling that the NCR is gonna send that bigshot bounty hunter our way soon. &PCName;, that's the name - I want you to be ready when they come.
ESP.TRADUIT:
费格斯,
我们计划在镇外袭击一支NCR商队。如果情报无误的话，希望这次能多扒点弹药和补给。你把这些护甲放在一起干得很好，下次给你奖赏。我们很快就回来。
- 莱德
P.S. 我希望你已经拿到了那把反器材步枪。我有种感觉，那个赏金猎人正一步一步走向我们的陷阱。&PCName;，这就是他的名字，我希望你尽快准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
M. Atticus M. Alcimo salutem dicit.
Si vales, bene est. Caesar is vexed by the traitor's incessant indolence, so he must die. I trust you will attend to the matter immediately.
Vale, Atticus
ESP.TRADUIT:
M.阿提克斯 M. 阿尔西莫 向你问候。
你最近是否还好？ 凯撒对最近接连的背叛行为已经忍无可忍，因此他必须死。我相信你能尽快处理好这件事。
告别, 阿提克斯
档案: 艾伯特.奎斯琳

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Quisling, Albert DOB: c. 2240 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Caesar's Legion; formerly an NCR scientist Poster Location: Camp Forlorn Hope Command Center
Charges: - High Treason, 07/21/2278
Bounty: $1000 Alive, $500 Dead
Notes: Albert Quisling is a former NCR scientist who defected because of fraternal ties to Caesar's Legion. He delivered invaluable technical data to the Legion, along with information on the NCR's inner workings. Sources indicate Quisling has been relegated to an underground lab where he is tasked with producing large quantities of medicine for the Legion. Several analysts believe he may also be working to manufacture chemical weapons for Caesar's Legion.
Recently John Quisling (Albert's brother) was killed in combat, and sources indicate that Caesar is losing patience with his pet scientist, and could very well crucify Dr. Quisling if the situation doesn't improve. It is imperative that Dr. Quisling be captured and safely returned to NCR authorities, if only for his knowledge of the Legion.
Tactical Considerations: Quisling is a cerebral, unimposing man, unlikely to give much meaningful resistance. However, getting past Caesar's men may prove a challenge.
Excerpt from a peer review, 05/02/2278, by Dr. Joseph Fawkes - "Dr. Quisling exhibits profound knowledge of his field, and dedication to proper technique and research methods. However, he openly flaunts his disdain for authority, often referring to his superiors as 'truckling asses' and 'fucking sycophants'. His brilliance is counterbalanced by an aloof, arrogant demeanor that is counterproductive to a healthy team dynamic."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 奎斯琳,艾伯特 出生时间: 公元 2240 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 凯撒军团; 前NCR科学家 布告地点: 一线生机指挥中心
指控: - 判投, 07/21/2278
赏金: $1000 活捉, $500 死亡
备注: 艾伯特.奎斯琳是一名前NCR科学家，因为血缘兄弟的蛊惑叛逃到了凯撒军团。他把我们很多重要的信息数据和内部研究成果带给军团，对我们造成了不可估量的损失。有消息指出，他被安排到一间地下实验室，负责为军团生产大量医疗制品。有分析家说，他还有可能为凯撒军团研制化学武器。
最近约翰.奎斯琳（艾伯特.奎斯琳的兄弟）在战斗中阵亡，有消息指出凯撒正在逐渐失去对科学家的信心，而且如果情况得不到扭转，他甚至会把奎斯琳钉死在十字架上。命令要求，务必要把奎斯琳博士活着带回NCR，他对于军团的情报对我们来说至关重要。
战术布置: 奎斯琳是个有头脑的，理性的人，他不会做出徒劳的反抗。但如何带着他安全地通过凯撒的地盘将是一个重要的考验。
引用一位同事的回顾, 05/02/2278, 约瑟夫.福克斯 博士 - “奎斯琳博士在他擅长的领域展现了丰富的才华，对于自己所热爱的研究能够做到孜孜不倦的投入。但他对于当局曾公开发表不满，对于自己的上司用污言秽语辱骂。他的这种狂妄自大对整个科研团队的凝聚力造成了巨大的破坏。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Alvord, John Alias: Four-Fingered John DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independant outlaw; head of the Alvord Gang Poster Location: Short Stick Saloon
Charges: (All offenses prior to NCR occupation are undocumented) - Armed Robbery, 11/21/2274 - Armed Robbery, 01/29/2275 - Armed Robbery, 06/28/2275 - Armed Robbery, 03/15/2276 - Armed Robbery, 06/05/2276 - Armed Robbery, 010/26/2276 - Armed Robbery, 12/25/2277 - Armed Robbery, 04/15/2277 - Armed Robbery, 08/02/2277 - Armed Robbery, 11/18/2277 - Armed Robbery, 01/01/2278 - Armed Robbery, 07/14/2278 - Armed Robbery, 02/20/2279 - Armed Robbery, 10/05/2279 - Armed Robbery, 01/12/2280 - Armed Robbery, 03/15/2280 - Armed Robbery, 07/04/2280 - Armed Robbery, 09/15/2280 - Armed Robbery, 12/11/2280 - Armed Robbery, 01/17/2281 - Armed Robbery, 05/05/2281 - Armed Robbery, 07/13/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/24/2281
Bounty: $500 Alive, $100 Dead
Notes: "Four-Fingered John" is easily the most proficient outlaw in the Mojave, having single-handedly deprived the Crimson Caravan and other agencies of an estimated 250,000 caps in robberies, loss of revenue, and other damages in the course of his career. Alvord takes great pains to avoid bloodshed while engaging in robberies, even using nonlethal weapons to neutralize guards and merchants. He is assisted by a gang estimated to be at least a dozen strong, all heavily armed and loyal to Alvord. He operates primarily in the vicinity of Mole Rat Ranch and Field's Shack, often retreating to the mountains north of New Vegas if the NCR dispatches troops to apprehend him.
Tactical Considerations: While Alvord's initial instinct is probably dialogue, he will not hesitate to use lethal force if cornered. He and his men are suspected of killing at least three different bounty hunters, all in a set ambush. Alvord has survived in the Mojave due to his capacity for surprise, and this should be taken into account before undertaking any mission to apprehend him.
Other: The root of Alvord's alias is unknown, as he is reported to possess all ten fingers. While data prior to 2274 is scant, Alvord is believed to have served time in a local jail, perhaps Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 奥尔沃德，约翰 别名: “四指”约翰 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立逃犯；奥尔沃德帮的头 布告地点: “短棍”沙龙
指控: (所有在NCR到来之前的犯罪已被记录) - 军火抢劫, 11/21/2274 - 军火抢劫, 01/29/2275 - 军火抢劫, 06/28/2275 - 军火抢劫, 03/15/2276 - 军火抢劫, 06/05/2276 - 军火抢劫, 010/26/2276 - 军火抢劫, 12/25/2277 - 军火抢劫, 04/15/2277 - 军火抢劫, 08/02/2277 - 军火抢劫, 11/18/2277 - 军火抢劫, 01/01/2278 - 军火抢劫, 07/14/2278 - 军火抢劫, 02/20/2279 - 军火抢劫, 10/05/2279 - 军火抢劫, 01/12/2280 - 军火抢劫, 03/15/2280 - 军火抢劫, 07/04/2280 - 军火抢劫, 09/15/2280 - 军火抢劫, 12/11/2280 - 军火抢劫, 01/17/2281 - 军火抢劫, 05/05/2281 - 军火抢劫, 07/13/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/24/2281
赏金: $500 活捉, $100 死亡
备注: “四指”约翰是莫哈维最猖狂的逃犯，在其生涯中曾单枪匹马抢劫了赤红商队和其他一些商业机构共250000枚瓶盖，造成了商业上的大灾难。虽然奥尔沃德在抢劫中极力避免流血伤亡，以及运用非致命性武器，但造成的损失仍不可估量。他有一队武装到牙齿的跟随者，忠心耿耿。他通常在鼹鼠农场和田间小屋，但如果NCR出动来找他的麻烦，他又会躲到新维加斯北面的山里。
战术布置: 与奥尔沃德的初次见面可能会以对话开场，但如果把他逼急了他也会用武力解决问题。他和他的人估计已经干掉了3个赏金猎人，那3个笨蛋都是中了埋伏。奥尔沃德在莫哈维的生存能力令人吃惊，在开始任务前千万不要小瞧他。
其它: 奥尔沃德的别名来源是个谜，因为据报告他的双手完好无损。另外根据2274年以前的情报，他曾在普瑞姆附近的一个监狱服刑了一段时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: Prometheus DOB: Unknown Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Black Mountain Super Mutants Poster Location: Outside the Vickki & Vance Casino
Charges: (All offenses prior to NCR occupation are undocumented) - Murder (five counts), 05/20/2281 - Murder (four counts), 06/15/2281 - Terrorism, 07/29/2281 - Murder (three counts), 09/25/2281 - Terrorism, 10/01/2281
Bounty: $250 Dead
Notes: Prometheus is a relative newcomer to Black Mountain, but has rapidly proven himself to be the most ruthless member of Tabitha's twisted cadre. He has spearheaded a campaign to "purge" humans from the Mojave, conducting raids on farms and caravans in the surrounding area.
Tactical Considerations: Prometheus is large even by super mutant standards, and has displayed incredible fighting ability on multiple occasions. One witness to his attacks described him as "A force of nature". Any contractors intent on terminating Prometheus should be well-armed and outfitted for a tough fight.
Survivor's account, 09/25/2281, by Bob Sanders, merchant: - "We were taking a caravan to the workers at Sloan one night, when all the sudden a grenade went off in the road. It blew the Brahmin to pieces, and knocked everyone off their feet. Fortunately the blast propelled me into a nearby ditch, where I was hidden from the mutants. Prometheus was the big one, he came in first. He ripped one of the mercenaries in half, and then used the gory torso to pummel the other guard to death. Then he... he actually ate pieces of them... I'd never seen any mutant do that, ever. They stripped the caravan and bodies for supplies and ammo, then left as quickly as they came. Fortunately another caravan found me in the ditch the next day."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 别名: 普罗米修斯 出生时间: 未知 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 黑山超级变种人 布告地点: 维基范斯赌场外
指控: (所有在NCR来到这里之前的犯罪均已被记录在案） - 谋杀 (人数：5), 05/20/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 06/15/2281 - 恐怖主义, 07/29/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 09/25/2281 - 恐怖主义, 10/01/2281
赏金: $250 死亡
备注: 虽然普罗米修斯刚到黑山没多久，但他已经迅速证明他是那里最残暴的家伙。他已经展开了一场“净化莫哈维”的行动，计划从打劫和掠夺附近的农场和商队开始。
战术布置: 普罗米修斯的个头非常高大，有着一般超级变种人都难以企及的强壮身体和超强力量。有目击者称，他是“大自然的力量”。任何计划前往消灭他的合约者必须装备有精良的武器和厚实的盔甲。
幸存者记录, 09/25/2281, 鲍勃.桑德斯, 商人: - “当时我们的商队在夜里朝斯隆前进，突然一个手榴弹滚进了队伍中。双头牛被瞬间炸成碎片，所有的人都被冲击波震翻，我则被抛到了一个水渠里，这帮我躲开了之后变种人的袭击。普罗米休息个头很大，他首先冲了出来。他把那些可怜的佣兵撕成两半，用强壮的身躯压死剩余的护卫。然后......然后他开始吃那些破碎的尸体......我还从来没有见过变种人会做这种事情，从来没有。他们从商队迅速剥下各类补给和弹药，然后迅速逃离现场。幸运的是，另一个商队第二天发现了我。”
档案: 马洛.巴克斯代尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Barksdale, Marlo Alias: None DOB: c. 2255 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Fiends Poster Location: Outside the Casa Madrid Apartments in Westside
Charges: (All offenses prior to NCR occupation are undocumented) - Assault, 07/20/2274 - Possession of Jet with intent to distribute (five counts), 02/23/2275 - Possession of Psycho with intent to distribute (seven counts), 05/14/2277 - Murder (two counts), 05/11/2279 - Murder (three counts), 06/15/2281 - Possession of Jet with intent to distribute (ten counts), 09/04/2281
Bounty: $150 Dead
Notes: Marlo Barksdale is the chief conduit for narcotics between the Fiends, Khans, and other factions. He has established a reputation for ruthlessness through shrewd leadership and a willingness to kill anyone that impedes his business interests.
Tactical Considerations: Like most Fiends, Marlo is well-armed, but he is also accompanied by two bodyguards at all times. It is likely that numerous customers will be in his vicinity, and will be hostile to any intruders.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 巴克斯代尔，马洛 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2255 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 恶魔帮 布告地点: 西区马德里公寓门口
指控:（所有在NCR来到这里之前的犯罪均已被记录在案） - 袭击, 07/20/2274 - 强行占有属于公有资产的杰特 (数量：5), 02/23/2275 - 强行占有属于公有资产的疯狂药 (数量：7), 05/14/2277 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 05/11/2279 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 06/15/2281 - 强行占有属于公有资产的杰特 (数量：10), 09/04/2281
赏金: $150 死亡
备注: 马洛.巴克斯代尔在莫哈维的药剂买卖市场占有主导地位。他因粗鲁的性格出名，对手下飞扬跋扈，对一切威胁到他商业利益的人也绝不心慈手软。
战术布置: 和其他恶魔帮的人一样，马洛全副武装，而且身边无时不刻跟着2名贴身保镖，对任何企图靠近的人充满敌意。
档案: 布莱德.杰米森

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Jamison, Brad Alias: "Bloody Brad" DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independant Outlaw; heads the Jamison Gang Poster Location: Short Stick Saloon
Charges: - Armed Robbery, 07/29/2279 - Armed Robbery, 11/15/2279 - Armed Robbery, 02/18/2280 - Murder, 06/02/2280 - Armed Robbery, 10/26/2280 - Armed Robbery, 12/20/2280 - Armed Robbery, 03/18/2281 - Murder (three counts), 03/18/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/25/2281 - Murder (five counts), 09/25/2281
Bounty: $250 Alive, $100 Dead
Notes: "Bloody Brad" Jamison earned the unflattering moniker in past years due to a tendancy to murder merchants and guards even after they've surrendered, in order to prevent any testimony by survivors. Jamison is reputed to be a twitchy hothead, apt to fall into a blind rage over the slightest offense, leading to frequent arguments and brawls with his own men. One former associate, "Fat Charlie" Wilkinson, recently stole a shipment of Legion gold, and is believed to have hidden the loot in an undisclosed location. To complicate the matter, both Brad Jamison and John Dunn are now actively pursuing the gold, and "Fat Charlie" recently disappeared; foul play is suspected.
Tactical Considerations: Jamison is well-armed and prone to fight with little provocation. However, the loyalty and efficacy of his men is doubtful, since Jamison has killed or run off most of his capable companions over the years.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 杰米森，布莱德 别名: 血腥的布莱德 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立奴隶主；杰米森帮的头 布告地点: “短棍”沙龙
指控: - 军火抢劫, 07/29/2279 - 军火抢劫, 11/15/2279 - 军火抢劫, 02/18/2280 - 谋杀, 06/02/2280 - 军火抢劫, 10/26/2280 - 军火抢劫, 12/20/2280 - 军火抢劫, 03/18/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 03/18/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/25/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 09/25/2281
赏金: $250 活捉, $100 死亡
备注: “血腥的布莱德”杰米森之所以赢得这个称号，是因为他在过去这几年里，即使面对已经投降的商人和护卫，他依然痛下杀手，为的是以免有幸存者指证他的罪行。他是个性情暴躁的人，即使是他的手下也经常因为一点微不足道的小事被他骂得狗血喷头。最近，他以前的一个助手，“肥仔查理”威尔金森偷了一箱军团金币，藏在了一个无人知晓的秘密地点。为了解决这件事，布莱德.杰米森和约翰.杜恩开始寻找这些金币，同时“肥仔查理”最近也失踪了。一场闹剧正在上演。
战术布置: 杰米森装备精良，易于被激怒。但他的手下却是行动高效、忠诚并值得信赖。当然，这是在他杀了大量以前能力出众的同伙之后才发生的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Burrows, Sam Alias: None DOB: c. 2245 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independant outlaw; head of the Burrows Gang Poster Location: 188 Trading Post
Charges: (All offenses prior to NCR occupation are undocumented) - Armed Robbery, 01/25/2281 - Armed Robbery, 05/11/2281 - Armed Robbery, 05/24/2281 - Armed Robbery, 08/05/2281 - Murder, 08/05/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/27/2281
Bounty: $500 Alive, $100 Dead
Notes: Sam Burrows leads a collection of outlaws and ex-raiders who prey on commerce near the 188 Trading Post. Little is known of Sam Burrows himself, though sources indicate he may be a former Khan or Jackal. He and his crew can always be found at Mountain Shadows Campground. Other sources also allude to Burrows' advanced age, which might indicate a willingness to surrender under the right circumstances.
Tactical Considerations: Sam Burrows keeps at least a dozen men in camp, with several sharpshooters always on watch for intruders. Any incursion into the campground will have to utilize stealth or overwhelming force to reach Burrows.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 伯罗，山姆 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2245 审判权: 巨岩城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立逃犯；巴罗帮的头 布告地点: 188贸易站
指控:（所有在NCR来到这里之前的犯罪均已被记录在案） - 武装抢劫, 01/25/2281 - 武装抢劫, 05/11/2281 - 武装抢劫, 05/24/2281 - 武装抢劫, 08/05/2281 - 谋杀, 08/05/2281 - 武装抢劫, 09/27/2281
赏金: $500 活捉, $100 死亡
备注: 山姆.巴罗带领着由逃犯和匪徒组成的团伙，专门袭击188贸易站附近的商队。关于山姆.巴罗的情报有限，但据说他以前是可汗帮或豹狼帮的人。他和他的团伙经常聚集在在山影野营地。还有消息说，巴罗年事已高，因此在特殊情况下有投降的可能性。
战术布置: 山姆.巴罗在他的营地有至少一打的人，还有几个枪手专门负责监视四周。如果想靠近营地，需要使用隐形或进行压迫性的武力攻击。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: Palo Peto DOB: c. 2260 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Scorpions Poster Location: Outside the liquor store in Westside
Charges: - Murder, 01/15/2281 - Murder, 04/02/2281 - Rape, 06/14/2281 - Murder (three counts), 06/14/2281 - Kidnapping, 09/21/2281 - Rape, 09/21/2281 - Murder, 09/21/2281
Bounty: $250 Dead
Notes: Though Palo Peto's origins are murky, he has recently developed a reputation for cruelty that rivals even the worst Fiends. Sources indicate that while Palo Peto is of European extraction, little else is known. In the past year he has asserted himself at the muscle end of the Scorpions organization, going to great lengths to mimic the methods and style of the Fiend Cook-Cook. He is based out of Monte Carlo Suites along with most of the other Scorpions, and occasionally makes forays into the surrounding area to pillage and terrorize civilians.
Tactical Considerations: Like his idol, Palo Peto is never seen without an incinerator, and by all accounts he is quite adept at roasting all his opponents. Any contractors pursuing Palo Peto are strongly urged to use stealth and eliminate Palo Peto first before engaging the greater force of Scorpions.
Survivor's Account, 09/21/2281 (Identity undisclosed): - "He burned Mike alive, right there in front of us, laughing the whole time. Then he made Joe open his mouth, threating to burn the girls and me. He put the nozzle right in Joe's mouth, and then... he just cooked him from the inside out... Joe couldn't even scream. After that, he used me and the girls until he got tired of us. All the time he kept laughing, speaking in some language I couldn't understand. The next morning he burned Mary's face off because he thought she was staring at him, and then he sent her out into the wastes blind, burned, and naked. He burned my hands and feet and left me there. I don't know why he left me alive."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 别名: 帕罗.佩托 出生时间: 公元 2260 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 蝎子帮 布告地点: 西区卖酒商店门外
指控: - 谋杀, 01/15/2281 - 谋杀, 04/02/2281 - 强奸, 06/14/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 06/14/2281 - 绑架, 09/21/2281 - 强奸, 09/21/2281 - 谋杀, 09/21/2281
赏金: $250 死亡
备注: 尽管帕罗.佩托的起源是个谜，但他已经迅速在他的敌人中间建立起了残酷的名声。有消息说他有欧洲血统，除此以外我们一无所知。在过去的这几年，他一路摸爬滚打，从底层干到了蝎子帮老大的位置。他的大本营位于蒙特卡洛公寓，他会带领蝎子帮时不时地袭击附近的居民。
战术布置: 和他的偶像Cook-Cook一样，帕罗.佩托无论走到哪都会随身带着喷火器材，他很擅长把他的对手烤成炭灰。建议任何追击帕罗.佩托的合约者先利用隐身接近他，否则要做好面对大量蝎子帮成员的战斗准备。
幸存者记录, 09/21/2281 (身份保密): - “他在我们面前，把麦克活生生地烤了，整个过程中一直不停地大笑。然后他威胁乔张开嘴，把喷嘴塞进他的嘴里，从内部喷火烧，这样让乔连嘶叫的机会也没有。接着他强奸了我和其她几个女孩，知道他没力气为止。第二天，他烧了玛丽的脸，因为他认为玛丽在盯着他，然后就把玛丽扔到垃圾堆里。回来之后他烧了我的手，脚，然后把我扔在那里就不管了。我不明白他为什么不让我死。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: Dynamite Danny DOB: c. 2260 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Powder Ganger Poster Location: Goodsprings
Charges: - Robbery, 09/04/2281 - Brahmin Rustling, 09/12/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/15/2281
Bounty: $50 Dead
Notes: Dynamite Danny is a rogue Powder Ganger who recently set up a Brahmin rustling ring that is damaging commercial interests in the Mojave. NCR leadership wants to make an example out of this thug, as he makes an effort to target caravans serving the government.
Tactical Considerations: Like most Powder Gangers, Dynamite Danny is just a criminal armed with heavy explosives. He operates alone, so he should be easy prey for a seasoned bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 别名: 炸药 丹尼 出生时间: 公元 2260 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 炸药帮 布告地点: 清泉镇
指控: - 抢劫, 09/04/2281 - 偷盗双头牛, 09/12/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/15/2281
赏金: $50 死亡
备注: “炸药”丹尼是个炸药帮流氓，他最近参与一起偷盗双头牛的行为，此举严重威胁莫哈维的商业稳定。而且他还老找服务于政府的商队麻烦，因此NCR想树立一个找死的典型。
战术布置: 和其他众多炸药帮成员一样，“炸药”丹尼身上有大量炸药。他通常独自行动，因此任务的完成不会很费力气。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Cortina, Pancho Alias: None DOB: Unknown Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independant outlaw; head of the Cortina Gang Poster Location: Mojave Outpost
Charges: (All offenses prior to NCR occupation are undocumented) - Armed Robbery, 01/21/2275 - Brahmin Rustling, 05/10/2275 - Murder (three counts), 05/10/2275 - Armed Robbery, 09/28/2275 - Armed Robbery, 02/02/2276 - Murder (five counts), 02/02/2276 - Brahmin Rustling, 05/28/2276 - Brahmin Rustling, 12/02/2276 - Brahmin Rustling, 04/11/2277 - Armed Robbery, 09/03/2277 - Murder (two counts), 09/03/2277 - Brahmin Rustling, 09/05/2281 - Murder (five counts), 09/05/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/25/2281 - Murder (two counts), 09/25/2281 - Brahmin Rustling, 09/30/2281
Bounty: $500 Dead
Notes: Pancho Cortina has been a bane to ranchers in the Mojave for decades, stealing, killing, and pillaging at will, and then retreating south when faced pursued by a superior force. After a four-year hiatus (which sources say was prompted by NCR and Legion activity), Pancho has returned with a vengeance, and is disrupting trade in the southern Mojave Wasteland. Pancho is known to mutilate and torture any bounty hunters that come calling; sources indicate he lost his entire family because of a shootout with heavy-handed contractors decades ago, and has never forgotten.
Tactical Considerations: Pancho is always accompanied by his dangerous right-hand man, Danny Navaja, who is said to have killed fifty men with throwing knives over the years. In addition to his psychotic assistant, Pancho keeps an entourage of twelve to fifteen gunmen, all heavily armed and battle-tested. All contractors pursuing this bounty are advised to bring companions, armor, and plenty of ammunition.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 科迪纳.潘乔 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2260 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立逃犯；科迪纳帮的头 布告地点: 莫哈维前哨战
指控: (所有在NCR来到这里之前的犯罪均已被记录在案） - 军火抢劫, 01/21/2275 - 偷盗变种牛, 05/10/2275 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 05/10/2275 - 军火抢劫, 09/28/2275 - 军火抢劫, 02/02/2276 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 02/02/2276 - 偷盗变种牛, 05/28/2276 - 偷盗变种牛, 12/02/2276 - 偷盗变种牛, 04/11/2277 - 军火抢劫, 09/03/2277 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 09/03/2277 - 偷盗变种牛, 09/05/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 09/05/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/25/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 09/25/2281 - 偷盗变种牛, 09/30/2281
赏金: $500 死亡
备注: 潘乔.科迪纳在过去的数十年时间一直是莫哈维农场主们的噩梦，他肆意偷盗、抢劫和杀戮，之后在官方武装的压迫下逃向南方。在沉寂四年（有消息说是因为NCR和军团的行动造成）之后，他卷土重来，开始威胁到莫哈维南方的贸易。潘乔以虐待找上门的赏金猎人出名，因为据说很久以前他因为一个赏金猎人而失去了他全家，所以这种深仇大恨他是绝对不会忘记的。
战术布置: 潘乔和他的左右手--丹尼.那瓦哈总是形影不离，那个家伙据说用飞刀共干掉50多个人。此外，潘乔手下还有12-15个人不等，全部装备精良。建议合约者在执行任务前带好充足的弹药，做好打一场硬仗的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Dunn, John Alias: None DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: The Mojave Marauders Poster Location: Primm (Near the NCR garrison)
Charges: - Murder, 12/04/2280 - Armed Robbery, 01/15/2281 - Murder (three counts), 01/15/2281 - Armed Robbery, 05/22/2281 - Murder (two counts), 05/22/2281 - Armed Robbery, 08/02/2281 - Murder, 08/02/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/14/2281
Bounty: $250 Dead
Notes: John Dunn leads the "Mojave Marauders", an outlaw gang loosely affiliated with "Bloody Brad" Jamison. Dunn is a former associate of Jamison's who formed his own gang last year and has since preyed on caravans across the Mojave. Like his former mentor, Dunn is violent, impulsive, and unpredictable.
Tactical Considerations: Dunn is usually accompanied by five to six gunslingers. Since there is no prospect nor reward for a live bounty, contractors are advised to utilize stealth while terminating the target.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 杜恩，约翰 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 莫哈维掠夺者 布告地点: 普瑞姆（靠近NCR守备队）
指控: - 谋杀, 12/04/2280 - 军火抢劫, 01/15/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 01/15/2281 - 军火抢劫, 05/22/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 05/22/2281 - 军火抢劫, 08/02/2281 - 谋杀, 08/02/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/14/2281
赏金: $250 死亡
备注: 约翰.杜恩领导着“莫哈维掠夺者”。这一违法帮派部分附属于“血腥的布莱德”杰米森。杜恩是杰米森的前助手，去年跟随并帮助他创建属于杰米森的帮派。像杰米森一样，杜恩喜好暴力，性格冲动，举止多变不可预测。
战术布置: 杜恩身边通常跟着5到6名枪手。由于没有活捉的赏金，合约者可以利用隐形接近并直接击毙目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Power, Jacob Alias: None DOB: Unknown (likely pre-war) Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: GLA (Ghoul Liberation Army) Poster Location: Ranger Station Delta
Charges: - Kidnapping, 05/28/2274 - Murder, 01/14/2275 - Kidnapping, 09/27/2275 - Murder (two counts), 04/02/2276 - Murder (five counts), 10/20/2276 - Kidnapping, 03/18/2277 - Kidnapping, 11/10/2277 - Murder (two counts), 06/15/2278 - Kidnapping, 12/25/2278 - Kidnapping, 09/20/2279 - Murder (three counts), 09/20/2279 - Kidnapping, 05/01/2280 - Murder (two counts), 05/01/2280 - Murder (three counts), 12/25/2280 - Murder (five counts), 07/04/2281 - Murder (two counts), 09/19/2281
Bounty: $750 Dead
Notes: Several law enforcement officials consider Jacob Powers' GLA to be the most violent, militant terrorist group in the Mojave Wasteland. Powers believes in killing adult humans on sight, and kidnapping children in hopes of "turning" them (which often leads to their death from radiation poisoning). Sources indicates the GLA's ideology revolves around the eventual creation of a primitive ghoul utopia, with humans providing slave labor. Within the organization Jacob Powers is simply referred to as "Ghoul Number 1", and his lieutenant, Paul Potts, is known as "Ghoul Number 2", and so on. Little is known about Powers' activities until recently, though sources suggest he is not a native of the Mojave, and was a refugee from the territory of Caesar's Legion.
Tactical Considerations: The GLA is based out of the heavily irradiated nuclear test site. The area is infested with feral ghouls, providing a convenient buffer between the GLA's bunker and any intruders. The GLA members are heavily armed, well-trained, and prone to shoot humans on sight. Contractors are advised to pack radiation-resistant clothing, Rad-x, and Radaway before entering the test site.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 鲍尔，雅各布 别名: 无 出生时间: 未知 (可能是战前) 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 食尸鬼解放联盟 GLA 布告地点: 游骑兵广播站 D
指控: - 绑架, 05/28/2274 - 谋杀, 01/14/2275 - 绑架, 09/27/2275 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 04/02/2276 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 10/20/2276 - 绑架, 03/18/2277 - 绑架, 11/10/2277 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 06/15/2278 - 绑架, 12/25/2278 - 绑架, 09/20/2279 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 09/20/2279 - 绑架, 05/01/2280 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 05/01/2280 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 12/25/2280 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 07/04/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 09/19/2281
赏金: $750 死亡
备注: 一些法律执行官员认为雅各布.鲍尔的食尸鬼解放联盟是莫哈维沙漠里最暴力极端的恐怖组织。鲍尔见人就杀，绑架小孩期试图转变他们成食尸鬼（这通常会导致他们因接受大量辐射死亡）。消息指出，这个组织的终极目标就是建立一个食尸鬼乌托邦，让正常人类成为奴隶。在这个组织中，雅各布.鲍尔通常被认为是“食尸鬼1号”，他的中尉，保罗.波特茨，被认为是“食尸鬼2号”。之前关于他的情报比较少，现在我们知道他不是莫哈维本地人，他曾经是凯撒军团的一名难民。
战术布置: GLA的基地位于一个充满高度辐射的核试验基地。那里充满了各种野生食尸鬼，在他们的基地和外界入侵者之间充当免费的缓冲器。GLA的武装人员装备齐全，训练有素，会射杀一切出现在视野的正常人类。建议合约者在执行任务前配备好充足的防辐射服、抗辐剂和福特宁。
档案: 弗兰克·埃尔科

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Elko, Frank Alias: None DOB: c. 2240 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Elko Gang Poster Location: Crimson Caravan Main Office
Charges: - Armed Robbery, 01/02/2281 - Brahmin Rustling, 03/14/2281 - Armed Robbery, 04/11/2281 - Murder (two counts), 04/11/2281 - Armed Robbery, 06/17/2281 - Armed Robbery, 06/22/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/02/2281 - Armed Robbery, 10/31/2281 - Murder (three counts), 10/31/2281
Bounty: $500 Dead
Notes: Assisted by his brothers Bill and Simeon, Frank Elko has turned the Elko Gang into a fearsome crew. The oft-inebriated outlaws have a reputation for speed and surprise, and while robbery is their priority, they will use lethal force in certain situations. Sources indicate the gang uses their stolen property and caps to finance a ceaseless drinking binge at their hideout near the Emergency Rail Station.
Tactical Considerations: When sober, the Elko Gang is reputed to be a straight-shooting, disciplined crew. However, the Elko gang's propensity for consuming alcohol en masse might allow an easier tactical scenario, provided the bounty hunter uses proper stealth and subtlety in their approach.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 埃尔科·弗兰克 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2240 审判权: 巨岩城 性别: 男性 阵营: 艾克帮 布告地点: 赤红商队总办公室
指控: - 军火抢劫, 01/02/2281 - 偷盗双头牛, 03/14/2281 - 军火抢劫, 04/11/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 04/11/2281 - 军火抢劫, 06/17/2281 - 军火抢劫, 06/22/2281 - 军火抢劫, 09/02/2281 - 军火抢劫, 10/31/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 10/31/2281
赏金: $500 死亡
备注: 在他的兄弟比尔和西蒙尼的帮助下，弗兰克.艾克带领艾克帮变得更加强大。这帮酗酒之徒以速度和奇袭闻名，抢劫是他们的日常例假，在某些场合也会运用致命武力。有消息指出，这帮家伙喜欢用抢来的钱财去购买大量的酒，在紧急铁路车站附近的藏身处狂欢。
战术布置: 艾克帮的人清醒的时候，枪法还是很厉害的，而且帮派纪律极其严明。但是，赏金猎人完全可以利用他们喜欢酗酒这一点，利用隐身和潜行悄悄靠近，然后打他们个出其不意。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Ribben, Arthur Alias: None DOB: c. 2210 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: The Enclave Poster Location: Boulder City Jail
Charges: - Genocide & Crimes Against Humanity, 05/15 - 07/20/2241
Bounty: $2000 Alive, $250 Dead
Notes: Arthur Ribben is believed to be one of a handful of living Enclave personnel in the Mojave Wasteland, having long since integrated into NCR society. His crimes at the Enclave Oil Rig were brutal, even by the standards of the era. Rumors and sightings of Ribben abound, but most are dubious at best. Some officials suspect that Ribben has long since died or left the Mojave, perhaps gone to Mexico. Several claimed sightings are documented below.
Tactical Considerations: Though he would be elderly, Arthur Ribben is a combat veteran of the Enclave, and should be considered armed and dangerous. Given the lack of information on the target, it is unfeasible to formulate an accurate tactical assessment.
Sighting #1, 05/21/2276, Freeside, Larry Fonda (Beggar): - "I saw him, by Jesus! He had a red, robot eye, and he used it to cook brahmin meat. Then he looked at me and spoke of the old ones. He said they told him about a man in black, riding a white horse, and smoking a hickory pipe. Then, he drove a chariot driven by white coyotes into the sunset. I suspect he went to Oklahoma."
Sighting #2, 12/01/2277, Westside, Jane Ferrigno (Merchant): - "He was hunting radscorpions outside Westside. I'm pretty sure it was him. I mean, he was a greasy old man who stared at my tits. That old pervert had to be a sicko like Robbins, Rabbit... wait, how did you say it?"
Sighting #3, 04/14/2278, Mole Rat Ranch, Jacob Leibowitz (Followers' Scribe): - "I saw a strange old man wandering the highway to Boulder City, muttering strange words to himself. It could have been Ribben."
Sighting #4, 07/21/2279, Snyder Prospector Camp, Joe Hawthorne (Prospector): - "I seen that old fucker, sure enough. He poisoned my dog and stole my fucking hooch! I saw him tear off for Cottonwood Cove. He's probably sucking Caesar's dick down there!"
Sighting #5, 10/21/2280, Gibson Scrap Yard, Angie Ferguson (Prospector): - "He walks the roads at night, shuffling change and dancing wildly. They say he has a bionic arm, and he'll rip out your heart!"
Sighting #6, 04/11/2281, Hoover Dam, Sgt. Joe Rodriguez (NCR Trooper): - "I saw him once, for sure. He's a goddamn zombie, and he roams the Colorado River, eating unsuspecting victims. Someone should shoot em' in the head."
Sighting #7, 09/24/2281, Goodsprings, Jackson Turner (Rancher): - "I ain't certain, but he looks like the guy I saw once as a kid. Maybe it was him, maybe not. He was doing some trading, and didn't look dressed up or anything - just another old man like me. He headed east with the caravan towards Novac, and that was that."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 里本，阿瑟 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2210 审判权: 巨岩城 性别: 男性 阵营: 英克雷 布告地点: 巨岩城监狱
指控: - 大屠杀和反人类罪, 05/15 - 07/20/2241
赏金: $2000 活捉, $250 死亡
备注: 阿瑟·里本据信是众多在莫哈维生存下来的前英克雷人员之一。即使以今天的标准评价，当年他在英克雷石油钻井平台事件上依然要负主要责任。现在关于他的留言传得到处都是，但大部分都不可相信。一些官员怀疑里本可能去了墨西哥，甚至早就已经死了。以下将记录一部分目击证言。
战术布置: 尽管他年事已大，但毕竟曾是一名训练有素的英克雷士兵。鉴于情报的匮乏，我们无法提供有效的建议。
目击 #1, 05/21/2276, 自由城, 拉里.芳达 (乞丐): - “我看见他了，上帝！他有一只火红的机械眼球，可以用来烤变种牛排。他对我说，人们把他描述成一个穿着黑衣服、骑着一匹白马、叼着根烟斗的家伙完全是胡扯。之后他驾着一辆由几只白色小山狼驱使的马车驶向夕阳。我估计他可能去俄克拉荷马州了。”
目击 #2, 12/01/2277, 西区, 简.费力格诺 (商人): - “他在西区外猎杀辐射蝎子。我肯定那就是他。我记得他看起来像个老头。这个家伙名字是不是叫罗本，李白......等，你们管他叫什么？”
目击 #3, 04/14/2278, 鼹鼠农场, 雅各布.雷波茨 (追随者书记员): - “我看见一个老家伙沿着高速路往巨石城方向走去，嘴里喃喃地不停说着话。他可能就是里本。”
目击 #4, 07/21/2279, 斯奈德探险者营地, 乔.哈瑟尔 (探险者): - “我看见那个老混蛋了，没错的。他毒死了我的狗，偷了我整整一箱威士忌！我看见他跑向科特伍德洞穴，他到那一定是去凯撒的鸡巴！”
目击 #5, 10/21/2280, 吉布森废品站, 安吉.弗格森 (探险者): - “他在夜里的路上走着，拖着一些废品，手舞足蹈。我听说他有一只机械手臂，可以瞬间掏出你的心窝！”
目击 #6, 04/11/2281, 胡佛大坝, 上尉 乔.罗德里格斯 (NCR 部队): - “我曾见过他。当时这个死僵尸正朝着科罗拉多河咆哮，吃着残缺的尸体。我真后悔没找人朝他头上来一枪。”
目击 #7, 09/24/2281, 清泉镇, 杰克森.特纳 (农场主): - “我不是很确定，但他看起来挺像我小时候见过的那个人。也许是，也许不是。他当时正在买东西，穿得看起来跟普通人一样。之后他跟着商队前往诺瓦克去了。恩，就是这样。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Rzeznik, Adam Alias: None DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independent Slaver Poster Location: Ranger Station Charlie
Charges: - Kidnapping, 05/21/2281 - Slavery (five counts), 05/26/2281 - Human Trafficking, 06/15/2281 - Murder, 08/02/2281 - Slavery (six counts) 08/02/2281 - Human Trafficking, 08/02/2281 - Slavery (seven counts), 10/31/2281
Bounty: $500 Alive, $150 Dead
Notes: Adam Rzeznik represents the interests of an underground slavery ring that continues to persist despite the NCR's best efforts to eradicate that loathsome enterprise. Rzeznik has remained hidden for years, and therefore only a fraction of his crimes are documented. Sources indicate that Rzeznik coordinates the slave trade between raiders and a third party, likely a liason for Caesar's Legion looking to acquire cheap chattel.
Tactical Considerations: Rzeznik has relied on secrecy to shield his operations, but it's doubtful he will surrender without a fight. Any contractor pursuing this bounty should be prepared for close quarters combat, as the target is known to operate indoors.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 泽尼克,亚当 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立奴隶主 布告地点: 游骑兵电台站 C
指控: - 绑架, 05/21/2281 - 奴役 (人数：5), 05/26/2281 - 非法平民交易, 06/15/2281 - 谋杀, 08/02/2281 - 奴役 (人数：6) 08/02/2281 - 非法平民交易, 08/02/2281 - 奴役 (人数：7), 10/31/2281
赏金: $500 活捉, $150 死亡
备注: 亚当.泽尼克代表了地下奴隶交易圈的最广大利益，尽管这个圈不断受到来自NCR的打击，但还是坚持地挺了下来。泽尼克已经隐藏了很多年，因此他只有一小部分罪行被记录在案。有消息说，泽尼克通常在土匪和第三方之间扮演中间商的角色，而这第三方的大头就是凯撒军团。
战术布置: 泽尼克依赖于他那隐蔽的场所进行奴隶交易。不战而降对他来说几乎是不可能的事。任何追击他的合约者都要做好打一场封闭空间战的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Joe,
Boss wants &PCName; gone, no excuses. That bounty hunter has been fucking us up for too long, and the leadership expects results. I'll get you some extra firepower, so I don't want to hear any whining. Just off this bitch so we can get back to business as usual.
- Noah
ESP.TRADUIT:
乔,
阿奴穆斯领主希望&PCName;尽快滚蛋，没有理由。那个赏金猎人已经胡作非为了这么长时间，领导层希望尽快听到实质性结果。我懒得听你的抱怨，我会给你一些额外的武力支援。抓紧把这个婊子干掉，我们的生意才能早日回到正轨。
- 诺亚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Rude, Doug Alias: "Dirty Doug" DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Independent Gunslinger Poster Location: Short Stick Saloon
Charges: - Manslaughter, 06/15/2281 - Manslaughter, 07/21/2281 - Manslaughter, 09/02/2281 - Manslaughter, 10/01/2281 - Manslaughter, 10/26/2281 - Manslaughter, 10/31/2281
Bounty: $500 Alive, $100 Dead
Notes: "Dirty Doug" Rude is a well-traveled pistolero with a penchant for goading individuals into duels, and then claiming self-defense if the attacker is killed or maimed. While not bold enough to challenge NCR officials, he has personally killed at least three contractors in duels. Aside from killing strangers, "Dirty Doug" makes his living as a gambler, drifting from town to town, using his reputation as a gunslinger to his advantage.
Tactical Considerations: While Doug Rude is a lone wolf, he is dangerous nonetheless. Numerous gangs and at least one posse have underestimated Rude's prowess with a pistol, only to end up dead. Rude does adhere to a loose code of honor, and can likely be prompted to surrender if defeated under his own terms of combat. If a contractor wishes to avoid such formalities, a more utilitarian approach would be to simply place a grenade in Rude's pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 鲁德，道格 别名: 肮脏的道格 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 中立持枪歹徒 布告地点: “短棍”沙龙
指控: - 杀人, 06/15/2281 - 杀人, 07/21/2281 - 杀人, 09/02/2281 - 杀人, 10/01/2281 - 杀人, 10/26/2281 - 杀人, 10/31/2281
赏金: $500 活捉, $100 死亡
备注: “肮脏的道格”喜欢刺激对手进行一对一决斗，一旦对方死了或导致残废，就宣称自己的行为完全出于自卫。虽然这种无耻的举动还不足以挑战NCR的底线，但他最近已经陆续杀掉了3个挑战者。除此以外，“肮脏的道格”就是一个赌博，他从一个城镇转战到另一个城镇，利用自己的名声威胁牟利。
战术布置: 尽管道格.鲁德是一匹孤独的狼，但他依旧十分危险。他耍手枪的实力高超无比，很多人为他们的低估表现付出了生命的代价。他对尊严还是稍稍看重的，如果你能以他的方式将他击败，他就会投降。如果合约者想以自己的方式完成任务，那么在他口袋里塞一颗手雷不吝为又快又简单的解决之道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Queenie, the new leader of the Fiends. She is wanted for murder, armed robbery, and other felonies. She was last sighted at Duckwater Cavern, along with numerous Fiends. She is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Queenie's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 奎尼，恶魔帮的新领导人。她因为谋杀、军火抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。她上一次被人见到是达克沃特洞穴，旁边还有大量恶魔帮成员。她持有武器，是个危险分子，只有拥有执照的武器专业人士才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Unknown Alias: Lobo DOB: c. 2250 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Fiends Poster Location: Boulder City Jail
Charges: - Murder (three counts), 11/15/2281
Bounty: $500 Dead
Notes: After the untimely deaths of Cook-Cook, Violet, Driver Nephi, Eileen, and Kurt Katil, the Fiends have experienced a crisis of leadership. Unfortunately, a ruthless young fanatic named "Lobo" has stepped up to pioneer a new era of terror. Like most Fiends, Lobo's origins are nebulous, but he has taken to his role like a duck in water. His first order of business was to ambush a patrol by the Westside militia, and then to torture the surviving captives over the course of a week. Later he had his cronies hurl the captives' severed heads at Westside's walls. Lobo insists his actions are retribution for the deaths of the aforementioned Fiends, and claims attacks will continue until &PCName; (the bounty hunter responsible for their deaths) faces him in single combat.
Tactical Considerations: As he is new to power, there is scant information on Lobo. He is expected to be accompanied by several dozen Fiends at any given time, and has displayed a proclivity for blades and melee weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 未知 别名: 洛勃 出生时间: 公元 2250 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 恶魔帮 布告地点: 巨石城监狱
指控: - 谋杀 (人数：3), 11/15/2281
赏金: $500 死亡
备注: 在恶魔帮的领导人一个接一个被“邮差”干掉后，恶魔帮已经陷入了群龙无首的混乱。不幸的是，一个叫洛勃的家伙站了出来，意图开启一个新的恐怖时代。进入领导层的洛勃如鱼得水，他的第一道命令就是在西区附近埋伏袭击一只过路的商队。那些俘虏被他整整折磨了一个星期。之后洛勃带人把他们的头扔向西区居民区。洛勃坚称，他的行为是为那些死去的恶魔帮头领们报仇，而且他的行动不会停止，除非&PCName;（要为那些死亡负责的赏金猎人）能站出来跟他单挑。
战术布置: 由于洛勃刚上任不久，关于他的情报并不多。预计他身边将会出现大量额恶魔帮随从，并且装备有精良的近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bart,
I want you to double down on production, and make sure those guards aren't just sitting on their asses. Most of these morons would shoot up with anything if they go long enough without a hit. Lobo is gone, and our backs are up against the fucking wall, so we need to move those stimpaks. &PCName; has hurt us, and the only way we can bounce back is if we get the funds to get tooled up enough to hold our ground, all while buying enough chems to keep these crazy fucks from killing each other.
I know "Lord Enormous" wants to take the fight to &PCName; right now, but that's out of the question. We're spread thin, and morale is shit. We need to focus on keeping what we have and building our resources. When we're strong we'll hit &PCName; and the entire NCR with everything we've got.
This shipment is going to get us some heavy weapons from Mr. K, so don't fuck it up, or I'll cut your balls off, just like I did to Henderson.
- Queenie
ESP.TRADUIT:
巴特,
我希望你能令产量加倍，让那些傻瓜一样的守卫不要整天像坨屎一样坐着。这帮笨蛋一旦相互之间距离稍远，就敌我不分了，一群白痴。洛勃死了，我们的人还那么没用，所以现阶段需要大量治疗针。&PCName;是我们的死敌，我们要打回去的唯一出路就是先准备好充足的资金，然后全副武装。现在先多准备些药剂。
我知道，“残暴领主”想要尽快和&PCName;开战，但现在根本就不可能。我们的实力还不够，人员忠诚也还是个问题。我们现在需要专注于积累我们的资源并强大自己。一旦时机成熟，我们不仅要向&PCName;开战，还要向整个NCR开战。
这次的货物可以帮我们从K先生那里获得一些重型武器，不要搞砸了，否则我就会像对待汉德森那样，把你的JJ切下来拿去喂狗。
- 奎尼

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the termination of the Viper chief known as "Rolo". He is wanted for murder and terrorism. He was last sighted near the Raided Farmstead. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Rolo's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR 悬赏 1000 瓶盖，干掉名为“罗洛”的毒蛇帮首领。 他因谋杀和恐怖主义而被通缉。 他最后一次出现在遭劫的农庄附近。 他被认为是武装和危险的，只能由武装专业人士追捕。 要领取赏金，请将罗洛之死的证据提交给巨石城监狱的拉里·斯卡尔上尉。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rick,
Stay alert while I'm out with the patrol. We're lucky to have found this place, so I want to make the best out of it. We're gonna inspect the Goodsprings Source and see if we can't nab a captive while conducting the reconnaissance. Anyway, keep a look out for that boogeyman bounty hunter everybody's talking about. It doesn't take much to knock off some fiends, but still... they say that he (or was it her?) took the Judge, so don't fuck around, ok?
- M.
ESP.TRADUIT:
里克,
我出去巡逻的时候你随时保持警惕。能找到这个地方我们很幸运，所以我希望我们能好好珍惜。我们会先去调查清泉镇的水源，然后看有没有机会抓几个俘虏。不管怎样，对那个人人都在讨论的赏金猎人要多留个心眼。尽管干掉几个恶魔帮的人并不困难，但......他们说他（她？）就是那个干掉审判官的人。这不是开玩笑吧？
- M.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Vasily,
You must have heard about Ghoul #1's murder at the hands of that smoothskin puppet, &PCName;. You have long been our greatest warrior, and I trust you will see justice done. We have suffered incalculable setbacks at that bounty hunter's hands. If you are successful, there will be a position of leadership waiting for you.
- George
ESP.TRADUIT:
瓦西里,
你一定听说食尸鬼们现在最想干掉的目标：&PCName;。你一直以来是我们最好的战士，我们在那个赏金猎人身上已经跌了不少的跟头，我相信你能实现正义。如果你成功了，我这儿还有一个不错的职位可以送给你。
- 乔治

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Billy,
It was wrong what they did, drumming you out of the rangers on charges of bigotry. I just want you to know that you've still got friends on the inside who haven't forgotten about you.
The goddamn zombies are taking over, I tell you. With freaks like Jacob Powers running around, you'd think our leaders would learn not to trust those rotten fucks. But wouldn't you know it, we just got a new zombie NCO, SSgt. Ricks, a cocky fuck. He smells like deep-fried dogshit, and he's dripping skin half the time.
You were right, those goddamn zombies are running everything in secret. I think House is one of them, and maybe even Caesar. Has anyone actually seen him? They were around before the war, and they're just trying to keep us all down.
I heard about what you did last week, at it made me proud. Those zombies have to understand we don't want their kind anywhere near decent folks. I'll give that to the Legion - they don't tolerate any freaks.
You take care out there, and keep fighting the good fight.
- Schillinger
ESP.TRADUIT:
比利,
他们那么做是错的，因为罪名完全是莫须有。我想让你知道，在这里你还是有朋友，我们没有忘记你。
这帮可恶的僵尸已经掌管了这里的一切。你也许会想，像雅各布那样的变态怎么能在这里呆这么久？但不瞒你说，我们又迎来了一个新的变态长官，上士 利克斯。他闻起来就像坨发臭的屎，皮肤上布满了血丝。
你是对的，这些混蛋僵尸正在把这里搞得一团糟。我觉得豪斯，甚至凯撒也是这样的家伙。话说有谁真的见过他们吗？
我听说了你上星期所做的事，这令我感到骄傲。那些僵尸需要明白，我们不会允许他们接近任何平民。我会告诉军团的人的，他们绝不会容忍任何畸形。
你在外面自己好好照顾自己，做好你认为该做的事。
- 席林格

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of "Four-Fingered John" Alvord. He is wanted for armed robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Mole Rat Ranch accompanied by multiple gang members. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit John Alvord or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏“四指”约翰·奥尔沃德。他因为抢劫军火和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在鼹鼠农场附近，与他一起的还有多个多个来自不同帮派的成员。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of the fiend leader known as "Lobo". He is wanted for murder and other felonies. He was last sighted Zapp's Neon Signs. He should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Lobo's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏恶魔帮的领导人，洛勃。他因为谋杀和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在扎普霓虹灯。只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Red Kelly. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Spring Mountain Ranch. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Red Kelly's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 莱德·凯莉。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在春泉山农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 2,000 caps for the capture of Arthur Ribben. He is wanted for genocide, conspiracy, and other crimes. His current whereabouts are unknown. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Arthur Ribben or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以2000个瓶盖悬赏 阿瑟·里本。他因为集体屠杀、同谋反叛和其他罪行被通缉。现在下落不明。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Charlie,
Fucking Slade is breaking my balls again and again. He and Red Bear have their own little fucking understanding, and I get stuck with the shit jobs. Like right now, I want to finish this letter, but I have to go set up and ambush at the old campsite, because Slade thinks there's going to be a bounty hunter on his ass. He just does what Red Bear tells him. No balls.
Last week that asshole humiliated me in front of everyone, just because I questioned one of his orders. I wasn't trying to be dramatic, I just didn't see the sense in sending a scouting party to scope out that saloon near Novac. I know why, though - he just wants to see what Doc Friday's up to, and he wants to kill him. Between you and me, though, I hope that old ghoul lights up Slade. He's got it coming.
Anyway, I think someone is approaching the campsite. Maybe Slade was right for once.
-Gustav
ESP.TRADUIT:
查理,
那个混蛋斯雷德弄得我蛋疼，一次又一次。他和红熊不知道脑子里装的是什么，我已经快受够了。就像现在，我只是想把这封信写完，但我不得不到外面去埋伏一个赏金猎人。斯雷德说是红熊要他这么干的。他连个鸟都没有，真没种。
上星期，那个混蛋在众人面前羞辱了我，就因为我对他的命令质疑了两句。我并不是想引人瞩目，我只是看不出派人到诺瓦克附近的一个沙龙去这样的行动有什么意义。我知道，他是想干掉那个叫“星期五”的医生。跟你掏心窝子把，兄弟，我觉得那个老食尸鬼比斯雷德强。斯雷德没有这个魅力。
不管怎样，好像有人正在靠近。也许斯雷德是对的。
- 古斯塔夫
通缉: 比利·杰克·吉布森

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Billy Jack Gibson. He is wanted for murder and hate crimes against ghouls. He was last sighted near the Yangtze Memorial. He is an accomplished hand-to-hand combatant and former ranger, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Billy Jack's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 比利·杰克·吉布森。他因为谋杀和针对食尸鬼的犯罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在扬子纪念碑附近。他是个职业的一对一高手，前游骑兵，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain Ribben displayed exceptional professionalism and dedication to his duties in coordinating logistical support and the humane disposal of test subjects during the development of F.E.V. Curling-13, Control Station ENCLAVE. His dedication to service was instrumental to the project's ability to process hundreds of test subjects, and to ultimately render a stable variant of the F.E.V. virus . Capt. Ribben's actions are a credit to himself, his unit, and the United States of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里本上尉在他的职责上展示了他充分的敬业精神与专业水平。在他不懈的努力下，科林13号F.E.V. 的研究取得了突破性的进展。他的无私奉献对项目进展起到了决定性的作用，在他的帮助下，项目得以在短时间处理近百起测试对象，并最终成功获得F.E.V.病毒的样体。里本上尉值得我们所有人尊敬，他是部队的骄傲，是美利坚合众国的骄傲。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Burns, Jake Alias: None DOB: c. 2240 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: The Burns Clan Poster Location: NCR Military Police HQ, NCR Embassy, The Strip
Charges: - Bootlegging, 08/15/2281 - Smuggling, 09/05/2281 - Murder (four counts, including an NCR official), 10/31/2281
Bounty: $500 Dead
Notes: Jake Burns is responsible for the murder of an NCR official, Capt. Gary Winstone, along with his wife and family. Capt. Winstone had uncovered the Burns' moonshine operation and was gathering evidence to support a criminal case against the entire Burns Clan. However, Jake and a few brothers tracked Capt. Winstone to his home outside New Vegas, and then slaughtered the entire Winstone family. Capt. Scull has requested that any contractors pursuing this bounty consult with him first.
Tactical Considerations: The Burns family consists of thirteen men and three women, all of varying age and relation to each other. They are heavily armed and hostile to any and all outsiders, regardless of the circumstances. Contractors are advised to utilize stealth or overwhelming firepower, as clan members will never engage in dialogue with outsiders.
Capt. Winstone's report, 10/30/2281: - "After several weeks of observation I've gathered enough data to render a criminal case against the Burns Clan. They control an extensive smuggling operation, selling whiskey, narcotics, and moonshine to raiders, merchants, and anyone with cash, including a lone Centurion who stops by each week. Based on the brother's conversation, I suspect the clan is headed by an unseen matriarch they refer to simply as "Grandma". While the brothers are eager to engage certain outsiders in commerce, they despise any trace of the NCR or government authority, vehemently insisting on their autonomy and independence. Last week I saw Jake Burns mercilessly beat a raider who simply asked if the Burns traded with the NCR. I've been observing them in proper cover and in plainclothes, and I doubt they've spotted me. Besides, they exhibit traits indicative of a narrow gene pool, so their collective intelligence is suspect, the grandma notwithstanding. Full documentation of their offenses will be submitted along with this report."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 彭斯，詹克 别名: 无 出生时间: 公元 2240 审判权: 巨岩城 性别: 男性 阵营: 布恩斯氏族 布告地点: NCR军事警察中心，NCR大使馆
指控: - 非法走私, 08/15/2281 - 偷运货物, 09/05/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：4，包括一名NCR长官), 10/31/2281
赏金: $500 死亡
备注: 詹克.布恩斯要为一起对NCR长官加里.温斯顿上尉和他的家人的谋杀案负责。温斯顿上尉当时发现了布恩斯家族非法生产制造月光酒的证据。于是布恩斯和他几个兄弟对他进行跟踪，并之后将他全家灭门。斯科尔上尉要求，任何合约者在执行任务前务必先向他进行咨询。
战术布置: 布恩斯家族有横跨不同年龄段的共13名男性和3名女性。他们武装精良，对任何外来者充满敌意。建议合约者对他们不要浪费口舌，以毁灭性的压制武器迅速将他们扫荡干净。
温斯顿上尉的报告, 10/30/2281: - “经过数周的观察，我掌握了足够起诉布恩斯家族的证据。他们形成了一整套运营模式，从制造、运输到销售，整个家族就像一个精密的仪器。他们向各种客户销售种类繁多的酒，交易全部以当场现金交割。基于观察，我推测这个家族由一个叫“祖母”的人负责管理。由于家族急切地只想同外人做生意，他们轻视任何源自NCR和政府的指责，坚持自己的自治和独立。上周，我看见布恩斯因为一个家伙问他们是否也与NCR做交易而狠狠地揍了他一顿。这段时间以来，我尽量隐蔽自己的身份，躲在暗处，但我觉得他们可能已经盯上我了。关于他们违法犯罪行为的全部记录档案将在之后随此报告一并发出。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Kelly, Padraic Alias: Red Kelly DOB: c. 2240 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: The Kelly Gang Poster Location: Sloan Mining Office
Charges: - Armed Robbery, 10/12/2280 - Murder (two counts), 10/12/2280 - Armed Robbery, 02/15/2281 - Murder (four counts), 02/15/2281 - Armed Robbery, 05/25/2281 - Armed Robbery, 07/14/2281 - Murder (three counts), 07/14/2281 - Armed Robbery, 07/29/2281 - Armed Robbery, 08/18/2281 - Armed Robbery, 09/21/2281 - Armed Robbery, 10/25/2281 - Murder (five counts), 10/25/2281
Bounty: $500 Dead
Notes: While most professional robbers make great pains to avoid NCR authorities, Red Kelly and his brothers make it a priority to target NCR assets and personnel. Records indicate the Kelly family once possessed a sizable ranch, but after the NCR gained control of the Mojave Wasteland their property became the subject of a heated dispute with land officials. The disagreement culminated in a brief shootout between NCR soldiers and the Kelly family, resulting in the deaths of Colleen Kelly (wife of Padraic Kelly), John Kelly (Padraic's son), and Pvt. Jacob Hurst. An official inquiry ruled that NCR officials and servicemembers acted within the confines of the law, and were justified in the use of lethal force in self-defense. However, the incident prompted criminal charges against Padraic Kelly, and the family farm was siezed by the NCR. Padraic Kelly fled with the remainder of his family, formed his gang, and began raiding NCR property and assets in earnest.
Tactical Considerations: Red Kelly is suspected to have been a Desert Ranger before the NCR's arrival. He is an expert marksman and tracker. Furthermore, he and his brothers are rumored to be using NCR power armor recently siezed from a supply depot. Contractors pursuing this bounty are advised to use armor-piercing ammunition and/or heavy ordinance.
Testimony from The Kelly Ranch Post-Incident Report, 09/15/2280: - "Myself, two NCR civilians, and a squad of soldiers set out to meet with Padraic Kelly and his wife in order to resolve the ongoing land dispute. I presented our case, which cites both legal precedent and eminent domain. Representing himself, Mr. Kelly became belligerent, shouting profanities and threatening me and the accompanying troops. Furthermore, his wife and brothers began to make threatening movements towards us. I implored Mr. Kelly to refrain from violence, but he commenced to striking me with his fists. When one of our soldiers used nonlethal force to neutralize Mr. Kelly, Mrs. Kelly produced a handgun and fired one shot into the soldier's head at close range, killing him. Subsequently the rest of the squad opened fire on Mrs. Kelly, killing her. Unfortunately Mrs. Kelly was holding their infant son at the time, and he perished in the hail of gunfire. It is a terrible tragedy, but it could have been averted if Mr. Kelly had only listened to reason." - Clay Dodge, Bureau of Land Management
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 凯莉，帕德里克 别名: 莱德.凯莉 出生时间: 2240 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 凯莉帮 布告地点: 斯隆矿业办公室
指控: - 武装抢劫, 10/12/2280 - 谋杀 (人数：2), 10/12/2280 - 武装抢劫, 02/15/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：4), 02/15/2281 - 武装抢劫, 05/25/2281 - 武装抢劫, 07/14/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：3), 07/14/2281 - 武装抢劫, 07/29/2281 - 武装抢劫, 08/18/2281 - 武装抢劫, 09/21/2281 - 武装抢劫, 10/25/2281 - 谋杀 (人数：5), 10/25/2281
赏金: $500 死亡
备注: 与其他那些职业罪犯尽量避开NCR当局不同，莱德.凯莉和他的兄弟们以袭击NCR目标做为最高优先权。记录显示，凯莉家族曾经拥有一个相当大的农场。但在NCR并入莫哈维之后，就这 片农场的归属权两者发生了剧烈的争执。后来一场冲突导致了数人死亡，其中包括科林.凯莉（帕德里克的妻子）、约翰.凯莉（帕德里克的儿子），以及士兵雅各布.赫斯特。事后官方调查显示，凯莉家族是出于正当防卫。但NCR还是发起了一场针对帕德拉克的指控，并派部队强行占有农场。于是帕德里克.凯莉带着其他的家人逃跑，并成立了自己的帮派，之后他们所有的行动均围绕抢劫NCR财产为中心展开。
战术布置: 莱德.凯莉在NCR到来之前曾是沙漠游骑兵的一员。他武器射击技术十分强悍。此外，有谣言说他和他兄弟现在开始使用动力甲了，那是之前他们从一个补给站偷来的战利品。建议合约者装备大量破甲弹药和重武器单位。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subject Name: Faulkner, Stephen Alias: Trigger DOB: c. 2260 Jurisdiction: Boulder City Sex: Male Allegiance: Former Omerta Poster Location: Outside the Mojave Express in Primm
Charges: - Rape, 09/28/2281
Bounty: $250 Dead
Notes: Though only one charge is on the books, Trigger is suspected of being a serial rapist, having only evaded prosecution through his status in the Omerta organization and the intimidation of witnesses and victims. Fortunately one woman was brave enough to offer testimony against Trigger, which the prosecution used to its advantage. With the weight of evidence and the victim's detailed account against him, Trigger fled before a jury could provide the guilty verdict. Trigger is now cut off from the Omertas, and is said to be hiding in the southern fringes of the Mojave Wasteland.
Tactical Considerations: It's rumored that Faulkner earned the nickname "Trigger" through his proficiency at performing "Hits" for the Omertas. He is likely skilled with small arms and should not be underestimated.
Excerpt from the victim's testimony, 10/13/2281 (Identity undisclosed): - "He said I'd get an audition for the singing gig at the Gomorrah if I just had a drink with him. I figured I'd talk for a while and see if he could really pull some strings for me. His room was weird, not like the other guys there. He had corn all over the place. Anyway, after a few drinks he started touching me, and then he said it was time for the audition. I told him no, but he didn't care. He acted like he'd done this before, and was just going through the motions. He hit me at first, and then held me down. But he didn't even get hard... I don't know if he could, so he... he used a corncob instead."
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名: 福克纳，斯蒂芬 别名: 特里戈 出生时间: 2260 审判权: 巨石城 性别: 男性 阵营: 前黑手党 布告地点: 普瑞姆莫哈维快递站外
指控: - 强奸, 09/28/2281
赏金: $250 死亡
备注: 虽然只有一项指控记录，但特里戈被怀疑是一系列强奸案始作俑者，由于之前黑手党阵营的庇护和对受害者的威逼一直能够逃脱惩罚。幸运的是有一名女性勇敢地站出来指证他的罪行。因为掌握有充足的证据和证人的证言，我们准备将特里戈缉拿归案，但他却及时逃脱。特里戈现在已经被黑手党除名，据说躲在莫哈维南部边境的某个地方。
战术布置: 有谣言说，福克纳因为在黑手党的神枪法赢得他的绰号。他的小枪技巧极其高超，千万不要低估他。
引用受害者证言, 10/13/2281 (身份保密): - “他说如果我能陪他喝酒的话，就帮我在赌场里找一份唱歌的工作。我想，反正就是聊会天也没什么，于是就跟他走了。他的屋子很奇怪，和别人的不太一样，地上到处都是玉米棒。几杯之后，他就开始碰我，他说到了‘检查身体’的时候了。我叫他住手，可一点用也没有。他很熟练地撕烂我的衣服，好像以前经常这么做。他打了我，然后把我按在床上，但是他那里怎么也硬不起来......我不知道他以前行不行，总之......他就换了一根玉米棒。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Trigger. He is wanted for rape, assault, and other felonies. He was last sighted near his shack south of Cottonwood Cove. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Trigger's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏特里戈。他因为强奸、袭击和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在科特伍德洞穴南面他自己的小屋附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Conrad,
You just remember what we talked about. &PCname; is the person who killed your mentor, and now I'm the target. I want you to take care of this whelp. I've got a dozen fiends ready to ambush this worm at the Emergency Service Railyard. Mather will greet the bounty hunter, and afterwards signal the ambush. Don't fuck up out there
- Red Bear
ESP.TRADUIT:
康拉德,
你还记得我们刚刚讨论的人吗？&PCname;，就是这家伙杀了你的导师，而现在我成了目标。我希望你能好好“照看”一下这只狗崽子。我有一队恶魔帮的人在紧急服务铁路广场埋伏着。马瑟会迎接这个赏金猎人的，一到你就给他们发信号。别搞砸了。
- 红熊
通缉: 布莱恩·克莱本

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Bryan Claiborne. He is wanted for murder and armed robbery. He was last sighted near Hell's Motel. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Bryan Claiborne's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏布莱恩·克莱本。他因为谋杀和抢劫军火被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在地狱旅店附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ghoul # 1,
Our reconnaissance mission was successful. We scouted Ranger Station Alpha and the exterior of Shadow Company's bunker as instructed. The ranger station is led by a female smoothskin, a ranger. It was not possible to gain entrance to the Shadow Company Bunker.
We also spotted a strange occurence on Lake Mead. Someone started shooting the Lakelurks at the Scavenger Rig in the lake, and after they were all dead, a portly smoothskin emerged on a boat. He made his way onto the platform, dragging what appeared to be a very heavy case. Surprisingly, he dumped the case into the lake from the southeastern barge, and then hurried away. This behavior is inexplicable, even for the smoothskin running dogs, but I wanted to bring it to your attention.
Respectfully, Ghoul # 12
ESP.TRADUIT:
食尸鬼 #1,
我们的侦察行动非常成功。按照指示，我们顺利调查了游骑兵广播站Alpha和暗影公司地堡的外围。那个广播站由一个女滑皮负责。暗影公司的地堡则完全不可能进得去。
我们还在旁边的湖上注意到一个奇怪的事情。我们的人那时在湖面上的拾荒者平台打湖沼蟹玩，一个肥胖的滑皮驾着一艘小船出现了。他来到平台上，拖着一个看起来像箱子的东西。令人吃惊的是，接下来他把那个箱子丢到了湖里，然后迅速逃离。他的行为非常怪异，虽然他没有对我们造成威胁，但我想还是要报告给您。
向您表示尊敬, 食尸鬼 #12

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It was Red Bear. It had to be. It was the same guy I saw on that wanted poster, and he killed my pa and brothers. We heard the Mojave was getting better, and finally had some semblance of law and order. That was a lie. This is a hateful place... even the elements are spiteful. I don't think I can survive. I'm just going to sit down and drink. If you find this note, please try to find Red Bear. His victims deserve justice.
He went towards the Spring Mountains. That was the last I saw of him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
是红熊干的。就是他。我在布告上见过他，就是他杀了我的父亲和母亲。我们听说莫哈维这个地方不错，开始出现法律与秩序的迹象。但这一切都是谎言！这里是个充满仇恨的世界……连天气也相当恶劣。我不知道我还能活多久。我已经快走不动了。如果你看到这张笔记，请帮我抓到红熊。他的罪行需要他受到法律的严惩。
我最后看到他向春泉山脉去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sergio,
Your request to supplant Mr. Fisk is approved. He has repeatedly demonstrated incompetence and inefficacy, all while our interests are compromised or destroyed by &PCName;. Once you remove Fisk and terminate the bounty hunter, you will have my full support in Valle del Hierro.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
塞尔吉奥,
你代替菲斯克先生的请求已被批准。他最近一而再再而三地证明了他的无知与无能，我们交给他干掉&PCName;的任务一次又一次地失败。只要你能把他和那个赏金猎人都干掉，你就会得到我在瓦尔德耶罗的全部支持。
真诚的, K.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sergio,
I heard you're doing well down in the Mojave. I congratulate you.
As for me, I'm wrapping things up and heading for Frost Hill, that mining town up in Utah. That's right, I'm retiring. This game isn't what it once was, brother, and times are changing. I'm going to turn in this name and settle down with the rest of those saps. I hear it's cold as hell, but at least there's no Marshals up there to hound my ass when I'm old and decrepit. All they've got is one lazy, crooked sheriff. I reckon that's what happens when most of the townsfolk are retired outlaws.
I'm riding solo now, and I gotta admit something strange happened. I could've sworn that some ghoul was trailing me, watching my every move. The face seemed familiar, if not for the rotting flesh. I'm probably just being paranoid. If you come looking for me, don't ask for Marko, because he won't be there. Take care of yourself, and don't let those law dogs see you sweat.
Your brother, Marko
P.S. Don't trust Mr. K., or whatever the they call him. Trust yourself, and to hell with everyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT:
塞尔吉奥,
我听说你在莫哈维干得不错。祝贺你。
至于我，我现在正起身前往冰霜山岭，那是一个犹他的矿藏小镇。对，我要退休了。现在游戏和以前不一样了，兄弟，时代变了。我准备换个名字，用剩下的钱度过余生。我听说这里很冷，但至少等我老的时候不会有像马歇尔一样的家伙来捣乱。他们看到的只有一个年老驼背的小镇警长。我发现那里的大部分镇民都是些这样的人。
我现在孤身一人，我得说我身边有奇怪的事正在发生。我看见某个个食尸鬼正在追踪我，观察我前进的每一步。那张脸看起来有些熟悉，如果不是那些卷曲的肉，我一定能认出来。如果你来找我的话，不要到处打听“马尔科”，因为那里没有这个“他”。好好照顾自己，不要让那些法律的走狗得逞。
你的兄弟, 马尔科
P.S. 不要相信K.先生，不管他们管他叫什么。世间百态，只有自己才值得信任。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Doug,
I heard you were in the region, up to your usual tricks.
I'm making some moves myself, and some of them will be far-reaching. I could someone like you once things are up and running. It goes without saying that you'll be well-compensated.
I don't need an answer right away. Just get word to me if you're interested. I'll be up in Valle del Hierro.
Regards, Sergio
ESP.TRADUIT:
道格,
我听说你曾经在这呆过，你有一套熟练的把戏。
我正在靠自己努力，但还是很不容易。我想要你这样能从困境中挺过来的人。付出并不一定有回报，人生有时并不公平。
我不需要你立即答复。如果你感兴趣，可以到瓦尔德耶罗来找我。
致敬, 塞尔吉奥

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Joshua,
I'm impressed by the results of the canine dietary supplements you've implemented. Epictetus' muscle mass and frame have shown continued development, and he's not even in his prime yet. Excellent work.
- Commander Meston
ESP.TRADUIT:
约书亚先生,
我对你提供的狗食菜单留下了深刻的印象。我的爱比克泰德现在长得又壮又结实，比它青年时期看起来还要略胜一筹。你干得非常好。
- 梅斯顿长官

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Codrum,
The agency has determined that &PCName; accepted a bribe of sorts from Red Bear and allowed the fugitive to escape from NCR territory. That is unacceptable - it goes without saying that &PCName; is now ripe for termination.
The package should include 500 caps and several stealthboys - you'll get the rest of the payment when you bring us &PCName;'s finger. We chose you because of your reputation - our source said you're the best bounty hunter in Nevada. I cannot overstate &PCName;'s combat prowess, however - use caution and make your shots count. We'll discuss more contracts when this is completed.
- Dickerson
ESP.TRADUIT:
科德拉姆,
我们的特工已经确定&PCName;接受了红熊的贿赂，用他早就断掉的手指帮他逃离了莫哈维。这是绝不能接受的。为了惩罚他，我们要你把他干掉。
包裹里有500个瓶盖和数个隐身小子--其他的赏金将在你完成任务后获得。我们选择你，是因为你是内华达最好的赏金猎手。&PCName;的实力很强，千万不要小看他。把&PCName;的手指带来后，我们可以和你继续讨论其他的合同。
- 迪克森

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brad,
I heard that Ghoul #1 has a brother named Joseph - is that just scuttlebutt?
Jackson pulled guard duty outside Powers' shack and said there's another level they keep sealed up, and that Ghoul #1 keeps an army of ferals down there. Jackson aslo mentioned Ghoul #1's brother went feral years back, so Ghoul #1 put him in that lower level. None of the NCO's allow us to speak of that level. The men say that something unholy is down there... something that predates the old world.
Barker told me that in case we get attacked by the smoothskins that Ghoul #1 has some kind of "switch" that would release all the ferals as a last resort. Barker's full of shit, though.
