He also claimed he was senator and professional dog trainer before he turned. He's just another mouthy boot trying to prove himself.
- Daniel
ESP.TRADUIT:
布莱德,
我听说1号食尸鬼有一个兄弟叫约瑟夫--这是真的吗？
杰克森在鲍尔的小屋外派遣了一支守卫队，他说有一层他们一直保持封闭着，1号食尸鬼还有一支军队在那里。杰克森还说，1号有一个兄弟在数年前就已经进化了，所以1号把1放在更深的层级，那个层级是我们普通士兵禁止讨论的。有人说那里有些邪恶的东西......在旧世界就已经存在的了。
贝克告诉我，万一我们被滑皮攻击，1号食尸鬼就会开启某个“机关”，把那些东西全都放出来。但贝克就是坨屎，他居然称自己进化前是名议员和专业的狗训练员。他的那张破嘴早就证明了他的价值。
- 丹尼尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fisk,
Your performance in the past month has been absymal. Besides uncalculated losses in assets, we've been deprived of several irreplaceable personnel, most notably Judge Richter. You have served the syndicate well in the past, so I will give you one final opportunity to rectify your mistakes. Terminate &PCName;, restore our connections in the narcotics trade, and see to other affairs detailed in future letters; if you perform these duties with celerity and proficiency, I will reward you appropriately. Should you fail, the consequences will be dire. You will be cut off from the syndicate, and left to fend for yourself. I trust this ultimatum will provide proper motivation.
- K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲斯克,
你最近一段时间的表现真是糟糕透顶。不仅令财团资产方面损失惨重，而且还失去了一位无可替代的重要人物，我们忠实的审判官里克特。鉴于你以前为财团做出的贡献，我们再给你最后一次机会：干掉&PCName;，恢复我们在这个地区的正常秩序。如果你能顺利完成，我会给予你一些有趣的奖赏。但如果你失败了，我们会把你从财团除名，之后的路就靠你自己养活自己。我相信这份最后通牒能激起你的干劲。
- K.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
Fucking Red Bear cheated us on the last game... I know it!
What's really crazy is this: he says to get back the drugs we lost, all we have to do is camp out here in the mountains, and ambush this "&PCName;" person, who's supposed to be some badass bounty hunter. Supposedly it's the one that got Eileen and Kurt Katil, but I don't believe those bullshit rumors. Everybody knows Eileen was killed by another Fiend - you can't trust a woman who makes a cock necklace!
As for Kurt, nobody knows. His whole crew just got wiped out one day. I figured it was NCR Rangers. I mean it had to be, right? What kind of fucking bounty hunter takes down a whole gang of fiends?
Red Bear said he's going to see Flagg - that fucker creeps me out more than any damn bounty hunter. I've heard some crazy shit about his bunker - you know, the one up by Ruby Hill Mine? Bad mojo goin' on up in there. They say it's some kind of cult, and when you step inside, you never come out. Who the fuck needs religion when you have good drugs? Anyway, somebody's comin' - I'll tell you the rest in person. The courier should get this to you by Wednesday.
- Honcho
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
我操那个死红熊，他在最后一场游戏里动了手脚......我就知道！
现在想想这是不是太疯狂了？他口口声声说由他去找回我们丢失的毒品，而我们只要在山里扎营，埋伏那个叫&PCName;的家伙就行了。这家伙似乎是个赏金猎人，而且有传言说，艾琳和科特.卡迪尔（译者注：这两人是赏金1出现的人物）正是死于他手......我才不信这些什么狗屎，艾琳肯定是被恶魔帮自己人推翻的--这个把咱们的命根子做成项链的婊子！
至于科特，谁知道。他那一整帮人一瞬间就被一扫而空。我怀疑是NCR干的，我觉得一定是！有哪个赏金猎人有这个实力有这个胆，去跟他们那么多人对抗？
红熊说他要去见弗拉格--这个混蛋比那个赏金猎人还要让我恶心。关于他那个地堡，你知道的，我听说好像在红宝石矿山附近。那里有种邪恶的诅咒，他们说是因为一种仪式的原因，要我说就是一团狗屎。有谁听说过什么狗屁宗教还要毒品的？不管怎样--哦，有人来了--剩下的我回头再跟你说。邮差应该能在星期三的时候把这封信交个你。
- 亨乔

ESP.ORIGINAL: &PCName; - that is the name of the villain who murdered our noble father. We will purge the Mojave of this disease once and for all. Our father deserved better than that... to be butchered like some low criminal! I swear that &PCName; will suffer for this injustice.
ESP.TRADUIT: &PCName; - 就是这个恶棍谋杀了我们的神父。他......他竟然像宰畜生一样令我们的神父一命呜呼。我们要为莫哈维净化这个家伙！我发誓：一定要让这个赏金猎人&PCName;接受正义的审判。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Arthur Ribben DOB: c. 2210 Place of Birth: Unknown Sex: Male Allegiance: Enclave
Assessment: The NCR has long since written off Arthur Ribben as a viable target, in spite of his egregious crimes while serving in the Enclave. Regardless, rumors and suspected sightings persist throughout the Mojave, but few are given much regard. Two years ago Shadow Company personnel undertook a regional manhunt without success; the only semi-credible accounts we garnered were the rant of a dying man from Goodsprings, who claimed to have seen Ribben on a trade route further east, and the mutterings of a senile woman who kept repeating, "He lives among us."
Though personnel combed the area between the 188 Trading Post and Novac, none of the interviewees fit the profile constructed by our psychologist and chief physician, Dr. Szeller.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名: 阿瑟·里本 出生时间: 公元 2210 出生地址: 未知 性别: 男性 阵营: 英克雷
评估: 自从NCR因为阿瑟·里本在英克雷时犯下的种种罪行将他列为通缉对象以来，已经过了很久很久。现在，各种谣言和目击证词遍布莫哈维，但大部分听起来都令人怀疑。2年前，暗影公司在一次任务行动中试图找到他，但无果而终。目前唯一听起来似乎可信的是一位已经去世的清泉镇居民的证言，他称他看到里本沿着贸易路线向东面去了。还有一位老妇人一天到晚喃喃自语：“他就活在我们中间。”
尽管有关人员在从188贸易站到诺瓦克之间地毯式搜索过，但再也没找到过任何有价值的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Capt. Ribben,
Thank you for providing information on the hidden cache of Enclave munitions. As promised, you have my personal assurance that your identity will remain safe. Your chosen alias of "Allen Rogers" now has full documentation within the NCR, and no one will have reason or evidence to accuse you of past crimes. Good luck in your future endeavors.
Sincerely, Judge Richter
ESP.TRADUIT:
里本上尉,
感谢你向我们提供关于英克雷弹药储藏地的信息。正如我承诺过的，我们会替你保密个人身份。你选择的别名“艾伦.罗杰斯”将会在NCR那里记录备案，因此再也没有人能够有证据追究你过去的一切所作所为。祝你以后好运。
真诚的, 审判官 里克特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jack,
Stop wearing that ridiculous helmet on duty. I know you're worried about the lakelurks, but Jackson's death was due to his stupidity as much as anything. Besides, that helmet will only obstruct your vision, and it has to be hotter than hell in the daytime. Suck it up, stay alert, and you'll be fine. There are worse things than lakelurks out there, believe me.
- Drake
ESP.TRADUIT:
杰克,
下次再执行任务时，不许再戴那个可笑的头盔。我知道你是担心那些湖藻蟹的袭击，但你要记住杰克森的死完全是因为这样类似的愚蠢。此外，那个头盔会影响你的视线，对你的预判造成影响，而且白天戴着它就跟享受蒸炉一样。不要管它了，随时保持警惕，你才能活命。在莫哈维有很多比那些湖藻蟹还要危险的东西，相信我。
- 德雷克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Commander,
Sources indicate that outlaws recently stole a sizable shipment of Legion gold; apparently the robbery occurred near Cottonwood Cove, though other details are scant. The act was supposedly engineered by an individual known as "Fat Charlie". The Legion will inevitably utilize extreme measures to retrieve their shipment, so I've ordered all personnel to report any and all information pertaining to the gold. I will keep you posted as I acquire more information.
Respectfully, Mr. Joshua
ESP.TRADUIT:
指挥官,
有消息说，最近有一队匪徒抢了数量可观的军团金币。我们除了知道事件发生在科特伍德洞穴附近外，并没有其他更详细的信息。这个行动似乎是由一个叫“胖子 查理”的人一手导演。军团一定会倾尽全力寻找这些金币，我也已经向所有的人下令，一旦发现任何有用的线索立即汇报。只要一有新的消息，我会立刻向您汇报。
向您表示尊敬, 约书亚先生

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fisk,
I used Captain Ribben's alias as leverage to secure another hidden cache of Enclave munitions. He's been operating as "Allen Rogers" for several decades, so it was quite a shock to the old man when he learned we knew his identity all along. Strange to think he's been living in Novac all these years, right under the NCR's nose.
He was more than willing to exchange information for NCR documentation. He's quite attached to that granddaughter of his. Maybe he's gone soft in his old age. It's hard to imagine - I scanned his dossier some time ago, and it's fair to describe him as "zealous" in his younger days.
I believe he has information on more weapon stores, so I'd like to continue leveraging his identity when our need for munitions dictates it. We can always hurt the girl if he refuses to comply, but we can't allow him to fall into NCR custody in any case. Sugar will be ready if Ribben's capture appears imminent.
Sincerely, Judge Richter
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲斯克,
我成功威逼了里本上尉，找到并回收清理了一个英克雷储藏弹药的洞穴。原来这么多年他一直用“艾伦.罗杰斯”这个名字，真难以相信他就一直住在诺瓦克附近，就在NCR的鼻子底下。你实在无法想象当我一语戳破他时他的惊讶表情，哈哈。
他不太愿意交换有关NCR的情报，他似乎对祖父的身份已经习以为常，小女孩倒是挺可爱的，也许是他年纪已经太大了。我之前有浏览过关于他以前行为的记录档案，实在难以想象他年轻时居然是个如此的狂热之徒。
我相信他还有更多武器储藏点的情报，如果需要的话，我会继续利用他真正的身份威胁他。如果他拒绝帮助，我们还可以绑架那个小女孩，但绝不能让他在走投无路之下向NCR投降。实在不行就直接把他绑了，这也会有甜头的。
真诚的, 审判官 里克特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Batu,
I know you blame &PCName; for Papa Khan's untimely demise. Since you won't be dissuaded from your resolute pursuit of vengeance, I may as well assist you.
A reliable source has indicated &PCName; is likely to pursue a bounty on Trigger, the savage little rapist who's on the lam in a remote shack. If you establish a proper ambuscade near the shack, you will likely catch your prey unawares.
I understand your ambition to control the Great Khans, and you'll certainly prove yourself worthy by dispatching the legendary &PCName;, a bounty hunter both feared and reviled across the Mojave. &PCName; was responsible for the Judge's death, and has been thoroughly injurious to our business interests. Assuming you're successful, please retain the head of the aforementioned person - in exchange I offer you ten thousand caps. Furthermore, I will adjust our trade agreement with your clan so that it better rewards your loyalty and labor.
Sincerely, Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
巴图,
我知道你因为大可汗的最终决定对&PCName;心怀不满。看到你如此坚毅的复仇之心，我想我或许可以帮助你。
我有一条可靠的消息说，&PCName;很有可能正在寻逐一个叫特里戈的赏金对象，那个可怜的家伙现在估计正藏在一个遥远的小屋里。如果你能在那里埋伏他，你一定能打他个措手不及。
我看出你有称雄可汗帮的决心，你一定能通过抓住&PCName;证明你的实力。&PCName;，这个现在闻名莫哈维的赏金猎人，不仅要为审判官的死负责，现在还严重影响到我们的正常生意。如果你成功了，请把他的头带给我，我会给你10000个瓶盖。除此以外，我还会调整我们之间的贸易条款，给予你更多商业上的利益空间，帮你实现你的野心。
真诚的, 菲斯克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fisk,
After considering your appeal, I've decided to re-admit you into the syndicate. However, this is your last chance. I will be sending a personal representative to convey my new directives for your business. Please ensure he is not shot by an overzealous guard, as I understand you've augmented the bunker's security staff. Do not fail me again.
- K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲斯克,
在考虑了你的请求后，我决定把你重新纳入我们的企业联合体。但这是你最后的机会。我会派一个代表亲自跟你讲述我们生意未来的发展方向。请确保他不被你那些过于狂热的守卫击杀，因为我听说你最近扩大了你的地堡保安人员。不要再让我失望。
- K.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tyler,
Mr. Khagan has decided to re-admit me into the syndicate, so I will be returning the men you so graciously lent me. I will also dispatch the compensation we discussed. Thank you for your timely assistance. I believe it factored into Khagan's decision, as he doesn't have the stomach to begin a war against another partner in the syndicate. His representative is entering the bunker now - I'll tell you the rest in the next letter.
Sincerely, Fisk
ESP.TRADUIT:
泰勒,
哈根先生已经愿意重新接纳我加入财团了，所以我不久就会把你曾经慷慨借给我的人手如珍奉还。我还会为你送去一批我们之前讨论过的补给。感谢你无时不刻对我的关怀，我觉得这对哈根的决定肯定也会有影响的。他是个聪明人，不会把把珍贵的力气浪费在财团的内部斗争中。好了，过一会儿他的代表就要来见我了。我会在下封信中把我们见面的详情说给你听。
真诚的, 菲斯克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Gary,
We couldn't find a single coffin in the Valley - not one. I know you're hell-bent on displaying that NCR pig in a coffin, but it ain't happening. I suggest you throw that bastard on some planks and leave him to rot. It will stink like a motherfucker, but you'll still be making a show out of him, right? To top it off, throw a party hat on that stiff. At least when we're putting out our cigarettes on his filthy corpse we can get a laugh out of him.
- Mike
ESP.TRADUIT:
加里,
在这个可怜的山谷竟然连口棺材都找不到--居然一口都找不到！我知道你急切地想把那个NCR蠢瓜挂在棺材里展览，但既然事实如此我们不如换个方式。我建议你把他扔在木板上，就这样暴露着，虽然尸体会扭曲，但也绝对可以观赏。另外最好再在他的头上放顶小圆派对礼帽，这样我们在朝他身上扔烟头的时候会有种不可言喻的快感。
- 麦克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Commander,
The Judge is definitely KIA. My scout acquired visual confirmation after investigating the bunker, which is now abandoned and littered with the bodies of the Judge and his slaves. The cause of death was assuredly unnatural, judging by the corpse.
Respectfully, Mr. Joshua
ESP.TRADUIT:
指挥官,
审判官的确已经身亡了。我的侦察兵到那个地堡去调查了一下，那里遍布着横七竖八的尸体。他辨别出了审判官，可以确定，他的死是人为造成的。
向您表示尊敬, 约书亚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: &PCName; DOB: Unknown Place of Birth: Unknown Sex: &PCSex; Allegiance: Unknown
Biography: Randall's protege, aka "The Courier" is the apparent culprit behind the Judge's downfall. Information on this person is sketchy, but our sources indicate "The Courier" has accumulated a substantial body count. Further investigation is recommended.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名: &PCName; 出生时间: 未知 出生地点: 未知 性别: &PCSex; 阵营: 未知
传记: 兰道尔的门徒，人称“邮递员”，一手导演了审判官的覆灭。关于他的信息不是很充分，但我们的信息源指出，在他的身后躺下的尸体数都数不过来。建议日后展开进一步调查。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Don't know why I want to write. Bleeding out, can't get to Westside.
Fiends keep coming, but I've managed to fend them off. It won't matter much longer, though.
At least Guts is still with me. My good friend, the only one who's been with me to the end. Better than my ex-wife, that's for damn sure. At least dogs won't fuck the neighbor and then steal everything you own.
I guess it's fitting that he's here with me. Feeling woozy, always thought I'd be cold at the end.
If you read this, and Guts is still here, please take care of my friend. I would like
ESP.TRADUIT:
不知道我为什么要写字。失血过多，去不了西区。
恶魔帮不断地袭来，但我设法把他们挡开了。不过，这不会持续太久。
至少肠子还在我身边。我的好朋友，唯一陪我到最后的人。肯定比我前妻强。至少狗不会操了你的邻居然后把你的东西都偷走。
我想他和我在一起很合适。感觉头昏眼花，总觉得最后会很冷。
如果你读了这篇文章，而且肠子还在，请照顾好我的朋友。我想

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the death of Henry Helm. He is wanted for murder, cannibalism, robbery, and kidnapping. He was last sighted near Valle del Hierro. He is to be considered armed and extremely dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Henry Helm's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR悬赏1000瓶盖杀死亨利·赫尔姆。他因谋杀、食人、抢劫和绑架而被通缉。他最后一次出现在耶罗瓦附近。他应该持有武器，极度危险，只有专业武装人员才能追捕他。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 750 caps for the termination of Jacob Powers. He is wanted for terrorism, treason, and other felonies. He was last sighted near the old nuclear test site, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Jacob Power's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以750个瓶盖悬赏雅各布·鲍尔。他因为恐怖行动、煽动骚乱和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在旧核辐射测试基地附近，有大量同伴随行。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Unsated by the bloody profiteering enjoyed as a bounty killer, the venal villain known as &PCName; has now begun a career as a murderous treasure hunter. Accounts indicate this grasping gold digger unscrupulously acquired leads on a trove of Enclave bullion. Sources tell the Coyote Courier that &PCName; exchanged sex acts in order to attain keys to select bunkers that retained the treasure.
Incapable or unwilling to brave the hazards of long-abandoned Enclave facilities alone, &PCName; apparently relied on a lone militiaman from Westside to lead their party. "The only reason &PCName; got Bradley to help was by sucking his cock," said Bobby Batts, a Freeside entrepreneur.
After scouring a number of empty sites, the disgraceful duo finally uncovered the Enclave stores in a shelter directly under the ruins of old Las Vegas. Though the gold was by all rights the property of the NCR, &PCName; flouted legal precedent and common decency without hesitation, claiming the stores in their entirety. Furthermore, when the kind, elderly guide inquired into earning a meager portion of the spoils, &PCName; casually gunned him down, leaving his corpse to fester in the bowels of an old war tomb.
Sources indicate &PCName; is now bent on hoarding this newfound wealth, having refused all requests for charity. Let us hope that some brave soul has the moral courage and intenstinal fortitude to finally face down &PCName; and bring the renegade to justice.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
不满足于血腥的暴利享受作为赏金杀手，贪得无厌的恶棍被称为&PCName;已经开始了杀人寻宝的职业生涯。资料显示这个贪婪的淘金者不择手段地获取了英克雷黄金的线索。消息人士透露野狼邮差&PCName;通过交换性行为，以获得掩体保存宝藏的钥匙。
无法或不愿独自面对长期废弃的英克雷设施带来的危险;他们依靠一个西区民兵来领导他们的组织。“&PCName;让布拉德利帮忙的唯一原因就是给他口交，”西区的企业家鲍比·巴茨(Bobby Batts)说。
在搜索了一些空的地点后，这对可耻的二人组最终在拉斯维加斯废墟下的避难所中发现了英克雷的战利品。尽管黄金所有权应该归NCR， &PCName;毫不犹豫地藐视法律先例和一般礼仪，拿走了所有的战利品。此外，当这位善良的年长导游询问要不要从这些战利品中分一点时，&PCName;迅速开枪打死了他，让他的尸体在一个旧战争坟墓里溃烂。
&PCName;表明，现在正致力于囤积这些新发现的财富，拒绝了所有的慈善请求。让我们希望一些勇敢的灵魂有道德的勇气和内在的刚毅之士，最终能将&PCName;这个叛徒绳之以法。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
While the disease of crime has long plagued New Vegas, it was only recently that organized mobsters made serious inroads into our fair metropolis. Led by a malign, illiterate maniac known only as "Zimmer" a collection of well-dressed thugs began squeezing local residents and businesses through intimidation and deliberate, systematic extortion.
With no assistance offered by feckless NCR officials, residents were nearly resigned to neverending subserviance to criminals until &PCName; once again intervened and delivered swift, impartial justice to the offending party. Though bitterly resisted by throngs of murderous gunmen, &PCName; rapidly rooted out the rascals behind New Vegas' woes. After an exhaustive, bloody campaign, the intrepid Courier finally faced off with the rabid madman, Zimmer. Though &PCName; made every effort to render a peaceful resolution, Zimmer's ambition and bloodlust could only be undone in a quick, merciful death.
Soon thereafter &PCName; uncovered the gangsters' ill-gotten spoils, which even included an extensive store of Enclave bullion. In a gracious, philanthropic gesture, &PCName; stated that this wealth would be re-distributed to the poorest citizens of our city, particularly in the form of non-profit welfare programs spearheaded by the Followers of the Apocalypse. Let us hope that our leaders will begin to emulate the bold, just spirit and deeds of &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
虽然犯罪问题长期困扰着新维加斯，但直到最近，有组织的暴徒才开始大规模入侵我们这个美丽的大都市。在一个名叫“齐默”的邪恶文盲疯子的领导下，一群衣着考究的暴徒开始通过恐吓和蓄意的系统勒索来压榨当地居民和企业。
没有负责任的NCR官员提供帮助，居民们被迫几乎永远臣服于罪犯，直到&PCName;再次介入并迅速、公正地审判了违规方。尽管遭到了成群凶残的持枪歹徒的顽强抵抗，他仍然迅速铲除了新维加斯灾难背后的流氓。经过一场穷途末路、血雨腥风的战役，无畏的邮差终于与狂暴的疯子齐默狭路相逢。尽管&PCName竭尽全力想要和平解决问题，但齐默的野心和嗜血欲望只能在迅速而仁慈的死亡中化为乌有。
不久之后&PCName;发现了匪徒的不义之财，其中甚至包括大量英克雷金条。以亲切、博爱的姿态，&PCName;将这些财富重新分配给我们城市最贫穷的公民，特别是以“天启追随者”牵头的非营利性福利项目的形式。让我们希望，我们的领导人将开始效仿&PCName;的勇敢、公正的精神和行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jake,
I know you'll do the right thing, honey. That old ranger will hurt our family, and family always comes first. You take your brothers and take care of him. Make sure there ain't no witnesses. If you want, you can take some meat from the young ones. I'll cook it up like veal, just the way my baby likes it. Grandma will always take care of you, Jake.
Love, Grandma
P.S. Come tuck me in tomorrow night. I need some company, and your brothers are occupied.
ESP.TRADUIT:
詹克,
我知道你明白你要做什么，亲爱的。那个老游骑兵会让我们家族陷入困境的。记住，家族的利益永远是你心中的第一位。你和兄弟们去好好照顾照顾他。如果你乐意，顺便从他家的小孩身上带点肉回来，我会像你小时候喜欢的那样给你做顿美味的肉汤。好了，去吧，奶奶对你的关心胜过一切。
爱你的, 祖母
P.S. 明天晚上到我这来睡，我有点孤单，需要人陪伴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 50 caps for the termination of Dynamite Danny. He is wanted for robbery, Brahmin rustling, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Hunter's Farmhouse. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Dynamite Danny's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以50个瓶盖悬赏“炸药”丹尼。他因为抢劫、偷盗双头牛和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在猎人农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the capture of "Bloody Brad" Jamison. He is wanted for Robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Harper's Shack. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Brad Jamison or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏“血腥的”布拉德·杰米森。他因为抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在哈珀的小屋附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rick,
I thought the food was bad in the NCR, but the chow in this place is fucking awful! Cookie whipped up a batch of tapioca pudding and kept talking about his "special ingredient" that he added. There's no telling what bodily fluids that slob is mixing into the food. I saw him cough phlegm right into the dog stew on Wednesday. It's no wonder that several of the guys are bent on hunting lakelurks when they're off-duty.
Anyway, I'm heading out on a LRRP, but I should be back within a week. Meston wants us to looks for some detachment of "Marines"? What the fuck is "Marine", anyway? It's probably another one of his bullshit schemes. He should read less and get out more, if you ask me.
- Zack
ESP.TRADUIT:
里克,
我觉得NCR那里的食物真是糟糕，但这里的美食真他妈牛逼！卷着甜奶酪的小圆布丁，撒着巧克力酱的草莓果冻，夹着冰欺凌的奶油起司，我操，真他妈好吃！尤其是库奇用他的独特配方做成的湖藻蟹肉煎饼，哇靠，我已经不知道怎么用语言表达了--这里的湖沼蟹的肉实在是太嫩了！
不久，我将被派到LRRP去，大约一个星期后回来。梅斯顿好像要我们去寻找一支什么......“海军陆战队”。这个沙漠哪来的什么“海军陆战队”？其实准确地说，当时我就没明白他在讲什么东西，谁知到他又在做什么计划安排。如果你要问我对他有什么看法，我觉得，他应该少说废话多做事！
- 扎克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Adam,
This latest batch should fit the bill for your business. I imagine the females will fetch a nice turnaround if you fatten them up a bit. A word of warning, though - you'd better geld those two males. One of them is a wild tribal who damn near beat one of my men to death. Even with their tongues cut out, I suspect they're plotting some type of escape.
This is my last run, so you better plan on acquiring stock through another dealer.
- Red Bear
ESP.TRADUIT:
亚当,
这最后一捆奴隶应该能满足你的需要了。我觉得那些女人在你倒手之前，可以先喂一喂，养肥了一定可以买个更好的价钱。另外给你一个警告，你最好把那两个男人都阉割了。其中一个家伙性格非常野蛮，几乎把我的一个人打死。我打赌即使你把他们的舌头都割了，他们也一定会计划逃跑的。
这是我最后一笔生意，我建议你最好计划从其他商人那里进点货做好储备。
- 红熊

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1. Take charge of this post and all government property in view.
2. Walk my post in a military manner, keeping always on the alert and observing everything that takes place within sight or hearing.
3. Report all violations of orders I am instructed to enforce.
4. To repeat all calls [from posts]more distant from the guardhouse than my own.
5. Quit my post only when properly relieved.
6. To receive, obey, and pass on to the sentry who relieves me, all orders from the Commanding Officer, Officer of the Day, Officers, and Non-Commissioned Officers of the guard only.
7. Talk to no one except in the line of duty.
8. Give the alarm in case of fire or disorder.
9. To call the Corporal of the Guard in any case not covered by instructions.
10. Salute all officers and all colors and standards not cased.
11. Be especially watchful at night and during the time for challenging, to challenge all persons on or near my post, and to allow no one to pass without proper authority
ESP.TRADUIT:
1. 负责这个职位和所有政府财产。
2. 以军人的姿态巡视岗位，时刻保持警惕，观察所见所闻的一切。
3.举报所有违反命令的行为。
4. 重复所有(从哨所发出的)比我自己的哨所更远的呼唤。
5. 只有当适当的放松时，我才会辞职。
6. 接受、服从司令官、值班军官、军官和士官的一切命令，并传给接替我的哨兵。
7. 除了执行任务时，别跟任何人说话。
8. 发生火灾或混乱时发出警报。
9. 不在没有指示的情况下呼叫警卫班长。
10. 向所有未穿制服的军官致敬。
11. 在晚上，尤其保持警惕，警惕所有在岗位上或附近的人，没有适当的授权，不允许任何人通过

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 10,000 caps for the capture or termination of "Red Bear" a known criminal and raider of dangerous repute. He is wanted for murder, theft, kidnapping, rape, and other crimes against the state and humanity. He was last sighted south of Goodsprings, in possession of several women from the surrounding territory. He is extremely dangerous and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Red Bear or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以2500个瓶盖悬赏“红熊”，一个臭名昭著的罪犯。他因为谋杀、偷盗、绑架、强奸和其他触犯法律和人性的罪行被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在清泉镇南面，周围有几名女性被他占有。他是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the capture of "The Mongol Kid", leader of "The Mongols", a radical offshoot of the Great Khans. He is wanted for kidnapping and other crimes against the state. He was last sighted at Lone Wolf Radio, accompanied by several well-armed gang members. He is extremely dangerous and should be pursued only by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit The Mongol Kid or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 蒙格尔·基德，一伙可汗帮分支--蒙格尔人的首领。他因为绑架和其他触犯州法律的罪行被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在独狼电台，身边有全副武装的帮派成员。他持有武器，是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Red Bear,
Thanks for letting Polly go. She's a hell of a shot, so I know you hated to lose her. Yesterday she made a shot from five hundred yards in high winds. The guy was gutshot, but he wasn't going anywhere. Of course, Polly took her time in working the guy over - even some of the veteran raiders were queasy when she carved out his eyes. You taught her well, my friend.
I just can't believe she used to be a slave. I don't know how you find your people, but you sure as shit have an eye for talent. Thanks again, and good luck in Vegas.
- Sebastian
ESP.TRADUIT:
红熊,
感谢你对波利的栽培。她真是个神枪手，我猜你一定很喜欢她。昨天她在500码的距离外射杀了一个家伙。那孩子腹部中弹，躺在地上一动不动。不过，波利为了处理那个战利品也花了不少时间--即使某些经验丰富的强盗看了也会觉得恶心--她把他双眼挖了出来。你教导有方，我的朋友。
我只是无法相信她以前居然是个奴隶。我不知道你是怎么认识她的，但你真是慧眼识珠，挖掘出了她的才能。最后再次感谢，祝你在维加斯好运。
- 塞巴斯蒂安

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Flagg,
Those captives should work fine for ya'll. They were wild as hell when I first nabbed them, but they should be good and docile by now. I'm heading up to the mercenary encampment, where I'll make my final delivery before heading back north. I've heard that Marko is making his way west, so I'm half expecting to see him up near Frost Hill. Every other bastard in the region is up there. I suspect he'll have them licking his boots soon enough. His presence might complicate our arrangement, but I'll keep you posted in any case.
- Red Bear
ESP.TRADUIT:
弗拉格,
那些俘虏应该看起来一切都好。当我刚抓住他们的时候，他们还是一帮野人，但现在应该已经很温顺了。我正要前往佣兵营地，在那里我要进行在回到北方前的最后一笔货物转交。我听说马尔科正在向西走，我有点开始期待能在冰霜山岭见到他。那里到处都是恶棍，但马尔科来了也只能为他添脚。马尔科的到来可能会令情况变得复杂，到时我会随时与你保持联系。
- 红熊

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is put on a table, cut, but never eaten?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么东西放在桌子上，切好，却从来不吃?

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
An unnamed source recently reported the NCR is actively recruiting assassins to perform state-sanctioned murder, a troubling development. Ostensibly the Boulder City Jail will license random ruffians of the wasteland to perform the duties of the state, with no regard for their background or affiliation. "I don't give two shits who they are, so long as they get the job done," said Captain Larry Scull, commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
It's true that the Mojave is seated on the frontier, and that most of our resources are devoted to the looming contest with Caesar's Legion, but it should stand as no excuse for reliance on solo contractors. It bespeaks the state's corruption and desperation when it legitimizes the use of profiteering picaroons who affectionately dub themselves "Bounty Hunters". They are an ilk comprised entirely of reptilian killers and grasping brutes, not to be trusted in the least.
I vehemently implore our leaders to reconsider this short-sighted stance. We shoulder the responsibility of restoring law, order, and due process; utilizing murder will only serve to undermine our legitimacy in this effort.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有一位匿名消息人士说，NCR最近正在招募需要追踪某些重要罪犯的刺客。表面上巨石城监狱有一套严格执照申请流程，但事实上对于申请者的背景他们几乎完全不考虑。拉里.斯科尔上尉，巨石城监狱的负责人，这样说到：“我才不管他们是谁，从哪来，我只要他们能完成任务就行。”
莫哈维坐落于外围边境，我们大部分的精力都浪费在与军团抢夺资源上，但这不是我们的法律系统寻求外部独立个体支援的理由。这个政府正在腐败，绝望，不遗余力地依靠一帮以金钱为最终目标的自称“赏金猎人”的一帮人维护社会安全。他们其实就是一群残酷的杀手、贪婪的畜生。
我强烈恳求我们的当局放弃这种无知而短视的做法。我们应该靠自己承担起弘扬法律和秩序的职责。如果再这样继续下去，我们就会毁了我们自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
The murderous rampage of &PCName; continued recently with the violent death of "Red Bear", a respected tribal chieftain traveling through the Mojave. Sources indicate &PCName; conducted an exhaustive pursuit of Mr. Bear, pertinaciously stalking him into the Spring Mountains. Amidst alpine serenity, &PCName; handily dispatched the hapless chieftain. Sources also state the vigilante mutilated Mr. Bear's corpse, collecting fingers and various organs as macabre trophies. Afterwards the bounty hunter submitted one of the gory tokens to NCR authorities.
This begs the question - why does our fair republic utilize such ghastly, barbaric methods for confirming bounties? More importantly, why are our taxes bankrolling this vile practice? Rewarding a malevolent sociopath like &PCName; is all but criminal, and therefore I beseech more reasoned leaders in our government to abandon this modus operandi.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
&PCName;的疯狂杀戮最近一直在持续，又一个倒霉鬼--红熊死在了他手里。消息指出，他一路追踪红熊来到春泉山脉，在风和日丽的阳光下残忍地将红熊杀害。还有人看见他近乎暴虐地折磨逝者的尸体，不仅剁下血淋淋的手指，而且丧心病狂地挖出新鲜的内脏，也许是想作为战利品。之后，他把其中一枚手指作为纪念品送给了NCR当局。
我请求回答--为什么我们公正的共和国会以这样的残酷方式确定目标的生死？更重要的是，为什么我们纳税人的钱会不经同意滥用于这种方式？给&PCName;这样一个恶毒的反人类分子奖赏，政府良心何在？我强烈要求举行公开辩论。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again, friend. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了，朋友。我能为你做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fancy seeing you here, Courier. I was quite looking forward to our next meeting. I hope you'll pardon my abrupt departure last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴在这见到你，邮差。我很期待我们的下一次会面。希望你能原谅我上次的突然离去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_0009711A_1.ogg

NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_0009711B_1.ogg

NPC : Blunt [02099EEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_0009A4BD_1.ogg

NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_000B129E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for stopping by. Have a safe journey.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_000B3B9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a moment. We'll talk outside.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_000B3B9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, it's just us now. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，现在只有我们了。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISomeguy02_GREETING_000CEDC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Suspicious}I don't recognize you. {Scolding}If you're here about property, you need to speak with James, down at the auction house.
ESP.TRADUIT: {怀疑}我不认识你{责骂}如果你在这里谈论财产，你需要和拍卖行的詹姆斯谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy
NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there, welcome to the Coyote Courier. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，欢迎来到森林狼快递处。我能帮你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPress_GREETING_00073957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPress_GREETING_0007396B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please leave me alone. You're breaking my concentration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请让我一个人呆着好吗？你让我无法集中注意力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPress_GREETING_0007396C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I hear you're looking for me. What can I do for you, bounty hunter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我听说你在找我。我能帮你做什么，赏金猎人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue02_GREETING_0004F39F_1.ogg
NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们现在都在这了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_GREETING_0004C205_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I finally get to meet the famous bounty hunter of the Mojave. The one who got the Judge, Red Bear, and Johnny Rounder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我终于见到了莫哈维最著名的赏金猎人。一个干掉了审判官、红熊和乔尼·朗德的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_GREETING_0004C205_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was expecting someone a little taller, frankly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白的说，我希望你的个子能更高点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_GREETING_0004C205_3.ogg
NPC : Slave [0204DA24] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, mister, but I've got a delivery for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的鲁莽，先生，但是我有一件货物要交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_GREETING_0004E7E7_1.ogg
NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck happened here? Who the fuck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里他妈的发生什么事了？你他妈的是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary22_GREETING_00047C05_1.ogg
NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold up, something kinda important has come up. I just got word that some ghoul bandit has camped outside Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，好像发生了一件很重要的事。我刚得到消息，有某个食尸鬼强盗正在诺瓦克外扎营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're getting a lot of reports that a power struggle has erupted in the local syndicate, and this might be connected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之前就曾得到大量报告，在当地企业联合体有一股强大的骚乱正在爆发。或许这之间存在某些联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This fella outside Novac is some kind of ghoul gunslinger and he might have a stake in the whole affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个在诺瓦克外的家伙手里有枪，估计就是他要为整个事件负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only ID we have on him is "Rounder". He robbed a caravan yesterday and killed two guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得到的仅有的消息称，他的名字叫朗德。他昨天打劫了一支商队，杀死了两名护卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My orders are explicit - kill the ghoul, immediately. We don't have time to put up posters or any of that bullshit, so I'm counting on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的命令很明确——立刻把他干掉。我们没有时间和足够的人手腾出来，所以我指望你来完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering, the reward is five hundred caps. And no, you don't have a choice. Get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为防你犹豫不决，我先告诉你，酬金是500个瓶盖。并且，没有任何讨价还价的余地。好了，快去搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A39_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take another step, or I'll put a round right in that pretty little smoothskin face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想有什么企图，否则我就会在这张漂亮的滑皮小脸上打个窟窿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you brought my secret admirer, Doctor Friday. It's good to see you, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见你带来了我的秘密仰慕者，“星期五”医生。呵呵，很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unusually reticent, I see. I guess he's still smarting from that last gunshot to his knee. As for you, courier, I just wanted to say thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，很不寻常的安静。我猜他自从上次的枪击事件后一定变得更聪明了。至于你，邮递员，我想对你说声“谢谢”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been wandering a long time, pursued and harried by my orthodontic nemesis, and all the while grasping for some semblance of power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在外面徘徊了很长时间，一直被我的复仇者四处追赶，只要一有机会就抓紧增强自己的实力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In one fell swoop, you've delivered my dream. By eliminating the Judge, Red Bear, and other players here, you've opened the doors for me and Sergio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就像一只勇猛的雄鹰，令我的梦想实现。审判官、红熊和其他人的死为我和塞尔吉奥的未来打开了一扇明亮的天窗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of that, you've brought my ageless enemy into the heart of an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过那扇窗，你把我的死敌们带进了万劫不复的深渊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I know what you're about, bounty hunter, and you ain't walking away from here. Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你知道你是哪一类的人，赏金猎人，而且你今天别想活着从这里走出去。还有什么话要说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A43_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRounderGang1Ref.enable aaRounderGang2Ref.enable aaRounderGang3Ref.enable aaRounderGang4Ref.enable aaRounderGang5Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper1Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper2Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper3Ref.enable
Don't take another step, or I'll put a round right in that pretty little smoothskin face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想有什么企图，否则我就会在这张漂亮的滑皮小脸上打个窟窿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame that you failed to bring the good Doctor Friday. I've grown strangely attached to his vengeful musings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾你没有把“星期五”医生带来。我对他强烈的复仇心已经产生了严重的依赖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for you, I just wanted to deliver a hearty thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你，我想说一声由衷的“谢谢”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A44_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In one fell swoop, you've delivered my dream. By eliminating the Judge, Red Bear, and other players here, you've opened the doors for me and Sergio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就像一只勇猛的雄鹰，令我的梦想实现。审判官、红熊和其他人的死为我和塞尔吉奥的生活打开了一扇明亮的天窗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sincerely wish we could've become acquainted, but we're all victims of the times. Goodbye, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真诚地希望我们能早就相互熟识，但可惜我们都是时间的受害者。再见，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary21_GREETING_00044A44_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaSecondary21.RounderGreeted to 1 setenemy aaDocFridayFaction aaRounderFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction aaDocFridayFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnnyRounderRef.startcombat playerref

aaRounderGang1Ref.enable aaRounderGang2Ref.enable aaRounderGang3Ref.enable aaRounderGang4Ref.enable aaRounderGang5Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper1Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper2Ref.enable aaRounderGangSniper3Ref.enable
I recognized you the moment you strolled in here. You're the famous bounty hunter who wiped out Richter and Associates, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你进来的一瞬间我就认出你来了。你就是那个孤身一人把里克特同伙会干掉的赏金猎人，是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D13B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also understand that you gunned down Jack, Heck Gunderson's former gunman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也知道，你干掉了杰克，那个以前老冈德森的枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D13B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was privileged to work with Jack for several years. He was a fine shootist, and lived his life according to the code.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能和杰克共事多年是我的荣幸。他的枪术很棒，在废土生活的多年依然能保持自己的哲学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D13B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It takes guts to meet me out here. I'll give you that, kid. That won't save you, though. Make your move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要来这见我还是需要点胆量的。你做的还不错，孩子。但胆量救不了你。动手吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D145_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't... can't believe it. You got me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我无法相信。你击败我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D14A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, You win, you little snot. Just give me the fucking collar and I'll turn myself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你赢了，你个小鼻涕虫。把那该死的项圈给我，我自己会把它戴上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary16_GREETING_0003D14A_2.ogg
NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on in, have a seat! There's coffee if you'd like it. Make yourself at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，快进来，坐，坐！如果你喜欢的话，我帮你再泡杯咖啡。像在你自己家里一样就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's no rush, but when you're ready to talk business, just have a seat and we'll get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不必着急，但当你准备好谈生意的时候，请坐，我自然会开始跟你商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C267_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, let me introduce myself. I'm Adam Rzeznik, and as you probably know I deal in human property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先做一下自我介绍。我叫亚当·泽尼克，你大概已经知道，我负责处理个人资产业务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize for the dank setting, but the NCR's presence dictates some degree of secrecy. Now, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为程序上的某些黑暗设置感到抱歉，但NCR强调必须保持某种程度的秘密性。好吧，现在我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C268_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy there, don't shoot! I'm just looking to conversate. Haven't seen anyone around this ranch since the owner left for no apparent reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，放松点，别开枪！我过来只是想跟你聊聊。自从这个农场的主人毫无原因地离开之后，我就一直没有见过任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm struggling to remember his name... goddamn age is getting to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看能不想记起他的名字……草，年纪还真不饶人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't matter. I think I know why you're here. I've seen you before - you're that bounty hunter who worked for Steven Randall, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这无所谓。我知道你为什么来这。我以前见过你——你就是那个为斯蒂芬·兰道尔跑腿的赏金猎人，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall was a good man... he had a lot of anger in him, but still good in his core. It's a shame what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔真他妈的是个好人……他自己惹了那么多麻烦，但他至少的本性是好的。可惜，他后来还是遭遇了不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm guessing you're looking for that slaver, right? Raznik or however you say it. He's a piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我猜，你正在寻找那个奴隶商人，对吧？泽尼克，哦，不管你怎么称呼他，反正他就是坨屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every once in a while the NCR passes through, trying to find him. It's common knowledge that he does business around the ranch here.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR每隔一段时间就会派人四处搜寻他的下落。他在这个农场一带做生意已经是人尽皆知的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what they don't know is that he's right under their noses - his bunker is hidden over yonder, beneath that overpass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们不知道的是，他其实就在他们眼皮子底下——他的地堡就隐蔽在那里，不远处的那个天桥下面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see that you've got something to say, so spit it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看得出来你还有话想说。你说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C279_8.ogg
NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) NPC : Guard [0203C28B] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it right there - state your business!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那儿站住——你是干什么的？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C28E_1.ogg

NPC : Slave [0203C298] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C29A] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C29E] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C2A0] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C2A2] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C2A4] (mod) NPC : Slave [0203C2A6] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary15_GREETING_0003C2BF_1.ogg
NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello there, stranger. Thanks for stopping by the shop. I'm Allen Rogers, owner and operator. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，陌生人。感谢你在我的小店停步。我叫艾伦·罗杰斯，这里的所有者和管理者。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary14_GREETING_00038AEF_1.ogg
NPC : Sally Rogers [02038235] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's good to see you again. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary14_GREETING_00039C2E_1.ogg
NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're here. Please, just get it over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到了。请一口气把它搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary14_GREETING_0003A4EE_1.ogg
NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondary14_GREETING_0003A4F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He waves his hands in an attempt to surrender]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it right there. We've been staking out this place for two days, just waiting for Jamison and his crew to step out so we can ambush them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在那而别动。我们在这个地方已经埋伏了2天了，就等着杰米森那帮家伙自投罗网。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary06_GREETING_0002DBE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then our little bounty hunter comes strolling right in as the gang commences to kill each other. Pretty fucking amazing luck, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他们已经乱成一锅粥，而我们的小赏金猎人来的还真是时候。草你妈的什么好运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't give two shits about that bounty. Jamison had information on a stash of gold. I want it, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我才不管什么狗屎赏金猎人。杰米森知道有一堆金子藏匿处的消息。现在就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary06_GREETING_0002DBE3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it right there fucknuts, don't take another step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在那别动，蠢货，别想有任何多余的动作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary03_GREETING_00027706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea who I am?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary03_GREETING_00027706_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you doing here? Explain yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那里干什么？我要听你的解释！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary03_GREETING_00027706_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么可以讨论的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary03_GREETING_0002A51C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've told you for the last time, don't disturb...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上次已经告诉你了，别再烦我了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_000245FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're not one of them - what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你不是他们一伙的——你是谁，在这干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_000245FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, you're working for the NCR... you've come to kill me, haven't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道了，你是NCR的人……你是来取我性命的，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_000245FC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing is digging into my neck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个破玩意弄疼我的脖子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_0002460B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, you killed him... I'd be dead if it weren't for you. Thank you. I'll see that these records go to good use. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天那，你把他杀死了……如果不是你，我就死了。谢谢！这些记录希望能用到好的方面去。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_00024622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 12 set aaSecondary02.QuislingCaptured to 1 player.removeitem aaQuislingRecords 1
I'm not stopping till I get to that jail!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会停下来，直到我到了那个监狱为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_00024626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing in here? No one is authorized to enter the lab! Explain yourself, immediately!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干什么？没有人能被授权进入这个实验室！告诉我你是谁，立刻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary02_GREETING_00024627_1.ogg
NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it, please, I'm hurt bad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请等一下，我已经严重受伤！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary01_GREETING_0002281C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I surrender... I'll turn myself in... just don't hurt me anymore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我投降……来抓我吧……只是别再伤害我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondary01_GREETING_0002281C_2.ogg
NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Fear
NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, young man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么，年轻人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_0001AF32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, miss?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_0001AF33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_0003B08D_1.ogg
