NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_00099ECE_1.ogg

NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_00099ECD_1.ogg

NPC : Buchan [02095686] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDialogue_GREETING_00099D94_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the one that killed Joe Cobb, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个杀了乔·柯布的家伙，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Powder Gangers don't forgive, and we sure as hell don't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮不会忘记你，我们死了也不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joe wasn't perfect, but he was my brother, and now you've got to pay. Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔不是个完美的家伙，但他至少是我的兄弟，你要为此付出代价。有什么遗言么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing for us to discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之间没有什么好讨论的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't make another move, profligate. I've been tracking you for days, and now... now you're going to pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动，混蛋。我已经跟踪你好几天了，现在……你要付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Agrippa [02031863] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00031862_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your actions at Cottonwood Cove, particularly the murder of Aurelius of Phoenix, have vexed the Legate Lanius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在科顿伍德洞穴的谋杀行为已经触怒了教皇的使节拉尼尔斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Agrippa [02031863] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00031862_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These missions are normally an impersonal matter, and I'm happy to undertake them, cum gladio et sale, but in this case, I volunteered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常这类任务都是与个人无关的事情，我根本就无所谓，但这次，我主动要求参与。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Agrippa [02031863] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00031862_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the distinction that comes with killing the famous bounty hunter who felled Aurelius and so many others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要赢得这份“干掉莫哈维最有名的赏金猎人”的荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Agrippa [02031863] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00031862_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now my legend will supersede your own!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久，我的传奇就将建立在你的尸骨之上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Agrippa [02031863] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00031862_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaEncounters.AgrippaGreeted to 1 startcombat player aaAgrippaRef.setav aggression 2
Hold it right there, jagoff. You're the courier I've been looking for. I've got a message I need you to deliver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在那别动，蠢货。你就是那个我一直在寻找的邮差。我有条消息需要你帮我传送一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bad Pussy [0203704C] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00037050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell my stepfather I'd break his fucking neck again if I had the chance. He's burning in hell right now, and he's about to get some new company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我的继父，如果有机会我还要亲手掐断他的脖子。估计他现在正在地狱煎熬着，而他很快就会有同伴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bad Pussy [0203704C] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00037050_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't get to clip a made guy and walk away, kid. Sorry, but it just don't work that way. Don't forget to deliver that message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会让你这么痛快就滚蛋的，孩子，好好看着。最后，别忘了我让你传的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bad Pussy [0203704C] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00037050_3.ogg
NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Frumentarius [02077375] (mod) NPC : Frumentarius [0207765B] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve, courier. I'm Quintus Fabius, Quaestor of Caesar's Legion. Pardon the intrusion, but we have an urgent matter to discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，邮递员。我叫昆图斯·费比乌斯，凯撒军团的刑事主管。我对自己的突然闯入很抱歉，但有一件很重要的事要和你讨论一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077942_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have something that belongs to Caesar - a sizable shipment of his gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒有某个东西现在在你手里——一个相当大的装有他金子的货箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077942_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally you would already be dead, but as you were merely a scavenger, and not the perpetrator of theft, I'm willing to let you live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下你早就死了，但我们考虑到你也就是个拾荒者，并非什么作恶多端的小偷，所以你继续苟延残喘着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077942_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, you must hand over the gold in its entirety, right now. No excuses or prevarication will be tolerated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你必须把那些金子全部交出来。任何推诿的理由和搪塞都是不可容忍的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077942_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me the 250 pieces and we'll leave without incident. What say you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那250块金子交给我，我们就会当什么事也没发生一样离开。怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077942_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm eager to find the gold at Dead Wind Cavern, courier. Stop bothering me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要立刻前往死风洞穴。别烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounters_GREETING_00077955_1.ogg
NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, kid. I noticed you reading over that wanted poster. You seem like you can handle yourself. Any chance you'll be going after Red Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，孩子。我注意到你正在阅读那张悬赏布告。你看起来似乎是个有能力的人。怎么样，愿不愿意去追踪红熊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00000F8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, have you hit the wall in your search for Red Bear? I imagine clues are scarce out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你准备开始追踪红熊了吗？我能想象，现在有用的线索少之又少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00000F9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might mean swallowing your pride a touch, but I can help you if you'll search for my niece. How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的荣誉正吊在危险的悬崖上。如果你能帮我寻找我的侄女，我就帮你。怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00000F9C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should keep your eye on the ball, kid. A saloon is no place to find outlaws like Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你要处处留心，我的孩子。在这个沙龙里是不会出现像红熊那样的匪徒的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00000F9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are in the wrong place at the wrong time, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在错误的时间来了错误的地点，傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00000FBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, good day to you, sir. How may I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，先生，今天天气真好。我能帮你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties02_GREETING_00002401_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good day, ma'am. How may I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是好天气，女士。我能帮你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties02_GREETING_00002402_1.ogg
NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_000081B5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 别动！说明你来这的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_000081B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're trespassing on Shadow Company territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在侵入暗影公司的领地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_000081B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were right about the followers. I've found a good life here. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对于跟随者的看法是对的。我在这已经开始新的生活了。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000FC06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, you made it. My contact is hiding over there. Mather, come on out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你办到了。我的合同就在那里。马瑟，快出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B93D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.ConradDillonGreeted to 10 setstage aaBounties02 32 aaMatherRef.enable
I see you've met Dillon. I've got some bad news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你已经见过迪伦了。可惜，我有些坏消息要告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dillon there is not who he seems. He's working with Red Bear, just like me and the eight gunmen surrounding you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪伦不是他看起来那个样子。他可是红熊的人，就像我和其他8个包围你的枪手一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B943_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.ConradDillonKilled to 2 set aaBounties02.ConradDillonAlive to 1 setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 32 1
Hells bells, they even shot the dogs, didn't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 草，他们连狗都不放过，他们怎么能这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy there, pardner - this ain't an ambush. I'm Conrad Dillon, and I'm in the same line of work as you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，朋友——这不是伏击。我叫康拉德·迪伦，我和你是站在同一条线上的战友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B650_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was tracking old Red Bear, but I guess we're both a little late, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在追踪一个叫红熊的家伙。但我猜，我们俩都稍微慢了一点，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B650_3.ogg

NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000D344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the fuck is Dillon? He was supposed to come with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个迪伦在哪里？他本来应该跟你一起来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000B940_1.ogg
NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were right. I belong in the Khans. Now get the fuck out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说对了。我是可汗帮的人。那么现在从我面前滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000FC03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, my son. What brings you to the People's Temple of the Order?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我的孩子。什么风把你吹到这里来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00015E15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, my daughter. What brings you to the People's Temple of the Order?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我的孩子。什么风把你吹到这里来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00015E16_1.ogg

NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001830D_1.ogg

NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001830D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I see you've finished the ritual. Are you ready to complete the initiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看来你已经通过仪式了。你准备好完成入会了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001830E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing to say to you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001830F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's always a pleasure to see you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_000185F3_1.ogg
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Sacrificial Victim [020171C1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear

NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0000D646_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just go down the stairs. You can find him in the cloister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沿着楼梯下去。你能在回廊里找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atwood [0201551F] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_000171D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you've entered the sacred property of the Temple of the Order. You best state your business, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经侵入了秩序庙堂的神圣领地。你是来干什么，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atwood [0201551F] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_00015E17_1.ogg
NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Father says we should focus on our studies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 神父说，我们应该一起努力学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultist [02010B69] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have much to learn, stranger. I need to stay focused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有太多要学的东西，陌生人。我需要集中注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultist [02010B69] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We must be ready to make the sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须做好牺牲的准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultist [02010B69] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take another step. You're about to enter a world of hurt if you go this way, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想乱来。如果你执意如此，你正在踏入一个危险的境地，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe it... little Polly has turned into a damned raider. I never thought my own kin could do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法相信……小波利居然变成一个十恶不赦的强盗。我从想过会成这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a rabid dog, she's got to be put down... I... I can't do it, though. I want you to kill her, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她就像只疯狗，她需要……我……不行，我办不到。我要你来杀她，就现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't drag this out. Just get it done.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my face. This is between me and my asshole Uncle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我面前滚蛋。这是我和混蛋叔叔之间的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing for us to talk about. If you want to see Red Bear, just keep going up the rise and you'll find him with the captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有什么可以谈的。如果你想见红熊，继续往那儿走，你会发现他和那群俘虏在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took your time, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在浪费时间，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001B7CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know it yet, but you're in a tight spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前什么都不知道，但你已经快了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001B7CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you make one wrong move, my men will send these captives to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再走近一步，我的人就会把这些家伙送进地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties02_GREETING_0001B7CF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I wanted to kill you, it would've happened already. You've shown some guts coming after me, so I've got a proposition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果以前我想杀你，那早就可以发生了。如今能来到我面前，你确实有种。我有个建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woo-hoo! Chuckles is impressed! We'll have to celebrate! Will Chuckles bake a cake with your lard? Or will he use your eyes as hors d'oeuvres?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜呼！ 丘克尔斯被感动了！ 我们得庆祝一下！丘克尔斯会用你的油烤蛋糕吗？ 或者他会用你的眼睛作为开胃菜？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you trying to exercise? Do some pushups, stop flailing around.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knives and sticks are for thugs. Gentlemen use pistols.

ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这不是星期五医生吗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Doc - you know anything about penis implants? I want one of those jackhammer dicks, pounds everything to dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生，你知道阴茎植入术吗?我想要一个电钻式的小弟弟，把所有东西都捣成灰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, girl. I can't concentrate with all that ass in front of me. Would you mind turning around, slow-like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死,女孩。有那么多屁股在我面前，我没法集中注意力。你能不能转过身去，慢慢地?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if that thing has a vagina.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道那东西有没有阴道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that flying Testicle out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那个会飞的蛋蛋弄出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, you brought Arkansas. I need him to take a look at my package. I think some hussy gave me the clap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你带来了阿肯色。我需要他看一下我的包裹。我觉得有个贱人把淋病传染给我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, that zombie looks like week-old carnitas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，那僵尸看起来像放了一周的卡尼塔斯小肉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you something... when you were imprisoned by the mutants, did they do anything... sexual to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我问你一件事......当你被变种人囚禁时，他们有没有对你做过……与你发生性关系的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brotherhood of Steel. What a bunch of pussies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会。 真是一堆娘们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look out, 1st Recon is present. Don't everybody get excited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意，第一侦察营来了。大家不要激动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, you got a look on your face like someone shoved a dirty corncob right up your ass. Chill the fuck out, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，你脸上的表情就像有人把脏玉米棒子塞进你屁眼里一样，冷静点，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mind not dragging your freakshow in here with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不要把你的怪胎秀拖到这里来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't growl at me, you ugly mutt. I didn't name you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别冲我吼，你这个丑杂种。我没叫你名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E0_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 队长，我跟你说过我在巴哈抓到那个强盗的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you got Red Beer. Ain't you high on the fucking hog now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有红啤酒。你现在不是嗑药磕嗨了吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_HELLO_000B29E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you kidding, kid? This is a done deal. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你在和谁开玩笑？这项交易已经搞定。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setstage aaBounties02 35 aaMatherAmbusher1Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher1Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher2Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher2Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher3Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher3Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher4Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher4Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher5Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher5Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher6Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher6Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher7Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher7Ref.startcombat player aaMatherAmbusher8Ref.enable aaMatherAmbusher8Ref.startcombatplayer
I'm not up for this. It doesn't seem right to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不关我的事。好像不是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with that! I can't live knowing that my own blood is a raider! Now don't bullshit me, kid. Are you going to do it or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 少在那胡扯！我要是知道自己的亲人是个强盗，我他妈就不活了！别跟我扯淡，孩子。你到底干还是不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I like your sense of humor, bounty hunter. Nobody in their right mind could imagine that I'd turn myself in to those NCR bitches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我喜欢你的幽默，赏金猎人。不过凡是有个正常脑子的人都不会认为我会把自己交给那帮NCR婊子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got balls asking me that. I don't have to prove anything to you, kid. You, on the other hand, better make up your damn mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我谈这些你还真有种，孩子。不过，我没必要向你证明什么。相反，你的脑子是不是坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something out there. I can almost smell em'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有东西。我几乎能闻到它们的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon we should stay sharp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们应该保持警惕。

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，可以跳进去，但是我在抽烟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all right. I'll console myself with some fine tobacco. You go on ahead and dodge bullets and all manner of nonsense. I'll be right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我要用上好烟草来安慰自己。你继续前进，躲避子弹和各种各样的废话。我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be here, steady as an oak. A drinking, smoking oak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在这里，像橡树一样稳重。 一颗喝酒，抽烟的橡树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should hope you will respect the norms of personal property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能尊重私有财产的规范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: {恼怒}拖着你的垃圾不是绅士该干的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A sapient approach, if I may say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的做法，如果我可以这么说的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't start the dance without me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersFiredN_0015C815_1.ogg
NPC : [00118E71] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\VNPCFollow_FollowersFiredN_000A360E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be playing with my heart now, gets me pissed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别玩弄我的心，我会被惹毛的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's back to cards with Kate. I'll be at the Short Stick if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，还是和凯特打牌吧。如果你需要我，我就在短棍沙龙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be it. {Sarcastic}Perhaps my vicious glares will deter our foes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随它吧。 {讽刺}也许我恶毒的目光会阻止我们的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {puzzled aroo}[Guts is already waiting for you to attack enemies first.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {迷惑的声音}[古茨在等待你先攻击敌人]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersTactic_000A361C_1.ogg
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersTactic_000A361D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed growl - already doing what the player wants}<growl>
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed growl - already doing what the player wants}<怒吼>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersTactic_000A3617_1.ogg
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersTactic_000A3618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral

{Wary, doesn't like 38}All right... don't be long. {Under her breath}Robots there give me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Wary，doesn't like 38}好的……别去得太久。{Under her breath}那边的机器人让我毛骨悚然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}Just be sure to bury me with my pistols.
ESP.TRADUIT: {快死了}记得把我和我的手枪一起埋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better have a good reason for this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: This attire is not up to snuff.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些真正的盔甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need something with more oomph.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更有气质的东西
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm just pissing him off.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm just pissing her off.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid this weapon is defective.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing is on its last leg.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm falling apart at the seams.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord help me, I can't feel my legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑，我感觉不到我的腿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Poisoned}Feel like I'm fixin' to pass out.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Poisoned}Something ain't right here, can't see straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: {中毒}这里有些不对劲，我什么都看不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad whimper}[Guts is overburdened and is having difficulty keeping up with you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {悲伤的呜咽}[古茨负担过重，很难跟上你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_FollowersOverbu_000A3614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking about it. Why?
I'll tell you why... I've been tracking Red Bear for over a decade. He butchered most of my family back in Utah, and took my niece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来告诉你为什么......我追踪红熊已经有些年了。在犹他的时候，他杀害了我的全家人，并带走了我的侄女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was old enough when I started this thing, and now I'm wearing down, kid. I hate to admit it, but Red Bear has outlasted me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我开始这趟无尽之旅的时候，我的年纪已经很大了，现在越来越力不从心。孩子，我不想但又不得不承认，红熊活的时间可能会比我更长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F8F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm damn near broke, but if you can find my niece, I'll see that you're rewarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的老骨头快不行了。如果你能找到我的侄女，我会尽全力给你任何帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F8F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's all I've got left in the world. If you just agree to search for her, I'll set you up with 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我唯一能留在这世界上的证明。如果你答应我帮忙找她，我愿意付你100个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F8F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But let's be honest, that's chump change compared to the bounty, and I've got information that should put you right on his trail. How bout it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，真诚地讲，这和你之前执行的赏金任务有很大的不同。现在我有足够的信息已捕捉到他的蛛丝马迹。你觉得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F8F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help find your niece, and forget about any reward. I won't accept it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮助你找到你的侄女。但不要谈什么报酬，我一分钱也不要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's mighty large of you, kid. I've traveled far and wide, and there ain't many with that kind of character.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太善良了，孩子。走了这么多的路，见了那么多的人，但我从来没见过像你这样拥有一颗善良的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F9E_1.ogg

NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've met some hard cases in my time, but you're a first-rate asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一生见过许多混蛋，但从没见过像你这么混蛋的家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F9F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, what information can you offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你能提供什么信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the deal. Red Bear takes his captives to raiders and tribals all over the region, but he's got a special arrangement with the Vipers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样的。红熊把他的俘虏卖给整个地区的强盗和部落，但他和毒蛇帮签订了一个独特的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear hates the Khans, so he supports their sorry-ass rivals with discounts on captives, which the Vipers then trade for arms and ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊讨厌可汗帮，因此他在他们的敌人那里交易俘虏时额外提供一个折扣，同时毒蛇帮与他交易武器和弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F98_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of Red Bear's old henchman, Slade, is now a ringleader for the Vipers, so it's working out even better for both sides now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊曾经的一个党羽，斯雷德，现在是毒蛇帮的一个头目。因此现在双方的关系比以往都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F98_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear has a reliable trading partner, and the Vipers are making moves to undermine the Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊有了一个值得信赖的贸易伙伴，而毒蛇帮在对抗可汗帮时开始逐步占据优势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I scoped out the Vipers moving some captives to the south of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我注意到，毒蛇帮现在正把一部分俘虏转移到小镇的南方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F98_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't keep captives for more than a few days, so a deal with Red Bear must've gone down recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不会把俘虏关在那里好几天，因此近期他们一定会与红熊进行交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F98_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can find Slade, you can get some information on Red Bear. I'm too old to take these bastards on, but I bet you're up for it. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到斯雷德，你一定能获得关于红熊的消息。我太老了，干不动这帮家伙了，但我相信你没问题。怎么样，还有什么想问的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F98_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was your background before hunting Red Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在追踪红熊之前是干什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it feels like it was a lifetime or two ago, but I worked for the government, sort of... it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，感觉这好像是上辈子，或上上辈子的事了，我为政府工作，至于职务……那不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00001577_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that fell apart, I set up a family in Utah, where I thought we could get in on Brahmin herding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开政府之后，我在犹他成立了一个家庭，幻想着以后多样一些双头牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00001577_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things weren't meant to work out that way, I guess. Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我觉得，很多事情远远不会按你所想的方向发展。好了，还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00001577_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever heard of Steven Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过斯蒂芬·兰道尔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm afraid that doesn't ring a bell. You got any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，而且我恐怕这个名字对我来说也没什么意义。你还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me about Red Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于红熊，你还能告诉我写什么吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name really is Red Bear. He grew up in a rough tribe in the plains, and acquired the title after killing a bear at an early age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字真的叫红熊。他在大平原的部落里长大。在他小时候亲手杀死一头熊后，人们就开始这么称呼他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was banished from his tribe in his teens after defying his father, the chief. It didn't take long before he formed his own band and went to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来他因为挑衅部落的酋长——他的父亲，被部落所驱逐。结果之后没多久，他就成立了他自己的团伙，并且还挺有规模。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years later he exterminated the upper caste of his old tribe, and took pleasure in executing his own father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年之后，他屠杀了原来部落里的贵族阶层，并带着微笑亲手处决了他的父亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, patricide is one of his minor offenses. He's killed men, women and children through multiple territories for decades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，弑父只是他的小罪行之一。接下来几年，他杀死了众多来自不同地区的男人、女人还有小孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most raiders are afraid of him, and at the very least they respect him because of his reputation for ruthlessness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分土匪都害怕他，并且因为他粗野的名声向他表示尊敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wasn't always on his own, however. He started out under a fellow named Marko, who taught Red Bear everything he knows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他并不总是只靠他自己。刚开始时，他有一个同伴，名字叫马尔科，就是这个家伙教会了红熊一切他所知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that Marko is the only man alive that can scare ol' Red Bear. They parted ways years ago, with one going east, the other gone west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说，这个马尔科是唯一一个活着的能吓到红熊的人。几年前他们分开了，一个去了东部，一个来了西部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_8.ogg

NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB1_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't have any more questions.
Well, I hope the information helps you. I don't even know if she's alive, but if you find my niece, her name is Polly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我希望这些信息能帮助你。我不知道她是否还活着，但如果你能帮我找到她，她的名字叫波利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to settle the score with Red Bear. You can find me at the saloon here in Goodsprings. Good luck out there, kid. I'm counting on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想尽快很红熊了结这一切。你能在清泉镇的沙龙找到我。祝你好运，孩子。我可就指望你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000F9B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 4 endif
I'm a professional. You provide the caps, and I'll find the girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可是个专业人员。你提供瓶盖，我找女孩。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost it ten years ago when Red Bear put a pistol round through my eyeball. There wasn't much left of the eye after that. Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前我就失去了它。当时红熊只用了一颗子弹，之后那里就什么也没剩下了。还有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Eth_00000FB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't negotiate with petty bandits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会和你们这些低劣的强盗谈判。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Gus_00001582_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaGustavViper1Ref.startcombat player aaGustavViper2Ref.startcombat player
I'm Gustav, one of the Vipers. You gotta a lot of balls to come strolling into our camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫古斯塔夫，毒蛇帮一员。敢来我们的营地，你可相当得有种啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Gus_00001581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you just wanna talk... I guess it's ok... Slade's at our camp down by the 95. See ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，如果你只是要谈话……我想应该没问题的……斯雷德就在营地不远。回见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me where Slade is, or I'll grind your bones into powder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我斯雷德在哪，否则我把你身上每一根骨头都掰断。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're awful weak to be making those kind of threats. Nah, I think it's time to just kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这还想威胁我？哈，看来是到了要你命的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Gus_00001585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me where Slade is, or I'll, uh... hurt you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我斯雷德在哪，否则，我……我会弄伤你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for Slade. I think he has a captive that I'm trying to find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在寻找斯雷德。我认为他手里有一个我要找的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you think so? Well, I'll sooner suck my own dick than give up a fellow Viper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你怎么知道？滚回去，等把自己干废了再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Gus_00001583_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you're just talking, that's fine. Between you and me, I'm no friend to Slade, so do what you gotta do. I'll steer clear while you're there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，如果你仅仅想交谈的话，可以。反正我不是斯雷德的朋友，你想对他干什么都可以，我什么都不管，什么都看不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gustav [02000FAD] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Gus_0000158C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie>I just want to speak with Slade. I won't mention your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我想和斯雷德谈谈。我不会跟他说起你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is that, thirteen hands in a row, Friday? Asshole, nobody's that lucky!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么，1排13只手，星期五？草，什么狗屎运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ike Clinton [02002403] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why Ike, whatever do you mean? Maybe Caravan's just not your game. I know! Let's have a spelling contest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么艾克，你什么意思？莫非你对纸牌不感兴趣？我知道了，我们来玩拼字游戏好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of listening to your mouth, Friday! You owe me caps, and I aim to carve them out of your zombie hide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经厌倦了你的废话，星期五！你欠我的钱，我就算刨地三尺也要从你那找出这些钱来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ike Clinton [02002403] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.IkeShot to 10 startcombat aaDocFridayRef aaDocFridayRef.startcombat aaIkeRef
Why did you shoot that man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么对那家伙开枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that Ike was in the middle of a dreadful losing streak, and he elected to blame me for his misfortune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕那家伙已经陷入了疯癫状态。自己运气那么倒霉，反而到来埋怨我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The poor soul... he was just too high-strung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的家伙……他刚刚就是有些兴奋过了头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D3_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们称你为“医生”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war I was an orthodontist, and while I've ceased practicing, I still enjoy using the title.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战争开始前，我是一名医生，然而我早已经停止了那份本职工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It lends weight to the name, don't you agree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在很享受这个称呼，它为我的名字增添了分量。你同不同意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to collect the bounty on Red Bear. Do you have any information that could help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想接受关于红熊的赏金行动。你有没有什么可以提供帮助的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chasing Red Bear, are you? Many impetuous souls have pursued that rogue, and they might as well have been chasing the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪红熊，你？很多冲动的灵魂都曾追踪过那个流氓，但他们也可能正成为那个家伙的猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I'm loathe to denounce your endeavor entirely, as Red Bear is a scoundrel of the lowest order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我不想去指责你的努力，但红熊永远应该是你目标名单里面排在最后的那个名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, he is just a man, and as the real Romans would say, "Memento mori."
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他也只是一个普通人，但很多人说他是一个只能存在记忆中的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We ghouls are an exception, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们食尸鬼是个例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for information, you might try accosting the local Viper hoodlum, Slade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想得到更多情报的话，你可以找毒蛇帮的一个流氓，斯雷德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054D7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firstly, congratulations on exterminating that nuisance. Like most of the raider refuse, he had little regard for decorum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那么首先，我要向你的行为表示祝贺。和许多其他恶棍一样，他缺乏礼貌的教养。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and his petty outlaws had a habit of preying on defenseless females. I simply cannot abide a man who disrespects women.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的那帮歹徒们喜欢亲近孤立无援的女性。我个人完全无法容忍一个男人对一个女人如此粗野无礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, with Slade dead, I'm afraid you're at an impasse in your search. Nevertheless, I might have a possible lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，随着斯雷德的死，我恐怕你的调查已经陷入僵局。然而好消息是，我可以帮你指明方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do know that Red Bear has extensive dealings with Mr. Norman Meston, a brutish individual who operates "Shadow Company".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道红熊与一个叫诺曼·梅斯顿的人有着广泛的往来。那个粗鲁的家伙经营着一家公司，也称暗影公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Shadow Company" is a rather shady mercenary outfit, but they manage to thrive out here on the fringes of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暗影公司其实是披着一件商业的外套，背地里做的都是些见不得光的勾当。他们的所作所为已经开始逐渐威胁到NCR在这里的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DB_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need information on Red Bear, zombie. Start talking!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要关于红熊的信息，僵尸。说话！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What an ugly thing to say.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find this guy?
Only inside the bowels of a heavily guarded bunker. It's an unappealing route to Red Bear, but it's a route nonetheless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在一个严密防御的地堡内部你才能找到他。通往那儿的路途非常险恶，但却是唯一的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the location [he points it out on your map]. Meston should have documentation of his dealings with Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是所在地点 [他在你的地图上指了指]。梅斯顿一定有和红熊之间交易的记录文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not privy to the details, but they have been trading for at least a decade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对其中的细节并不清楚，但他们至少已经交往了很长一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you can tell me about Meston and Shadow Company?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于梅斯顿和暗影公司，你还有什么可以告诉我的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call them "Shadow Company" for a reason. It's a crude, yet accurate description of their secretive nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家公司被称为“暗影公司”是有原因的。那是一个十分自然而精确的对他们秘密本性的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Various factions rely on them because they conduct all operations with the utmost confidentiality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多集团都依靠他们，因为他们所有的运作都极其隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Meston, I don't know much about the man, other than he has a tremendous capacity for physical violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就说梅斯顿吧，我对这个人了解不多，除了他臭名昭著的名声，据说他有一个冲满肢体物品的容器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that the company's profits finance his implants and other unnatural augmentations to the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谣言说，他用公司的盈利收集各种植物和非自然器官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And where you find Meston, you'll find his rabid lackey, Mr. Joshua. He's a vicious little cur, and utterly loyal to Meston.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你找到梅斯顿的时候，你自然能找到他的马屁精，约书亚先生。他是一个无恶不作的恶棍，对梅斯顿有着异于常人的忠心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see I haven't dissuaded you. If you manage to survive, I hope you return to the saloon and visit a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我没有必要劝阻你。如果你能活下来，我希望你能回到这个沙龙来，没事和我聊聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one more thing - if you are going to pursue this in earnest, I'd advise you to consult with Mr. Dent, the gentleman sitting at the bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还有一件事，如果你想认真地对待这次行动，我建议你去向登特先生咨询一下。坐在吧里的那个绅士就是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he's had dealings with Shadow Company in the past, although they were anything but amicable. Farewell, and good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我印象中，他以前和暗影公司有过商业往来。现在的话，他们之间的友好关系早就灰飞烟灭了。好了，再见，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaBounties_aaBounties02Doc_000054DF_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setstage aaBounties02 18 setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 16 1
Set aaScullDialogue.DocBefriended to 1 set aaDocFridayQuest.bDocHireable to 1 showmessage aaDocBefriendedMessage
I understand you have information on Shadow Company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你有关于暗影公司的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do. What's it to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是知道。但那关你什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to find Norman Meston. He has information on a bounty I'm pursuing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要找到诺曼·梅斯顿。他有一些关于我的赏金目标的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is finding that bounty worth your life? Because going after Meston is a suicide mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找那个目标值得为此付出你的生命吗？因为你去找梅斯顿本身，就是一件自杀任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不过看起来你没开玩笑，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, let me give you some details on Norman Meston, and see if I can't get you to reconsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先透露给你一点有关他的小细节，然后看看这些内容会不会让你重新考虑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody is sure about Meston's origins, but one thing is certain - he is a warrior's warrior, and runs that oufit with discipline and authority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人知道梅斯顿的出身，但有一件事却十分确定，那就是——他是领袖中的领袖，能以绝对的权威和严格的纪律管理着那家公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why House and other prime movers rely on Meston for their dirty work - he'll always get the job done, or heads will roll - literally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么豪斯和其他人总是依靠他来处理那些肮脏的活——只有他总是能顺利地完成工作，而不留下任何蛛丝马迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the bunker, it's a death trap. He's got at least three dozen armed men, sentry bots, and ravenous mongrels as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于那个地堡，简直就是个死亡陷阱。他在那里安排了至少3打全副武装的守卫、机器人，还有穷凶恶极的杂种狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they don't stop to ask questions, either - if you step foot in their little lair, expect to be shot, burned, and mauled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从来不会对人提问。如果你胆敢踏进那巢穴一步，要么身上多几个窟窿，要么被烈火吞灭，或者要么被撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've made a living out of reading people, and I can see you're going to go through with this. The things people will do for caps...
ESP.TRADUIT: 活了这么长时间，我现在看人的能力还是很准的。我能看得出来你有能力闯过这一关，因为通常别人做事都只是为了钱……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might not want it, but here's some advice: use a stealth boy, get in, get the info you need, and get out. Don't dick around in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许不愿意听，但这是我给你的建议：用隐身小子，潜入，拿到你想要的东西，潜出。不要试图在里面有任何多余的举动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, you can have this one. I haven't needed it in years. Good luck, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这个给你了。我现在已经不需要这个了。祝你好运，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BD_10.ogg

NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02CJD_000081BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? That's the biggest bunch of bullshit I've ever heard. Get the fuck out of here, idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？这是我听过最狗屎的回答。快滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_0000965C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Major Major, and I must see Norman Meston immediately!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是陆军少校，我现在必须立刻会见诺曼·梅斯顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, sure, sure - go on through, but... watch out for the guards. They tend to shoot on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，当然，当然，进来吧，但……注意小心那些守卫。他们会射击一切出现在视野里的物体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_0000965F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier with a critical delivery for Commander Meston. Stand aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个邮递员，有一个重要的包裹要交给梅斯顿长官。闪开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, sure. But, uh... watch out for the guards... and stuff... I'll shut up now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，好的。但是……注意那些守卫……和那些……东西……我不说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_00009659_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't move for anybody, dickshit!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_0000965B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, you better move... or else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，你最好……滚开……或是……别的什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill every one of you Shadow Company pussies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这的就是为了干掉你们这里的每一个人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want any trouble. I just want to speak with Norman Meston.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想惹任何麻烦。我只要求和诺曼·梅斯顿说两句。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, really? You know, since you asked so politely, I'll let you pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是吗？你知道，既然你这么有礼貌，我就让你通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_0000965E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way you're getting in, jackass. In fact, I'm tired of shooting lakelurks. It's time for some target practice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本就别想进去，傻瓜。事实上，我对打那些湖里的螃蟹已经有些审美疲劳了，看来现在是换个联系目标的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shadow Company Guard [020057C2] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Sha_0000965E_2.ogg
NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe you're right. I've been planning for this, dwelling on revenge for so long, that it's transformed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许……也许你是对的。我已经策划我的复仇计划太长时间了，这些完全改变了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to see you again, bounty hunter. You've got to live with your actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再次见到你，赏金猎人。你自生自灭吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He that studieth revenge keepeth his own wounds green, which otherwise would heal and do well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的复仇心态严重影响了心智的创伤，否则那些会自己慢慢自愈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck are you trying to say? You just collected your last bounty, numbnuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈到底想说什么？你刚刚为你赢得了最后一个赏金目标，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaPG1Ref.startcombat player aaPG2Ref.startcombat player aaPG3Ref.startcombat player
Revenge is like serving cold cuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 复仇就像是一份冰冷的创伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I didn't know he was your brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉。我不知道他是你的兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apology accepted. Now you have to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 道歉接受。现在，你必须死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaPG1Ref.startcombat player aaPG2Ref.startcombat player aaPG3Ref.startcombat player
[Taunt] Your brother cried like a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: [辱骂] 你的兄弟哭得像个婊子。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Cobb [0200A1EE] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a proposition - let's work together on this thing and split the reward. Red Bear's close, but I doubt I can take him alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个提议：我们一起干，然后平分。红熊就快到了，我怀疑我一个人对付不了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B652_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 2,500 caps is a lot of money, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 2500个瓶盖可是一笔很大的树木，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B652_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust people with moustaches. No can do.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B656_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a plan, asshole, and you just deviated from it. This is for the Judge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢货，这么好的计划你都不接受。接受惩罚吧，为了审判官！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B656_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like your face. I think I'll just kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢你的脸。我想我要杀死你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember finding The Judge in his bunker, left to rot as a bloody heap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得在审判官的地堡发现他时，他正蜷缩成一团血淋淋的腐肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B657_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was like a father to me. I'm gonna split your face from ear to ear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对我就如同父亲一般。我要把你的脸撕成碎片，一片一片地撕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B657_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great! Don't worry, I won't slow you down. Meet me outside the Emergency Service Railyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！别担心，我不会脱你后腿的。在紧急服务铁路广场外等我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B658_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a contact there - hopefully we can get the drop on Red Bear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一份合同在那儿，希望我们能一起搞定红熊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Conrad Dillon [0200B64D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Con_0000B658_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, thanks. That's one less thing to do on my list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样，那谢谢了。我的任务清单上又少了一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B942_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you're dead, I'm done for the day. See, I've been paid to put you down, so only one of us is walking away from this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你也死了，我今天的任务就都完成了。看，有人付我钱来干掉你，咱们俩只有一个能活着离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B942_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll probably regret this, but I know your reputation. I'll leave with my men, but you sure as fuck better kill Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我或许会感到后悔，但我知道你的名气。我会带我的人离开，但你最好他妈的早点干掉红熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000BC2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he finds out that I double-crossed him, it's gonna be a dark day for Mr. Mather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他发现我是双面鬼，嘿，我的好日子就快到头了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000BC2C_2.ogg
