ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the note Red Bear gave me - it says where we're supposed to meet. Maybe you can find him there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一张红熊给我的笔记，上面说了我们将要见面的地点。也许你能在那里找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dillon already high-tailed it out of here. You better watch out for that snake. Later, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪伦或许已经被跟踪了。你最好小心你的后背。回头见，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000BC2C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 35 1 set aaBounties02.MatherSurvived to 1 player.additem aaMatherRedBearNote 1
I only want Red Bear. Push me, and I'll kill you and all your men. Nobody wants that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要红熊。如果胆敢阻挠，我就把你和你的人全杀了。没有人希望如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. It's thirteen on one, you jackass. I'll take those odds any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扯你的蛋。要知道现在可是13比1。做白日梦呢你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0005C6F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you know who I am? I'll kill every one of you bastards without blinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可知道我是谁？我能一眨眼就把你和你的混蛋们全部干掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no such thing as a clean fight, kid. Tough shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有比这样更好的方法了，孩子。去死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B949_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only a coward needs twelve extra gunmen to kill one courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有懦夫才需要那么多人帮忙干掉一个可怜的邮递员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you little bastard. If that's how you want it, I can play that way. Stand down, boys! I'm taking this punk myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你个小混蛋。如果这是你想要的，我奉陪到底。后退，小伙子们！我要亲自干掉他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B94A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you grab your balls and fight me yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢不敢带着你的“蛋”跟我一对一？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Taunt] You and your entire gang are a lot of craven cunts.
ESP.TRADUIT: [侮辱] 你和你的人就是一群软逼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you wanna play rough, huh? Okay, release the dogs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你想好好玩玩是吧？好的，放狗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B94B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setstage aaBounties02 35 aaNVBMatherAmbushParentRef.enable aaNVBMatherTauntParentRef.enable
You, Dillon, and Red Bear can all go fuck yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你、迪伦，还有红熊，草你们妈逼！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's music to my ears. Waste this bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是美妙的音乐。浪费了这个婊子了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mather [0200B93B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000B948_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear... he killed them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊……他把他们都干掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D346_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went into Westside to get supplies. When I got back, he had already left...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到西区去收集补给。等我回来，他已经走了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D346_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't have left them... I shouldn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不该离开他们……我不该……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D346_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, son. Who was killed?
My pa and my brothers. He took the supplies, and just killed them. I know they wouldn't put up a fight. We don't believe in fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的爸爸和我的兄弟们。他把家里值钱的东西都拿走了，还杀了他们。我知道他们不会反抗的。我们不相信暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would that man kill them? My pa didn't even believe in using guns. Why did he have to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个家伙为什么要杀人？我的爸爸甚至枪都不会用，他为什么非要去死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D349_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me where Red Bear went, or I'll give you something to cry about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我，红熊去哪儿了。否则我会让你更痛快的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He... he went that away [points toward Mt. Charleston]. You're no better than him, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他……他往哪个方向去了[指向查尔斯顿山]。你跟他一样混蛋，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D34A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just an animal. One day it will all catch up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是头无情的野兽，总有一天它会占据你全部的身心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D34A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, they didn't believe in using guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思？他们不信任用枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were pacifists... Dad always called it "nonviolence".
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是和平主义者……爸爸总是说“非暴力”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D34C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what to believe now. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该信什么了。我该做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D34C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it's difficult to be a pacifist, particularly when dealing with men like Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要做一个和平主义者一定很困难，尤其是当你须要面对像红熊一样的人时。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know... I don't know what to believe anymore. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道……我不知道我该信什么了。我该怎么办呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D34E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm already tracking Red Bear. Come with me and you and can settle the score.
I dunno... I've never even shot a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道……我从没使过枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giving pain for pain... I just don't know if it's the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用血来擦拭伤口……我不知道这样是否正确。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: See the Followers of the Apocalypse at the Old Mormon Fort. They'll give you food and shelter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去找在魔门城堡的那些天启追随者。他们会给你食物和庇护。
好的，如果你这样说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better start toughening up. Go see the Khans - they'll make you or break you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好赶快坚强起来。去找可汗帮，他们会锻炼你的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D357_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if I'm cut out for that... but if you say so. They're at Red Rock Canyon, right. I'll head out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我什么时候能从中恢复……但既然你这么说。他们好像是在红岩峡谷，对，没错的。我现在就去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D357_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last thing - did you see where Red Bear was headed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一件事，你有没有看见红熊往什么方向去了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got a glimpse of his gang in the distance. They were headed to Mt. Charleston. I'm gonna do like you said now. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只在远处瞥了一眼他们。他们往查尔斯顿山去了。我现在就按照你说的去做，再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000D355_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody can give you justice, kid. If you're a man, you go out and take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人能还你正义，孩子。如果你还是个男人，就站起来勇敢地接受。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story? What was your family doing in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你有什么故事？你的家人在莫哈维是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Making a pilgrimage... we had traveled from New Canaan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来实行朝圣之旅……我们从新迦南来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
Really? I was actually looking forward to settling the score. What do I do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？我正想安顿下来呢。我现在该做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, I want you to stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意，你跟着我就行了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: See the Followers at the Old Mormon Fort. You'll find food and shelter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去找在魔门城堡的那些天启追随者。他们会给你食物和庇护。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to toughen up. Go see the Khans. They'll make you or break you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好赶快坚强起来。去找可汗帮，他们会锻炼你的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0000FBFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, brothers and sisters, remember the words of the prophet: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟们，姐妹们，铭记先知所言：死亡只不过是永恒的沉眠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Aar_00015856_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where there is diligence, there is penitence. Look to your duties, forsake the unchaste, mendacious allure of the outside world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要勤奋，就能赎罪。坚守你的责任，摒弃外面世界一切不贞和虚假的诱惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Aar_00015856_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The master will call, and we will be stalwart, willing to make the sacrifice. Amen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 主就会召唤你，我们坚定地和你在一起，时刻准备牺牲自己。阿门！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Aar_00015856_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.FlaggGreeted to 2 set aaBounties02.SpeechGiven to 1 aaAaronFlaggRef.evp ;enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
I want to speak with you about the "Opportunity".
Yes, I'm glad you made it. We've been keeping tabs on you, Courier. When a lone bounty hunter takes down Red Bear, Sergio, and Zimmer... we notice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我很高兴你做到了。 我们一直在密切关注你，邮差。 当一个赏金猎人独自击败红熊、塞尔吉奥和齐默时...我们很难不注意到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever your political views, your actions have helped the Mojave and the Republic. In light of this, I believe we may have use for your talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你的政治立场如何，你的行动切实帮助了莫哈韦废土和NCR。鉴于此，我相信你的才能可以派上用场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for Red Bear. I understand you might have information on his whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找红熊。我知道你可能有关于他藏身处的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps. That depends on your motives, stranger. Why do you seek Red Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许。那取决于你的动机，陌生人。你为什么要找他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_0001699F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me where Red Bear is, right now.
Calm, my friend, calm down. I see what you're looking for, and you'll find the answers soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，我的朋友，冷静。我知道你要找什么，你不久就会得到答案了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you how to find Red Bear, but first you must pass a "test" of sorts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你怎么找到红熊，但首先你要经过我的“测验”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's ridiculous. You're not even dressed like a courier! State your true purpose!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太可笑了。你穿的根本就不像个邮递员！告诉我你的真正目的何在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Uh... I have an urgent package. I'm a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 额……我有一个紧急的包裹。我是个邮递员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko? By all means, I'll tell you everything I know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科？我的天，我会告诉你我所知道的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear left not long ago to deliver his last captives to some mercenaries camped further up the mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊不久前带着他的最后一个俘虏刚离开。他继续向山上走了，那里有一个商人营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find him here. [He points out the location on your map]
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能在这里找到他。[他指向你的地图上的某个位置]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, give Marko my best. You'll tell him I was helpful, yes? Of course you will. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请给予马尔科我最衷心的问候。对了，你会告诉他我是个很有用的人，对吧？你一定会说的。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Marko sent me. Should I tell him that you delayed me?
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 马尔科派我来的。是不是需要我告诉他，你耽搁了我的行动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Aaron Flagg, and I'm the shepherd of this longsuffering flock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫艾伦·弗莱格，我是这群坚韧不拔的信徒的导师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the People's Temple of the Order, a shelter for the tired, desperate, and helpless, and a rampart against iniquity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是人民教会的庙堂，一个为疲惫、绝望、无助提供的避难所，一个抵抗非正义的堡垒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000169A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on his head, and I'm looking to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人悬赏他的头，我是来取的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. It's such a grisly profession. I wonder how you sleep at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道了。这项职业真可怕。我很奇怪在晚上你怎么能睡的着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you how to find Red Bear, but first you must pass a "test" of sorts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告你怎么找到红熊，但首先你要经过我的“测验”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, fuckstick - tell me where he is or I'm going to kill everyone, starting with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你个蠢货，告诉我他去哪了，否则我把你们都杀了，先从你开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough of your threats, you impudent maggot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够了你的威胁了，你个莽夫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I have to do?
As a stranger, you may prove your fealty to the order by paying penance at the sacred altar. That is the quick and easy route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个陌生人，你须要在圣坛前忏悔来证明你的忠诚。这是最快速并且最容易的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the true believer, however, you may gain formal admission into the order by performing the rites of sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于真正的信使，你须要再经受牺牲仪式的考验才能获得正式的接纳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The choice is yours. What will it be, stranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择由你自己做出。你会走哪条路，陌生人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171BB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll join the order. What must I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想加入教会。我需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a captive waiting at the sacred altar, inside the inner sanctum. Kill her, and you will be inducted into the order. Do you accept?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在圣坛的内部圣所那里有一个俘虏。去把她杀掉，你就能加入教会了。你愿不愿意接受？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. You'll find parchment resting on the sacred altar in the Inner Sanctum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。你会在圣坛的内部圣所找到一些羊皮纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Read the writing on the parchment aloud, and you will be... purified. Return afterwards and I will gladly share the information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大声地读出那些纸上的内容，你就能被……净化。然后回来告诉我，我会很高兴与你分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.PenanceDone to 1 aaFlaggAltarNoteRef.enable setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 66 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 68 1
I don't accept bribes... however, if this were an act of charity, I suppose I could share the information as a gesture of friendship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我无法接受……但是，如果这是以慈善的名义捐赠的话，我觉得我有必要向你表示出友谊的姿态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will cost you five thousand caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like my options. Surely we can make a different "arrangement". What's your price?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢我的选择。当然，我们还是可以做出另一种“安排”的。说出你的价格？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. The woman's sedated, so it should be relatively painless. Return when you've performed the rites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。那个女人已经服了镇静剂，因此不会给她带来多少疼痛。当你完成了仪式后回到我这里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.SacrificeDone to 1 aaSacrificeVictimRef.enable setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 65 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 68 1
Then that limits our options. What will you do instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们的选择就有限了。你想到别的什么法了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I'll kill you instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想，我可以把你干掉。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CA_1.ogg

NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want any part of this. I just want the information on Red Bear, and then I'll walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和这些事有任何牵连，我只想知道有关红熊的信息，然后我会自然走开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're blind to your own turpitude, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被你的堕落蒙蔽了双眼，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't walk away, in any case. You've tainted this ground with your sin... you must be purged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你别想离开这里。你因你的罪恶污染了这片圣土……你要接受净化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for information on Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在寻找有关红熊的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, stranger. Speak to the father, Aaron Flagg. He'll be able to help you. Don't do anything stupid, though. The Deacons are watching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，陌生人。去和神父，艾伦·弗莱格说，他或许能帮你。但别做任何傻事。公会人员都会盯着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atwood [0201551F] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill everyone, starting with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这是杀死你们的，从你开始。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atwood [0201551F] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000171D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaFlaggCultistFaction PlayerFaction set aaBounties02.FlaggGreeted to 2 setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 69 1
Then you are hereby initiated into the People's Temple of the Order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你将加入这个人民教会庙堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to your new family. I know you have pressing business, but you are always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你来到新的大家庭。我知道你现在肩负的事物有些压力，但在这你依然受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Red Bear, do what must be done. The universe is indifferent to our petty pursuits. You can find him here. <He points it out on your map>.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于红熊，去做你想做的去吧。宇宙不会因此有任何不同。你可以在这找到他。[他在你地图上指了指]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.SacrificeDone to 6 set aaBounties02.CultJoined to 1 setstage aaBounties02 100
I've changed my mind. I don't want any part of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了。我不想参与了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too late for that, my child.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your indecision at this hour is unacceptable. If you cannot commit, then you must be purged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在已经由不得你犹豫了。如果你拒不执行，你要接受神圣的净化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You set me up, asshole. Now you have to pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你惹恼我了，混蛋。你要为此付出代价。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me where Red Bear is, and I might forget about your treachery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我红熊在哪，然后我会忘记你的叛逆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: R-Really? That is a most magnanimous gesture, for if you can best Yama, my prospects in battle are dim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真……真的？你真是宽宏大量，如果你打得过冥王，那我就毫无胜算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mercy and forgiveness are appreciated. You can find Red Bear at a mercenary encampment further up the mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的仁慈和宽恕令人惊叹。你可以在山上的一个商人营地那里找到红熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are always welcome here. You will be an honored guest any time you visit. Good luck to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里你永远是受欢迎的。你是我们这里最受尊敬的客人。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.PenanceDone to 6 setstage aaBounties02 100 set aaBounties02.CultJoined to 1 setobjectivecompleted aaBounties02 68 1 player.rewardkarma 25

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That hurt, you miserable worm! If the deathclaw can't do it, then I will!
ESP.TRADUIT: 疼死我了，你个卑微的臭虫！如果死亡爪捻不死你，我来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_000185FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, bitch - I'm having a bad day, so get the fuck out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，小妓女，我今天心情很不好。别挡我的道。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Polly [02019A1E] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you've forced my hand. God forgive me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那我不得不亲自动手了。上帝原谅我……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties02.PollyGreeted to 25 aaEthan2Ref.setav aggression 1 aaEthan2Ref.startcombat aaPollyRef aaPollyRef.setav aggression 3
Change is the law of life.
I know sometimes you have to let go, but... I just... I wanted to save her. All those years wasted...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道有时候必须想开，但……我……我想救她。这么多年过去了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of your bullshit. I think I'll kill both of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够你们俩了。我要把你俩都杀了。
什么？你个丧心病狂的家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02019A1D] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why are you running the jail?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么为什么由你来管理这个监狱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because the brass fucked me, that's why. My ass is past retirement, but some colonel used stop-loss to keep me running his shitty little jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为上级太操蛋了，这就原因。本来我是要退休的，但上头威胁我，让我代替来管理这个肮脏的鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhatDoin_0005532A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth is we're spread thin, so any combat-ready rangers and troops, they're already deployed to the forward areas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事实上我们这边人手开始不够了，大量战斗装备的部队都被派到很远的地区去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhatDoin_0005532A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically I'm stuck here until the war ends or I drop dead. It's hardly ideal, but I'm determined to make the best out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上我必须一直呆在这里，除非战争结束，或是去见上帝。虽然现实不太理想，但我也只能尽可能地去适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhatDoin_0005532A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to apply for a bounty hunting license.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要申请一个赏金猎人执照。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, there isn't really an application. It's more of a briefing. We're trying to bring law and order to these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这其实也不需要什么申请程序，只要简述一下就行。我们只是想给这片土地多带来些法律和秩序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicense1_0001C629_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really care if you like the NCR or not. Just bring in the bad guys and you'll get paid, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管你是不是NCR或是别的什么东西。只要你能把我们要的家伙带来，我就会付你钱，听起来很简单吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicense1_0001C629_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if that's an acceptable arrangement, I'll have your license ready in a moment. So what's your answer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能接受的话，我很快就能办好你的执照。意下如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicense1_0001C629_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wouldn't it be? If you've got the guts, it's easy money. One thing, though - unlike these mercenary firms, we do pay higher for live bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，为什么不呢？你抓到了人，就能换来钱，多容易。对了，还有一件事，和其他商业公司不同，我们为活的赏金目标支付得更高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that you can't talk everyone down, so we also pay for fingers. However, you're giving up cash if you always go in guns blazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然知道你不可能说服每一个人，所以我们也会为手指付钱。但是，如果你把对方打成碎块，哼，你就别想看到钱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to assist you with getting these live bounties, I'm going to issue you a "Bounty Collar", which is just a modified slave collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了帮助你抓活的，我会给你一个“赏金项圈”，这是通过一个奴隶项圈改造而来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This little device goes around their neck. When you manage to talk them down or coerce them, slap this on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个小装置是套在脖子上的。当你把对方驳倒或强压成功后，就给他们戴上这玩意儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they stray off course, it will start prodding them with a nice dose of electricity. If they head for the hills, it will fry their ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们企图摘下，它会释放出间歇性的刺激电流。如果他们胆敢逃跑，“轰”，它能烤焦他们的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my word for it - it ain't pretty. Once you get it on, they won't wander. When they turn themselves in, just come in and claim the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我说的话，虽然这小东西长得不咋地，但只要启动后，没人敢轻举妄动。当你把那些家伙带来后，直接进来就行，然后领取你的赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The collar has an electronic signature that indicates it's your bounty, so don't worry about someone taking credit for your work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个项圈可以打上电子标记，证明是你的猎物，所以不要担心被别人抢占你的劳动果实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll find bounty posters scattered through the territory. If there's a poster, we've got the paperwork on them, so just bring em' in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在这一带地区随便什么地方看到如此一类的赏金告示。在相关告示的上面，我们还会有文书附着，记得到时把文书也带来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's pretty much it. Here's the collar and your license. Come back if you have any questions... and happy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的已经不少了。这是你的项圈和执照。有问题的话再回来问我好了……祝你狩猎愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseY_0001C62D_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your loss, kid. You can't do shit without a license, and there aren't any firms left to hire you. Come back when you come to your senses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是你的损失了，孩子。没有执照你什么也干不了，而且也没有类似的公司供你挑选。等你想通了再回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullLicenseN_0001C62C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a damn about your offer. I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不对你的俘虏感兴趣。我来取你的性命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you just dug your own grave. Open fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就是在为自己挖坟了。开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001D1BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaRedBearCampMarkerRef.placeatme C4Explosion set aaBounties02.RedBearGreeted to 20 aaRedBearAmbushParentRef.enable SetEnemy aaRedBearFaction aaRBCaptiveFaction setenemy aaRedBearFaction playerfaction
[Taunt] Only a coward hides behind captives, you ugly mongrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: [侮辱] 只有懦夫才躲在这些俘虏的背后，你个丑陋的杂种。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaRedBearCampMarkerRef.placeatme C4Explosion set aaBounties02.RedBearGreeted to 30 aaRedBearAmbushParentRef.enable aaRedBearTauntParentRef.enable SetEnemy aaRedBearFaction aaRBCaptiveFaction setenemy aaRedBearFaction playerfaction
I've got you outnumbered, outgunned, and in the open. If I turn myself in, I'll be getting the death penalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我比你人多，枪多，而且这是个开阔地带。如果我自首了，我反而会被判处死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why in the fuck would I want to do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈凭什么要听你的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to turn yourself in, right now.
Ah, yes. I like your sense of humor, bounty hunter. I'd sooner cut out my heart and eat it than turn myself in to those NCR sons of bitches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好。我喜欢你的幽默，赏金猎人。我想，我宁愿把自己的心挖出来吃掉，也不会跟NCR那帮狗娘养一样的东西投降的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0005C70B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to turn yourself in.
Ok, scrapper. You and me, but it's on my terms. Knives or fists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的，就你和我。不过轮到我说了，你选择刀还是拳？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captives out of this. If you're such a badass, fight me yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关这些俘虏的事。你他妈如果还是个男人，就跟我单挑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a lot of balls asking me that. I don't have to prove anything to you, puppy. You, on the other hand, better make up your damn mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敢跟我说这些你还真得有点胆量。但，小鬼，我没必要向你证明什么。相反，你的脑子是不是长错地方了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0005C70A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a duel, old man? Or are you afraid you might lose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 决斗怎么样，死老头？还是你害怕自己会输掉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get right to the point, puppy. I want to retire, but I don't want to be looking over my shoulder for bounty hunters the rest of my goddamn life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，废话不多说，我直接说重点。我想退休了，但我不想下半辈子生活天天为什么赏金猎人提心吊胆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect you're in this for the money, plain and simple, so I figure I can kill two birds with one stone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你是为了钱而来的，很简单。不如这样，我有一个可以一举两得的方案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yesterday one of those Jackals got a lucky shot off and managed to mangle my hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 昨天，有一个混蛋运气相当的好，一颗子弹打穿了我的手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my fingers was hanging on by a thread, so I just sliced it off and held onto it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我的一根手指就是用线缝在手掌上的。我去把线剪开，把这根手指给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I propose: you take the finger, turn it in, and get your reward. Meanwhile I take my earnings and disappear - permanently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我的提议：你把我那根本来就断了的手指交掉，然后得到你的报酬。同时，我拿着我的钱，永远地消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what you're capable of, and I also know this run has had some close calls for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你的名气很响，这件事一旦暴露了，对你是有风险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange for the insurance, you'll never hear from me, ever. Once I get gone, I stay gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你可以得到我的保证：你永远也不会再听到我的声音。我说走，就会永远地走掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the deal. Take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了。你接受还是不接受？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001EBA8_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My favorite - I think you'll regret that choice in a few moments, but it doesn't really matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那是我的最爱。我想你马上就会后悔的，但没有后悔药可以吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stow your gear in the footlocker. In the unlikely event that you kill me, you'll find the key to it in my pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上把你的其他东西放倒小提箱里。万一你把我杀死了，你可以在我的口袋里找到钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I die, the captives are yours by right - my men won't touch you. Of course, we all know what's going to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我死了，这些俘虏都是你的了，我的人不会妨碍你。当然，你和我都知道，这是不可能发生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's some leather armor to wear, just to keep things even.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，穿上这件皮甲，这样才公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough talking - let's do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，废话不说了，开始吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeallitems aaRBDuelLockerRef player.additem armorleather 1 75 player.additem WeapKnifeCombat 1 75 Player.EquipItem armorleather 0 1 Player.EquipItem WeapKnifeCombat 0 1 aaRedBearRef.startcombat player
Fine. If I die, the captives are yours, by right of combat. My men won't touch you, you have my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。如果我死了，这些俘虏都是你的了。我保证，我的人不会妨碍你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stow your gear in the footlocker. In the unlikely event that you do kill me, you'll find the key to it in my pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上把你的其他东西放倒小提箱里。万一你把我杀死了，你可以在我的口袋里找到钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's some leather armor to wear, just to keep things even.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，穿上这件皮甲，这样才公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough talking. Let's do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，废话不说了，开始吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeallitems aaRBDuelLockerRef player.additem armorleather 1 50 player.additem WeapBrassKnuckles 1 aaRedBearRef.removeitem aaRedBearKnife 1 aaRedBearRef.additem WeapBrassKnuckles 1 aaRedBearRef.startcombat player Player.EquipItem armorleather 0 1 Player.EquipItem WeapBrassKnuckles 0 1
I've changed my mind. I don't want a duel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了，我不想决斗了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lost your nerve, huh? I can't say I blame you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你神志不清了，是吗？我无语了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only question is: what are you gonna do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一的问题就是：你他妈到底想怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001E8C6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe you're right... I'm tired of running. I'm ready for this to end. Give me that damn collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，也许你是对……我已经对不停地逃亡感到疲倦了。我想赶快绝竖着一切。把那该死的项圈给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001F9FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaRedBearRef.removeitem aaRedBearKnife 1 aaRedBearRef.setav aggression 0 aaRedBearRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 set aaBounties02.RedBearCaptured to 1
You can't run forever. End it now, on your own terms, and make amends with your past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你逃得了一时，逃不了一世。别再躲藏了，用你的后半辈子，修复你前半辈子犯下的罪恶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's insane. I'm never going down alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这简直就疯了。我绝不接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0001F9FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the right thing to do.
Red Bear turned himself in. I'm here to collect the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊已经自首了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me tell you something, when that bastard walked in here, I thought I was dreaming, I shit you not!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我草，有些话我不得不说，当那个混蛋走进来的那一刻，我怀疑自己的眼睛是不是瞎了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0001FA08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what you pulled to get that outlaw into a collar, but it's nothing short of a miracle in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是怎么办到的，但至少在我看来，这真你妈是个奇迹啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0001FA08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The reward is twenty-five hundred for bringing him in alive. Congratulations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他活着带来的报酬是2500个瓶盖。祝贺你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0001FA08_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Red Bear, he's awaiting trial in Shady Sands. Word has it that even the president is gonna be there for the hanging. Great work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于红熊，他要在林荫沙漠那里接受判决。据说连总统都要亲自到现场观看死刑。你真是太棒了，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and there's one last thing. When we confiscated Red Bear's personal effects we found this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，最后还有一件事。当我们查收红熊的个人材料时我们发现了这张笔记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0001FA08_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2500 player.additem aaRedBearKnifePlayable 1 player.additem aabountycollar 1 player.additem aaRedBearPollyNote 1 setstage aaBounties02 190
startquest aaSecondary21 set aaSecondary21.LarryInformed to 1 aaLarryScullRef.evp set SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 to SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 + 1
I'd like to collect the reward for a bounty.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullBountyTu_0001FA05_1.ogg

NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullBountyNe_0001FA07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Red Bear, and I'm here to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了红熊。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, just let me verify the finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等，让我仔细看看这根手指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0002085E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned, that sure is Red Bear's finger. A bounty is a bounty, kid, and I guess that old bandit slowed down and lost his edge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我草，这个真的是红熊的手指。你干得很好，孩子，我猜那个老混蛋的历史到此结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0002085E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On behalf of the NCR, thanks for taking that bastard out. I don't know what you're going to do with the caps, but you sure earned them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带表NCR，向你表示真心的感谢。我不知道你打算拿这些钱怎么办，但这些都是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedBear_0002085E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaRedBearFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1000 setstage aaBounties02 190
startquest aaSecondary21 set aaSecondary21.LarryInformed to 1 aaLarryScullRef.evp set SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 to SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 + 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Fear
NPC : Captive [02019456] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Captive [02019459] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Captive [0201945B] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh fuck, you're not kidding? Shit, just give me the collar, I'll put it on right now, just don't hurt me anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，草，你没开玩笑吧？日，把那该死的项圈给我，我现在就戴上，只是别再弄疼我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary01Mo_00022DE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaMongolKidRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 set aaSecondary01.MongolKidGreeted to 10 set aaSecondary01.MongolCaptured to 1 aaMongolKidRef.evp
I'm going to put a collar on you. Turn yourself in at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要在你脖子上戴上这个项圈。然后把你交到巨石城监狱去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty poster said dead or alive. I prefer dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金告示上说活的或死的都可以。我更喜欢死的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck away from me!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Mongol Kid [02022525] (mod) Quest : ([02022523]aaSecondary01) Coward for a Minute EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary01Mo_00022DE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMongolKidRef.setav confidence 3 aaMongolKidRef.setav aggression 2 startcombat player
The Mongol Kid turned himself in. I'd like the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蒙格尔·基德自首了。我来领取报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That crybaby couldn't turn himself in fast enough. He wouldn't shut up about his damn injuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个家伙不会那么快认罪的。他来了以后就不停地又哭又叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't much more than a flesh wound, really. No wonder the Khans wouldn't have him - he was just a big pussy all along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不就那么一小块伤口么。怪不得可汗帮不要他，他就是头弱不禁风的小猪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, he just got sentenced to thirty years, which means he's gonna end up somebody's bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，他被判了30年牢狱，这意味着又有一些妓女少了一个可以服务的对象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's refreshing for an old-timer like me to see these young punks brought to justice. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到这些年纪轻轻的兔崽子被公正处理，我感到很欣慰。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary01 190
I killed the Mongol Kid, and I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了蒙格尔·基德，我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's no problem. Give me a second to authenticate the finger...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。给我几秒钟，我来检查一下手指……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure enough, that's his. I wish I could've put him on trial, but dead is better than nothing. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 错不了，就是这个。我本来希望能亲手送他进监狱，但看来死亡也是个不错的结局。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMongolK_0002395F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaMongolKidFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary01 190
You're coming with me, dead or alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须我走。要么就死在这里。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024600_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I'm here to kill you. I just wanted to see you squirm first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这当然是为了杀你的。我想第一个看见你的尸体。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_000245FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right. I do have quite a bit of intelligence on the Legion's logistics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。我有大量关于军团的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024608_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll turn myself in. I see you've got the collar ready, so while I'm putting it on, grab my records from the desk over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去自首的。看来你的项圈已经准备好了，那么我自己会戴上的。桌上有我以前做的记录，你可带走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024608_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 10 player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaAlbertQuislingRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaQuislingRecordsRef.enable setstage aaSecondary02 16
You've got information on the Legion, right? Just use that as leverage, and you'll get leniency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有关于军团的信息，对么？你可以用那个来为你赢得宽恕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's preposterous! I've been labeled a traitor - they'll hang me for the propaganda alone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太荒谬了！我已经被贴上了叛徒的标签，他们会把我放在大庭广众之下吊死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024609_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turning yourself in will show that you're contrite, and should ameliorate the sentence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就自首，你会获得宽恕，否则迎接你的事更严厉的审判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, I'm not an assassin. I just want you to turn yourself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，我不是刺客。我只是希望你能自首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I just don't know... I can't go back to the NCR. Treason is a capital offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我不知道……我不能回NCR。背叛，对任何人来说都不可饶恕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024603_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, Caesar's men will probably track me down and kill me before I even get to the gallows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此以外，凯撒的人一定会追踪我，并且在我被绞死以前永远地封住我的口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024603_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God, don't hurt me! Ok, ok, I'll come with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝，别碰我！好，好的，我跟你走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, just grab my records while I put this collar on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请一起拿上我的记录档案，我自己把这个项圈戴上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 10 player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaAlbertQuislingRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaQuislingRecordsRef.enable setstage aaSecondary02 16
There are 206 bones in the human body, and I know how to break most of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人身体上有206根骨头，我很清楚哪一根骨头时最脆的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't scare me, cretin! Go intimidate someone else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你吓不倒我，混蛋！这招去对付别人吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to show you some real pain if you don't start cooperating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不跟我合作的话，我要让你尝尝什么叫真正的苦头！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a perspicacious one, aren't you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's fair to say that I'm a fish out of water here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准确地说，在这里，我就像离开了水的鱼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I joined the Legion after my brother kept pressuring me. He was strong in life, and found real purpose in the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之所以加入军团，有我哥哥持续向我施加压力的原因。他在军团活得很充实，有着明确的人生目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never had a shortage of work in the NCR, but the damn bureaucracy was always weighing me down, and they constantly hampered my research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在NCR我从不会缺少工作可干，但那可恶的上级长官就像呼唤虫子一样对我，还经常阻碍我的研究进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: John said the Legion would give me freedom, and that I could be part of something special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰说，军团会给我自由，我也会实现自身独特的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR had me bottled up like a lab rat, researching mundane bullshit, ignoring my real talents, so I defected.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR把我就像小白鼠一样关在实验室里，研究那些狗屁东西，而忽略我真正的天赋。所以我就逃了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you defect to the Legion? At first glance, you don't seem the type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会投靠军团？看到你的第一言，我认为你不是通常的那种类型。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is a lab rat doing with Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一只只属于实验室的“死老鼠”在军团能有什么作为？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but you've narrowed down my options. I'm afraid you have to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，但你让我别无选择，我恐怕你只有死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's alright. I keep cyanide hidden in my coat pocket in case of such an event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我在我外衣的口袋藏了一瓶氰化物，以备这种情况出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the course of our conversation I managed to fish it out and place it in my drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们谈话的过程中，我已经把它偷偷倒入我的杯子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0002460D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put this collar on and turn yourself in. I'll put in a good word for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这个项圈戴上去自首。我会为你说几句好话的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have a future here... you're right, I've got to face my mistake and accept justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经没有什么未来可言了……你是对的。我需要面对自己犯下的错误，并接受正义的审判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024620_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I put this contraption on, will you please grab my records from the table? It's got valuable intelligence that can help my case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我把这个戴上的时候，请问你能不能帮我拿一下桌上的记录档案？上面记录有大量的重要信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024620_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 10 player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaAlbertQuislingRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaQuislingRecordsRef.enable setstage aaSecondary02 16
[Yawn] The world's smallest violin is done playing. Time to die!
ESP.TRADUIT: [打哈欠] 丧钟已经敲响了。去死吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck! Get away from me!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_00024621_1.ogg

NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Ce_0002462E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 12 set aaSecondary02.QuislingCaptured to 1 player.removeitem aaQuislingRecords 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Ce_0002462F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm taking Quisling out of here. Get out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要带奎斯琳离开这里。别挡道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You would defy the legion? By Caesar, I'll eat your liver!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢蔑视军团？以凯撒的名义，我要活挖你的心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Ce_0002462C_1.ogg
NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaQuislingCenturionRef.startcombat player aaCenturionMongrel1Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel2Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel3Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel4Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel5Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel6Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel7Ref.enable aaCenturionMongrel8Ref.enable

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Ce_00024634_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 12 set aaSecondary02.QuislingCaptured to 1 player.removeitem aaQuislingRecords 1
Move or I'll crack open your fucking skull, right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再动一步，我就敲碎你的骨头。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus Alcimus [02024611] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Ce_00024635_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 再动一步，看我怎么收拾你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Albert Quisling turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾伯特·奎斯琳已经自首了。我来收取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought for sure he'd wind up in a noose, but old Quisling had enough dirt on the Legion to get his sentence knocked down to ten years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见了，这个老家伙会因为他叛投军团的行为被判10年以上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQuislin_0002689C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you did a hell of a thing for the Republic bringing him in alive. Some secret squirrel types from the capital were overjoyed about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不论如何，你能把他活着带回来真是做了一件大好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Albert will be talking to our intelligence guys real soon, and ultimately that'll save lives. Here's the reward. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾伯特不久就会被带到我们情报部门的弟兄那里，他们会好好“照顾”他的。好了，这是你的报酬。干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQuislin_0002689C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary02 190
I killed Albert Quisling. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了奎斯琳。我来收取的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, you're a bloodthirsty one, aren't you? That old lab rat might have been a traitor, but I seriously doubt he was any threat to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天那，你怎么这么嗜血，啊？这只实验室的老鼠虽然是个叛徒，但他再怎么样对你也不会造成威胁吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQuislin_0002689D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm disappointed, but a deal is a deal. Here's the reward, and a bit of advice: try talking to the target before you start blasting away, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，算了，我非常失望，不过事已至此，也无法挽回了。这是你的报酬，另外给你个建议：下次再玩“爆米花”之前，先和你的对象聊聊行不行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQuislin_0002689D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaAlbertQuislingFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary02 190
Twenty years is a long time to rot in a goddamn jail cell, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 20年了，足够烂在狗屎的监狱里了，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... maybe you're on to something. I can't keep running forever. Eventually some ranger will tag me, or one of my boys will try to take command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是……也许你说得有道理。我不能再这么一直逃下去。这样下去最终肯定还是要被逮到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029998_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, throw up that damn collar. Once it's on, there ain't no turning back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，把那个该死的项圈扔过来。一旦戴上了，就没有回头路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029998_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR will eventually track you down. Someone will always be after that bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR最终还是会找到你的。在赏金猎人的后面还会陆续有人来要你的命的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done time, and none of it is easy. I'd rather die standing up than kneel to the fucking NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经坚持了这么长时间，还有什么不能忍受的。我宁愿死也不会向NCR低头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A conviction for robbery might get you twenty years of easy time. Just turn yourself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接受抢劫的指控或许能让你在接下来的20年获得更轻松。自首吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to turn yourself in, right now.
You've got some nerve to come strolling up to my hideout like this and making demands!
ESP.TRADUIT: 能摸到我这个隐蔽所，你还是很有两下子的，但别太得寸进尺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why in the fuck would I turn myself in? Better yet, why shouldn't I just blow your fucking head off for making the suggestion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我凭什么要听你的？更何况，我更喜欢把你那提出愚蠢建议的傻瓜脑袋爆开花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029993_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill you, plain and simple. I need that reward money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这就是为了杀你的，很简单。因为我需要钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you want it bad enough to die for it, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你已经被钱冲昏了头脑，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys, smoke this grasping piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 先好好闻闻自己放的臭屁吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029994_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary03.FightStarted to 1 setenemy aaJohnAlvordFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnAlvordRef.setav aggression 2 aaJohnAlvordRef.startcombat player aaAlvordGangParentRef.enable
Then I suppose we're out of options. We'll have to do this the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我猜，我已经没有什么选择了。看来你是敬酒不吃吃罚酒。
可惜，吃罚酒的不是我，混蛋，是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary03.FightStarted to 1 setenemy aaJohnAlvordFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnAlvordRef.setav aggression 2 aaJohnAlvordRef.startcombat player aaAlvordGangParentRef.enable

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe I'm doing this. Stand down, boys! I'm taking a walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实无法相信自己会对他们一直信任下去。行了，我想通了，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029996_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throw me that fucking collar I know you've got waiting. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那个该死的项圈扔过来，我自己会装。再见。
