ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029996_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really trust your men? Eventually one of them will supplant you in this kind of outfit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的信任你的同伙吗？总有一天他们其中之一会想方设法把你排挤掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not worried about a thing, seeing as to how I'm on the high ground with a loaded weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不担心这些屁事，我只知道自己现在好好地站在这里，手里端着上了膛的枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary03Al_00029997_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you worried about your men trying to usurp you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道不担心你的同伙会排挤你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Taunt] If you had any goddamn sense, you'd have shot first and talked later.
ESP.TRADUIT: [侮辱] 你要是有点脑子的话，怎么不用下面的“嘴”吃东西？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Alvord [0202713A] (mod) Quest : ([02027138]aaSecondary03) Vain in Robbery EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary03.FightStarted to 1 setenemy aaJohnAlvordFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnAlvordRef.setav aggression 2 aaJohnAlvordRef.startcombat player aaAlvordGangParentRef.enable aaAlvordBrahminRef.enable
John Alvord turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·奥尔沃德自首了。我来收取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured that old bandit would turn himself in - he was probably more worried about his own men than the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，我看见了，他对自己人的担心肯定远胜对NCR吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJohnAlv_000299A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he ended up getting 15 years. While he wasn't as nasty as some, it's good to see justice served. Keep up the good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他可能会被判15年。虽然他的罪孽不算太深重，但至少正义在他身上可以得到实现。继续好好干吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJohnAlv_000299A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary03 190
I killed John Alvord. I'm here to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把约翰·奥尔沃德杀了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, just give me a moment to check out the finger...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。等我一会儿，我要检查一下手指……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJohnAlv_000299A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you nailed him, alright. He was slowing down, and that's a profession that doesn't take kindly to aging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，就是他。接下来又到了给你钱的时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJohnAlv_000299A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaJohnAlvordFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary03 190
I killed Prometheus, and I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把普罗米修斯杀了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you bagged that big bastard, did ya? Supermutants are getting too big for their britches, so I'm glad you put them in their place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他干掉了，是吗？这些超级变种人的命也太长了。很高兴他们终于碰到你这个家伙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInPrometh_0002AAEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaPrometheusFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary04 190
I killed Marlo Barksdale, and I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了马洛·巴斯克代尔。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let me take a look at the finger...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我仔细看看这根手指……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMarloBa_0002BF0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's Marlo's alright. That's one less gangster to worry about, though I bet someone takes his place next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，没问题。又少了一个让人担心混蛋，尽管我猜下周有人会取代他的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMarloBa_0002BF0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your cash, kid. Keep up the good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些钱是你应得的，孩子。继续好好干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInMarloBa_0002BF0F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 150 player.removeitem aaMarloBarksdaleFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary05 190
The name's Pullman. I'm a Regulator. As the name would suggest, me and my crew are here to regulate the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名字是普尔曼。我是一名监管者。正如名字所言，我和我的同事们监管着整片莫哈维地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Wh_0002F2D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a lawless place, brimming with miscreants and dregs, so there's no shortage of work for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地区现在越来越乱了，充满了恶棍和残渣，我们经常忙得没日没夜的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Wh_0002F2D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rash words are like sword thrusts...
ESP.TRADUIT: 粗鲁的预言就如同锋利的刀刃……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Fu_0002F2DB_1.ogg

NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Fu_0002F2DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLudlowRef.startcombat player aaReynoldsRef.startcombat player
I'd advise you to keep going. For future reference, it's best to stay out of our way, pilgrim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你就像你说的这样。至于未来，你最好也不要挡我们的道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Sp_0002F2DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gentlemen, I only came here for the bounty. I have no interest in other matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，我来仅仅是为了完成我的赏金任务。我对其他的事一点也没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. Boys, show this bounty hunter what happens to liars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扯淡。孩子们，告诉这个赏金猎人，撒谎会有什么后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06Sp_0005DB5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLudlowRef.startcombat player aaReynoldsRef.startcombat player
[Lie] I was only prospecting. I didn't know this was a hideout.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎] 我只是来观光的。我根本就不知道这里还有个藏身所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Give Note] This note is all I found.
ESP.TRADUIT: [交出笔记] 我所找到的就只有这个笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I appreciate your honesty, I have to ensure that others don't stake a claim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很欣赏你的诚实，但我要确保别人没有什么异议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLudlowRef.startcombat player aaReynoldsRef.startcombat player
[Taunt] They stashed the gold up your mother's cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: [威胁] 他们把金子都藏在你妈的逼里了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaPullmanRef.modav guns 50 aaLudlowRef.modav guns 50 aaReynoldsRef.modav guns 50 aaAzraelRef.enable aaGabrielRef.enable aaLudlowRef.startcombat player aaReynoldsRef.startcombat player
I don't know shit about shit.
Then you're either a fool or a liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要么是个蠢货，要么就是骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06ID_0002F2DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't abide fools, and I hate liars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法容忍蠢货，而且我憎恨骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pullman [0202DBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0202C4CB]aaSecondary06) L'Estasi dell'Oro EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary06ID_0002F2DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaLudlowRef.startcombat player aaReynoldsRef.startcombat player
I killed Brad Jamison. I'm here to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把布莱德·杰米森杀了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so you bagged ol' "Bloody Brad", did ya? I don't know who gave him that damn moniker. He probably gave it to himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你抓到了“血腥的布莱德”？我不清楚是谁给他起了那么恶心个外号。但，他还真证明了他对得起这个称呼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBradJam_0002F5C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He ran a tight crew for years, but I heard he had been slipping lately. Rumor also has it that he knew about some stash of Legion gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他逍遥在外已经很长时间了，但我听说他最近不常见影了。有谣言说，他发现了大量的军团金币。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBradJam_0002F5C7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just the scuttlebutt, though... if the Legion loses anything they're usually on it like white on rice. Anyway, here's the reward. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正都是些闲话……如果军团真的丢了这些东西他们早就会如同热锅上的蚂蚁了。无论如何，这是你的赏金。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBradJam_0002F5C7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaBradJamisonFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary06 190

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you know I was coming for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道我会跟你走？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always somebody gunning for me, but the sharpshooters usually manage to scare em' off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我背后总是有人想要我的命，虽然他们吓不着我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a good thing going here... those caravans coming out of the 188 trading post were easy prey most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能走到今天这一步很不容易……那些大部分从188号贸易站走出来的商队，都是脆弱不堪的猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hurt, kid, and I'm willing to turn myself in. What's it gonna be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受伤了，孩子，我不想再这样下去了。我要自首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Sam Burrow [0202FE62] (mod) Quest : ([0202FE5F]aaSecondary07) Place and Means EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary07.SamCaptured to 0 setenemy aaSamBurrowGangFaction playerfaction 0 startcombat player
Sam Burrow turned himself in. I'm here for the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆·伯罗自首了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those traders at the 188 outpost will be happy to hear that Mr. Burrow is behind bars and awaiting trial back in the Core Region.
ESP.TRADUIT: 188号贸易站的商人们如果听到伯罗被捕的消息一定会乐疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSamBurr_00030A00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon he won't be getting loose any time soon. Don't spend the reward in one place, kid. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他永远不会被释放出来的。这些钱是你应得的，好好利用它们吧。干得好，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSamBurr_00030A00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary07 190
I killed Sam Burrow. I'm here to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了山姆·伯罗。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on... yeah, that's his finger. Ol' Sam had easy pickings on those trade caravans for too goddamn long. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下……恩，这的确是他的手指。老山姆把那些商队玩弄于鼓掌的时间真是太他妈久了。好样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSamBurr_00030A01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaSamBurrowFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary07 190
I killed Palo Peto. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了帕罗·佩托。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see that finger, or whatever's left of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来仔细检验一下这个手指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInPaloPet_00030FCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, that's Palo's finger. I hope that bastard's getting a taste of his own medicine in hell. Good work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，没错的。我希望这个混蛋下了地狱后好好尝尝自己种下的恶果。干得漂亮，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInPaloPet_00030FCA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaPaloPetoFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary08 190
I killed Dynamite Danny. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了“炸药”丹尼。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see that finger... hmmm... yeah, that's his, by God. He was a nasty little twerp, too. I hope you made him suffer. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我先来仔细看看这个手指……hmmm……啊，就是他，上帝。这个下流的讨厌鬼。希望他死了也会饱受摧残。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInDynamit_000326C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 50 player.removeitem aaDynamiteDannyFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary09 190
I killed Pancho Cortina. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了潘乔·科迪纳。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let me see the finger... yep, you nailed that old bandito. Keep it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我先看看手指……没错，这个手指不会是别人的。给，这些都是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInPanchoC_00033260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaPanchoCortinaFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary10 190
I killed John Dunn. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了约翰·杜恩。我来领取我的赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, just let me verify the finger... yeah, you got him. I really am glad to see that murderer out of business. Good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我检查一下……没问题了。我很高兴这个杀手再也不会再接生意了。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJohnDun_000343AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaJohnDunnFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary11 190
I killed Jacob Powers. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了雅各布·鲍尔。我来拿我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, that is one disgusting finger! The goddamn skin is dripping off... I just lost my appetite... thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，这个手指是最恶心的一个！连皮肤都没了……我快吐了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJacobPo_00034F9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can verify that this is Jacob Powers' finger. He was harassing Searchlight for years, and after what happened... well, I'm glad to see him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定这就是雅各布的手指。他已经骚扰探光镇好几年了，这之后……恩，我非常高兴再也不用见到他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJacobPo_00034F9E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, anything that can be called a zombie and a communist in the same sentence should be put down for the sake of humanity. Good work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，任何足以被称作僵尸或变种人的家伙在同样的罪恶下都应该被判以极刑。干得好，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJacobPo_00034F9E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 750 player.removeitem aaJacobPowersFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary12 190
I killed Frank Elko. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了弗兰克·埃尔科。我来拿我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let me authenticate that finger... yeah, you got the bastard. I hope you killed his brothers too. They're a bunch of drunken savages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好极了。让我先看看……恩，没错，你抓的就是他。不过，我倒是希望你连他兄弟也干掉了，他们两个总是狼狈为奸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInFrankEl_000367AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward. Good work out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是你的报酬。继续好好干吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInFrankEl_000367AF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaFrankElkoFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary13 190
So what brought you to Novac?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是什么把你带到诺瓦克来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's relatively safe, and I've managed to eke out a living over the years, tinkering and fixing things for traders and travelers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这里相对安全些。这些年我一直在外面摸爬滚打，活得很不容易，尽要看那些商人和旅客的眼色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife passed a few years ago, and my son was killed fighting those savages at the first battle of Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子几年前过世了，我的儿子在第一次胡佛大坝战役中被那些野蛮人杀害了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's his picture over on the wall. I tried to dissuade him from joining up... "Don't waste good iron for nails or good men for soldiers," I said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边的墙上就挂着他的照片。我曾劝说他放弃参加……“不要为了一张不值得的战争浪费自己的生命。”我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got swept up in it all along with his friends. Now he's gone, and it's just me and Sally, his daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他什么也没说，和他的战友一起走了。现在他不在了，就剩下我和他的女儿，萨利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you're wondering about her mother, it's a dead end. She was a harlot, nothing more. She ran off with some gambler right after Brian died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道她妈妈的故事，那真是令人难以启齿。她就是个婊子！自从布莱恩死后，她就跟着某个赌徒跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I can't complain. Having Sally here is a reason to keep getting up and trying, in spite of it all. Seeing her smile is all the motivation I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我又有什么好抱怨的呢。只要萨利在这里，我每天就有动力做任何事情。只要看到她的笑容，我就会感到舒心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_00039C2D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is something the matter with Sally? She doesn't say much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 萨利怎么了？她一句话也不说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sally's deaf, I'm afraid. She's got plenty of brains - she reads every book I can scrounge up, and she's got a sharp wit to boot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕……她聋了。但她很聪明，她特别喜欢读书，她一有空就喜欢抱着本书坐在椅子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Wh_00039C30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though she's a fine lip reader, she'd still be helpless out there in the wasteland at her age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管在读书方面她毫无障碍，但以她这年龄，在废土上生活的话依然会寸步难行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Wh_00039C30_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If something happened to me... I just don't know. I've taught her how to hunt, skin animals, and fend for herself, but she's still young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一我发生了什么事……我不知道，也许我应该教她打猎，射击，尽量自己能养活自己。但问题是，她还小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Wh_00039C30_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She'd be easy prey for raiders or those scum from Caesar's Legion. They don't have much regard for women, much less those who are impaired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那些强盗和军团杂种们眼里，她只不过是只任人宰割的兔子。那些家伙对女性从不手软，从不轻易放过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Wh_00039C30_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but that name doesn't ring a bell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，这个名字我根本就没听说过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never met him, but I had the chance to interact with his contemporaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没见过他，但我曾有机会和他的同伙交流过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever crimes the Enclave perpetrated, I was always impressed by their fastidious approach to oral hygiene, every last one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论英克雷犯了多少滔天罪行，我对他们“嘴上的卫生”依然感到十分震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Captain Ribben, I understand he assisted with horrific experiments while serving under Lieutenant Colonel Charles Curling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于里本上尉，我很清楚他为什么参与这些恐怖试验，并同时服务于查尔斯上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all accounts, Captain Ribben was quite enthusiastic, but fortunately for all of us, some "Chosen One" stopped the whole affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总体而言来说，里本上尉是个狂热分子。但对我们而言幸运的是，某个“获选者”终止了这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never quite fathomed the appellations in such legends. Who chose this "one"? I certainly didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没调查过拥有这个传奇一般称号的人是谁。这个“被选中的人”到底有些什么故事我一点也不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, you didn't inquire into my opinions on wasteland myths. To return to the matter at hand, I have no idea where Captain Ribben might be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我多嘴了，你可没问我关于这些废土传奇的观点。好了，回到我们原来讨论的东西上来，我真的不知道里本上尉会在什么地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few rumors persist, and they're dubious at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收集到过一些谣言，但听起来完全不值得相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One traveler purported that Ribben was now a wild man in the Spring Mountains, and had spawned a pack of feral orphans to do his bidding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个旅人说在春泉山看到里本，他养着一群野生的小动物不知道在做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stranger things have happened, but I'm skeptical nonetheless. In the meantime, I will drink to your success, and bid you good luck in this manhunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使更奇怪的事也发生了，我也一点不会怀疑。同时，我将为你即将而来的成功举杯，祝你此次“狩猎”成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Do_0003A4DB_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had any information of value, that old devil would be rotting in a jail cell right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能有任何有价值的消息，那个恶棍早就死在监狱里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14La_0003A4DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a damn ghost. Aside from the bullshit sightings, no one's seen hide nor hair of that man for decades. I figure he's either dead or long gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个受诅咒的幽魂。除了那些吊儿郎当的流浪汉，这么长时间来从没有人见过他。或许他早死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14La_0003A4DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He killed a bunch of folks way back. Bad business. Last I heard he hitched up with a fat senorita and moved to Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙曾经杀过一整村的平民。真他妈不要脸。我最后听到的消息是，他挟持了一个妓女跑到墨西哥去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Jo_0003A4D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of those old Enclave goons have assimilated or long since departed for areas without formal government.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分英克雷蠢蛋早就已经融入当地了，因为没有一个固定的组织或英克雷政府能把他们重新聚集起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14CJ_0003A4DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The majority of them aren't worth the trouble, but Arthur Ribben is an exception, given the nature and scope of his crimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分人都逐渐安于稳定，但那个阿瑟·里本是个例外，看看他的本性和他犯下的罪行你就不会感到奇怪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14CJ_0003A4DF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Men of every stripe and qualification have scoured the Mojave for Ribben, and all they've uncovered are ghost stories and outlandish rumors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每一个跃跃欲试的男人都在莫哈维寻找他的行踪，但他们最终找到的，只不过是一些幽灵一般的故事和令人难以置信的谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14CJ_0003A4DF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's my advice: follow the money. Guys like that still have to eat, and so he's got to be pursuing some manner of business that uses his skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的建议：跟着钱走。像他那样的家伙也是人，也要吃东西活命，所以他一定会利用他的能力做些事情，而这时就会露出马脚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14CJ_0003A4DF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my two cents, anyway. Even though it's been a long time, he still deserves to face justice. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以上就是我所知道的了。即使过了这么长时间，他依然必须接受法律的制裁。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14CJ_0003A4DF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's that old Enclave war criminal that's still at large, right? From what everyone's said, he was a monster... did terrible things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个老英克雷，同时也是个战争罪犯。所有人都说，他是个怪物……干的全是些恐怖的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ki_0003A4DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much, but I did hear this - supposedly he lives in a cave and raises Cazadors... some people say he created them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道的不多，但我听说过这些话——他住在一个山洞里，养着一些大黄蜂……有人说那些恐怖的生物是他创造出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ki_0003A4DA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say he still catches people and uses them as experiments for his unholy creations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有人说，他会抓住一些俘虏，然后把他们当他那些恶思想的实验品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ki_0003A4DA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you find him, don't take any chances - they say he has a cybernetic arm, and he can rip off your limbs with it! But that's just a rumor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到他，不要浪费任何宝贵的机会——他们说他有一只机械化的手臂，能轻松把你的胳膊锯成两段！……但也许只是谣言吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ki_0003A4DA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found definitive proof that you're Arthur Ribben. I'm taking you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经找到足够的证据证明你就是阿瑟·里本了。我要带你走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't be serious! That's the most outlandish thing I've heard in years! Do you even have any proof to support such a ridiculous claim?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开玩笑吧！这是我这么多年来听到的最可笑的话！你有什么证据可以证明你的言论？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks over the evidence] God... I didn't think they could find me after all this time... Sally... she can't make it alone... I can't go.
ESP.TRADUIT: [他看着证据] 天……我可不认为过了这么久他们还能找到我……萨利……她一个人往后怎么过……我不能走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd have to go to trial... the NCR will make a spectacle out of me, and my granddaughter will be left alone. No, I'd rather die, frankly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我不得不接受审判……NCR会公开处刑，我的孙女……她以后可怎么办啊。不……坦白的说，我宁愿死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4F7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found definitive proof that you're Arthur Ribben. Now I have to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经找到足够的证据证明你就是阿瑟·里本了。现在我要你的命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? That's preposterous! You're serious? [He examines the evidence]. God, you've found me... after all this time. I didn't think it would happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？太荒谬了！你开玩笑吧？[他检查了一遍证据] 天，你找到我了……终于。我本来以为这一切不会发生那么快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't resist... I expected this day might come. All I ask is that you make sure Sally gets a good home. She doesn't deserve to suffer for my sins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会抵抗……我早就预料到这一天终会到来的。我希望你能向我保证萨利以后有一个温暖的家。她不值得因为我的原因受到伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we at least do this outside? I'm too old to run... I just don't want her to see it. I'll meet you outside after I say goodbye to Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能到外面去吗？我太老了，快走不动了……我不希望她看到这一幕。等我和萨利告别之后，我会到屋外和你见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4E6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 5 set aaSecondary14.ArthurDiscovered to 2
I'm going to make you suffer, just like your victims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你为了你曾经的罪行血债血偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I deserve it, but please... think of Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我自找的，但……请为萨利考虑一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0003A4F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, you should turn yourself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许你应该自己主动自首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I'll have to go to trial... the NCR will make a spectacle out of me, and my granddaughter will be left alone. No, I'd rather die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？那样我会受到惩罚的……NCR会公开处刑，我的孙女……她以后可怎么办啊。不……我宁愿现在就死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ex_0003A4F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please see that Sally gets a good home. Go ahead and do it... I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请向我保证萨利能有找到一个安全的家。希望你能照顾她……我准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ex_0003A4F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to set you free, but only for the girl's sake. Now get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会放了你的，但那是看在小妹妹的份上。现在赶快从我眼前消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You would do that? I don't know what to say... I didn't expect it. Please, just don't tell anyone the things I've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟然？我真不知道说什么好……真没想到。请你别告诉任何人关于我的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ex_0003A4F3_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，非常感谢你，陌生人。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ex_0003A4F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 0 set aaSecondary14.ArthurGreeted to 2 player.rewardkarma 25 setstage aaSecondary14 180
I'll make it quick, which is more than you can say for your victims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你痛快点的，比你对那些可怜的人所做的更痛快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do it. Just don't hurt Sally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动手吧。希望你别伤害萨利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ex_0003A4F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you refuse to face justice, then you leave me with no other options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你拒绝直面公正，那你让我别无选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then do what you must, bounty hunter. I knew this day would come. I just don't want Sally to see it. I'll wait for you outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就做你必须做的吧，赏金猎人。我知道这一天迟早会到来。我会到外面等你的，因为我不希望萨利看到这一幕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Op_0003A4FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 5 set aaSecondary14.ArthurDiscovered to 2
You're right... I can't keeping running from fate. Give me the collar. Please, just ensure the NCR takes good care of Sally. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的……我无法逃过命运的选择。给我那个项圈。请确保NCR能好好照顾萨利。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A501_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 10 aaArthurRibbenRef.additem aabountycollar 1 playerref.removeitem aabountycollar 1
The anvil of justice is planted firm, and fate who makes the sword does the forging in advance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正义的审判之锤坚固无比，只有它才能锻造命运之剑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I defer to Sophocles: "There is a point at which even justice does injury."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很遵从一位古希腊诗人的话，“在某个时刻，即使公正也会令人受伤”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A502_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you honestly expect to escape justice? You must take responsibility for your crimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的认为你能逃脱正义的审判？你必须为你曾经犯下的罪恶负责。
行……行，随便你怎么说我都干！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A4FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 10 aaArthurRibbenRef.additem aabountycollar 1 playerref.removeitem aabountycollar 1 player.rewardkarma -25
You know my reputation. I'll hurt that girl... bad. Put on the collar. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该听说过我的大名。我会“好好地照顾”这个女孩！现在把项圈带上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't intimidate me. No, I'm staying right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你威胁不了我。不，我就呆在这里哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A500_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're starting to piss me off. Put on the collar, old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你令我生气了。把这个项圈戴上，老头子。
好的，随便你怎么说都行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A503_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 10 aaArthurRibbenRef.additem aabountycollar 1 playerref.removeitem aabountycollar 1
Put on the collar, or I'll break your arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这个项圈戴上，否则我扭断你的脖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kidding yourself if you think I'll respond to intimidation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是以为我会屈服于你的威胁，那你就大错特错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put on the damn collar or... I'll hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但上这个项圈，否则……否则我会让你难受的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recognize that... Ovid's "Letters from Pontus", right? They expressed the shame of exile, if I recall. Perhaps I've been in exile all this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听过这句……奥维德的“来自庞图斯的信”，对不对？如果我没记错的话，这是他们对被流放的忏悔。和他们相比，我一直是在过被流放的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A505_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary14.ArthurCaptured to 10 aaArthurRibbenRef.additem aabountycollar 1 playerref.removeitem aabountycollar 1
The punishment can be remitted; the crime is everlasting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 惩罚可以被宽恕；而罪孽则万劫不复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God has nothing to do with it. I've put it behind me. All I care about is Sally, so I'm not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使上帝也什么都做不了。我已经把这一切都抛到脑后了。我所关心的只有萨利，我哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Tu_0003A506_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For God's sake, don't you have conscience?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在上帝的份上，你究竟有没有良心？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arthur Ribben turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿瑟·里本来自首了。我想我是不是可以领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought it was some kind of joke at first, but he checked out. I'm just amazed that old bastard lived right under our noses for so long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始我还以为你在开玩笑，但随后他的出现令我感到震惊。我很惊讶，这个死老头竟然在我们眼皮底下好好地活了这么长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those bureaucrats back at Shady Sands got really worked up about this... they had planned to use his trial to boost morale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些在林荫沙地的官员们现在有的忙乎了……他们准备通过对他的审判大幅抬高自己道德的高度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7EB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it wasn't meant to be - the old man died of a massive heart attack right before it started. He couldn't bear losing that granddaughter, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但计划未能成功实施……那个老头在一切开始前死于了心脏病。我想，他可能承受不起失去孙女的打击吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7EB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which, we had someone pick up the girl. She'll be going to a state orphanage. It's going to be tough, but she'll have to manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 换个话题吧，我们派人收养了那个小女孩。她会被送到政府资助的孤儿院。尽管在那里的生活很艰难，但看起来她还是挺坚强的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7EB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man upstairs didn't do her any favors making her the granddaughter of a known war criminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个在天上的老人留给这个小女孩的，除了“战争罪犯的孙女”这个称呼以外，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7EB_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary14 190
I killed Arthur Ribben. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了阿瑟·里本。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid, are you on Jet or something? You're serious... alright, let me see this finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，你嗑药了还是怎么了？哦，这么严肃……好的，让我看看手指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well fuck me, this is Arthur Ribben's finger, and it's definitely fresh. He was here in the Mojave all along... who'd have guessed it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我草，这真是阿瑟·里本的手指，肉还是新鲜的呢。他在莫哈维呆的时间太长了...谁知到呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did find an Allen Rogers... shows he's survived by a sole granddaughter. I suppose she'll be headed to that orphanage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我终于找到艾伦·罗杰斯了...那个可怜的小女孩继承了他的一切。我猜她可能要被送到孤儿院去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInArthurR_0003A7F3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaArthurRibbenFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary14 190
You're bringing out the big guns, aren't you? Alright, I'll see what I can do. I know of a Ranger who's looking to adopt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还真麻烦啊你。好吧，我想想我能做什么。对了，我认识一个想要收养孩子的游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullRibbenGi_0003A7EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're good people, and I suppose she'd be better off there. I'll do this for her father... and that's it. Now get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一家都是好人，我猜在那里她一定会过得很幸福。这就算是我为了她父亲做的吧……就这样，行了，你可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullRibbenGi_0003A7EF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her father was a decorated war hero, and a fellow ranger. You can do better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的父亲是个杰出的战争英雄，也是游骑兵的一员。你应该拿出更好的解决办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deserve's got nothing to do with it, kid. It's a raw deal for everyone, especially that girl, but that's just the way it's gonna be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不该又能怎样。这样的结果对每个人来说都很合适，尤其是那个女孩。不去孤儿院还能怎样，只有这一条路可走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullRibbenGi_0003A7F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An orphanage? The girl didn't do anything wrong - she doesn't deserve that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孤儿院？那个孩子没做错任何事情，她不该遭到这样的待遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a damn about that brat. I got paid, and that's what matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不管那个小孩呢。我拿了钱就走，其他都不关我的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a hard one, aren't you? I suppose it's speaks to how low the NCR has sunk when we're forced to rely on your sort. Take your money and leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的心肠可硬啊。NCR依赖你来做这些事可真是瞎了眼了。拿着你钱滚蛋去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullRibbenGi_0003A7F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's unfortunate, but there's nothing more we can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，她真不幸，但我们什么也做不了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, partner. Sadly, she'll end up paying for old Arthur's crimes. These are hard times, I guess. Listen, keep up the good work out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，老伙计。很遗憾，她终身都要补偿老阿瑟所犯下的罪行，对她来说，那将会是段很艰难的岁月。听着，不要想太多了，继续好好干吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullRibbenGi_0003A7F0_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么认识兰道尔的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a well-traveled prospector I knew quite a few shady characters in the Mojave. Randall always paid well for information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个爱好旅行的游人，我认识莫哈维这里大部分有头有脸的人。尤其是兰道尔，他总愿意为有价值的信息支付可观的价钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C27F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'm reluctant to share my secrets, but Randall was trustworthy, and he wasn't stingy with the cash. It was nice while it lasted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我不太情愿与别人分享我的秘密，但兰道尔是个例外，他毫不吝啬金钱。和他一起合作令人感到愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C27F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lot of good scavenging... uh, I mean prospecting... to be done down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里寻找有潜在价值的东西……恩，我是说搜寻……一切有价值的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C281_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of folks are scared of the Legion, Jackals, Vipers, and Banditos, but they rarely roll through here in force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分平民害怕军团、豹牙帮、毒蛇帮还有强盗，但他们从未凝聚成一股自己的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C281_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most often it's just caravans and traders - especially those dealing in human commodities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常只有那些商队和商人——尤其是搞商业贸易的人，形成为一股小团体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C281_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam R... fuck his last name - you know who I mean... he is subtle enough to avoid the NCR, but I've seen where they're operating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当……草他妈的名字，你知道我什么意思……他头脑很敏锐，很轻易就能躲开NCR的视线。但我知道他们都在什么地方运营业务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C281_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I say live and let live, but he's different. They call him "The Butcher" for a reason... he's a goddamn monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常做事都给人留条后路，但他不同。人们称他“屠夫”……他就是个该死的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C281_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall did me a solid on more than one occasion, and I never got to thank him. I figure this is the next best thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔曾经帮了我很多忙，但我一直还没来得及感谢他。我想，这或许是我最想做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C282_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I hate slavers, and will continue to do so until my dying day. Twenty years ago they took my wife from me... it ruined my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时我恨那些奴隶主，对他们的憎恨直到死也无法消除。20年前，他们把我的妻子从我身边夺走……从此我的人生就毁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C282_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I looked for years, but never found a trace. Even the men who took her are a mystery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找她找了很多年，但一点线索也没找到。即使那些带走她的人也似乎消失得无影无踪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C282_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figure getting back at Rz... Rezn... fuckface... gives me a small sense of justice. Just get him, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果能把泽……草，那张恶心的脸……带给我，我才会稍微感受到一点正义的力量。替我逮到他，好么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C282_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any questions. I'll see you later.
Alright, kid. Good luck taking out that scumbag. I'll be around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，孩子。希望你尽早把那个混蛋带来，祝你好运。我还呆在老地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nestor [0203C277] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Ne_0003C280_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, excuse me. His office is the first door on the right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，请原谅。他的办公室就在右手第一道门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Gu_0003C295_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this how you treat your customers? I'm interested in doing business with Mr. Rzeznik.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你对待你们顾客的态度吗？我有一笔生意要和泽尼克先生讨论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. Tell me why you're really here or I'm gonna unload buckshot into your lying ass, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扯淡。告诉我你来这到底干什么，否则我就一枪崩了你的脑袋，草。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Gu_0003C296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... I'm selling slaves, er... property. Is Mr. Rzeznik buying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 额……我是来买奴隶的，额……不，是个人资产。不知泽尼克先生是否感兴趣？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill everyone in here, starting with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你们都杀了，从你开始。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Gu_0003C294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to collect the bounty on Adam Rzeznik.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个赏金猎人，我来找亚当·泽尼克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have been better off lying, you simple bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你撒谎的水平最好再练练，你个头脑简单的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guard [0203C288] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Gu_0003C293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to know the person I'm dealing with. What's your background?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先了解一下我要打交道的人。你有什么背景经历？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough. My family moved here from some place called The Den. My maternal grandfather was some kind of bigshot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我的一家很早以前从某个叫“丹”的地方搬来。我母亲的祖父是个大亨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was left to fend for myself at a young age, so I joined up with the Jackals. After a misspent youth, I began this business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很小的时候就被迫自食其力，于是我加入了豹狼帮。在浪费了宝贵的青春后，我开始走上从商之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to some old contacts I'm able to secure property at cheaper rates than my competitors, and that means more dinero in the customer's pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好一开始我就接触了一些相当好的合同，可以以比我竞争对手更低的价格销售给顾客，而这也意味着为我的顾客可以省下更多的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2AE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now the bad ol' NCR cramps my style a bit, and while that keeps me from offering a maximum discount, I can still beat anyone on the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，恶心的NCR来搅局了。但即使他们强迫我减少折扣的敞口，我依然能以价格的优势打败所有在莫哈维的同类产品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2AE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a stupendous judge of character, and I'm sensing you're in need of a... manual laborer. Am I right or am I right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的个性里有惊人的判断力，我觉得你……应该是需要一些擅长体力活的劳工。我的判断怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2AE_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on your head. I'm taking you in, Rzeznik.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的头现在是悬赏目标。我是来抓你的，泽尼克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay, let's not do anything hasty, alright? You're not the first bounty hunter to come calling, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧，别那么急匆匆的好吗？不过我恐怕你不是第一个来这的赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I account for these sort of things when I estimate overhead. In fact, I have a special fund set up for this sort of situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我确实要为我以前高估自己的行为负责。事实上，为了应付像现在这个局面，我一直保有一笔特殊的基金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sense that deep down you're a practical person - after all, how many bounty hunters are idealists? In light of that, why don't we talk turkey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你内心深处其实是个很切实际的人——毕竟，有多少赏金猎人是理想主义分子？这样的话，不如我们好好商量商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on your head, you piece of trash. I don't plan on taking you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的头可值一大笔钱，你个垃圾。我就没想留你的狗命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, this kind of thing is bad for business. Guards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这种态度可不适合谈生意。守卫？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sleep very well because I have a full stomach, a loaded gun, and a roof over my head. Oh, and you blew your cover, dickshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我睡得着，是因为我身体健康、身上有枪、头上有房。哦，你终于撕下你的面罩了，臭老二。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you enslave and market human beings, and still sleep at night?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢奴役并且买卖人口。干着这种丧尽天良的事，你晚上怎么能睡得着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I won't give away all my trade secrets, but I'll say this: I guarantee security, reliability, and fair rates for my suppliers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我从不泄露我的商业机密。但有几点我可以保证：我可以为我的顾客确保交易的秘密性、可靠性，以及公平的价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most slavers are not good with people, so to speak. I take the raw material, mold it into a commodity, and then market the hell out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以说，大部分奴隶主待人都不友好。我一般先收购“原材料”，然后加工成“商品”，最后拿到市场上交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My word is my bond here in the Mojave. Of course, a contract with Caesar's Legion doesn't hurt, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在莫哈维，我可是一言顶千金。当然，和凯撒军团的合同是我生意的主要来源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2B2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to admit that I'm impressed by this operation. How do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不得不承认，你的商业行为给我留下了深刻的印象。你怎么办到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fucking insane! You're serious, aren't you? Ok, just give me the collar, and I'll go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是疯了！你是认真的，是吗？好，把那该死的项圈给我，我自己走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikCaptured to 1 Player.Removeitem aabountycollar 1 aaAdamRzeznikRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaAdamRzeznikRef.evp
If you don't go willingly, I'm gonna carve you into pieces and deliver them to the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不跟我合作的话，我就把你剁成碎片，拿去喂狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some moxy to come in here and threaten to hurt me, with a knife, no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还真有胆说这种话，就拿着一把小刀？开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's some advice - if the guy has a gun, don't threaten him with a knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的建议——如果一个家伙手里有一把枪，就绝不要用一把小刀威胁他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put on the collar, or I'll cut off your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这个项圈戴上，否则我切烂你的脸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, all this time I've been sleeping with one eye open, wondering when an escaped slave or an ambitious guard will take me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这么久以来，我睡觉时一直是睁一只眼闭一只眼，时刻警惕着可能会逃跑的奴隶或想来取我性命的警卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never wanted to do this. It's the only way I know how to survive out here. But maybe I can get a new start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没想过这么做。只有像现在这样我才能苟活于世。但……也许我该选择重新开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's ironic I'll wear the collar. I suppose it's fitting. Goodbye, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真讽刺，我现在居然自己戴着这种项圈。还好还算合适。再见了，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikCaptured to 1 player.removeitem aabountycollar 1 aaAdamRzeznikRef.additem aabountycollar 1 aaAdamRzeznikRef.evp
Eventually the NCR, bounty hunters, or your own men will take you out. Do the time and start over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迟早NCR，其他赏金猎人，人之你自己的手下会把你干掉。你等着瞧吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea where I've been or what I've experienced, kid. Don't lecture me about self-preservation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本不知道我去过什么地方经历过什么场面，孩子。少用这种教导的语气跟我说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're smart, you'll turn yourself in. Someone will take you out eventually if stick around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你够聪明，那你就应该自首。如果你赖在这里不走，迟早有一天会有人来把你带走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'm listening. What's your offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我在听，你的提议是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you one thousand caps, right now. All you have to do is walk away and forget about this little encounter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你1000个瓶盖，立刻就给。你所要做的就是马上从这里走开，就当这里什么事也没发生过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I checked, that would the double my reward money, assuming you could take me in alive. So, do we have a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 依据我上次的调查，这笔钱是在你能活捉我的前提下获得的两倍。怎么样，干不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, one thousand caps it is. We have a deal.
Excellent! You've made the right choice. And don't worry - this stays between us. You stay safe out there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！你做了一个相当正确的选择。别担心，这件事除了你我之外再无外人能知道。你放心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikGreeted to 11 player.additem caps001 1000 player.rewardkarma -50 setstage aaSecondary15 180
You're beginning to bore the hell out of me. I think I'll just kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我感到心烦意乱。我想我还是杀了你比较果断。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't accept bribes. This is your last chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不接受这些贿赂。这是你最后的机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that was your last chance. I'm sorry we couldn't do business together. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是你最后的机会。我很抱歉这笔生意泡汤了。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, I really underestimated you. Ok, two thousand caps it is. Now get the hell out of here before you run me out of business, you thief!
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，我真的低估你了。好，就2000个瓶盖。快拿了钱滚，别再妨碍我了，你个小偷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikGreeted to 11 player.additem caps001 2000 player.rewardkarma -50 setstage aaSecondary15 180
Make it two thousand and I'm in.
That's ridiculous! I'm a small business owner, not the fucking bank! No, one thousand is my final offer - take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太可笑了！我只是个小生意人，又不是他妈的银行！不，1000个是我最后的提议。干，还是不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0003C2C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it five thousand and I'm in.
Adam Rzeznik turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当·泽尼克自首了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, that silver-tongued piece of shit came in, sure enough. He was always one step ahead of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，那个戴着银色项圈的家伙来过了。他以前在行动上总是领先我们一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It didn't help that he was sharing the dividends of his business with several NCR officials, not to mention supplying the legion with slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使他以前与某些NCR的长官分享他的生意利润也救不了他，更不用说他还在于军团的交易中赚取了大量金币。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But as I might have predicted, he's cutting a deal with the prosecution. In exchange for information on the legion, he's getting a lighter sentence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但正如预料的那样，他在罪行起诉上被打了个折扣。通过交换他那些关于军团的情报，这家伙只获得了较轻的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's getting off easy, but either way you got the job done, so good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很轻易地脱离了重罪，但无论怎样，你成功的完成了你的任务。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary15 190
I killed Adam Rzeznik. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了亚当·泽尼克。我来取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me verify that finger... yeah, that's his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看一下这根手指……对，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of slavery, you could've added treason and bribery to old Rzeznik's charges. Scum like him don't deserve a trial, in my opinion. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了奴隶买卖以外，你还可以在对他的指控中增加“叛徒”和“贿赂”这些罪名。像他这样的混蛋罪有应得，当然，这只是我的观点。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInAdamRze_0003C2CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 150 player.removeitem aaAdamRzeznikFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary15 190
I hear you're quite the duelist. Care to step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你是个相当强悍的决斗家。我们出去进一步说话怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I was hoping for, actually. Meet me in the street and we'll finish this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上这正是我期望的。在大街上见我，让我们好好做个了结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary16Du_0003D140_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's in the past. My job is to deliver you to the authorities, one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是过去的事了。我现在的工作就是带你去自首去，要么咱们就换一种方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. You're the professional type. Alright, I'll do this - if you fight me on my terms, and somehow incapacitate me, I'll surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，你是很职业的那种。好吧，我干——如果你以我的方式赢了我，我就投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary16In_0003D141_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bullshit, no arguing. We settle it in the streets, one on one. I'll assume that your silence indicates consent. Meet me outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不许作弊，不许争论。我们在大街上了结，一对一。我假设你的沉默就是默许。外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary16In_0003D141_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not big on conversation. I came here to kill you, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和你废话。我就是来杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As expected, you're just a bloody-minded fool. Meet me in the street outside and we'll settle this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出所料，你个嗜血的狂徒。在大街上见我，我们要好好做个了结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary16In_0003D13F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I accept your surrender. Turn yourself in at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接受你的投降。你自己到巨石城监狱自首去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaDougRudeRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 set aaSecondary16.RudeCaptured to 1 aaDougRudeRef.evp
Little snot? You should learn when to keep your mouth shut, old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个惹人厌的家伙，你该好好学学什么时候该闭上你的臭嘴，死老头。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doug Rude [0203D134] (mod) Quest : ([0203D131]aaSecondary16) The Duelist EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doug Rude turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 道格·鲁德自首了。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that old pistolero's pride was hurt more than his body. Ever since Jack was killed Doug was considered the fastest around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看这个老不死的家伙是自食其果。自从杰克被干掉了，道格一直是被认为掏枪最快的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInDougRud_0003D436_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But like they say, "Pride comes before the fall". You might want to keep that in mind. Good work out there, hotshot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但也正如人们所言“骄兵必败”。你也好好记住这句话。干得好，继续吧，快枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInDougRud_0003D436_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaSecondary16 190
I killed Doug Rude. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了道格·鲁德。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that. Yeah that Doug's alright, and you got his trigger finger, no less. He was fast and mean, but sometimes that just ain't enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看。啊，这就是道格的手指，还是他扣扳机的手指。他身手非常敏捷，但看来在某人面前还远远不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInDougRud_0003D437_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He enjoyed goading people into pistol duels and then claiming self-defense after the fact. I guess he never figured on running into the likes of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喜欢鼓动别人进行决斗，事后又宣称完全是出于自卫行为。我猜，他怎么也不会料到会碰到你这个对手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInDougRud_0003D437_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaDougRudeFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary16 190
I killed Lobo. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了洛勃。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that finger. You know how Lobo got that name, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看手指。你知道洛勃有名字，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInLoboDea_0003DA20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say when he got hopped up on jet that he'd literally start howling at the moon. From the looks of his finger, his howling days are done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听人说，一旦他嗑上杰特，就能想MJ一样进行月球漫步。从他的手指来看，他的确适合去跳舞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInLoboDea_0003DA20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's definitely Lobo's. Good work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，洛勃已经被搞定了。干得好，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInLoboDea_0003DA20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaLoboFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary17 190
The bounty poster for Jake Burns said to consult with you first. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 贴着悬赏詹克·彭斯的告示说，开始前要先来见见你。有什么事么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, I wanted to talk to you about this case before you set off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在你开始前我想先和你详细地谈一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This case is personal for me. Jake Burns and his shitkicking relatives killed one of my very good friends, Captain Gary Winstone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这起案件对我来说其实是私人案件。詹克·彭斯和他那些操蛋同伙杀了我一个最好的朋友，加里·温斯顿上尉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_2.ogg
