ESP.ORIGINAL: We had received some reports of an illegal moonshine operation near Crescent Canyon, so he started investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们那时收到报告，说在巨石城附近有一家非法酒厂，于是他先开始展开调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right before Captain Winstone was going to uncover their hideout, the "Bum" brothers tracked him down to his home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在温斯顿上尉马上就要查到他们的藏身处时，布恩斯那帮混蛋跟踪他到家里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was one of the first investigators on the scene, and it was fucking awful. I've seen some heinous shit in my days, but those animals...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是第一个到现场的调查员，那个场面回想起来至今令我感到恶心。我看到了我一生中最不应该看到的东西，那帮畜生……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I estimate they had their way with Gary's wife before they did both of them in, along with his two kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们估计先糟蹋了他的妻子，然后侮辱了他的孩子，最后把他全家都碎尸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're fucking savages, and they've got to go. Now officially, your only job is to kill Jake "Bums", you know, the brothers' ringleader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这帮混蛋，这帮畜生真是该死。说到正题，你的任务很简单，杀了杰克，你知道，那帮家伙的老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, Winstone's reports indicated that they do operate as a clan, with a matriarch at the top. And I want you to kill that old raggedy cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，温斯顿遗留的报告指出，他们是以家族的方式运营，站在最上面的是个女族长。所以我要你把那个臭婊子也干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you bag Grandma "Bums" , I'll throw in an extra two hundred and fifty caps, no questions asked. Now I'm counting on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能把她搞定，我会额外付给你250个瓶盖，就这样。好了，剩下的就指望你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0203E2CB]aaSecondary18) Ayin Tachat Ayin EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary18Sc_0003F7DF_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Jake Burns. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了詹克·彭斯。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me verify that. Goddamn right that's his finger. He was a real piece of shit, and we're all glad to see him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我先鉴定一下。上帝，没错！他是一个十足的恶棍，他的死真是令人大快人心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJakeBur_0003FADB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm happy to know that Jake's dead, I've got to ask you - did you off Grandma "Bums" too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管听到他的死讯我很高兴，我还是要问一下，你杀死他祖母了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInJakeBur_0003FADB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaJakeBurnsFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary18 190
That's good. Damn good, in fact. As promised, here's another two hundred and fifty. You did me right proud on this one, kid. Good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了，太他妈的好了！这是我之前承诺的，250个瓶盖。我现在为你感到相当的自豪，孩子，好样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGrandma_0003FADD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Scull glares at you with disappointment, then returns to his work].
ESP.TRADUIT: [斯科尔失望地看了看你，埋头继续去工作了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Red Kelly. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了莱德·凯莉。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the finger is red enough... yeah, you got him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这个手指……是他的。好的，你完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedKell_00040A07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kelly was a pain the ass, ransacking convoys, stealing guns, whatever he could. He called himself a rebel, I just think he was as an asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莉是个十足的强盗，他打劫车队，盗取枪支，无恶不作。他自称是起义，要我看就是个二百五。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRedKell_00040A07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaRedKellyFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary19 190
Alright, you've got yourself a deal.
You know what? You're smarter than I gave you credit for, kid. Here's the finger. Have a nice fucking life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你猜怎么着？我觉得你比我想的要聪明得多，孩子。给，这是我的手指。希望你以后活得轻松而操蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0004F38B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaRedBearPropYesMessage aaRedBearRef.disable player.additem aaRedBearFinger 1 player.rewardkarma -250 set aaBounties02.RedBearBribed to 1
You're starting to limit my options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就让我别无选择了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Rea_0004F389_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since we're just talking, do you have any information on Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，顺便问你一句，你听说过马尔科这个人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We went our separate ways. He likes to kill even more than me, and that's no easy feat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们后来分开了。他比我更渴望鲜血，想像他那样可真不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_00054D66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were a betting man, I'd wager he's somewhere in the southern plains, raiding settlements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是可以打赌的话，我猜他现在大概在南方平原的某个地方，干些令他自己开心的勾当。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_00054D66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should I cut a deal with you? You've been trying to kill me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我要和你达成协议？你刚才甚至想杀我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider it a test, bounty hunter. It's not as if killing fiends is a change of pace for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就当那只是一道测试，赏金猎人。想把你干掉绝不会像想杀一个笨蛋那么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0005C70C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, Charlie was a pain in the ass, but you got his gun. For all the pain you might have endured, you've emerged stronger. You should thank me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，是查理自己没事找事。经过了这么多危险的磨难，你其实已经成长了不少。因此相反，你应该感谢我才是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Red_0005C70C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Trigger. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了特里戈。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, they got tired of that scumbag jumping bail, so somebody decided he had to be put down, you know, "For the good of the Republic" as they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好的。那帮家伙已经厌倦了他反反复复的越狱，即使你不这么干他们也希望他死。“为了民主的自由”这帮家伙会这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInTrigger_00043E94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaTriggerFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary20 190

ESP.TRADUIT: 可以和我讲讲你的故事吗，医生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up before the war, and was blessed with a strong upbringing and a classical education. Both have served me well in these troubled times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在战争打响前出生，生活在一个团结的家庭里，接受了良好的而优质的教育。这两者对我的影响都很大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father died when I was rather young, so my brother Joseph and I were close. That was a lifetime... two lifetimes ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我还很小的时候，我的父亲就死了，因此我的兄弟约瑟夫和我非常亲密。那听起来像是上辈子……不，上上辈子的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joseph was taken from me before the war. I don't normally like to speak of it, but it's been so long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约瑟夫在战争打响前从我身边被夺走了。我不想再回顾这段历史了，虽然这还是发生在不久以前的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joseph was the sheriff in our hometown. What he lacked in loquacity he made up for in decisiveness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约瑟夫是我们家乡小镇的警长。尽管他废话特别多，但他执行其任务来非常坚决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was an honest man - more honest than I ever was, at least. He was a rock - I thought he could never die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个诚实的人——至少是我见过的最诚实的人。他的体型就像块石头，我觉得死和他根本就不沾边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One weekend a drifter made his way into town, and for no apparent reason killed Joseph. He shot him in the back, they said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个周末，一个流浪汉来到了小镇，毫无原因地把他杀了。据说，他的后背中了弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The state police eventually found the perpetrator, a man by the name of Johnny Rounder. He was tried and sentenced to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 州警最后发现了这个罪犯，一个叫乔尼·朗德的家伙。他后来被判处死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He sat on death row for two years, and after countless appeals and delays the execution date was finalized: October 24, 2077.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他坐在牢里一直在等待死亡，整整两年。在数不尽的法庭纠纷和喧闹之后，审判日2077年10月24日突然降临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a day too late, as things turned out. The airbursts over Ft. Benning produced enough radiation to kill almost everyone shortly afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明，这一天来得太晚了。空气中巨大的热浪和辐射几乎可以杀死每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I watched my family wither away... my own son turning pale, his hair falling out, crying... I wanted to die with them, but I lingered on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我眼睁睁地看着我的家庭一个接一个倒下……我的儿子脸渐渐发青，头发开始大片大片点脱落……我哭着，痛不欲生，想和他一起死。但那时的我在面对死亡时还非常懦弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fell asleep next to my wife as she died, and prayed to die with her. Instead, the next morning I woke up looking at Johnny Rounder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的妻子死后，我倒在她身边睡着了，向上帝祈祷着能陪她一起。然而，第二天我醒来时，却发现乔尼·朗德站在我面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was holding Joseph's badge, admiring it like it was a long-lost trophy. He had already changed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他抓着约瑟夫的警徽，以一种欣赏丢失已久的奖杯的眼神注视着它。他已经变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He just looked at me and said, "Now you've got something to live for, Doc," and then walked away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他看着我，说：“现在，你有活着的理由了，医生。”然后就走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been following that bastard for two hundred years, and it's going to end here. I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经追踪那个混蛋快200年了。我有预感，这件事很快就要在这个地方有个了结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A30_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you know Steven Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识斯蒂芬·兰道尔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wanted for questioning in regards to a minor altercation in the adjacent territory. Randall was prompted by his employers to pursue me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我因为在邻近的地区涉嫌参与一场小纠纷被通缉。兰道尔被他的上司派来追查我的踪迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall was very professional about the whole affair, and realizing I was a fellow southerner, he was willing to discuss the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔在这整件事件的处理上非常职业，在意识到我只是个普通的南方平民后，他愿意和我讨论一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We settled it with a card game, which I handily won. Randall was a gentleman about the affair, and left it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之后以一盘扑克定夺，结果我轻松获胜。兰道尔很绅士地认输，然后就离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering whether I cheated, I'll say this - any man who wouldn't cheat when gambling for his freedom is a damn fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了以防你指责我作弊，我先声明——任何需要以一场赌博来决定你人生自由的家伙，都会你妈毫不犹豫地作弊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's simply a shame what happened to Randall. He carried himself with a rare combination of strength and calm. He was very poised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于这之后发生的，我感到羞愧。他带着他的为实现的理想永远的沉睡了。他的死真遗憾，真可惜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I can tell you that if your profession depends on using a gun, poise counts for more than anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时我还想跟你说，如果你遇到什么事都指望手里的这把枪，那么你的姿势永远比其他任何东西都要重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRand_00044A3D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever heard of "Mr. Fisk"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过菲斯克这个人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, he's a key figure in an organized crime syndicate. Supposedly he had extensive dealings with that corpulent pervert, The Judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他是一个有组织犯罪团伙里的重要成员。据说他以前和一个人高马大的家伙有着大量的生意往来。对了，那家伙人称审判官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayFisk_00044A2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The prevailing rumor is that Mr. Fisk has come under significant pressure from his own superiors since you've disrupted their interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有流言说，菲斯克在他上级的巨大压力下开始有所行动，因为你搅乱了他们正常的经营秩序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayFisk_00044A2F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Mr. Fisk is removed, it would only exacerbate the power vacuum rendered by the Judge's demise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果菲斯克也被你干掉了，那么由审判官之死引起的愤怒将会迅速加剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayFisk_00044A2F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly wouldn't shed tears for either of those bastards, but I worry who might replace them. Nature abhors a vacuum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不为那些混蛋的结局掉一滴眼泪，我担心的是是否有谁会迅速取代他们。通常，道高一尺魔高一丈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayFisk_00044A2F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to let you know that I dealt with Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想让你知道我见过红熊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about a man named Sergio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫塞尔吉奥的人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a veritable psychopath who places engraved harmonicas in the mouths of slain opponents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个神经病，喜欢在每一个被杀死的对象嘴里放一个精致的口琴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridaySerg_00044A3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How he acquires such a steady supply of harmonicas and the means to engrave them is beyond me, but that is his monikor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于他从哪弄来这么多口琴，又是如何雕刻得那么精致，这我就不知道了，但他的所作所为令人非常恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridaySerg_00044A3E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was born from the same putrid stock as Marko, so villainy is in his bloodlines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和马尔科属于属于同一路货色，骨子里处处渗透着恐怖和邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridaySerg_00044A3E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why did you come to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你为什么来莫哈维？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaKikuchiOrderD_000558F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you start up this saloon? What's the story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么开始这间沙龙的？能不能告诉我你的故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not much to say. I came into some money, so I fixed up this building and turned it into a saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的。我赚了些钱，于是找人把这个房子修了修，然后就成现在这个样子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaKikuchiBackgr_0005D2A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the caravans and prospectors passing through, I've been able to get a lot of business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有大量商队或旅客从这里路过，所以我有机会谈大笔的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaKikuchiBackgr_0005D2A9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for me, you could say I was a drifter for a while. I'll leave it at that. Some things are better left unsaid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我，你可以称呼我是个流浪汉。有些旧事我不想提，把它们忘了反而会比较好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaKikuchiBackgr_0005D2A9_3.ogg

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedStay_00044A26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I should do this by myself, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我自己来就行了，医生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right... I'm usually cool in all my dealings, but I fear my anger will get the better of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你说得对……我通常很多事情都能冷静地处理，但也许就这件事情我的愤怒已经毁坏了我的理智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedSepa_00044A27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it will give me satisfaction to see Johnny die. Are you certain you want to do this alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，只要能看到乔尼的死，我依然会很欣慰。你确定你一个人没问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedSepa_00044A27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's well enough. I'll be at the saloon if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行了，如果你需要我的话，你能在这个沙龙里找到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedSepa_00056753_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure. I work better alone, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定。而且我一个人能干得更出色。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's how you want to handle it, alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这确实是你偏爱的方式，好，我很期待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocSeparateSu_00044A29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I changed my mind. I want to stick together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了，我希望和你合作。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocSeparateUn_00044A28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Marko?
He is an ill-bred, flagitious cur bent on pillaging and destruction. Despite his bucolic origins, he possesses considerable intelligence and cunning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的人性异常扭曲，穷凶极恶，丧尽天良。尽管他的出身于乡下，但他有惊人的智慧和狡诈的心机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayMark_00044A3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw him on one occasion in the town of Dalhart, a dusty stopover on the plains. He was trading in hides and chattel, an accepted practice there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在达尔哈特的一个小镇上见过他。那是位立于中部平原的某个灰尘肆意的小镇。他正在交易皮革和奴隶，看起来和一般人没什么区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayMark_00044A3C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His eyes said it all - he had a stare that was more barren and dehumanized than that irradiated steppe. He was young, but I knew what he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他的眼睛袒露了一切——他的双眼透露着死寂的凶光，比那些受辐射腐蚀的双眼看起来还要人性泯灭。他看起来很年轻，但我能看得透他内心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayMark_00044A3C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has long since been a pestilence in those parts, though I estimate he is aging by now. It's been... thirty years since I saw him that time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从各个方面来看，他都称得上是一种致命的瘟疫。他现在应该也已经不小了，距上次我见到他……已经过去30年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayMark_00044A3C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the law doesn't catch him, then time will, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果法律最终无法惩罚他的话，时间会的，我的朋友，因为时间对任何人都是公平的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayMark_00044A3C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two hundred years and you still haven't killed him? What gives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 200多年了你始终未能杀死他，为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've killed each other several times over, if you're measuring pain. He had experience with a pistol, and was able to outduel me... at first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果仅用痛苦来衡量的话，那么我们双方已经相互杀死对方多次了。起初，他曾用一把手枪，在决斗中占了我的优势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, it was just a game... he'd leave me broken and bleeding in some remote spot. But in time the games stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对时间而言，这只是场游戏……他令我的人生破碎残缺，独自滴淌着痛苦的鲜血。但是游戏，总会有结束的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was around 2190, I think... we were somewhere in Texas, someplace where they still had trees, near Louisiana.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约在2190年左右，我们大概在德克萨斯的某个地方，那里长满了树，好像还靠近路易斯安那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I caught him coming out of the saloon, but it wasn't some craven ambush. I looked him in the eyes first, and then I put a .357 slug in his gut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正好看见他从一家沙龙里出来，而那次并不是什么伏击。看到他的第一眼我就掏出了.357左轮朝他肚子开了一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He mangled my arm, and managed to get away, thanks to his gang. We've faced off at least a dozen times since then, but never with any resolution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他躲开了，然后压断了我的胳膊，成功跑掉了。那之后我们有打过几次照面，但一次也没有解决掉我们之间的矛盾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the last few years he's been running a gang outside the NCR and Legion's respective territories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的这几年时间，他拉帮结伙，组成了自己的一个帮派，但行动范围始终在NCR和军团的领地之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, with the regional power players and the Judge gone, there is opportunity for a ruthless prick like Johnny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，随着一些近期一些强有势力的人物的死亡，如审判官，对乔尼来说，他现在会感到心头有根刺一样，因为随时可能会要了他的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I know how he thinks. He'll be here, sooner rather than later. If not for the power, than for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我知道他会怎么想。他迟早会来到这个地方的。如果不是为了别的什么事，那就一定是为了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever get a lead on him, look me up. I'd do anything to get another shot at him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你找到指向他的线索，一定记得跟我说，我一定要亲手在他脑袋上射个洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayGene_00044A32_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Johnny Rounder. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了乔尼·朗德。我来取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me just verify that... yeah, that's his. That's a hell of a relief, kid. Good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来确定一下……额，没问题了。我感到一身轻松，孩子，干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, before you go celebrating, there's another matter. Last night a blood-drenched maniac ran into a ranger station and reported a "massacre".
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，在你庆祝之前，有件事要跟你说一下。昨天晚上，有一个血淋淋的疯子闯进一个游骑兵巡逻站，报告说发生了一场“大屠杀”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tipped us off about a hidden bunker that supposedly belongs to the infamous Mr. Fisk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他张口结舌地告诉了我们一个隐蔽的地堡，那个地堡隶属于一个无耻之徒，菲斯克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the guy insists that some badass gang entered the bunker and cleaned it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，那个家伙坚持说，一伙人闯了进去，把那里翻了个底朝天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stated that the assailants left him alive to announce their deed. I'm suspicious of this whole affair, so I want you to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说，那些袭击者留他的狗命，就是为了让他去宣扬那场地堡里的血灾。我个人对这整件事情抱怀疑态度，所以我希望你能去调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're not doing this out of the goodness of your heart, so we'll make it an even one hundred in exchange for meaningful evidence. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不会无缘无故去做些不计后果的事，为了看起来公平些，我们会为每一件证据付你100个瓶盖。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInRounder_00044A58_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaJohnnyRounderFinger 1 setstage aaSecondary21 190
startquest aaSecondary22 setstage aaSecondary22 5 set SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 to SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 + 1
Since I'm going after him, do you have any more information on Johnny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我要去追踪他，那么你有没有一些关于他的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's certainly not lacking in manual celerity, but since I wounded him that time, he can't summon enough courage to face me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的身手虽然依旧敏捷，但自从我那次伤了他之后，他再也不会有勇气单独面对我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedMore_00044A40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, it would be a fatal error to underestimate him. When the time for action arrives, festina lente.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，任何对他的实力的低估都会造成致命的失误。记住，一旦时机成熟之时，就要立刻抓住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedMore_00044A40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no stranger to violence, so you'll be fine once the shooting starts. You take care of the gang members, and I'll dispatch Johnny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对暴力已经并不陌生，所以一旦战斗开始你不会感到无所是从。你去好好照顾其他帮派分子，我来亲自对付乔尼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedMore_00044A40_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I retrieved your brother's badge from Johnny Rounder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从乔尼·朗德那里拿回了你兄弟的警徽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thought I would see this again. I've never had many friends, courier, but I'd be honored to be yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未梦想过我还能再见到它！我并没有多少朋友，邮差，但能成为你的朋友是我一辈子的荣幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayRetu_00044A56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeitem aaFridayBadge 1 setobjectivecompleted aaSecondary21 20 1
if aaDocFridayQuest.bDocHireable != 1 Set aaScullDialogue.DocBefriended to 1 set aaDocFridayQuest.bDocHireable to 1 showmessage aaDocBefriendedMessage endif
I don't have to explain myself to anyone, asshole. Get out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没必要向任何人解释，混蛋。滚开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vipers don't move for nobody, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮不会为任何人让路，婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Luther, with the local Viper crew. We got hired by Mr. Fisk to work as muscle, since things were getting hairy around here, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是卢瑟，我们是这当地的毒蛇帮成员。自从这一带开始变得有些混乱起来，我们便被菲斯克先生雇佣做打手，你知道不？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I show up and all I see is Mr. Fisk and his workers all deader than dogshit, and you just nosing around the joint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出现在这里，因为我看见菲斯克和他的人全都死得比狗还惨，而你正在这附近晃悠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C0B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't gonna ask again. Who are you, and what the fuck are you doing here? Better yet, start explaining why Mr. Fisk is dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再问第二遍。你是谁，你他妈到底在这里干什么？最好给我解释清楚，为什么菲斯克先生死了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C0B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sent here to investigate Mr. Fisk's murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被派来调查杀死菲斯克先生的凶手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh really? That's a load of shit, I say. Mr. Fisk promised us a nice payday, so I think I'm gonna to cut it out of your hide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是吗？今天真你妈操蛋。菲斯克先生本来要支付我们一大笔佣金，看来我只能扒下你的皮来代替了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just an innocent contractor. I'm not looking for trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是个无辜的执行人。我不是来找茬的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't any innocent contractors, fucknuts. Wait a minute... I know who you are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么无辜不无辜的，笨蛋。哦，等等……我知道你是谁了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're that cocksucker who killed Slade! I'm gonna enjoy this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个杀死斯雷德的混蛋！我要替他报仇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... I mean, I don't know... shit, Mr. Fisk is even trickier than I thought. Ok, we'll meet him there. Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊……哦，原来……草，菲斯克这家伙原来比我想象的还鬼。好了，我会去的，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just a body double. Mr. Fisk wants you to meet him at the Tribal Village out west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到的只是个替身，菲斯克先生要你在部落村庄的西面见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the biggest bunch of bullshit I've ever heard. I think I'm gonna cut out your lying tongue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是满嘴的狗屎，谎话连篇。我恨不得立刻就把你的舌头割下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luther [02047BFA] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2B]aaSecondary22) The Head That Wears a Crown EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary22Lu_00047C10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, it was the Fiends... they did it. I'm just a prospector, honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，是恶魔帮的人……是他们干的。我只是个路人，我是来打酱油的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone at the bunker is dead. I found this harmonica lodged in Fisk's mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地堡里所有的人都死了。不过我在菲斯克的嘴里发现了这个口琴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm... I recognize this. Damn, this is bad news, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩……我认识这个口琴。天，这可不是什么好消息，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured that someone might knock off Fisk, but I hadn't planned on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计的确有人想置他于死地，但至少我没有这么想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This harmonica belongs to Sergio Booth, hence the initials. He always leaves these things in the mouths of high-profile victims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个口琴是属于塞尔吉奥·布斯的。他总是在那些他的受害者嘴里塞上一个口琴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's fast, ruthless, and unpredictable. And now he's here, goddammit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他身手敏捷、残忍无情，行为举止不可预测。现在他竟然在这一带，上帝啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Fisk gone and the NCR occupied with a war, Sergio has a real opportunity to sieze control of the local raiders and crime syndicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着菲斯克的死和NCR陷入战争的深渊，塞尔吉奥现在面前摆着一个大烂摊子，他如果能把握住机会，整个地区的土匪和罪犯都将会处于他的掌控之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm worried that Sergio's presence might be tied to another pressing matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很担心，塞尔吉奥的出现可能与另一桩事件有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just recently Lt. Ramsey went out to recon Valle del Hierro. It's a newfound hub for raiders that's tucked away in the Sheep Range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近拉姆齐中尉奉命前往侦察瓦尔德耶罗。那是在绵羊山脉新建的一个土匪剧集中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What really has me worried was Ramsey's last message. He seemed to believe he'd sighted Sergio up there. I was skeptical at the time, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正令我奇怪的是拉姆齐最后的留言。他似乎相信自己在那里目击到了塞尔吉奥。现在我对此感到非常怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no doubt about it now, though. Sergio's here, and he's probably set up shop in that cesspool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有一点毫无疑问，塞尔吉奥一定去过那个焚化池般的地堡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Ramsey, I'm fearing the worst. If that's indeed the case, please get his dog tags.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于拉姆齐，我担心可能会发生最坏的后果。如果真是这样的话，请帮我带回他的狗牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd advise you to pack plenty of ammo, supplies, and a few well-armed companions. I wish I could spare men, but it's out of the question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你去之前带上充足的弹药和补给，还有全副武装的队友。我希望能腾出点人手借给你，但可惜这已经超过了我的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the old days we would've run in there guns blazing, and then hanged the ringleader on site. Now, with this damn war we can't do shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是以前的话，我们一定会一起大干一场，并当场吊死这帮混蛋。但现在，这场可恶的战争已经让我们有些精疲力尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the risk, you have to take Sergio down. I'm authorizing a reward of two thousand caps for his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管要冒多少风险，你一定要结果了这个塞尔吉奥。我被获准可以为他的手指支付2000个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the money ain't enough, then there's something else. Sergio is rumored to be the half-brother of Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得钱不够的话，我还有一件事要告诉你。塞尔吉奥据说是马尔科的半个同胞兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you had dealings with Steven Randall before, and there's a lot of bad blood with Marko. I've seen you with that old pistol of Randall's, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你以前和斯蒂芬·兰道尔一起共事过，你一定听说过关于马尔科的那些令人发指的罪行。你现在身上一定有兰道尔的那把老手枪吧，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_15.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of hard men have pursued Marko, and they all came up empty-handed, and most of them died in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多人曾追踪过马尔科，但大部分最终都是两手空空，甚至有些中途就下落不明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_16.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's alive, then Sergio is your best shot at finding him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他还活着，那么塞尔吉奥一定是你最好的突破口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_17.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, two thousand caps and a shot at finding Marko. If that ain't incentive enough, you need to change occupations. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，2000个瓶盖附加寻找马尔科的线索，如果这还不能令你满意，那你差不多可以换个工作了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFoundHar_00047C14_18.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100 player.removeitem aaFiskHarmonica 1 setstage aaSecondary22 190
Who am I? I'm a guy who kills those fucks from Caesar's Legion every chance I get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁？利用一切机会杀死每一个来自凯撒军团的人，这就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhoAreY_0004AD69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Lieutenant John Ramsey. Don't call me John, LT, or any other shit. To you, I'm just "Lieutenant".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是中尉约翰·拉姆齐。不要喊我约翰、LT或其他什么狗屁东西。告诉你，我就叫“中尉”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhoAreY_0004AD6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's none of your fucking business.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhyYouH_0004AD6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insubordination. Striking a superior officer. Conduct unbecoming. That about sums it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是为了反抗。抗议一位高级官员。贸然指挥等一系列错误行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhyYouH_0004AD6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The limp-dick CO at my last duty station had it coming. That incompetent fuck was getting my men killed, so I acted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个鸡巴在我上次执行任务时导演了这一切。就是因为那个发育不全的老二，我的人才倒下了那么多，草，所以我才这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhyYouH_0004AD6E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brass would have shit all over me if they could, but old Scull put in a good word, and my combat record means something in wartime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个狗屎一样的军官对我侮辱至极，但老斯科尔劝慰我，至少我的战斗记录编写得不偏不倚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhyYouH_0004AD6E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They can chew you up, but sooner or later they have to spit you out, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上头那些人时而能把你捧上天堂，迟早又能把你打入地狱，你说对不对？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyWhyYouH_0004AD6E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there a reason you're so angry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你这么生气的原因？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me if I'm a little... abrasive, but I'm not used to being in the same room with Legion-loving cunts who ask stupid questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我有点……粗暴了。但我不太习惯和喜欢军团并总是问一些傻逼问题的笨蛋们呆在同一间屋子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyAngry_0004AD6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'm hurting your feelings, just take your sensitive ass back to that fucked up little fort and start sucking Caesar's shriveled cock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得我伤了你的感情，那就把你的屁股收回到那个城堡里，继续去草凯撒的鸡巴好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyAngry_0004AD6B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be sure you don't catch a disease, seeing as to how the Legion isn't very keen on medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要确保你别得病就行，军团显然对医学毫不重视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyAngry_0004AD6B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what else could you expect from a bunch of stubborn, root-sucking jackasses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但对那帮脑子有病、顽固不化的蠢驴来说，你又能期待什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyAngry_0004AD6B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a hint: I'm in a half-assed duty station handling drunks, fuckups, and criminals when I should be with a combat unit. Reason enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你个提示：我就是个傻逼、二百五、蠢货、罪犯，我本来应该属于作战单位，却被扔到了这个鬼地方。够了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyAngry_0004AD71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I grew up in New Mexico. I've got nothing else to say, so don't ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我在新墨西哥长大。我不想再跟你废话了，别再问我什么无聊的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyYourSto_0004AD73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not from California. I grew up in hell, courtesy of Caesar and his shitty legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不是加利福尼亚。我在地狱一样的环境中成长，需要时刻保持对凯撒和他那狗屎军团的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyYourSto_0004AD74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but you don't strike me as an officer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并无冒犯之意，但请别以看待军官的眼光看我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the butter bars, I'm still an enlisted man in my heart of hearts. I earned a battlefield commission a few years back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了这个奶油酒吧，我的内心还是一名刚应征入伍的军人。几年前我终于在战场上赢得了我的荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just happened to be one of the last surviving souls at a place called Firebase Zulu. It's a remote outpost south of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那个名叫祖鲁火场的地方，我很幸运成了唯一幸存下来的人。那个地方离莫哈维非常远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Colonel was another political appointment with his head up his ass. Patrols and reconnaissance warned him for weeks, but he was oblivious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 负责指挥的上校是个屁股比脑袋还聪明的家伙。巡逻队和侦察兵多次就形势向他提出警告，但他都置若罔闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That CO even detailed engineers to install creature comforts in his bunker, when they should have been fortifying the perimeter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他竟然要求工程师们在地堡里安装生物休闲设施，而这些工程师本来应该被派去加固并扩建堡垒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He insisted that we were in a "Reinforced observation post". Of course, when the Legion did hit us, it was a goddamn nightmare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他坚持说“我们待的地方已经是个加强型侦察哨站”。当然，一旦军团发起进攻，一切都会变成泡沫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a night assault, and they were so damned fast. We were practically overrun in a matter of moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个漆黑的夜晚，他们出现得如此迅速，我们在瞬间就被全部瓦解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD70_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess - I don't wear a red skirt and enjoy kicking the shit out of women and slaves, so that rules me out as officer material, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜——我从不穿红色的衬衫，从不亲妓女和奴隶的屁股，然后就被长官排挤掉了，对不对？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For your information, I earned the rank because I killed dozens of your Legion friends, and I was happy to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据你的信息，我之所以获得这个军衔，是因为我操掉了几十个你军团的朋友，是吧？如果真是这样，我也挺高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0004AD72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucko, I'm not telling you shit. I don't ask about your dirty secrets, or say, that scar on your head. Why? Because it's none of my damn business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 草，我才懒得理你。我才不会对你的那些秘密感兴趣，或是你脸上的伤疤的来历。为什么？因为那跟我没有任何狗屁关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the big deal? I just want to know who I'm working with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么大不了的？我只是想熟悉一下我将要一起合作的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I grew up in a small village in New Mexico. It was up in the mountains, where we were relatively safe from other tribes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我在新墨西哥的小镇长大。那里群山蔓延，生活倒也悠然安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was only five or so when the Legion swept in. My father died quickly along with the other fighting men in the tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我约5岁左右，军团闯入了我的生活。我的父亲和村落里其他勇于反抗的人全都阵亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mother was raped and then killed for resisting her attackers. My older brother was taken, but he was deemed worthy of service, not slavery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的母亲先是被强奸，随后因为反抗强奸被杀害。我的哥哥被带走了，但他是以随从的身份走得，而不是奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sickly at the time, so they pressed me into slavery. They told me to show "Honestas, Industria, et Prudentia."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我那时体质虚弱，因此他们把我当做奴隶。他们一遍又一遍地告诉我，“劳动，勤劳，忍耐”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was forced to work the fields and livestock. I can't tell you how many of them died out there, working to feed the damn Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被迫在田里种地，和放养牲畜。我无法告诉在那里究竟死了多少人，他们为了养活那帮军团才浪费生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember what the overseer would say to us after someone died: "To keep you is no benefit. To destroy you is no loss."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得在某人死后监督头对我们说：“我们没有任何义务养着你，你的死也不会对我们造成任何损失。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0004AD77_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm putting my ass on the line out there, so I just want to know who I'm working with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里的生活就是命悬一线。我想对你了解更多一些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a problem with bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和赏金猎人之间有矛盾么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Maybe not. Maybe fuck yourself. If Captain Scull would let me off the hook, I'd kill every one of these bastard criminals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有，也许没有。草，如果斯科尔上尉让我滚蛋，我就把这帮混蛋全部杀掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyBountyP_0004AD79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking to talk shop, just hit me up. I write and update the files for those scumbags you're chasing, so I can give you information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你只是聊聊，那你找我好了。我为那些你在追逐的猎物收集和整理资料，所以我有很多你需要的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyBountyP_0004AD79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you think I have a problem with bounty hunters, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你坚信我和赏金猎人有矛盾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyBountyP_0004AD79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing the Mongol Kid. Do you have any information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪蒙格尔·基德。你有没有关于他的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of it is already in the official dossier, but here's my two cents: The Mongol Kid is a pussy who couldn't hack it in the Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分信息都已记录在官方档案里了，但我这还有点印象：蒙格尔·基德是可汗帮里不太好对付的一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoMon_0004AD7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put some buckshot in his kneecaps and that big bitch will come crawling in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朝他的膝盖骨开机强，那个婊子就会呻吟般地跪在你面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoMon_0004AD7B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Albert Quisling. Do you have any extra information?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪艾伯特·奎斯琳。你还有什么可以告诉我的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. Officially, you're supposed to keep him alive at all costs, since he has valuable intel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个就没有了。就官方态度而言，我们需要你不惜一切代价活捉他，因为他掌握有大量有价值的情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoQui_0004AD7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unofficially... I hope you shoot that traitorous motherfucker between the eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就非官方态度来说……我希望你在那个婊子两眼之间来上那么一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoQui_0004AD7D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't play dumb, Courier. You know damn well who I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别装傻，小邮差。你清楚我的底细。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhoAreYou_0004CD84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Sergio, or as everyone used to know me, "Marko's little brother". That's gonna change here, starting in this town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是塞尔吉奥，或者正像以前人们称呼我的那样，“马尔科的小弟”。有些事情到了需要改变的时候了，就从这个小镇开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhoAreYou_0004CD84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want what's mine, and then some. I've paid my dues, Courier, and nobody's gonna stand in my way now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我的，就是我的，谁也别想拿走。我已经付了我应付的，现在，没人能挡在我面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatYouWan_0004CD88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna run this town, and I'll make more money than Fisk or The Judge ever dreamed of, mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个小镇现在归我管，我会赚比菲斯克和审判官更多更多的钱，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatYouWan_0004CD88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as for my brother... I couldn't give a fuck. Soon enough they'll be forgetting Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我的老哥...我才不管呢。不久，他们就会忘了叫马尔科的这个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatYouWan_0004CD88_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to build something, Courier. This is going to be a haven for commerce, unmolested by the NCR or Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个庞大的重建计划。这里将成为一个没有NCR和军团的商业的天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll provide security, sanctuary, and a free market on anything, without restrictions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以提供保安、教堂，还有一个可以自由交易、没有限制的市场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Valle del Hierro will be a flourishing, independent entity in the Wastes, not beholden to the NCR or Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓦尔德耶罗将会成为这片废土上独立的、繁荣的新时代奇迹，让NCR和军团望尘莫及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD85_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough. Your move, creep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够你的胡言乱语了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy aaSergioRaiderFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy aaSergioFaction PlayerFaction startcombat player
[Taunt] You're that half-assed sidekick for Marko, right? Is he gonna show up and save you again?
ESP.TRADUIT: [侮辱] 你永远活在马尔科的影子下，你和他根本没法比。要不要喊他再来救你一次？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy aaSergioRaiderFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy aaSergioFaction PlayerFaction startcombat player
All I see is a haven for slavers and raiders, and one guy who wants to control it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所看见的，只不过是一个奴隶主和强盗的天堂，还有一个一心想控制它的家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make no mistake - I do control it. And nobody, and I mean nobody is going to take it away from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没说错，这里的确完全归我掌控。没人，我是说谁也别想，把这个地方从我手里夺走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fisk was weak, and he doubted my potential. He said I'd never be more than a... than a sidekick. You saw what happened to that fat fuck, I suspect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 菲斯克太软弱了，他甚至质疑我的未来。他说我永远只能是个小伙计。哼，我猜你已经看到他的下场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD87_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm here, and this crew is ready to die for me and my dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我现在成功地站在这里，我的这些人……他们随时准备……为了我和我的梦想，献出自己的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWhatDoingH_0004CD87_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want with me?
There is such a thing as being too successful, believe it or not. Bounty hunters are nothing unusual, but none have shared your effectiveness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你信不信，有些事情可以变得相当成功。干赏金猎人这一行的家伙通常都与众不同，但从没有一个人像你这样务实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though he was a perverted madman, the Judge served a purpose, along with so many others you've purged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官，尽管他是个扭曲的疯子，但通过与他人合作，执着地追寻着他自己的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't offer you bribes or false appendages. I lured you here so that everyone will see you die by my hand, in this street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会向你提供什么贿赂或附属。我之前把你引诱过来，就是想为了在这条大街上让所有的人都看到你死在我的手心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll admit that I'm slightly ambivalent, as you've removed some potential rivals, and demonstrated real dedication to your craft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我现在不得不承认，我的内心开始矛盾起来，你为你自己移除了一个潜在的对手，并且展示了你灵活的生存手腕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of those in your business are shiftless, changeable rogues, apt to accept bribes or susceptible to intimidation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干你这一行的通常都毫无志向、胆小善变、内心没有原则、一个控制不住就全身塌陷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed plenty, and paid off a few. It's an honor to finally test my skills against a thoroughbred like yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了很多人，也报复了很多人。但通过对付你这种高尚的家伙来检验我的技巧，对我来说这是一种荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In more civilized times, I'd put you to work for me, but we're all victims of this barbaric age, I'm afraid. Anything else before we start the music?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是在文明的时代，我一定会请你为我工作，但可惜现在的时代兵荒马乱。在镇魂曲吹响前，你还有什么要说的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioWantMe_0004CD8C_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Steven Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知不知道斯蒂芬·兰道尔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brother only mentioned him once. He described what he had to do in order to be initiated into a certain raider crew, The Vandals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的兄弟跟我提到过他一次。他说，为了加入那个强盗团伙——汪达尔，他不得不那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioRandall_0004CD8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was only a child then, and I don't remember much. All I can tell you is that it was terrible, even for my brother's standards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会儿我还是个小孩，我记得不是很清楚。我能告诉你的只有，那件事的发生对他来说也是相当糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioRandall_0004CD8F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko did many things to people. Just remember: I am not my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科对人干的事数也数不清。不过你只要记住：我是我，我不是我的兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioRandall_0004CD8F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't you like to know? You'd probably go after him, wouldn't you? I can tell you where he's at - the end of a long and storied career.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想知道？你像去调查他的踪迹？我可以告诉你他在哪——他就在你生命的尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioMarko_0004CD90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We separated some time ago, believe it or not. We've got different styles, to put it mildly. Oh I've killed my share, but him, he's taken it further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是很久以前分开的，不管你信不信。简单地说，我们的做事风格完全不同。我已经到此为止了，而他……他走得比我还远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioMarko_0004CD90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's probably grown tired of those open plains by now. He preyed on commerce for years, sucking life out of those isolated city-states.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他大概已经对那些宽广的平原感到厌烦了。他对生意的渴望倒是已经持续了很多年，也希望在那些孤立的城市里继续放纵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioMarko_0004CD90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He could end up back East... Your guess is as good as mine, courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他大概会在东方结束自己的一生……你的猜测其实和我的差不多，小邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioMarko_0004CD90_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you put Lt. Ramsey on display?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么对拉姆齐中尉这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He killed seven of my people before he succumbed to his wounds. Since he died quickly, there was no reason to torture him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在屈从于死亡前干掉了我7个人。既然他死那么快，也没有必要折磨他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioLtRamsey_0004D06F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gary wanted to please his patrons, so he suggested they leave Lt. Ramsey as a trophy outside the saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加里希望能取悦他的顾客，所以他建议把那个你说叫拉姆齐的家伙当做奖杯立在沙龙外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioLtRamsey_0004D06F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is remarkable what businesses will do in order to attract customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得说，这种做法相当显著，吸引来了大量顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioLtRamsey_0004D06F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Sergio. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了塞尔吉奥。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that finger... well, you did it, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我来看看……啊，你办到了，真的，你居然办到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As happy that I am to know that Sergio is dead, I still hold myself responsible for Lt. Ramsey's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我很高兴看到他死了，但我还是要为拉姆齐中尉的死负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, you earned every bit of this reward. I don't know how you did it... but you're the best goddamn bounty hunter I ever saw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不论如何，这是你所有应得的报酬。我不知道你怎么办到的……但你绝对是我见过的最他妈牛逼的赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And just because Sergio is gone doesn't mean I don't have work for you. There are still smaller bounties scattered through the territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，塞尔吉奥的死并不意味着你的工作到此结束。外面依旧还有一些悬赏在等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, we're at the frontier, and there's no telling who could drift in here next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，我们现在已经处于前线了，没人知道下星期谁会来这，谁又会走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not really my business, but I hope you found some information on Marko. He's been running from justice for far too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这不关我的事，但我还是真心希望你能找到有关马尔科的信息。他远离公正审判的时间已经太长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever want to collect a bounty or just shoot the shit, drop in anytime. We ain't going anywhere. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你又领了什么赏金任务或捕获到悬赏的猎物，随时来我这好了。我们就倒在这里，别的地方哪也不去。好了，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInSergioD_0004D648_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 player.removeitem aaSergioFinger 1 player.removeitem aaRamseyDogTag 1

set aaScullDialogue.ScullExtra to 1 aaLarryScullRef.evp set SomeguyMaster.NVBStatus to 3 setstage aaFinal 190 Set aaFinal.CourierGreeted to 1 aaFinalCourierRef.enable aaFinalCourierRef.evp set SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 to SomeguyMaster.Undefined01 + 1
Hell if I know. They don't tell me shit, and the less I know, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道，他们连个屁都不跟我讲。而且知道的越少其实越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaFinalCourierWher_0004E7EE_1.ogg
