ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard that one courier got his brains blown out because he knew too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就听说某个邮递员因为知道的太多脑袋开了花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaFinalCourierWher_0004E7EE_2.ogg
NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaFinalCourierGood_0004E7EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't pay me enough for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早知道就这点工资我才不干呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0204E7E5] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaFinalCourierFuck_0004E7ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, but it won't change a thing. Make your move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，但这什么也改变不了。你先走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioSpeechChec_0004E7F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're so confident, fight me mano a mano.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你够自信的话，就来跟我单挑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be crazy, but I've never been accused of being stupid. No, I'll stick to the plan. Goodbye, courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我或许疯了，但我从来没被人称过懦夫。我才不接受你的提议。再见吧，邮递员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergio [020485E2] (mod) Quest : ([02044A2D]aaFinal) As a Judgment EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaFinal_aaSergioSpeechChec_0004E7F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy aaSergioRaiderFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy aaSergioFaction PlayerFaction startcombat player
I killed Emmett Curry. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了埃米特·卡里。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that old finger... goddamn, that smells putrid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看这个手指……草，震奇臭无比！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInEmmettC_0004E804_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, that's Emmett Curry's. It looks like the Vipers are down another gunman, I suppose. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这就是埃米特·卡里的了。看起来毒蛇刚又少了一个会耍枪的人，我猜。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInEmmettC_0004E804_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaEmmettCurryFinger 1 setstage aaEpilogue01 190
There's a bounty on your head. I want you to turn yourself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是悬赏目标。我要你立刻自首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, so the NCR can make a spectacle out of me? I might as well be crucified by Caesar. I'm not going to be an object of fun for those fat cats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，这样NCR就可以公开审判我了？我会像耶稣一样被钉死在十字架上的！我才不去成为一堆“肥猫”玩乐侮辱的对象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F3AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on your head, dead or alive. I was planning on the dead option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是赏金目标，既可以是死的，也可以是活的。我偏好前者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty have tried, kid, but none have succeeded. Give me your best shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人已经尝试过了，孩子，但没有人成功过。拿出你的真本领吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F3AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing in Valle del Hierro dressed like that? I'm surprised the locals tolerate you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干什么？在瓦尔德耶罗穿成这副鬼样？我很惊奇这里的人居然对你如此容忍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let the attire fool you, kid. You don't have to dress like a buffoon to get respect in this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要以貌取人，孩子。在这个地方，即使你穿得像朵花一样，也不一定会有人尊重你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They know my name, and that's enough. Besides, I didn't come here to exchange pleasantries with the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们知道我的名字，那就足够了。此外，我来这而不是来跟人开玩笑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had heard that Sergio was recruiting gunmen from all over, so I thought I'd see what was available.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说塞尔吉奥在各个地方招募枪手，所以我来试试有没有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now he's dead, and apparently I've made myself vulnerable by drifting so close to NCR territory again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他已经死了，我离NCR的领地又那么近，现在的处境非常尴尬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's your plan? Are you gonna try to gun me down like you did Sergio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算接下来做什么？想干掉塞尔吉奥一样把我也干掉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way of knowing for certain, I suppose. I deserve a lot worse than anything the NCR can dish out, to tell you the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不可能明白所有的事情。实话跟你说，与NCR比，我完全是另一类的产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to end up dying on the streets of some dusty shithole like Sergio. There's always some young punk eager to take you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想像塞尔吉奥那样死在肮脏的大街上。你听着，总有一天，有些家伙会来要你的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think on that, bounty hunter. You might be kingshit today, but pretty soon... you're gonna bite off more than you can chew. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是这么想的吧，赏金猎人。你今天或许走了狗屎运，但不久……你会自讨苦吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F68F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaGeorgeHardinRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 set aaEpilogue02.HardinCaptured to 1 aaGeorgeHardinRef.setav aggression 0 aaGeorgeHardinRef.evp
I won't make any promises about the NCR's justice system, but consider the alternative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法对NCR的司法系统做出任何保证，但这由你自己决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not the first time I've been fed that line of bullshit. No, I think my pistol gives me better odds than any goddamn jury, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我第一次听到这种废话了。不，我宁愿信任我手里的枪，也不信任什么狗屁陪审团，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : George Hardin [0204F39A] (mod) Quest : ([0204F388]aaEpilogue02) A History of Violence EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue02Har_0004F690_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you turn yourself in you'll receive a fair trial by jury. You have my word on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你自首的话，你会被减轻惩罚。我向你保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: George Hardin turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔治·哈丁自首了。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So he did. I don't know what you said to talk him down, but when he walked in my first inclination was to reach for my pistol, collar be damned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，他的确来了。你究竟施了什么魔法？不过他进来后的第一反应就是去抢我的枪。草，这个破项圈怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGeorgeH_0004F694_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really care what you said, though, because it worked. That solemn bastard didn't say two words when we processed him and shipped him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管咋样，它还是起作用了。那个倒霉鬼一句话也没说就倒下了，后来我们把他拖了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGeorgeH_0004F694_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite the body count, I believe he was sentenced to life without parole, if you can believe that. I'd hang every one of them, if I could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是这件事，我相信他也至少一定会被判终身监禁不得保释，如果你也相信的话。如果能力允许，我恨不得亲手吊死每一个这样的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGeorgeH_0004F694_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000 player.additem aabountycollar 1 setstage aaEpilogue02 190
I killed George Hardin. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了乔治·哈丁。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGeorgeH_0004F695_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess nothing should surprise me after everything you've pulled. You're a goddamn machine. I'm just happy you're working with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从你做了那一切之后，你再也没有什么能令我感到惊讶的了。你真是个高效率运转的机器！我很高兴你没有为别人工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInGeorgeH_0004F695_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaGeorgeHardinFinger 1 setstage aaEpilogue02 190
I'm pursuing John Alvord. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪约翰·奥尔沃德。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Alvord manages to get the jump on most everyone - that's how he robs so many caravans without accumulating bodies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·奥尔沃德的身手比常人要厉害很多。这就是他抢劫了大量的商队却总不会留下尸体的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJoh_00052A91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to shit yourself when he surprises you. And he will surprise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量不要在他吓你的时候被他吓着。不过他的确会吓着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJoh_00052A91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Prometheus. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪普罗米修斯。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's big, bad, and meaner than hell. What else do you need to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他又高又大，向来自地狱的使者。你还想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoPro_00052A93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Marlo Barksdale. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪马洛·巴克斯代尔。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The guy is a natural businessman. Every one of his competitors has been forced into "Early Retirement".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙是个天生的商人。他的每一个竞争对手都被迫“早早退休”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoMar_00052A95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is now the primary dealer for the Fiends, which is nothing to sneeze at. Take him out, and those Fiends will be... fiending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他现在是与恶魔帮做交易的最大的一个中间商，对他决不可轻视。把他干掉，恶魔帮就会……疯掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoMar_00052A95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Brad Jamison. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪布莱德·杰米森。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, you could say his management style is a little harsh, leading to high turnover in that outfit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有。你可以说他的管理方式有点严厉，和那里之前的模式有着翻天覆地的区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoBra_00052A97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bullshit, he's kind of a psycho, and I wouldn't be surprised if his own men up and killed him one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但怎么说呢，他有点偏执狂，如果有一天他的手下奋起反抗把他干掉，我绝不会为此感到惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoBra_00052A97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Palo Peto. Do you have any additional information?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪帕罗·佩托。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much, really. He's some kind of foreigner with a bloodlust, and apparently Cook-cook is his hero. I couldn't make this shit up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是很多。他是个外地人，有着嗜血杀戮的渴望，Cook-cook明显是他心中的英雄。我知道的就这些了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoPal_00052A99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Dynamite Danny. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪“炸药”丹尼。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a retard with a sack of dynamite. He's liable to blow himself up before anyone collects the damn bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个热衷于玩炸药的白痴。他一定会在别人要他命之前，先把自己炸上天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoDyn_00052A9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only reason we have a bounty on that buffoon is because of the rustling. If you fuck up cattle prices, there's gonna be hell to pay. Go figure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙之所以成为悬赏对象的唯一原因，就是他毫无顾忌地偷盗家畜。如果你把牛肉的价格搞得一团糟，那么这个世界就会乱成一锅粥的。好了，快去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoDyn_00052A9B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Pancho Cortina. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪潘乔·科迪纳。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't information, but here's a piece of advice: don't get captured, or he'll cut off your cojones and stick them in your mouth. Have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次我没有任何可以告诉你的，但我有条建议：别被他抓住，否则他会把你的肠子挖出来，然后塞到你嘴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Jacob Powers. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪雅各布·鲍尔。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of these bounties are a joke, but Jacob Powers is a true asshole who deserves to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些赏金目标其实就是些玩笑，但雅各布·鲍尔绝对是属于那种该死的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJac_00052A9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That zombie fuck likes to sneak into homes and kill the parents, then kidnap the kids and haul them back to his little dungeon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个变态喜欢偷偷溜进人家中，杀死夫妇，然后把小孩子绑架到自己的又小又黑的地牢里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJac_00052A9F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He exposes the children to large doses of radiation, and most them die in the process. A handful survive, however, and are assimilated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他把小孩暴露在大量的辐射剂量下，眼睁睁地注视着大部分慢慢死亡。一小部分能活下来，但之后就被他“吸收”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJac_00052A9F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can live with robbers, thieves, and even some of the murderers, but this motherfucker... he's got to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以和强盗、小偷、甚至谋杀犯住一起，但唯独那头僵尸……草，你赶紧把它解决掉吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoJac_00052A9F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Frank Elko. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪弗兰克·埃尔科。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I hadn't taken an oath to the NCR, I believe it's fair to say I might have ended up in the Elko Gang, and here's why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我没有向NCR宣誓，我想在埃尔科帮那里终其一生也是个不错的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoElk_00052AA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't have any wild ideological bent, they aren't cultists, and God knows they aren't random psychos, apt to shoot anything that moves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们没有什么荒蛮的意识倾向，也不是什么文明分子。但只有上帝知道他们是不是瘾君子，为什么热衷滥杀无辜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoElk_00052AA1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All they do is rob caravans so they can keep their party going, and that's it. Sure, they've killed a few mercenaries, but who hasn't?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所作的只有抢劫，抢劫，不停地抢劫商队。我确定，他们大概已经杀了好些个人了。但谁又没有呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoElk_00052AA1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pursuing Arthur Ribben. Do you have any additional information on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪阿瑟·里本。你有没有什么额外的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, you're wasting your time. He's a goddamn myth. Just read the fucking dossier. I had to type in those ridiculous sightings. Trust me. Let it go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在浪费时间。他就是个迷。赶快去读那些卷宗。我还要打这些可笑的备案。相信我，别再缠我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyInfoArt_00052AA3_1.ogg

NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyBye_00053F12_1.ogg

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocFridayBye_00053F11_1.ogg

NPC : Kikuchi [02039F1A] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaKikuchiBye_000558F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: California, originally. But it's been a long time since I've seen it. I grew up in the Tehachapi Mountains. It's a beautiful, peaceful place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加利福尼亚，我出生的地方。自从我上次见到它已经过去很长时间了。我在蒂哈查皮山长大，那是个风景如画的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhereFro_0005532C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My old man was a rancher, and made a good living at it, too. He wanted me to get in the family business, but I was young and foolish, so I left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲是个大牧场主，我们全家过着衣食无忧的生活。我父亲希望我也尽快帮助管理生意上的事，但我还小，太愚蠢了，于是我离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhereFro_0005532C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I wish I'd stayed up in those mountains, fat and happy with some farmer's daughter at my side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我多么希望当时能留下来，生活在那美丽的群山之中，没事还能带着附近的女孩在仓库里玩双人运动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhereFro_0005532C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But who the fuck am I kidding? I could never stand to be in one place for too long. Besides, I'd have blown the family fortune on whores and booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这么想又有什么用呢？我根本受不了在同一个地方呆的时间太长。而且，我因为太多的放纵已经耗尽了家里的财富。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhereFro_0005532C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brother stayed on to run the farm, but I ain't heard from him in years. He's a bossy little fuck, so I'd have probably shot him if I went back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的兄弟留下来维持着农场，但我已经好久没听见他的消息了。他的脾气像头倔牛，要是我回去见到他了，没准会一枪把他崩掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullWhereFro_0005532C_5.ogg
NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I Got raised rough, ended up in a jam, so I joined up. Drank too much, pissed off some pussyfied top, landed in this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小时候生活很不顺，成年了还是老样子。每天没事喝喝酒，泡泡妞，然后在那个洞里一泻千里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinYourSt_00055330_1.ogg

NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinYourSt_00055330_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever been called an asshole?
Do you have problem with me?
Sorry, I didn't mean anything by it. I just want to know the people I work with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我不是有意的，我只是想了解一下和我合作的家伙。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_aaEthanBye_00056758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feared that's what happened. I couldn't imagine her surviving all those years. She was such a gentle girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所担心的就是这个。我无法想象，这么多年了她还能活着。她是如此文雅的一个女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyDea_00056778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for looking into it, and for bringing Red Bear to justice. Here's a little something I was saving for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你帮助我寻找她，并在红熊身上实现了正义。这里有一点小小的东西要送给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyDea_00056778_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, and thanks for your help. It's time I left these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，谢谢你的帮助。是时候了，我可以放开这一切了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyDea_00056778_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] Polly was sold to Caesar's Legion. She's in Caesar's tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎] 波利被卖到了凯撒军团。她现在在凯撒的帐篷里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, those strutting bastards are holding her? I have to get her back, some way. I don't know how, but, I'll find a way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，那些耀武扬威的混蛋拥有了她？不行，我要立刻把她救出来。虽然我还不知道怎么做，但我一定要找到办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyLeg_0005677C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Polly became a raider under Red Bear. She's working with another crew now. [Give him the note]
ESP.TRADUIT: 波利成了红熊身边的一个土匪。她现在正和她的同伙在一起。[把笔记给他]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit, let me see that note! No... she couldn't have... sonofabitch, it's true. My own niece, turned into a raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡扯，让我看笔记！不……不可能……妈的，这是真的。我的侄女，竟然成了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyTru_0005677D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She can't be a raider. My chest, it's on fire. Do something, you useless fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，她不会变的！我的胸，好疼……做点什么啊，别傻站着……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyTru_0005677D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I uncovered some information on Polly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了一些关于波利的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God, you're serious? Please, just tell me straight - is she dead? Did he sell her? What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝，你是认真的么？请别拐弯抹角，她死了吗？他把她卖了吗？到底发生什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyNew_00056774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] Polly was kidnapped by the Black Mountain supermutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎] 波利被黑山的超级变种人绑架了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Those freaks have her? I... I'll try to save her, I suppose. God help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？那帮畸形绑架了她？我……我要去救她。上帝帮帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ethan [02000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaEthanPollyBla_00056777_1.ogg
NPC : Allen Rogers [02038181] (mod) Quest : ([02038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaSecondar_aaSecondary14Ar_0005B884_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are merely aspirants, and have not proven their worth. In time, they may earn the privilege of speech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们现在还一无是处，还没有证明他们的价值。等时候到了，他们自然会赢得说话的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_0005C6F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once worked for the vile forces of mechanical devilry, serving the gods of a long-dead world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经为一股残酷的机械组织服务，他们看起来是那么冷漠无情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_0005C6F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They called themselves a Brotherhood of Steel, but they are a twisted cadre of rusted ideas and dying ambition, fated to perish as a relic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们称自己为钢铁兄弟会，但他们被自己扭曲的观念和腐朽的野心不断折磨，最后像遗迹一样毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_0005C6F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After many tribulations and much wandering, I recieved an epiphany from the old ones, and henceforth I'm resolved to deliver their message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在经过了数不清的磨难与流浪之后，我得到了神的启示，因此，我下定决心向人们传达神的旨意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aaron Flagg [020131C0] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Fla_0005C6F6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, zombie. [To Doc Friday] No offense, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 草你妈，你个僵尸。[对“星期五”医生] 请勿见怪，医生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with the both of you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary21Fu_0005C700_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaSecondary21.RounderGreeted to 1 setenemy aaDocFridayFaction aaRounderFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction aaDocFridayFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnnyRounderRef.startcombat aaDocFridayRef aaDocFridayRef.startcombat aaJohnnyRounderRef

ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死你一定是一种很美妙的享受，畸形。
我要让这句话成为你的遗言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary21En_0005C6FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaSecondary21.RounderGreeted to 1 setenemy aaDocFridayFaction aaRounderFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction aaDocFridayFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnnyRounderRef.startcombat aaDocFridayRef aaDocFridayRef.startcombat aaJohnnyRounderRef
You trust Sergio? And I just thought you looked dumb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信塞尔吉奥？那我看你就是个大傻瓜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's a complicated deal, with ramifications, and I, well... fuck it, just kill this motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这项协议很复杂，肯定会有分歧，而我，额……草，还是杀了他吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary21Se_0005C701_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaSecondary21.RounderGreeted to 1 setenemy aaDocFridayFaction aaRounderFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction aaDocFridayFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnnyRounderRef.startcombat aaDocFridayRef aaDocFridayRef.startcombat aaJohnnyRounderRef
Unlike you, I don't shoot people in the back. I'm gonna put one right in your filthy face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你不同，我从不在别人背后打黑枪。我要从正面在你脸上来一枪。
那来吧，你个不要脸的家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Johnny Rounder [02044A2A] (mod) Quest : ([0204445C]aaSecondary21) Justice Delayed EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary21Sh_0005C6FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: enableplayercontrols 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 set aaSecondary21.RounderGreeted to 1 setenemy aaDocFridayFaction aaRounderFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction aaDocFridayFaction setenemy aaRounderFaction PlayerFaction aaJohnnyRounderRef.startcombat aaDocFridayRef aaDocFridayRef.startcombat aaJohnnyRounderRef
I don't know anything about you and Doc Friday, but I'm here to collect a bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本不认识你和这位“星期五”医生，我只是来取你俩人头的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We managed to counterattack and push them out of the perimeter, but the casualties were terrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们成功地采取了反攻，并把他们赶出了边界，但我方的伤亡非常惨重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They kept us under siege for seven days until we were relieved. I saw a lot of good men and women die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对我们的包围持续了7天，直到围困被解。我看很多人都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between the snipers, mortars and constant assaults, we dwindled down to less than fifty fighting men, down from three hundred at the start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在狙击手、迫击炮和持续不断地进攻中，我们大量减员，从最初的300多人到只有不到50人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that kind of situation, a Staff Sergeant can become a lieutenant real quick. I certainly wasn't in a position to refuse the promotion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那种恶劣的环境下，一个士官可以迅速升级到中尉。我也当然不会拒绝这样的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that fiasco, I made up my mind to never allow any dumbfuck CO to endanger the lives of my men, come hell or high water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那次惨败之后，我下定决心，以后决不允许任何愚蠢的上司来决定我部下的生死存亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And in the process of sticking it to my last commander, I've found myself in this little shack with the retirees, doing police work, and that's that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持这样的信念，我迎来了我最后一个长官。但我发现我居然被安排到这种小屋子里，身边都是退休的老兵，真是无法忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseyOfficer_0005C704_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on a schedule. Can we finish this another time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我日程表里还有别的安排。我们换个时间再说如何？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since I was growing into a strong lad, the Legion relegated me to logistical support for their frontline troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着我逐渐长大成人，军团把我安排到为前线部队提供后期的部门里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My overseer's unit was tasked with setting up an outpost in territory occupied by the Desert Rangers, but we never made it there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的督头单位被命令在被沙漠游骑兵占领的地区建立一个前哨站，但我们一直没有完成这个任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Rangers ambushed us at night, and like most ambushes, it was a brief, bloody, and one-sided affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些游骑兵在一个夜晚伏击了我们，那个场面非常血腥，战斗局势一边倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the smoke cleared, I saw my old overseer, writhing in the dirt, gutshot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 硝烟散尽，我看到我的督头在血泊中扭动，他中弹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cut out his tongue, eyes, and then I pulled out his insides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我挖出了他的舌头、眼睛，还有他全部内脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As he lay there squirming, I leaned over and whispered, *"Disce pati," into his ear. He had always said that to slaves when he beat them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着他不停颤抖，我俯身，对着他耳边轻轻说：“要学会忍受痛苦。”他在鞭打奴隶的时候经常对她们说这句话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I joined up with the Desert Rangers at the ripe age of fourteen. Not long afterwards we got assimilated into the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我加入了沙漠游骑兵。那一年，我站在14岁的边缘。不久，我们便被吸收进了NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate the work you do, bounty hunter, but I think you can understand why I want to get out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很欣赏你的成就，赏金猎人，但我希望你能明白为什么我急切地想离开这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaRamseySpeechO_0005C709_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on a schedule. Can we finish this another time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我日程表里还有别的安排。我们换个时间再说如何？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Ramsey [02049EB4] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was ok at first - Caesar himself welcomed me. They said I would be given a "critical" position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚开始一切都很顺利，凯撒对我表示欢迎。他们说，会给我一个“很重要”的职位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that "critical" position? Manufacturing healing powder en masse. I was hoping to do real research, or at least do something meaningful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你猜那个职位到底是什么——制造治疗粉……我非常希望能做真正的研究，或至少做些别的有意义的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar initially wanted me to produce chemical weapons, but I played dumb, so they gave me this job instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒刚开始要我制造化学武器，但我搞砸了，于是他们就给了我这个任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had my misgivings about the NCR, but there's no way I'd let these barbarians get their hands on a chemical agent
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对NCR确实有些顾虑，但再怎么样我也不让这帮野蛮人把手伸向化学药剂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard about what they did to Searchlight, so I can't imagine what they'd do with VX or Sarin. I know one thing: I didn't want any part of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来我听说了他们在探灯镇的所作所为，我无法想象他们会如何运用VX和沙林。我只知道一件事：我绝不能参与。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After my brother was killed in a skirmish, they really put the screws to me, showing their true colors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的兄弟死于一场小冲突之后，他们渐渐地露出了真面目，开始给我脸色看了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been threatening to beat me, even crucify me if my numbers drop off... it's clear they're gearing up for the battle at the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们开始威胁，如果我的人数量继续下降就要打我，甚至把我钉在十字架上……那时候很明显，他们在为大坝一战集结力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion touts itself as the unifying standard for a new civilization, but it's just fascism and primitivism wrapped in a toga.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团鼓吹自己是新时代文明的倡导标准，但其实就是裹在长袍里的原始主义和法西斯主义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me for the tirade... I've been bottling this up for a long time. I just have to ask... where do I go from here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的长篇大论……这些东西我已经憋了很长时间了，我须要找个人宣泄一下……接下来我们谈什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C711_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, time is an issue. Tell me the rest of it another time, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，时间不允许了。这样，剩下的换个时间再告诉我，行不行？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you wouldn't understand. You're just a callous troglodyte, no better than the rest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你根本就不明白。你就是个对什么都漠不关心的老顽固，没人比得上你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C713_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll take your word as a fellow scientist. While I put on the collar, please grab my records from the desk over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我相信你作为一名科学家的良知。当我把这个项圈戴上的时候，请拿好我放在桌面上的文案记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary02.QuislingGreeted to 10 player.removeitem aaBountyCollar 1 aaAlbertQuislingRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaQuislingRecordsRef.enable setstage aaSecondary02 16
I'm a person of science, just like you - I give you my word that you'll get fair treatment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个科学爱好者，正和你一样——我向你保证，你会受到公平的待遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop expectorating such nonsense, you fatuous ape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再胡言乱语了，你这头蠢驴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Albert Quisling [020242DF] (mod) Quest : ([02023F1A]aaSecondary02) Blod er Tykkere enn Vann EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary02Qu_0005C716_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like science right? You can do, um... equations, like Drake and read tables, and... yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢科学，是吗？你可以，额……方程式，正如牛顿和相对论，额……对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you give me an overview of the property on sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我一份你们销售资产的清单吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course! We've got a nice variety, so I'm sure there's property that will fit your budget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！我们的商品种类齐全，而且我保证你的钱花得物有所值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you like them young, then we have a few boys ready to serve your every need. I can offer you the red-haired lad for... two-fifty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你喜欢年轻的，我们有一些小男孩可以随时为你服务。有个红头发的小家伙……只要25个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you're looking for a different sort of companion, all our female stock is on sale! They're muted, spayed, and utterly docile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想找另类同伴，我们所有的女性现在都在促销！她们性格沉默、手感良好、长得俊美，而且全都被切除卵巢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, we have some adult males - very robust, and eager to work. I could part with one of them for seven-fifty, or the pair for twelve hundred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，请允许我向你介绍我的成年男性——他们十分强壮，“工作”热情。单个卖要75个瓶盖，一对儿只要120个瓶盖就可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're thinking about the boy, right? Don't worry, we provide a six-month warranty and free medical care for the property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在考虑小男孩，对吧？别担心，我们提供6个月的质量保证和免费医疗服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you're thinking about the hair color, right? Don't worry, the price is the same. I'll start the paperwork while you decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在考虑头发的事吗？别担心，价格都是一样的。一旦你决定了，我就开始起草文书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0203BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0203BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSecondar_aaSecondary15Rz_0005D58D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the war?
I heard somebody say, "War never changes." What a bunch of bullshit. Give me a tactical nuke and I'd change this motherfucker real quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听某个人说过，“战争，战争永远不会变。”什么狗屁东西。给我几个战术核弹，我就能改变整个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what I'd do? I'd take a deal 'n' crawfish, then drill that ol' Caesar in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我想干什么吗？我要弄一堆的小龙虾，把它们全都塞到凯撒的屁眼里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB5B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like working in the jail?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么适应在监狱里的生活？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time I was detailed to burning human shit, and that might've been worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经一度被命令负责烧屎，和这里相比那个简直不堪回想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Red Bear?
He's a goat fucker, so I heard. Him and House would be a team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个鸟人，据说鸟很长。他和豪斯肯定一帮的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your assessment of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生如何评价？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's some kinda freak, living in a tower, keeping piss in bottles and drinkin it. Fucking disgusting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个奇怪老头，窝在一座高塔，屁股从不挪地，鬼才见过真相。操他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the NCR's position in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如何看待NCR在莫哈维的作用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's for shit. Caesar's got a hard-on for that dam. He has some giant retard with a metal mask supposed to win it. Tailgate Lingus or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有鸟作用。凯撒为了争夺大坝，整个人已经勃起。他还有一群蒙戴金属面罩的巨汉，可以帮助他取得大坝之战的胜利。NCR呢？有个屁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinOpinio_0005DB59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not my problem, kid. You've got to learn how to take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的问题，孩子。你得自己学会如何照顾自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Nobody gives a damn around here, do they? Ok, fine, I'll take care of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？根本就没人会在意这一切。哦，好吧，我会自己照顾自己的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Matt Jackson [0200D05A] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADE]aaBounties02) Loaded for Bear EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBounties_aaBounties02Mat_0005DB63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaMattJacksonGoneFiendMessage aaMattJacksonRef.disable aaMattJacksonFiendRef.enable setstage aaBounties02 55

ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到诺瓦克来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the beautiful scenery and fine cuisine, not to mention the handsome men - like Doc Friday, for example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有美丽的风景和诱人的美食，更不用说帅气的男人——比如，像“星期五”医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhatBring_0005F3AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm looking for work. There are always contracts for caravans between Novac and the 188 trading post, so I'm where I need to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开玩笑，我是来找工作的。总会有些往返于诺瓦克和188贸易站的商队需要人手。所以我来到我应该来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhatBring_0005F3AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you must know, I'm from outside New Reno. My family died from disease when I was young, so I lived with my Uncle John.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自新里诺。在我小的时候我的父母就双亡了，因此我跟着我的叔叔约翰一起住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhereFrom_0005F3AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had run with the Desert Rangers in his younger days, so he had a lot of practical knowledge to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他年轻的时候和沙漠游骑兵在一起呆过，因此他有很多生活技巧和实战知识，并乐于与我分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhereFrom_0005F3AF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He showed me the ropes and got me set up in the business. After he passed I took over his contracts, and I've been on the road since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他交给我一切，并把我带上了他的生意。他死后，我接管了他所有的合同，现在，我已经慢慢上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhereFrom_0005F3AF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you'll pardon the intrusion, it doesn't seem like you're a native. Where do you hail from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意我的冒犯，你看起来似乎不是本地人。你从哪来？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaWhereFrom_0005F3B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the war?
I think it's bad for business. Manpower is an expensive commodity, I hate to see it wasted so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为它会对商业发展会造成严重影响。人力资源是很贵重的商品，如此地大量浪费非常可惜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaOpinionWa_0005F3AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want a clear winner, really. This stalemating and ongoing attrition is destabilizing the entire region, to nobody's benefit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想平平静静的，真的。现在这种僵局和趋势正在破坏整个地区的稳定，这对任何人都没有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaOpinionWa_0005F3AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Shadow Company?
They're tough, disciplined, and well-paid. Most mercs would give their firstborn to get on board with that crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家公司态度强硬、纪律严明，并且报酬支付非常丰富。大部分雇佣兵都愿意在他们那里走出入行的第一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaInfoShado_0005F3A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming you survive, ten to fifteen years of steady work can set you up for life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假定你能一直活着，10-15年的稳定工作基本可以解决后半生的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaInfoShado_0005F3A9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their leader is the key to the whole thing. I don't know his background, but he's rumored to be tougher than Caesar's Legate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的领导人是整个公司的关键。我不太了解他的背景，但有谣言说他比凯撒的特使还要难以对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaInfoShado_0005F3A9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a mercenary, right? How's the work around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个佣兵，对吗？这个工作怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as you see me sitting on my ass in this bar, you should have a clear picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你既然看到我牢牢地坐在这，你就应该清楚是怎么回事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaMercenary_0005F3AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's feast or famine, really. I get most of my income from the caravans and merchants, so it can vary with the seasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么饱腹累累，要么饥肠辘辘。我全部的收入都来自商队和商人，因此它会随之季节变迁而变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaMercenary_0005F3AB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shadow Company snatches up most of the contracts, and we independents are left to pick up the scraps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暗影公司抢走了大部分合同，我们这些独立的家伙只能去抢他们剩下的饭菜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaMercenary_0005F3AB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did hear a rumor that some new firm might be moving into the Mojave... "Martin's Marines" was the name. Who knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说有一些新的公司正在步入莫哈维……“马丁的陆战队”就是其中的一个名字。谁知到是真的假的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaMercenary_0005F3AB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever been to Frost Hill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有去过冰霜山岭？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, but only once. Most people around here have never even heard of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但只去过一次。但大部分住在那的平民甚至都没听说过这个名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a mining town way up in Utah, beyond the Legion, NCR, or any type of law. Lots of raiders, escaped slaves, and old outlaws settle there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在犹他北部的一个采矿小镇，远离军团、NCR和任何法律。有很多土匪、逃犯，还有逃跑的奴隶聚集在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprisingly, the people are hospitable. They make a living from banditry and mining, though regulators and bounty hunters give them hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 令人惊奇的是，那里的人都很好客。他们靠打劫和采矿过日子，尽管有时一些监管者和赏金猎人会给他们带来麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Marko?
He's some kind of legendary killer from the plains. I hear he enslaved an entire town and then burned it to the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是来自大平原的一个传奇般的杀手。我听说他曾奴役了整个一个小镇，然后把它付之一炬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaMarko_0005F3AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
Aside from their fanatical misogyny, I kind of respect them. Caesar provides real security in a chaotic, fucked up world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果摒弃不谈他们的狂热，从某种程度上而言我还是尊敬他们的。凯撒在混乱中树立了新秩序，震撼了整个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaOpinionLe_0005F3AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've accompanied caravans through Legion territory, and I've never felt safer. Sure, I got some dirty looks, but otherwise it was fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经跟随商队路过军团的领地，我从来没有像这样感觉安全过。当然，我看起来可能脏兮兮的，但至少还好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaOpinionLe_0005F3AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old highway from Kingman to Flagstaff is the safest stretch of road you can find in this continent. Believe me, I've seen a lot of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从“金门”到“旗杆”的这段旧高速公路是这个大陆上你能找到的最安全的道路。相信我，我见过的太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaOpinionLe_0005F3AC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's that old Enclave butcher from way back, right? You're on a snipe hunt if you ask me. If he's managed to survive, he's long gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个老英克雷刽子手。如果你要问我，我得说你这趟旅程挺悬的。如果他以前成功幸存下来，那么他现在应该早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaInforArth_0005F3A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, the bounty hunters give them hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思，赏金猎人带给他们麻烦？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the citizens are ex-cons, outlaws, or escaped slaves. The NCR and Legion both have contracts on people up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的大部分居民都是有前科的，与NCR和军团有着藕断丝连的联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When people move there, they usually take up a new name before taking the oath of citizenship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们移居过去后，通常会在取得公民身份前换一个新名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they commit a crime against another citizen, the punishment ranges from exile to death. However, crimes against most outsiders are perfectly fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们对另一个公民犯了罪，相应的惩处从驱逐到死刑都有。但是，对外面的人犯罪却是法律所允许并承认的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what gets the town in trouble, and I believe will be its undoing. The whole thing is supported by organized raiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就令那个小镇陷入了大量的麻烦，我相信这甚至会直接导致它的毁灭。这个城镇为有组织的犯罪集团所支撑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually the NCR or Legion will send somebody up there to shut it down, and mark my words - it won't be pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终NCR或军团一定会派什么人过去彻底终结它的存在。这样其实倒没什么不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaAnnaFrostHill_0005F3A8_5.ogg

NPC : Anna [0205F395] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_aaAnnaBye_0005F3A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met with Garth. He tried to get tough, so I cut off his ears. You should know better than to try strong-arming me, Fisk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过高斯了。他试图表现得很强硬，于是我割了他的耳朵。你心里应该很清楚在我面前强硬的后果，菲斯克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_00061369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever pull some shit like that again, I'll come down to that nice, clean bunker and scalp you and your pretty secretary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再派些屎一样的人来，我就到你那整洁干净的地堡去，把你和你那漂亮女秘书的头皮全部扒下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_00061369_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sergio's coming, old man. You better run while you have the chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞尔吉奥就要来了，老头。你最好趁你还有机会赶快跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_00061369_3.ogg

NPC : Dent [020081B3] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDialogue_aaDentBye_00061931_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you and your boys are too stoned to take instructions, I'm leaving this tape for your sorry asses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你和你的人如此顽固不愿服从指示，我特地给你们这群傻瓜留了这盘带子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_000624C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though you lost the game last night, I'm going to leave the drugs, booze, and ammo with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你昨晚输了那场游戏，我还是要把那些药品、酒饮和补给留给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_000624C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange, I want you to kill a bounty hunter coming after me. I suspect that hunter will track me into the mountains, so set up an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相对的，我要你帮我杀一个跟踪我的赏金猎人。我猜那个家伙将会跟踪我到山里来，所以我建议你设个伏兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_000624C1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get off your asses, clean those rifles, and sharpen the blades on those saws. When that hunter comes, you better be quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快行动起来，擦干净那些步枪，磨砺锯上的刀刃。当那个猎人来了，你最好速战速决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_000624C1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you fuck this up, I'll cut out your guts and feed them to my wolf pups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你搞砸了，我就把你的肠子挖出来，拿去喂我的狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Bear [02000F83] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aazzHolotapeRed_000624C1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is the NCR suddenly recruiting bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR为什么突然开始招募赏金猎人了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because we're overextended. We came in here waving the banner and expecting to mold the Mojave into our own image.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我们正在大肆扩张。我们现在全力以赴，希望能早日将整片莫哈维并入我们的版图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ain't exactly the case. This war has turned the Mojave into a wound, and it's attracting every manner of vermin out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能注意到，现实的发展并不总是如你所期。现在这场战争已经令莫哈维深痕累累，外面各地的“爬虫”正在涌入这片受伤的土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old guard is dead, thanks to you and to Randall. But now, now there's a new breed, with no sense of restraint, no sense of humanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于你和兰道尔的原因，老的一代混蛋已经死了。而新来的家伙们毫无自我约束，缺乏人性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they ain't afraid of anything or anyone. They only answer to force... and that... is where you come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们天不怕地不怕。他们只服从……暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody's got to put that fear into them - the kind that twists your spine and makes you hesitate, even if only for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要一个人令他们心生恐惧——那种扭曲你脊梁和心智的恐惧，即使只持续一会儿也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them already know your name. They'll be coming for you. But you aren't like the others, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们大部分都已经听说过你。他们会因为你才来到这里。但你和他们终究是不同的，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something is driving you. It doesn't matter if it's greed, if it's hate, or a sense of justice - you hold onto it... you're going to need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些东西驾驭着你的心。无论是贪婪、憎恨还是正义感驱使，这都不重要，重要的是，你一直在坚持。不久，你就会需要它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullOpinionB_000664A0_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Jayson Ambrose, the publisher, editor and writer for the Coyote Courier, the Mojave's most reliable source for news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫杰森·安布罗斯，“山狼快递处”的出版家、编辑和作者，我们是莫哈维最可信赖的信息来源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressWhat_00073968_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be the bounty hunter everyone is reading about. I've got to say your actions have been an unforeseen boon to the paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定就是那个人人都在谈论的赏金猎人。我得说，你的经历为我们的报纸带来了不可预见的收益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subscriptions have skyrocketed, so thank you for providing the headlines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 订阅量简直就是一飞冲天，非常感谢你为我们提供那么多头条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I'm offended that you would even suggest libel on my part. I take great pride in my journalistic intregrity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我为你想起诉我们文字诽谤感到非常生气。我为我作为记者的刚正不倚而自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, there's no such thing as bad publicity. You're in a dirty business, friend, so you shouldn't expect the press to sing your praises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，现在这件事已经闹得人尽皆知。你真肮脏，朋友，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My benefactors expect me to hold the NCR to a high standard. Believe me, it's nothing personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的资助者希望我把NCR树立成标准模范。相信我，这可不是出于什么私情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at it from my perspective - bounty hunters make for lousy heroes. Honestly, who in their right mind would build a narrative around them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我的观点来看——赏金猎人都是群卑鄙的英雄。诚实地说，谁会真心愿意为他们记录身边的每一件事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073962_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the guy who's been smearing me, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你就是那个曾经污蔑我的家伙，是不是？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressAmbr_00073972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to discuss your depiction of me in the newspaper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你讨论你在报纸上对我的描述。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing worse than a critic. I'm going to enjoy killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有比诽谤更严重的问题了。我要杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're really fucking serious? Get away, you goddamn psycho!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你来真格的？滚开，你个神经病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressKill_0007396A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, maybe I was a little harsh. I'll drop the current theme and go for something different... perhaps a focus on your heroism?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许我的观点有点偏颇。我会把这个主题换掉，想个别的来代替……或许我可以专注于你的英雄事迹？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_00073977_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined to 2 set aaMeetPress.AmbroseGreeted to 2
"The critic is a man who prefers the indolence of opinion to the trials of action."
ESP.TRADUIT: “评论家是偏好主观的倦怠更甚于实践的执行的一类人。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, then I will continue with the current focus on your reckless killing spree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我会持续关注你那些鲁莽的杀戮行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_00073978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in no position to judge me. The critics can kiss my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本没有资格评价我。你们这帮评论家去吃屎吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, alright! I'll print a retraction and start a new series... it'll show your bravery and rectitude. Please, just don't hurt me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，好的好的！我会撤回那篇文章，另起炉灶……我会重笔墨强调你的勇气与正值。请别伤害我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressInti_00073974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined to 2 set aaMeetPress.AmbroseGreeted to 5
I wonder how well you would type with broken hands? I think you should stop writing about me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇你如何用一双断了的手打字？你必须终止对我的胡写行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not very judicious to threaten a member of the press. I've got contacts in the NCR that can put you away for life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想威胁我这样一个出版界的精英，你真是太不明智了。我和NCR高层可有关系，我可以随时让你滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressInti_00073976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop writing that crap or I'll kick your ass into next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止写那些狗屁东西，否则我会一直骚扰你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a deep, unwavering commitment to objectivity... but perhaps I've been ignoring a compelling human interest story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有坚定、不可动摇的意志……但也许，我忽略了别人坚定的信念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_00073964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Five hundred caps sounds about right, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 500个瓶盖还是可以接受的，你意下如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_00073964_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were to become a "benefactor", could you be counted on to change your depiction of me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能成为你的“赞助者”，你能否考虑修改对我的描述？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, did you get the money together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你把钱都已经准备好了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_0007396D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to discuss becoming a "benefactor" again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再跟你讨论一下“赞助者”的问题。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPress_aaMeetPressBye_0007395F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your claims of journalistic intregrity are bullshit. I know you're on the syndicate's payroll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在报纸上发表的那些文章完全是胡扯。我知道你收受了来自财团的贿赂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, hold on for a second. I accepted payments from multiple investors, but that hardly means I'm compromising my principles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，等等。我的确接受来自投资者们的赞助，但这并不意味着我会打破我的原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressHave_00073969_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, I think there's a fantastic story waiting to be told - a tale that involves an unlikely hero, the bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正相反，我觉得我可以写一篇非常出彩的故事——一篇关于一个赏金猎人的传奇故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressHave_00073969_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're willing to forget about this note, I assure you future issues will herald your deeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意忘记这份笔记，我向你保证日后的报告都会不偏不倚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressHave_00073969_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The villain will become a hero... and save the Mojave! Yes, that's it! I'm going to start on it right away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个平民成长为一个英雄……拯救了莫哈维！对，就是这样！我现在就开始写！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressHave_00073969_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined to 2 set aaMeetPress.AmbroseGreeted to 2
