Fantastic. Your largesse is duly noted. I think you'll enjoy the upcoming editorials. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。你的慷慨我会牢记在心的。我想你对即将出版的评论会到非常满意的。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_0007396E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 set aaMeetPress.StyleDetermined to 2 set aaMeetPress.AmbroseGreeted to 2
Then I suggest you get the amount we discussed. I'm sure your next bounty will cover it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我建议你尽快把钱准备好。我想你解决掉下一个赏金目标后可定会没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_0007396F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've changed my mind. I won't bribe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变我的主意了。我一分钱都不会给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I have deadlines to meet, so I trust you can find the exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我的截稿时间已经到了，我相信你自己能找到出口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressBrib_00073970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're particularly critical of my actions. Do you think you would've done anything differently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我经历的评论显得很“独特”。你知道你本来应该可以做得更好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aristotle said, "Criticism is something we can avoid easily by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing."
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚里士多德说：“我们应对别人评论的方法，就是什么也不说，什么也不做，就当什么也没有。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_0007397A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're awfully thin-skinned for a bounty hunter, aren't you? Besides, are my flimsy scribbles really hurting your livelihood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个神经敏感的赏金猎人，不是吗？此外，我那微薄的笔触真的有触动到你现实生活当中吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_0007397A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to answer your question, I can't say I would do anything, because I'm not a bounty hunter, thank God.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但为了回答你的问题，我不能说我会无动于衷，因为我不是赏金猎人，感谢上帝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_0007397A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My duty is to report the news and periodically offer editorials on people and events. It just so happens you're a high-profile person now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的职责是报道新闻，定期撰写关于知名人事的评论文章。而你恰恰就是我要瞄准的高调人士之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_0007397A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you can always learn a thing or two from the critics. We serve an important function, and you should show some appreciation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，你也总能从这些评论文章里学到一点东西。我们是社会中重要的职能机构，相反你应该对我们展示你的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jayson Ambrose [02072F82] (mod) Quest : ([020730A3]aaMeetPress) Meet the Press EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaMeetPres_aaMeetPressSpee_0007397A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I must go there. It seems this journey will never end. Caesar smiles on your probity, courier. Here is a token of my gratitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我又得走一趟了，这趟旅程似乎没完没了。凯撒会对你的诚实微笑。给，这枚硬币表达了我对你的感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077948_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaEncounters.QuintusGreeted to 10 aaQuintusFabiusRef.evp player.additem LegionMoney25 2
<Lie> I retrieved the chest without knowledge of its contents. It was taken to Dead Wind Cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我在取回来的时候根本不知道里面是什么东西。这个箱子之前似乎要被送往死风洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a mendacious buffoon. I only regret that I can't take more time killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个爱撒谎的小丑。没有多余的时间来杀你真令我不爽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077952_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, I... I was just swimming and I found the chest. I didn't take anything, honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，我……我刚刚在游泳，不小心发现了这个箱子。我真的什么也没碰。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_0007794F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is unacceptable. I only wish we had time to properly scourge and crucify you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的说话我无法接受。我真希望我们有时间把你在十字架上钉死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077950_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I had the gold, I wouldn't give to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我有金子，我也不给你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077951_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took the gold, and there's no fucking way I'm giving it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确拿了金子，但我绝不会放弃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While your candor is refreshing, it won't save you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，整么快就转变过来了，可惜诚实救不了你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077953_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your goodwill to Caesar is noted, amicus. However, if you do not provide the missing sum your reputation means nothing to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对凯撒的友好我们是知道的。但，如果你不把失踪的部分交出来，不要归我们翻脸不认人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been a faithful friend to Caesar. Doesn't that stand for something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是凯撒忠实的信徒。这还不能说明什么吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quintus Fabius [02077374] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaEncounte_aaEncountersQui_00077958_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the Legion. Fuck Caesar. Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你丫的军团。操你丫的凯撒。操你丫的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Queenie. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了奎尼。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me just check the finger... yeah, that's hers. You know the fiends had fallen far when they looked to her for leadership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我来检验一下这个手指……啊，就是她的。你知道，当恶魔帮推举她作为老大之后，他们的堕落实在太快了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQueenie_000813D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It makes me wonder if the Fiends are finally starting to unravel as an organized band of raiders... that's probably wishful thinking. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这令我开始怀疑，如果恶魔帮迅速瓦解变成普通的一群强盗……当然，这只是我的意淫罢了。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInQueenie_000813D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaQueenieFinger 1 setstage aaEpilogue03 190
I killed Billy Jack. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了比利·杰克。我来领取我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me just authenticate the finger... yeah, that's Billy Jack's. He was one tough bastard, and a real asset to the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来鉴定一下……没错，就是比利·杰克。他是个很难对付的人，他的死对游骑兵来说绝对是个好消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBillyJa_00081FF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no fan of zombies, but Billy Jack took it too far. After he assaulted a ghoul officer the brass made an example out of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是僵尸们的粉丝，但比利·杰克在这点上做得有点过火了。自从他干掉了一个食尸鬼军官后，上级把他当成一个典型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBillyJa_00081FF2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew he was up to no good, but I couldn't imagine how far he would sink. You did the right thing by taking him down for good, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这家伙作恶多端，但我无法想象他坠落得如此深渊。你为人们做了一件好事，你做得对，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBillyJa_00081FF2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaBillyJackFinger 1 setstage aaEpilogue04 190
I killed Bryan Claiborne. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了布莱恩·克莱本。我来领取我的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright, give me a second to verify it... yeah, you sure smoked that zombie, didn't you? Good work out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好的，给我几秒钟让我先看看……哈，你把那个僵尸给熏了吧？干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaTurnInBryanCl_00081FF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 250 player.removeitem aaBryanClaiborneFinger 1 setstage aaEpilogue05 190

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedWait_000842A1_1.ogg

NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaScullDia_aaDocJoinedFoll_000842A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you're here, I wanted to let you know about a new bounty we just got. We haven't even put up a poster yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你来了，我想告诉你我们刚收到一笔赏金。我们还没贴海报呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's on a Fiend named Blood-Hammer, some kind of giant badass holed up in the old Tweed Apartment Building south of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是在一个名叫血锤的恶魔帮身上，这个体型巨大的恶棍藏在西区以南的旧特威德公寓里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right when we were about to stick a fork in the Fiends, this nutjob comes along and takes charge, has them terrorizing Westside again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我们准备向恶魔帮开刀的时候，这个疯子来了，掌控了局面，让他们再次在西区横行霸道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Intel says that Butt-Hammer here has a hundred or more Fiends in that building with him, all armed to the teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 情报显示血锤所在的那栋楼里有上百个全副武装的恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We believe that if someone can get in there and take this guy out, it will finally put an end to the Fiends' leadership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相信如果有人能进去干掉这个人，就能终结恶魔帮的统治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that you might be the only person capable of pulling this off. This might be the toughest bounty you've gone after, so plan accordingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是，你可能是唯一有能力完成这件事的人。这可能是你追查过的最棘手的赏金，所以你要有相应的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Command thinks that once Butt-Hammer is removed, we can finally start bringing civilization to the city. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 指挥部认为一旦血锤被消灭，我们就可以开始为这座城市带来文明。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0008BEB0_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Blood-Hammer. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了血锤，我要领取赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the finger checks out. I'll say one thing for the Fiends - they're resilient. They've lasted longer than I expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，手指没问题。我要为恶魔帮说一句话，他们很坚强。比我想象的中坚持得要久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000911B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to make predictions, but this might be the end of the Fiends. Let's just hope somebody worse doesn't take their place. Good work, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想做预言，但这可能是恶魔帮的末日。希望不会有更糟糕的人取代他们。干得好,孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000911B8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBloodHammerFinger 1 player.additem caps001 2000 setstage aaNVBIISomeguy01 190
Got a letter for you, some secret squirrel shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有封信给你，一些秘密的松鼠屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The secret kind, motherfucker. Some unibrowed heifer hands me a letter, says, "Give it to the Courier. Their eyes only." Aye-aye, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 秘密的那种，混蛋。 一些没有眉毛的小母牛递给我一封信，说：“把它交给信使，只为寻找他们的眼睛。” 是的，是的，婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uppity cooze didn't even leave her name, just twirled out of here like her shit don't stink. Goddamn hussies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傲慢鬼连名字都没留下，就这么走了就好像她的屎不臭一样。该死的贱妇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing those assholes up at the puzzle palace got some kind of op they want you to run. Probably burning shit on Caesar's front porch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜谜题宫殿里的那些混蛋想让你执行什么任务。可能是在凯撒的前廊烧屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We draw the best and brightest up in this bitch. Take your letter and stop slobbering on my desk, you simple motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把婊子里最好最聪明的都拉上来。拿着你的信，别在我桌子上流口水了，你个傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dumbass, did you even find out what the letter is about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢蛋，你知道这封信的内容了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker, do I look like a secretary? Go find a robot if you want somebody to give you coffee and blowjobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋，我看起来像秘书吗?如果你想要有人给你喝咖啡，给你口交，那就去找个机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking attitude on you bounty hunters... self-entitled cocksuckers, all of you. Makes my ass want to dip snuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你们这些赏金猎人的态度...你们这些自以为是的混蛋。我的屁股都想吸鼻烟了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000951E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're with the NCR, you can go ahead and count me out of your pissant scheme.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是NCR的人，你可以把我排除在你的卑鄙计划之外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested in the contract. Tell me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对合同感兴趣。告诉我更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough. I'd rather fuck a Deathclaw than help the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经听够了。 我宁愿操死亡爪也不愿帮助 NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were on the verge of contacting you when something... or should I say, someone, fell into our lap. This person has... valuable information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正要联系你的时候，突然...或者我应该说，有人，从我们身边跑了过来。这人...带着有价值的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some rangers caught her in a sting, and now she's offering intelligence on the Legion in exchange for immunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些游骑兵抓住了她，现在她提供军团的情报以换取豁免权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently this person has some history with you, as she refuses to divulge her secrets to anyone else. You must have made an impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，这个人与你有一些过往，因为她拒绝向其他人透露她的秘密。 你一定给她留下了深刻的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, here's my proposition: If the interrogation nets us intel used in an operation, I promise you the contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我的建议是，如果审讯能让我们得到行动中使用的情报，我同意你的契约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, there's no turning back now. If you decline, we will never contact you again. It's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，现在已经没有回头路了。如果你拒绝，我们就不会再联系你了。由你决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E29_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in working for the NCR. Thanks, but no thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣为NCR工作。谢谢，不用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, but know this - if you walk away, there is no coming back. I only make this offer once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但你要知道，如果你一走了之，就再也回不来了。我只出一次价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure. I'll be on my way.
Very well. Good luck to you, Courier.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'll hear the rest of your offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会听听你的其他提议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were on the verge of contacting you when something... or should I say, someone, fell into our lap. This person has valuable information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正要联系你的时候，突然...或者我应该说，有人，从我们身边跑了过来。这人...带着有价值的信息。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some rangers caught her in a sting, and now she's offering intelligence on the Legion in exchange for immunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些游骑兵抓住了她，现在她提供军团的情报以换取豁免权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently this person has some history with you, as she refuses to divulge her secrets to anyone else. You must have made an impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，这个人与你有一些过往，因为她拒绝向其他人透露她的秘密。 你一定给她留下了深刻的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here's my proposition: Interrogate the prisoner, use the information to stage an operation, and in exchange I'll guarantee steady work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的建议是，审问犯人，利用这些信息实施行动，作为交换，我保证你会有稳定的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it as an informal screening process. There is no turning back now. If you decline, we will never contact you again. It's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以把它看作是一个非正式的筛选过程。现在已经没有回头路了。如果你拒绝，我们就不会再联系你了。由你决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this agency just about gathering intelligence? I'm a killer, not a spy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个机构只是收集情报吗？ 我是杀手，不是间谍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend, spycraft and killing are not mutually exclusive. Far from it. We do both, though we are very focused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友，间谍和杀人并不是相互排斥的。远非如此。我们两者都做，尽管我们非常专注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you want me to kill people for money, right? Isn't that bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你想让我为了钱杀人，对吗?这不是赏金猎人吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR isn't fighting a war against raiders or outlaws, we're fighting the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR不是在和掠夺者或流亡者作战，我们是在和军团作战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't diminish what you've accomplished. Cleaning out Valle del Hierro was remarkable. But that's not what we do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不会贬低你的成就。对瓦尔德耶罗的清理是值得表彰的。但那不是我们的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We work in the shadows, dealing with Frumentarii, double-agents, and traitors. We also conduct covert operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在暗处工作，对付军团特务，双重间谍和叛徒。我们也进行秘密行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up here?
It might surprise you, but I actually chose this station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会感到惊讶，但实际上是我选择了这个电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamAboutY_000BAD68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a... history with the Legion. Only reason I'm with the agency now is because an explorer drove his spear through my kneecap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和军团...有些过往。我现在在局里的唯一原因就是一个军团探索者用他的矛刺穿了我的膝盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamAboutY_000BAD68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I was with the Rangers, doing a tour here when my squad was ambushed near the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当时和游骑兵在一起，在这里巡逻，我的小队在河边被伏击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamAboutY_000BAD68_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw firsthand what bad intel does to our men in the field. After my medical discharge, I set out to make sure it doesn't happen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲眼目睹了错误情报对我们外勤人员的影响。出院后，我开始着手确保这种事不再发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamAboutY_000BAD68_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's how I ended up here in the Mojave. We've got a fight coming, and I don't want to be sitting on the sidelines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是这样来到莫哈韦的。我们要打仗了，我不想袖手旁观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamAboutY_000BAD68_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. The prisoner is in the right holding cell. Do not touch her, whatever your past interactions. There is more at stake than you realize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。犯人被关在正确的牢房里。不要碰她，不管你们过去有什么来往。有些比你想象中更危险的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back when you're done questioning her. It's good to have you on board, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 审问完她后给我报告。很高兴你能加入，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's unfortunate, but we will respect your decision. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，但我们会尊重你的决定。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00096E2E_1.ogg
NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was double-crossed by the Legion, so I'm willing to help the NCR, under certain provisions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被军团出卖了，所以我愿意在某些条款下帮助NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm willing to expose one of the largest frumentarius rings in the Mojave. In exchange, I want immunity from prosecution and fifty thousand caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意告诉你们莫哈韦废土上最大的军团特务组织之一。作为交换，我想要豁免权和五万的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099380_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me what I want to know, or I'll cut your face off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我我想知道的，否则我就把你的脸割下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitch, I'm gonna kill you twice.
If you were going to kill me, you would have done it already. No, you're a clever sort. You'll wait to hear what I have to say, won't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要杀我，你早就动手了。你不会的，你很聪明。你会等着听我说的，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097121_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here? How did you get caught?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么?你是怎么被抓到的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to a touch of perfidy on the part of my Legion contact, I was ambushed by Rangers. They even killed Zeke, the poor creature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我的军团线人背信弃义，我被游骑兵伏击了。 他们甚至杀死了可怜的泽克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097120_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, caged up like a filthy rat. Serves you right, hussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，像只肮脏的老鼠一样被关在笼子里。活该，贱货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here to gloat, have you? Ever consider that you wouldn't be here if I hadn't asked for you by name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跑到这里幸灾乐祸？ 你有没有想过，如果我没有问你的名字，你根本不会出现在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097A12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zeke died slowly, didn't he? <Sarcastic> Do you need a new friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 齐克是慢慢死去的，不是吗?<讽刺>你需要一个新朋友吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He died with more dignity than you'll summon in a lifetime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死得比你这辈子都要有尊严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097A14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking out when you have so little idea of what happened... buffoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你对发生了什么一无所知时就不要随便说话......小丑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097A14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck your offers, fuck the security, and fuck the agency. You're dead, bitch. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的提议，去他妈的安全，去他妈的代理。 你去死吧，婊子。 <攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00097A16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you talking to me? Why not just tell the agency?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么跟我说话?为什么不直接告诉代理?

ESP.ORIGINAL: For one, you keep your word. I also know that you finish what you start. If I tell you how to hurt the Legion, you'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一方面，你信守诺言。 我也知道你完成了你开始的事情。 如果我告诉你如何伤害军团，你就会去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099388_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I left it up to the NCR, they'd foul it up in short order. Petty bureaucrats would wrap it up in red tape, leave it all in a dusty folder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我把它交给NCR，他们很快就会搞砸。小官僚们会用繁文缛节把它包起来，放在满是灰尘的文件夹里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099388_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you... you'll go after them. Something about you, Courier. Hard to put my finger on it, but you... intrigue me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你......你会追上他们的。 关于你，邮差。 很难把我的手指放在它上面，但你......引起了我的兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099388_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose there's a tinge of guilt from our last encounter. I hope you won't hold it against me. {Charming}A girl's got to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你对我们上次见面有点内疚吧。我希望你不要反对我{迷人}女孩得吃饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099388_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know about the frumentarii? I thought you were just a small-time slaver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么知道凯撒军团特务组织的？我以为你只是个三流奴隶贩子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion developed a labor shortage, so they're trading with slavers in the Mojave. They pay extra for NCR personnel and citizens, so we oblige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团出现了劳动力短缺，所以他们和莫哈韦的奴隶贩子交易。他们为NCR人员和公民支付额外费用，所以我们很乐意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099389_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, my contact and I had a... tumultuous relationship. He's the sort that believes a vagina disqualifies you from rational thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，我的线人和我有个...混乱的关系。他是那种认为阴道会让你失去理性思考的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099389_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tried to strong-arm me into paying extra, so Zeke threatened to rip his legs off. Apparently, he resented my style of negotiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他试图强迫我支付额外费用，所以 泽克威胁要扯掉他的腿。 显然，他讨厌我的谈判风格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099389_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At our next meeting, the contact was nowhere to be found. Instead, I was ambushed by a squad of rangers. I have no doubt he set me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们的下一次会面时，我没有找到线人。结果，我被一队游骑兵伏击了。我确信他陷害了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099389_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have every reason not to trust you. This doesn't feel right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全有理由不相信你。这感觉不对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of leverage, not trust, or... {Derisive}feelings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是筹码的问题，不是信任的问题，或者...嘲笑}感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099387_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Frumentarii aren't just gathering information. They've sabotaging supply lines, organizing resistance, and sowing dissent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些军团特务不只是在收集信息。他们破坏补给线，组织抵抗，散布异议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099387_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust is irrelevant. You have to decide what your priorities are, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信任是无关紧要的。你得分清轻重缓急，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099387_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll make sure the NCR meets your demands. What can you tell me about the frumentarii?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会确保NCR满足你的要求。你能告诉我关于凯撒军团特务组织的事吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was in the practice of selling slaves to a frumentarius in deep cover. He's a pimp in Freeside, goes by the name of Papa Chapman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在暗中把奴隶卖给军团特务组织。中间商是自由城的皮条客，名叫查普曼老爹
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been in cover so long that he prefers the profligate lifestyle. He can't do without chems, booze, and girls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他藏身的时间太长了，所以更喜欢挥霍无度的生活方式。他离不开毒品，酒和女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion doesn't seem to mind since Chapman keeps shipping slaves and intel back to them. He also has contact with at least two other frumentarii.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团似乎并不介意，因为查普曼一直向他们运送奴隶和情报。他还与至少两个其他的军团特务有联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as I'd like to see him dead, Chapman will probably flip for the right offer. I don't think he's in a hurry to die for Caesar or Lanius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很想看到他死，但查普曼很可能会为合适的出价而出卖我。我觉得他不急着为凯撒或拉纽斯而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you press him, there's no telling what you might uncover. I hope this settles things between us, Courier. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你逼问他，谁也说不准你会发现什么。我希望这能解决我们之间的问题，邮差。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No deal. I don't trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有达成协议，我不相信你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we are at an impasse. Return when you come to your senses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就陷入僵局了。等你恢复理智了再回来找我吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099386_1.ogg

NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've reconsidered my position on your offer. Tell me what you know, and we'll work something out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我重新考虑了你的提议。把你知道的都告诉我，我们再想办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I thought you'd come around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我认为你会回心转意的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was in the practice of selling slaves to a frumentarius in deep cover. He's a pimp in Freeside, goes by the name of Papa Chapman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在暗中把奴隶卖给军团特务组织。中间商是自由城的皮条客，名叫查普曼老爹
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been in cover so long that he prefers the profligate lifestyle. He can't do without chems, booze, and girls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他藏身的时间太长了，所以更喜欢挥霍无度的生活方式。他离不开毒品，酒和女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion doesn't seem to mind since Chapman keeps shipping slaves and intel back to them. He also has contact with at least two other frumentarii.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团似乎并不介意，因为查普曼一直向他们运送奴隶和情报。他还与至少两个其他的军团特务有联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as I'd like to see him dead, Chapman will probably flip for the right offer. I don't think he's in a hurry to die for Caesar or Lanius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很想看到他死，但查普曼很可能会为合适的出价而出卖我。我觉得他不急着为凯撒或拉纽斯而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you press him, there's no telling what you might uncover. I hope this settles things between us, Courier. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你逼问他，谁也说不准你会发现什么。我希望这能解决我们之间的问题，邮差。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009938D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther divulged the identity of a frumentarius. She's asking for immunity and caps as compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯帖透露了一个军团特务的身份。 她要求豁免和瓶盖作为补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent, we'll certainly accomodate her. If she's willing to give them up now, she might develop into a real asset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我们一定会照顾她的。如果她现在愿意放弃他们，她可能会发展成一个真正有价值的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for you... I think you'd be perfect to meet with this contact. If Esther is right, he could help us break open a major Legion operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你......我认为你会非常适合与这位联系人见面。 如果以斯帖是对的，她可以帮助我们打破军团的重大行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing, though - this isn't bounty hunting. Don't come back here with a bloody finger and tell me "Mission accomplished". We need intel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过有一件事--这不是赏金狩猎。 不要带着血淋淋的手指回到这里告诉我“任务完成”。 我们需要的是情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The priority is to flip this scumbag. Let him know that it's the NCR or a hollow point in the brain. If he makes demands, try to work with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首要任务是扳倒这个人渣。让他知道这是NCR或者是他脑中的空洞。如果他提出要求，试着和他合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he plays along, we can feed misinformation to the Legion, and also get the jump on other frumentarii.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他配合，我们就能向军团提供错误信息，也能抢在军团特务之前一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care how you do it, just make it happen. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你怎么做，只要让它发生就行。 还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099390_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a history with Esther. I can't stomach the idea of her walking free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和以斯帖有过节。我无法忍受让她逍遥法外这件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A deal is a deal, but... perhaps we can come to an understanding. We have agreed to release Esther from custody with ten thousand caps in hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一言为定，但...也许我们能达成共识。我们已经同意在交出一万瓶盖的情况下释放以斯帖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens then is up to chance, so to speak. I'll tell you what - you follow through and see this op to the finish, and she's yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以这么说，接下来发生的事全凭运气。我跟你说，你要坚持到底完成这次行动，她就是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099395_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you know the time and place of her release so you can settle with her. We'll leave it at that until the mission is concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会告诉你她被释放的时间和地点这样你就可以跟她和解了。在任务结束之前，我们就不谈这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099395_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of offer am I authorized to grant Chapman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被授权给查普曼提什么样的条件?

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're a strong negotiator, you shouldn't offer anything. However, if he's still got any Legion left in him, intimidation might not be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是一个强有力的谈判者，你就不应该提供任何东西。 但是，如果他的内心还向着军团的话，恐吓可能还不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099396_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officially, don't compromise the interests of the NCR or its citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 官方规定，不要损害NCR或其公民的利益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099396_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unofficially... if this piece of shit gives up an entire frumentarius ring, we'll set him up for life. Honestly, I don't care about the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非正式地。。。如果这家伙放弃了一个完整的军团特务组织戒指，我们会安排他终身监禁。老实说，我不在乎细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099396_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
Very well, here's your first payment. Good luck, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这是您的第一笔付款。祝你好运,邮差
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Buchan [02095686] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaBuchansBARTER_00099D98_1.wav
NPC : Buchan [02095686] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't hear nothing, I don't say nothing. Nothing, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么也没听到，什么也没说。没什么，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Buchan [02095686] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099D9A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, sugar, did you bring that strap-on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿~甜心，你带那个绑带了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, who the fuck is you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EC3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVBIISomeguy02.PapaGreeted to 2 aaPapaChapmanRef.addscript package DefaultSandboxEditorLocation512
I'm &PCName;. We need to discuss your relationship with Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是&PCName;。我们得谈谈你和凯撒军团的关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't you a straightforward motherfucker? Listen, I don't know shit about no Legion, except they like to fuck each other in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个正直的混蛋?听着，我对军团一点都不了解，除了他们喜欢操对方的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099ED4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't judging, if that's your thing, I can have the girls toss your salad for a discount. Shit, I'll call it Caesar's Salad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没意见，如果这是你的事，我可以让姑娘们帮你扔沙拉，让她们打个折。该死，我要叫它凯撒沙拉!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099ED4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the only Caesar I know. If you want to talk pussy or dope, come on up. Otherwise, I'll ask you to walk your ass the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我唯一认识的凯撒。如果你想跟女人或毒品说话，请上来。否则，我就叫你滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099ED4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, honey, I don't know nothing about no Legion, except they fuck each other in the ass. That's not Papa's style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢~亲爱的，我对什么军团都不了解，除了他们用屁股做爱，那不是老爹我的风格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099ED5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you bring that sweet little tail of yours on up and we'll talk about it as much as you want. Help yourself to a drink if you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不把你那条可爱的小尾巴拉上来，你想怎么说我们就怎么说。如果你愿意，请随便喝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099ED5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know about your involvement with Caesar's Legion, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要知道你和凯撒军团的关系，马上

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker, who do you think you talking to? You see this here cane? I will dent your skull like a crusty nut!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋，你以为你在跟谁说话？ 你看到这里的手杖了吗？ 我会让你的头骨像硬壳坚果一样凹陷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ain't hard enough to step up to Papa, bitch. If you think you got the heart, come on up and talk that shit, see what happens.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to start thinking long-term. The NCR will look kindly on a good turn right now.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa already gave up one name. Ain't that enough for one day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爹已经放弃了一个名字。不是足够的一天吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009A1DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want this deal to work, you need to throw us a bone. I want more information.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will it take to bring you over to the NCR?
Ain't this some shit... motherfuckers expect me to turn on the Legion? Them assholes will hunt you down anywhere, bitch!

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if Esther's flipped, I'm compromised. Lanius will want my head on a platter. Why did I get involved with that she-bitch? Fuck me!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EE6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I'll do this, but I got some... terms. First, I want protection. No rangers or bounty hunters running up in my shit, you hear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我会这么做的，但我有个...协议。首先，我需要保护。不准有NCR或赏金猎人来找我，听到了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EE6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things stay as they were, except I feed bad info to the Legion, and good intel to NCR. I keep pimping and slinging, and nobody fucks with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切正常，我给军团提供坏情报，给NCR提供好情报。我一直在拉皮条，没人敢惹我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Chapman [020982BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_00099EE6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next, I want caps up front every time I pass intel. You do that, and I'm your man. Anything else will cost you extra.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来我每次提供情报时都要加钱。你这么做的话，我就是你的人。其他任何东西都要额外花钱

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, the NCR will meet your terms. What do you know about the frumentarii?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，NCR 会满足你的条件的。 你对军团特务组织了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll start you with a taste, partner. Legion likes to keep eyes on the convoys so they's can hit them at the right time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先让你尝尝，伙计。军团喜欢盯着车队，这样他们就能在合适的时间攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They keep a man with the Crimsons, name of Blunt. He's a semper fi motherfucker, always serious about this shit. He don't play, either.

ESP.ORIGINAL: He might act like a dumb citizen, but he's a hard sonofabitch, you best believe it. That cat will fuck you up over a dirty look.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blunt will get you on the trail. Papa might be willing to tell you more, if ya'll is willing to be generous.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solid work, Courier. If Papa keeps feeding us intelligence, it could net us enough data to launch more ops down the road. Anything else to report?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛苦了,邮差。如果老爹继续给我们提供情报，我们就能获得足够的信息来开展更多行动。还有什么要报告的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B07F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I persuaded Papa Chapman to work as a double agent for the NCR. He gave up another frumentarius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服了老爹查普曼为NCR做双面间谍。他又供出了一个军团特务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Listen you dumb hick, this isn't bounty hunting, where you cut the thumbs off hobos and cash out! Lives are at stake, you simple motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？ 听着你这个笨蛋，这不是赏金狩猎，在那里你砍掉流浪汉的拇指并兑现！ 我们现在处于危险之中，你这个单纯的混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you did manage to ID another frumentarius. At least you didn't come back empty-handed. Anything else to report?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...你找到了另一个军团特务。至少你没有空手而归。还有什么要报告的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B080_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met with Papa Chapman, but he refused to flip. However, I identified another frumentarius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过查普曼老爹，但他拒绝让步。然而，我发现了另一个军团特务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa Chapman also gave me a list of additional frumentarii and informants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查普曼老爹还给了我一份其他线人的名单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding! I'll get to work analyzing these leads. If the data checks out, I may have some extra work for you. Here's a little bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!我要开始分析这些线索了。如果信息属实，我可能有一些额外的工作给你。这是一点小奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B082_1.ogg

NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B082_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, go ahead and check out this guy at the Crimson Caravan. Just remember that not all of the frumentarii are as flexible as Papa Chapman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，去看看这个在赤红商队的家伙。只是要记住，并不是所有的军团特务都像老爹查普曼那样好说服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, most of them would probably pop cyanide or go out fighting if the prospect of capture arises. Watch your ass, and stay alert. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，如果有可能被抓获的话，他们中的大多数人可能会释放氰化物或者出去战斗。小心点，保持警惕。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B084_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't expect him to go quietly. Most frumentarii are hand-picked by Vulpes. They won't let just anybody mingle with the profligates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到他会安静地离开。大多数军团特务都是沃普斯精心挑选的。不会让任何跟放荡者混在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... hold on, just a moment. Part of this ledger is encrypted. It will take some time to crack it, but he noted something for today's date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...稍等一下。这本账本有一部分是加密的。这需要一些时间来破解，但他记下了今天的日期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'm reading this right, I think it's referencing grid coordinates. Let's see... that would be close to Sloan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没看错的话，我认为它参考了网格坐标。让我们看看...离斯隆很近
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been hell keeping Sloan supplied due to Powder Gangers and Deathclaws. I might be way off-base, but my instinct is to check this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一直以来，斯隆都被炸药帮和死亡爪搞得精疲力尽。我可能离基地太远了，但我的直觉是去看看这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look into this, and I'll make it worth your while. Check out the road between Goodsprings and Sloan, see if anything comes up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个，我会让你觉得值得的。 查看清泉镇和斯隆之间的道路，看看有没有什么事情发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just verify if any of our Caravans have been hit on that route. If you find anything, try to follow up on it as best as possible. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去查查我们的商队是否在那条路上被袭击了。如果你发现了什么，尽可能地追踪它。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009B650_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was forced to kill Blunt, but I retrieved this ledger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被迫杀了布伦特，但我找到了这本账簿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your cover is blown, Proculus. You have once chance to keep your life: work for NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的身份暴露了，普罗库勒斯。你只有一个保住自己性命的机会:为NCR工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's strange to be called that in person, been a while. I thought those thugs might give me away. Fools never learned to destroy letters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有段时间了，我还真不习惯当面这么叫你。我以为那些暴徒会出卖我。傻瓜们从来没有学过销毁信件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9C2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Permit me my own question: What makes you think I value my life, Courier? That's right - I know all about you, Nuntius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我问你一个问题:你凭什么认为我珍视自己的生命，邮差?没错-我知道你的一切，努提乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9C2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'll stick with something more pressing: why should I even consider working for a corrupt, plutocratic mob like the NCR? Death might be better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我有更紧迫的问题：我为什么还要考虑为像NCR这样腐败的富豪们工作？死亡也许更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9C2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's strange to be called that in person, been a while. I thought those thugs might give me away. Fools never learned to destroy letters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有段时间了，我还真不习惯当面这么叫你。我以为那些暴徒会出卖我。傻瓜们从来没有学过销毁信件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Permit me my own question: What makes you think I value my life, Courier? That's right - I know all about you, Nuntia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我问你一个问题:你凭什么认为我珍视自己的生命，邮差?没错-我知道你的一切，努蒂亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'll stick with something more pressing: why should I even consider working for a corrupt, plutocratic mob like the NCR? Death might be better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我有更紧迫的问题：我为什么还要考虑为像NCR这样腐败的富豪们工作？死亡也许更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've traded your last captive, slime. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的最后一个俘虏已经被交易了，蠢蛋<攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much have you sacrificed for the Legion? Has it been worth it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为军团牺牲了多少?值得吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've sacrificed more than you'll ever know. Duty and honor used to mean something to me... everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我牺牲的比你知道的要多。责任、荣誉和曾经对我很重要的......一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I helped the Legion pacify tribes, crucifying any dissidents. I was there when they threw Graham into the Grand Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮助军团安抚部落，钉死异议者。他们把格雷汉姆扔进大峡谷的时候我也在场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the love of my life was beaten to death in front of me by the Monster of the East, I said nothing. I know about sacrifice, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我一生的挚爱在我面前被东方怪物打死的时候，我什么也没说。我知道什么是牺牲，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will tell you what I know, then I will disappear. I require no payment or pardon. I only ask for anonymity. Is that satisfactory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会告诉你我知道的，然后我就消失。我不要求报酬或赦免。我只要求匿名。你满意吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CC_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't appreciate the gravity of your proposition, Courier. Loyalty is not just something stamped in a coin. I live and die by it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不明白你这个提议的严重性，邮差。 忠诚不仅仅是印在硬币上的东西。 我为此而生和死..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, the NCR will set you up for life, with no more cares or concerns. Can the Legion do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，NCR会帮你安排好生活，不再有顾虑。军团能做到吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is pointless. We'll have to do this the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都是毫无意义的。我们得吃点苦头了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely you've loved and lost. Has the Legion really accepted you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定爱过，也失去过。 军团真的接纳了你吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, no. There was someone, long ago. A centurion, Caius. He had a body carved from granite, blue eyes peering from his scarred face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是真的，不是。 很久以前，有人。 百夫长，盖乌斯。 他有一具用花岗岩雕刻而成的身体，从他伤痕累累的脸上可以看到他蓝色的眼睛
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We fought and bled together across Arizona, back when the Legion seemed right. Bringing order to the wastes, a noble cause.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在亚利桑那州并肩作战，浴血奋战，那时候军团似乎是正确的。让荒芜之地恢复秩序，一项崇高的事业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we fought the NCR, things changed. Caius made a mistake, paid for it with his life. Lanius bludgeoned him to death in front of everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们与NCR对抗时，情况变了。盖乌斯犯了个错误，付出了生命的代价。拉尼尔斯当着大家的面把他打死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will tell you what I know, then I will disappear. I require no payment or pardon. I only ask for anonymity. Is that satisfactory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会告诉你我知道的，然后我就消失。我不要求报酬或赦免。我只要求匿名。你满意吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9CA_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I agree to your terms.
Well, where do I begin? Is there anything you want to know up front? Now is the time to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我从哪里开始呢?有什么你想先知道的吗?现在是时候问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't accept those terms. You don't get to retire in this business, Blake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不接受那些条件。你不能在这一行退休，布莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expected as much. I'll drink to your fortune. Goodbye, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也期望如此。我为你的好运干杯。再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can tell me about the Legion's plans, that should conclude our business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能告诉我军团的计划，我们的生意就能做成了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While it might surprise outsiders, the Legion is in need of additional slaves. Conquering tribes across Arizona made them an abundant resource.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然外人可能会惊讶，但军团需要更多的奴隶。征服亚利桑那州各地的部落使他们成为丰富的资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, with expansion halted at Hoover Dam and Denver, slaves are no longer in steady supply. Unfortunately, the demand never dropped off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，随着胡佛水坝战役和丹佛的奴隶贸易扩张停止，奴隶供应不再稳定。不幸的是，需求从未下降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion operates massive mines in Arizona that require scores of slaves, in conditions that kill off laborers in droves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团在亚利桑那州经营着大量的煤矿，需要大量的奴隶，在那样的条件下，矿工们会成群结队地死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those mines provide the metal used to forge weapons and armor. Most of the Legion's supplies are produced and carried by slave labor. Understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些地雷提供了用于锻造武器和盔甲的金属。 军团的大部分补给品都是由奴隶劳动生产和运输的。 理解？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, an emergent priority in the Mojave is to facilitate the enslavement of NCR personnel, allies, and possibly VIP's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，在莫哈韦，一个紧急的优先事项是奴役NCR的人员，盟友，可能还包括要人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiding parties can only cover so much ground, though. A clever frumentarius, however, can convince other groups to target the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，突击队只能覆盖这么多地方。然而，聪明的军团特务可以说服其他团体对付NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So far it's been a success. The NCR has cut patrols, and citizens are afraid to venture outside the cities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，这是成功的。NCR巡逻减少了，市民不敢到城外冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DA_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything about Firebase Zulu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于祖鲁火场的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never served in the Central theater, but it's no secret that Tribune Marcellus is set on capturing the outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未在中央剧院服役过，但保民官马塞卢斯准备占领前哨已经不是什么秘密了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His victory is almost a certainty. That's not Legion rhetoric, either. I've heard the rumors from all sides, NCR and Caesar's men. Zulu is doomed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的胜利几乎是必然的。那也不是军团的说辞。我从四面八方都听到了谣言，包括NCR和凯撒的人。祖鲁是注定要失败的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what becomes of a distant outpost, but rather what transpires afterwards. With Caesar gone, Marcellus will challenge Lanius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎一个遥远的前哨站会发生什么，我在乎的是之后会发生什么。恺撒一死，马塞卢斯就会挑战拉尼尔斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd put my coin on Marcellus, all things being equal. Lanius is a vicious brute. He may rule now, but given time... the men will turn on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一切平等，我会赌马塞卢斯。拉尼尔斯是个凶残的畜生。他现在可以统治，但假以时日...那些人会背叛他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Marko?
There's a name you don't hear muttered often. I suppose it's owed to ignorance... and fear. I heard of him when I traveled in New Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个名字你不常听到别人念叨。我想这是由于无知......和恐惧。我在新墨西哥旅行时听说过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've known killers, even legitimate psychopaths, but nothing quite like the stories surrounding Marko. Wild-eyed Texans said he killed whole towns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识杀手，甚至是合法的心理变态，但都比不上马可的故事。狂野的德州人说他屠杀了整个城镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's probably just convenient fiction used to pass time around the campfire. He's flesh and blood... how bad can he be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这可能只是用来在篝火旁消磨时间的方便小说。他是有血有肉的人......他能坏到什么程度?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ulysses... that name is familiar... yes! The fool with the ridiculous hair! I had the misfortune of working with him in Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯......这个名字很熟悉......是的！ 长着可笑头发的傻瓜！ 我很不幸在亚利桑那州和他一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most frumentarii are subtle creatures, apt to blend in, observe. He was the model of exhibitionism, always swaggering and preaching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数军团特务都是微妙的人，善于融入和观察。他是爱出风头的典范，总是趾高气扬地说教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get nauseous just thinking of his fatuous tirades, railing on about bulls, bears, and dead nations. I believe he was impotent, hence the angst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一想到他那愚蠢的长篇大论就感到恶心，抱怨公牛，熊和死亡的国家。我相信他是阳痿，所以才这么焦虑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9D8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all good information, but what's the next step? How can I make use of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都是很有用的信息，但下一步是什么？ 我该如何利用它？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've already made use of it. Chapman, Blunt, and I were the cogs for this scheme. They'll simply replace us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经用过了。 查普曼、布伦特和我是这个计划的齿轮。 他们只会取代我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it comes to slavery, forget about Cottonwood Cove or the Fort. They're small-time. Most of the chattel goes through Canyon Cove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到奴隶贸易，忘了棉花丛湾或城堡吧。他们是三流的。大部分的动产都经过峡谷湾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's down the Colorado, not far from Dry Wells. The Legion keeps a barge at Cottonwood Cove to ferry slaves there. Then they're shipped east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在科罗拉多河下游，离枯井不远。军团在棉花丛湾有艘船用来运送奴隶。然后他们被运往东方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is at least a century of legionaries guarding the site, with another century down the road. It's all overseen by Tullius of Prescott.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少有一个百人队的军团守卫着这个地方，接下来还有一个百人队。一切都由普雷斯科特的图利乌斯负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a Centurion hand-picked by Caesar to oversee the slave trade. He's known within the Legion as "Trucidator", the killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是凯撒亲自挑选的百夫长，负责监督奴隶贸易。 他在军团中被称为“屠戮者”，一个杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Tullius and liberating the slaves would be a significant setback to the Legion, not to mention the fact this would happen on their turf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死图利乌斯并解放奴隶将是军团的重大挫折，更不用说这将发生在他们的地盘上。
