ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd be forced to divert manpower from raiding parties to defense. If I were you, that would be my plan. It's your choice, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们将被迫将人力从袭击方转移到防御上。 如果我是你，这就是我的计划。 当然这是你的选择，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember: audentes fortuna iuvat. Should we never speak again, vale et bonam fortunam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住：命运女神偏袒有胆量的人，我们再也不会说话了，再会并祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DE_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem to have a casual opinion of slavery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎对奴隶制有一种随意的看法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You forget that many of us began as slaves. My village was seized when I was ten, my family killed. I was given the privilege of slavery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你忘了我们很多人是从奴隶开始的。我十岁的时候我的村子被占领了，我的家人被杀了。我被赋予了奴隶的特权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009D9DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm impressed, Courier. You made the right play letting him live. He could be an asset to us later on. Let me take a look at this data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我留下了深刻的印象,邮差。你让他活着是对的。他以后可能会对我们有用。让我看看这些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Canyon Cove, I know about this place. Rangers reported it after a LRRP several months ago, said it would take a company to clear it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 峡谷湾，我知道这个地方。几个月前，游骑兵队在一次远程侦察巡逻后报告了此事，称需要一支部队来清理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't have that luxury. Oliver doesn't want to allocate troops or resources for offensive operations before the big dance at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会有这样的奢侈。奥利弗不想在胡佛大坝战役之前为进攻行动分配兵力或资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This op will be off the books, Courier. We won't claim you if things go south. You'll be on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差，这件事不会公开的。如果情况不妙，我们不会认领你的。你得靠自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The flip side is that we're paying you ten thousand caps if you pull it off. Two up front, and eight on completion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，如果你成功了，我们会给你一万瓶盖。预付两成，事后付剩下的八成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I caught up with another frumentarius, Blake. He gave up the Legion's plan in exchange for clemency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到了另一个军团特务，布莱克。他放弃了军团的计划以换取宽大处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every once in a while you should resist the urge to kill everyone you meet, Courier. That man would have been more useful to us alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每隔一段时间你就得抑制住想杀掉每一个人的冲动，邮差。那个人活着对我们更有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, you did net us more intelligence. Let me have a look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你为我们提供了更多情报。让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Canyon Cove, I know about this place. Rangers reported it after a LRRP several months ago, said it would take a company to clear it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 峡谷湾，我知道这个地方。几个月前，游骑兵队在一次远程侦察巡逻后报告了此事，称需要一支部队来清理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't have that luxury. Oliver doesn't want to allocate troops or resources for offensive operations before the big dance at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会有这样的奢侈。奥利弗不想在胡佛大坝战役之前为进攻行动分配兵力或资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This op will be off the books, Courier. We won't claim you if things go south. You'll be on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差，这件事不会公开的。如果情况不妙，我们不会认领你的。你得靠自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The flip side is that we're paying you ten thousand caps if you pull it off. Two up front, and eight on completion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，如果你成功了，我们会给你一万瓶盖。预付两成，事后付剩下的八成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I terminated another frumentarius, Blake. He was carrying a lot of intelligence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又干掉了一个军团特务，布莱克。他身上带着很多情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know of any other frumentarii in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道在莫哈韦还有其他的军团特务吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know there are scores of them. The Legion places a lot of stock in human intelligence... and secrecy. I only knew about Blunt and Chapman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道有很多这样的人。军团非常信任人类的智慧...和保密。我只知道布伦特和查普曼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have several men inside the NCR, among the officer corps, Rangers, and even some elected officials. Damned if I know who they are, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在NCR内部有几个人，包括军官团、游骑兵，甚至一些民选官员。不过我并不知道他们是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly do you want me to do?
Infiltrate Legion territory and terminate Tullius of Prescott. There are bonuses if you liberate slaves and terrorize the Legion garrison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 渗透到军团领地，消灭普雷斯科特的图利乌斯。如果你解放奴隶并震慑军团守军，你会得到奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are two additional, optional targets in Canyon Cove, Bo Harper and John Calhoun. The first is a slave-catcher, the second a trader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 峡谷湾还有两个可选目标，博·哈珀和约翰·卡尔霍恩。 第一个是奴隶猎手，第二个是奴隶商人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you eliminate Harper and Calhoun, I'll throw in a tidy bonus. However, they are targets of opportunity. Tullius is the primary objective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你除掉哈珀和卡尔霍恩，我会给你一大笔奖金。当然，他们是次要的目标。图利乌斯是首要目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd advise you to bring any companions with you, along with ample ammunition and armament. This is going to be bloody. Are you in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你带上所有同伴，以及充足的弹药和武器。 这将是血腥的。 你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCC7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I'm in. This is what I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然参加了，这就是我该做的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to hear it. I just hope you appreciate what you're getting into. If it were me, I'd utilize a stealthboy, plant C4, then blow it all to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听你这么说。我只是希望你能珍惜你所处的环境。如果是我，我会利用隐身小子，植入C4炸药，然后把一切都毁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are the caps, along with a few extras, courtesy of the agency. And don't forget - Esther is all yours when this is done. Good luck, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是瓶盖，还有一些额外的东西，这是中介提供的。别忘了，这事结束后以斯帖就归你了。祝你好运,邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCCA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVBIISomeguy02 48 player.additem caps001 2000 player.additem stealthboy 3 player.additem WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive 4
Sorry, I'm not interested in a suicide mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我对自杀任务不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a problem, I understand. But this is it between us. No more contracts, no more contact. We are finished. Good luck to you, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，我能理解。但这是我们之间的事。没有合同，没有联系。我们搞定了。祝你好运，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_0009DCCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to speak with you about the bounty on Rolo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈关于罗洛的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, several farms in the southern part of the valley have been systematically massacred by unknown assailants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，山谷南部的几个农场被不明身份的袭击者有组织地屠杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue06Scu_000A02CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We assumed it was Legion raiding parties for a time, but that doesn't fit. The attackers aren't seizing any captives. They just up and kill everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一段时间我们以为是军团偷袭，但那不对。袭击者没有抓住任何俘虏。他们会杀了所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue06Scu_000A02CA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the Legion understands the value of a live captive. No, we suspect it's an old-school Viper crew headed up by some nut called "Rolo".
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使军团也知道活捉的价值。所以，我们怀疑是由一个叫"罗洛"的疯子领导的一个老派毒蛇帮
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue06Scu_000A02CA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for checking in with me. Here are a few things that should help you out. Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你和我联系。这里有一些东西应该可以帮助你。祝你们好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem stealthboy 1 player.additem stimpak 2 player.additem WeapGrenadeFrag 2 setobjectivecompleted aaEpilogue06 5 1
I killed Rolo, and I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了罗洛，我要领取奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, just a moment. Ok, well that finger is verified, you got that scumbag. Heathen Vipers are just as bad as the Fiends sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，稍等一下。好吧，你的手指被证实了，你干掉那个人渣了。毒蛇帮异教徒有时和恶魔帮一样邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue06Scu_000A0E6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brass is going to look real kindly on you for this one. Clearing out the worst of the raiders opens the frontier for settlers. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次上级会对你很友好的。把最坏的掠袭者赶出去，为移民开辟了边疆。良好的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0209FCED]aaEpilogue06) The Old Ways EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue06Scu_000A0E6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you travel with me, boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不和我一起旅行呢，孩子?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsHire_000A44C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaGoodGuts.bGutsHireable to 1 Set aaGutsRef.Waiting to 0
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------/\
SIFH 1 IgnoreCrime 1 set VNPCFollowers.bPlayerHasFollower to 1 set VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers to VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers + 1 set aaGutsRef.HasBeenHired to 1 ;set VNPCFollowers.bCritterInParty to 1 aaGutsRef.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 aaGutsRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaGutsRef.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 aaGutsRef.addperk CompanionSuite set aaGutsRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set aaGutsRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1 aaGutsRef.evp
They got your master, didn't they? Sorry, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们抓住了你的主人，不是吗？对不起，孩子。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsIntro_000A363F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't snarl at me. I didn't name you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要对我大吼大叫，我没有给你取名字

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsIntro_000A3641_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, fellah. I won't hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，伙计。我不会伤害你的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsIntro_000A3643_1.ogg
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsIntro_000A3644_1.ogg
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsIntro_000A3645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to make it on your own, boy.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGoodGutsHireN_000A3648_1.ogg
NPC : Guts [020A35E4] (mod) Quest : ([020A3600]aaGoodGuts) Good Dog, Guts EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\RobotUniqueRex\aaGoodGuts_aaGutsGOODBYE_000A364C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to ask you about the bounty on "Uncle Chuckles".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问问你关于“丘克尔斯叔叔”的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle fucking Chuckles, now there's one depraved sonofabitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的丘克尔斯叔叔，现在又有一个堕落的狗娘养的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000A9886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocksucker dresses up like a clown and lures kids into his house, then he fixes them for supper. Sick bastard's been at it for over ten years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那混蛋打扮得像个小丑，把孩子们引诱到他家里，然后把他们当晚餐。这个变态已经干了十多年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000A9886_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost caught him back in California, but got a rumor that he drifted to Vegas. Word is that he's behind those latest kidnappings in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们差点在加州抓到他，但有传言说他去了拉斯维加斯。有传言说他是最近自由城绑架案的幕后黑手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000A9886_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, seems lady luck might have cut us a break. Hobo by the name of Tommy Rags said he saw a clown leading a kid away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，看来幸运女神可能会让我们休息一下。一个叫汤米·拉格斯的流浪汉说他看见一个小丑把一个孩子带走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000A9886_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not the best lead, but it's something. Let this guy know that we sent you, and uh, he should open up. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不是最好的线索，但还是有意义的。让他知道是我们派你来的，他应该会敞开心扉。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000A9886_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scull said you could tell me about this "Uncle Chuckles" character.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯科尔说你可以告诉我“丘克尔斯叔叔”这个人的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, the clown! Yeah, I seen that squirrely freak shuffling near the gate, carrying balloons and promising candy to kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么?哦,小丑!是啊，我看见那个古怪的怪物在门口慢吞吞的，拿着气球，向孩子们许诺糖果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A988B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kept an eye open, watched where they went. It was an old ranch house out yonder, past the overpass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我睁大眼睛，看着他们去了哪里。那是一座古老的牧场房子，就在立交桥那边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A988B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, since I'm being so helpful, how about throwing some ends my way? Kings are a bunch of greasy tightwads, won't help at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我帮了这么大的忙，给我点好处怎么样?猫王帮是一群又肥又吝啬的人，根本帮不上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A988B_3.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: <给他100瓶盖> 当然，这里是100瓶盖

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bless you, stranger! Good luck catching that fucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝福你,陌生人!祝你抓到那个混蛋！好运!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A988F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 10 player.removeitem caps001 100 aaTommyRagsRef.additem caps001 100 setstage aaEpilogue07 15
Ain't that a bitch? You're as broke as me! Well, here's hoping you catch that sick bastard, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是个婊子吗？你和我一样穷！好吧，不管怎样，我希望你能抓住那个恶心的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A9891_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't even have 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我连100个瓶盖都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate the tip, but you need to help yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很感激你给我的小费，但你得靠自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you a piece of work? That's the last bit of valuable information you'll get from ol' Tommy, I promise you that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是个好汉吗?这是你从老汤米那里得到的最后一点有价值的信息，我保证!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A9890_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Kick him in the head> You can have the end of my boot, hobo.
ESP.TRADUIT: <踢他的头> 你可以把我的靴子拿走，流浪汉。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tommy Rags [020A9883] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Tom_000A9892_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Jubilant, Cheerful}Welcome, welcome, welcome! Step right up, have a treat! Chuckles has soda, sweets, and steak! Everything a growing body needs! {Insane laughter punctuates his announcement}
ESP.TRADUIT: {兴高采烈}欢迎，欢迎，欢迎！来吧，好好享受一下！丘克尔斯有苏打水，糖果和牛排！成长中的身体需要的一切{疯狂的笑声打断了他的宣告}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AA9F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Excited, overjoyed}Toys! Oh, the toys! Trucks, planes, dinosaurs! {Begins making playful sounds of planes, dinosaurs, bombs, etc.}If you like toys, come back to the big room, where I keep the {dramatic delivery of 'secret'}secret prize!
ESP.TRADUIT: {兴奋，欣喜若狂}玩具！哦，玩具！卡车，飞机，恐龙{开始发出飞机、恐龙、炸弹等有趣的声音。}如果你喜欢玩具，到大房间来，在那里我保存着{秘密的变戏法"}秘密奖品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AA9FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, watch out for gnomes! The fun is just starting! {Insane Laughter}
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，小心侏儒!好戏才刚刚开始呢!{疯狂的笑声}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AA9FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Transitioning from laughter}Wakey wakey! It's a beautiful morning in Chuckles' Labyrinth of Laughter! Get those stiff bones up and moving, we've got games to play!
ESP.TRADUIT: {笑声转变}醒醒！ 在丘克尔斯的迷宫里，这是一个美丽的早晨！ 让那些僵硬的骨头动起来，我们有游戏要玩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB871_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Gasping with excitement}Look at all these goodies! Riddle me this, stranger - What is put on a table, cut, but never eaten? Choose wisely!
ESP.TRADUIT: (兴奋得喘不过气来)看这些好东西!让我猜猜，陌生人--什么东西放在桌子上，切好了，却从来不吃?做出明智的选择!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB876_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Impersonating physician}Well, doctor, what we've got here is a clear case of head in ass disease. Do you concur, Dr. Poopsie? Of course you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {假扮医生}好吧，医生，我们这里有个很明显的“脑袋有病”的病例。你同意吗，便便医生?你当然知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Talking to teddy bear in instructional manner}Poopsie, this is what we call natural selection.
ESP.TRADUIT: {以教学方式与泰迪熊交谈}Poopsie，这就是我们所说的自然选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mimicking song on radio}It's a sin... how stupid you are!
ESP.TRADUIT: {模仿收音机里的歌曲}这是一种罪过......你是多么愚蠢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB87F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Faking seriousness}Oh, that was a solid choice, really. {Whispering to teddy bear}Poopsie, I think this one isn't going to make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {假装严肃}哦，这是一个不错的选择，真的。 {对泰迪熊耳语}Poopsie，我认为这个不会成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB87E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Amused at player's electrocution}Your performance is... electrifying! {Resumes laughing}
ESP.TRADUIT: {被玩家逗乐了}你的表现......令人振奋！ {继续笑}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB87D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dramatic}Oh, you're so, so close. {Maniacal laughter}Just kidding, I have no idea which one it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: {戏剧}哦，你是如此，如此接近。 {疯狂的笑声}开个玩笑，我不知道是哪一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB87C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Impersonating train in cartoonish fashion}Choo choo! Look, it's the little idiot who... couldn't! {Insane laughter ensues}
ESP.TRADUIT: {模仿卡通风格的火车}Choo choo！ 看，是那个小白痴......不能！ {疯狂的笑声随之而来}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB87B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gnomes, gnomes, gnomes! Some are loyal, some are knaves, some are spies! True gnomes never lie, knaves always lie, and spies must die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 侏儒、侏儒、侏儒!有的侏儒是忠诚的，有的侏儒是无赖，有的侏儒是间谍!真正的侏儒从不说谎，骗子总是说谎，而间谍必须死!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB883_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at that, Poopsie! This one has a brain!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB88B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well done! Dirty spies always get what's coming to them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 做得好!肮脏的间谍总能得到报应!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB88D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick a door! Any door! One will lead you out of the labyrinth, while the other two... will make you dead! {Maniacal laughter ensues}
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择一个门!任何门!一个会带你走出迷宫，而另外两个...会让你死的!{疯狂的笑声随之而来}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000AB8A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, clown. It's the collar or the grave. Your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静，小丑。是项圈还是坟墓，你选一个吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm, Chuckles doesn't like collars. Made for smelly mutts and hussies, not artists! Take that collar and stick it where the sun doesn't shine! {Laughter ensues}
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，丘克尔斯不喜欢项圈。专为臭婊子和贱货设计的，而不是艺术家！拿着项圈，把它钉在没有太阳的地方!{笑声随之而来}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surrender peacefully, and I promise no harm will come to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和平投降，我保证你不会受到伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuckles doesn't like surrender. That's for French monkeys, eating cheese and smoking unfiltered cigarettes. Harm sounds like more fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 丘克尔斯不喜欢投降。那是给法国猴子准备的，吃奶酪，抽未经过滤的香烟。伤害听起来更有趣!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, such drama! I'll be the Capulets, you be the Montagues. Have at thee, coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太戏剧化了！我是卡普利特，你是蒙泰古。打你，懦夫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not giving me any options, Chuckles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我别无选择，丘克尔斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Options? I'm a clown, not a diplomat! You tried to do the right thing, talk Chuckles down. I'll make muffins out of your brain, a fitting tribute!
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择吗?我是小丑，不是外交官！你想做正确的事，劝服丘克尔斯。我要用你的大脑做松饼，作为对你的致敬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Suddenly reflective}Chuckles knows plenty about pain. Only laughter makes it stop. The hurt from hunger... and cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: (突然沉思)丘克尔斯对痛苦很了解。只有笑声才能让它停止。饥饿带来的痛苦......寒冷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thrown from home with boy, forced to walk snowy road, no food or help. We went in the cave, hoping to get rescued.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和男孩一起被赶出家门，被迫走雪道，没有食物也没有人帮助。 我们进入洞穴，希望能获救。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hurt so much, the hunger! I couldn't stop thinking of it. Chuckles... I wanted to kill myself, save the boy. Voice said I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 饥饿太痛苦了！我不停地想。丘克尔斯...我想自杀，救那个男孩。但那个声音说我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New voices said boy had to die, it was ok! The Old Ones told me to do it! They told me it would make the pain stop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个声音说男孩必须死，没关系的!是古人们让我这么做的!他们告诉我这会让我停止疼痛!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuckles did it. The boy begged me, but I did it. It was so sweet, like veal. Chuckles had to have it again. Voices said it was ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丘克尔斯做到了。那孩子求我，但我照做了。太甜了，就像小牛肉一样。咯咯笑想再来一次。那个声音说没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuckles hurt so many. He deserves to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丘克尔斯伤害了很多人。 他该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1B_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely you weren't always like this. Did something happen to you? You must be hurting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定不是一直这样的。你出什么事了吗?你一定很痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need for violence? Stupidest thing Chuckles ever heard! {Laughing}
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要暴力？丘克尔斯听过的最愚蠢的事情!{笑}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk this about this. There's no need for violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈这个。没有必要使用暴力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do that. I must do it. I will answer for these crimes. Goodbye, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以做到。我必须做这件事。我将对这些罪行负责。再见,赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Playerref.additem aaClownKey 1 aaUncleChucklesRef.additem aaBountyCollar 1 aaUncleChucklesRef.addscriptpackage aaGenericTurnMyselfInPackage aaUncleChucklesRef.evp set aaUncleChucklesRef.Surrender to 1
Your only chance at closure is to face justice and own up to your misdeeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你唯一能了结的机会就是接受审判，承认你的罪行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liar! Chuckles knows you're a filthy liar, and... wait... I can hear them... right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骗子！丘克尔斯知道你是个卑鄙的骗子，而且...等着...我能听到他们...马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD2B_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: {神志不清，吓呆了}犹格索特斯说话了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Ones also speak to me. They say you should surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 古神也在对我说话。他们说你应该投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your wish is granted, you sick fuck. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 实现你的愿望，你这个恶心的混蛋<攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Chuckles [020A1EFA] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaUncleChucklesVoiceType\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Chu_000ACD1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we put that nut in shackles right after he strolled in. Politicians had him lined up for a show trial in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他一进来我们就给他戴上了手铐。政府安排他在加州接受公审。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, old Chuckles didn't make it to court. Joaquin was transferring him over to civilian authorities when the clown resisted arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，老丘克尔斯没能上法庭。当华金正把他移交给民政局时小丑拒捕了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subsequently, Chuckles had an accident... smashed his skull on a boulder six times. {Deeply sarcastic}Clumsy bastard had it coming, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，丘克尔斯出了意外......他的头盖骨被石头砸了六次。(非常讽刺)我猜这是笨家伙自找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ain't your problem, though. You held up your end of it, got him in jail, so you get the full reward. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那不是你的问题。你完成了自己的任务，把他送进了监狱，所以你得到了全部奖励。很棒的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaChucklesFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1000 setstage aaEpilogue07 190
Uncle Chuckles turned himself in. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丘克尔斯叔叔自首了。我想领取赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me verify that thing... yep, that's Chuckles'. Damn clowns are a fucking menace, and he was the worst of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我来验证一下......是的，这是丘克尔斯。该死的，小丑就是个威胁，而他是其中最坏的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing is one thing, but hunting down children and eating them? Well, that's something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人是一回事，但猎杀儿童并吃掉他们是另一回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD2A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brass might complain, seeing how's they wanted a trial, but here's a little secret... that little cocksucker wasn't leaving this jail alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当局可能会抱怨，因为他们想要审判，但这里有个小秘密......那小混蛋不会活着离开监狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD2A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the reward, along with a bonus on me. You earned it. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是奖励，还有我的奖金。 你赚到了。 干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020A1AC0]aaEpilogue07) The Last Laugh EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue07Scu_000ACD2A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Uncle Chuckles. I'd like to collect the reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了丘克尔斯叔叔。我想领取赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harper and Calhoun aren't Legionaries, are they? Are you asking me to kill civilians?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈珀和卡尔霍恩不是军团成员，对吧?你是要我去杀平民吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Civilians? Well, these civilians managed to capture and enslave dozens, perhaps even hundreds of Mojave residents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 平民吗?这些平民设法俘获并奴役了几十甚至上百名莫哈韦居民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000AEC27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harper habitually infiltrates NCR territory to kidnap ex-slaves and return them for a bounty. It's not too different from your day job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈珀经常潜入NCR的地盘绑架奴隶并将他们送回以获取赏金。这和你的日常工作没什么区别
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000AEC27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grandpa Calhoun is one of the chief slave traders in Legion territory. If you buy a slave in Arizona, there's a good chance it's got his brand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡尔霍恩爷爷是军团领地的主要奴隶贩子之一。如果你在亚利桑那州买一个奴隶，很有可能是他的牌子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000AEC27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have reservations about taking out these animals, that's your call. Are you still in for the hit on Tullius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对猎杀这些畜生持保留态度，那你自己决定。你还在追杀图利乌斯吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000AEC27_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something.
Then by all means, ask away.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something else.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the NCR?
It was good while it lasted, but Tandi's dream is fading, I'm afraid. The republic is simply too big for its britches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稳定的时候还不错，但恐怕坦蒂的梦想正在消退。这个共和国实在是太大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I've got a real soft spot for the NCR, but I don't see it expanding past the Mojave, at least not for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要误会我的意思，我对NCR很有好感，但我认为它不会扩展到莫哈韦沙漠之外，至少暂时不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I find myself wondering what else is out there. I mean, the Legion will fade away soon enough. What's in Texas? Dixie? The Midwest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我发现自己在想还有什么。我是说，军团很快就会消失。得克萨斯州有什么?美国南部呢?中西部地区呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR can handle the Legion, but I'm not sure if it could handle someone with their shit together, using real weaponry. Oh, well.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR 可以对付军团，但我不确定它是否可以用真正的武器对付一个人。 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war, I always suspected House was a species of pervert. There's no telling what type of debauchery he's engaged in up in that tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前，我一直怀疑豪斯是个变态。真不知道他在那座塔里都干了些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seemed the sort of man who fancied himself god, or at least god-like. Though there's no denying his brilliance, his hubris is worrisome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎是那种自以为是神的人，或者至少是像神的人。虽然他的才华无可否认，但他的傲慢令人担忧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do after the Second Battle of Hoover Dam?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二次胡佛水坝战役后你做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given my state, I try not to ponder the far future. Some people envy ghouls for our longevity, but even that has its drawbacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我的情况，我尽量不去考虑遥远的未来。有些人羡慕食尸鬼长寿，但即使这样也有缺点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless Lanius and his army of skirts sweeps through, I will stay put. The Mojave suits me, and I would be loathe to abscond prematurely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非拉尼尔斯和他的军队胜利，否则我就留在这里。莫哈韦沙漠很适合我，我可不想过早地逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
They're a gang of catamites who ritually sodomize each other with broomsticks. That is the prevailing rumor, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是一群用扫帚在仪式上鸡奸对方的恶棍。 无论如何，这是盛行的谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear travelers and traders laud the Legion from afar, citing security. They haven't seen a man crucified or children branded like cattle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到旅行者和商人在远方称赞军团的安全。他们没见过有人被钉死在十字架上，也没见过孩子像牛一样被打上烙印。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have, I won't forget it. Malo periculosam libertatem quam quietum servitium. I'll take dangerous liberty over peaceful slavery any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有，我不会忘记的，“我愿自由而有危险，但不愿安宁而受奴役”，任何时候我都会选择危险的自由而不是安全的奴隶制
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about being a ghoul?
Some ghouls constantly bemoan their state, droning on about their decay and prejudice by "smoothskins". I could give a damn what people think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些食尸鬼不断地抱怨他们的状态，唠叨他们的堕落和对“光滑皮肤”的偏见。我才不在乎别人怎么想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will outlive the bigots, and anyone bold enough to upbraid me in public will find themselves in an... unenviable position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会比那些偏执狂活得更久，任何敢在公众场合责骂我的人都会发现自己陷入......不令人羡慕的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear the grumblings of fanaticism from Jacob Powers and his sort, crying for a ghoul revolution. Hogwash, all of it. He's just a criminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到雅各布·鲍尔斯和他的那种狂热的抱怨，呼喊着一场食尸鬼革命。 都是废话，他只是个罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, courtesy is a fading commodity in the wastes, so I try to dispense it equally to both human and ghoul alike. That is all I have to say on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可悲的是，礼貌是废物中逐渐消失的商品，所以我试着把它平等地分配给人类和食尸鬼。这就是我要说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with Kate? She doesn't say much.
She's a sweet soul, but unfortunately, English is not her first language. How she came to arrive in North America is still a mystery to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是个可爱的女孩，但不幸的是，英语不是她的母语。她是如何来到北美的，这对我来说仍然是个谜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would venture to guess that she is of Slavic extraction. I honestly don't know. Our interactions are largely of a... physical nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我冒昧地猜测她是斯拉夫血统。我真的不知道。我们的互动很大程度上是一种......物理性质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Sergio out of the picture, do you think we'll see a drop-off in banditry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞尔吉奥不在了，你认为我们会看到盗匪活动减少吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firstly, please accept my heartfelt thanks for slaying that animal. To answer your question, I would venture to say... maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，请接受我衷心的感谢你杀死了那个畜生。为了回答你的问题，我冒昧地说......也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The big-name outlaws know that they're marked men out here, so they'll steer clear. However, some crazies can't be deterred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些大名鼎鼎的不法分子知道他们在这里被盯上了，所以他们会避开。然而，有些疯子是无法阻止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon the cliche, but nature abhors a vacuum, and that's what we have now. Somebody will step in to fill it soon enough, mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的陈词滥调，但大自然讨厌真空，这就是我们现在所拥有的。很快就会有人接手的，记住我的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever meet Ulysses in any of your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在旅行中遇到过尤利西斯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to forget him. We nearly came to blows in a saloon near Pahrump. He was the most self-important jackass I've ever met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想忘掉他。在帕伦普附近的一个酒馆里，我们差点打起来。他是我见过的最自大的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He couldn't play poker without blathering about politics. If they had given Ulysses an enema, he could have been buried in a matchbox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不能在不谈论政治的情况下玩扑克。 如果他们给尤利西斯灌肠，他可能会被埋在火柴盒里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He began moaning about dead nations, and I told him that if he'd been around before the war, we'd have tossed him in a padded room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他开始抱怨死去的国家，我告诉他，如果他在战前就活着，我们会把他扔进软垫病房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of it all, there were vermin residing in his weaves. Every time he sneezed, lice littered the card table. It was revolting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，他的衣服里还住着害虫。每次他一打喷嚏，扑克牌桌上就满是虱子。这是令人作呕的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he refused to doff his mask, so he was doubly indiscernible during the game. After losing a score of denarii, he shambled back outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，他还拒绝摘下面具，所以在比赛中他就更不容易被认出来了。输了二十个银币后，他蹒跚地走回门外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was the first and last time I saw Ulysses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我第一次也是最后一次见到尤利西斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the toughest person you ever met?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最坚强的人是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... I'll have to weigh that. Toughest might be another ghoul I met once, NCR Ranger by the name of Watson. Quiet, surly bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我得权衡一下。最坚强的可能是我曾经遇到的另一个食尸鬼，名叫华生的NCR游骑兵。安静,粗暴的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folks talk about Joshua Graham and the Judge, but I'd wager that Watson would scalp those twits in a heartbeat. Cold eyes and steady hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们都在谈论约书亚·格雷厄姆和审判官，但我敢打赌华生会瞬间剥下这两个蠢货的头皮。冷酷的眼神和坚定的双手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't around him long, but it was enough to feel him out. Something was off about him... not malign, but just... secretive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然在他身边的时间不长，但已经足够了解他了。他有点不对劲......不是恶意，只是......神秘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's odd is that his partner is the most bombastic, drunken fool I've ever met, another ranger named Josey. He pissed himself and started a brawl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是，他的搭档是我见过的最夸夸其谈，最醉醺醺的傻瓜，另一个叫乔西的游骑兵。他撒尿，然后开始打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watson and Josey were good friends, though. You couldn't cross one without agitating the other. Suffice to say Josey did most of the agitating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 华生和乔西是好朋友。你不可能越过其中一个而不刺激另一个。我只想说，大部分都是乔西鼓动的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to like Guts. What's the problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像不喜欢古茨。有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was silent out of politeness, but since you're inquiring... he's a drooling, hair-hacking meatbag, constantly pissing and growling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出于礼貌保持沉默，但既然你问了他就是个流着口水，剪着头发的肉饼，不停地撒尿和咆哮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That mongrel makes a habit of trying to copulate with my shins, staining my trousers in the process. You'd be better off with a goat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那条杂种狗总是想和我的小腿交媾，结果弄脏了我的裤子。你最好还是养只山羊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve, stranger! We were just sitting down to dinner, why don't you join us? Come in, come get a bite to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣母，陌生人！我们刚坐下来吃晚饭，你为什么不一起吃呢？进来，来吃点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B1297_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for joining us. We thought one of our neighbors might stop by, so we set an extra place at the table. Would you like to say grace?
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您加入我们。 我们认为我们的一个邻居可能会过来，所以我们在桌子上多放了一个位置。 你想做祷告吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B129D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet he'll play a mean harmonica in hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌他在地狱里吹口琴一定很厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是给约瑟夫的，你这个笨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the signal, and I'll put one right between the eyes of this libelous scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我信号，我就在这个诽谤的人渣两眼之间开一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would appear we are late to the festivities. They even killed his lovely mistress. Such a waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们要迟到了。他们甚至杀了他可爱的情妇。真是浪费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As well as can be, Doc. I hope that partner isn't making life too difficult for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以，医生，希望这个搭档没让你过得太艰难
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvDocR_000B29D6_1.ogg

NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvDocR_000B29D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same as always, Doc. Not much changes in the jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一如既往，医生。 监狱里的变化不大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvDocR_000B29DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Impossible, Captain. I lead a life of pleasure and ease. It's the only way to live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能的,上尉。我过着快乐安逸的生活。这是唯一的生活方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joaquin, only thing you've caught was herpes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 华金，你唯一染上的是疱疹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvJoaq_000B29EE_1.ogg

NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvJoaq_000B29EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, captain, I've tracked down more outlaws than all these bounty hunters combined. I've walked the desert for weeks, never stopping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，上尉，我抓到的逃犯比这些赏金猎人加起来还多。我在沙漠里走了几个星期，从来没有停下来过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinConvSc_000B29F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God's honest truth, captain. It was One-Eyed Juanito, wanted for... being a pederass! Tracked him into a canyon, shot him through the eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝作证，上尉。是独眼胡安尼托，一个被通缉的恋童癖 !我追踪到一个峡谷，射穿了他的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinConvSc_000B29F5_1.ogg

NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvJoaq_000B29F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Joaquin - that's enough, I can't hear myself think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，华金--够了，我无法思考了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullConvJoaq_000B29F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell, Comrade Powers. You can carry the revolution with you to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，鲍尔斯同志。你可以把革命带到地狱去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good lord, that is one corn-fed sombitch of a mutant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，那是一个吃玉米的变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said the bounty on this monster was 250 caps? We have been bamboozled, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说这个怪物的赏金是250瓶盖?我们被骗了，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not every day you get to see Old Glory... it's a little odd, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是每天你都能看到星条旗...事实上，这有点奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She died as she lived - like a whore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她活着和死了一样--像个妓女
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Doc Friday [0200159B] (mod) Quest : ([020A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, sure, let's see what you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们看看你有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFingerGe_000B3B78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to turn in some generic fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想交出一些普通的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will know my name is &PCName; when I lay my vengeance upon thee! <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我向你复仇的时候，你会知道我的名字是 &PCName; ！ <攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. God is great, God is good. Let us thank Him for our food. Amen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。上帝是伟大的，上帝是善良的。让我们感谢他赐予我们食物。阿们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. And what brings you to Canyon Cove?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,陌生人。什么风把你吹来峡谷湾了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sorry, I just assumed. We just forget that not everyone believes like us. I'll be happy to say grace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我只是以为。我们只是忘了不是每个人都像我们一样虔诚。我很乐意做祷告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bless us, O Lord, and these, thy gifts, which we are about to receive from thy bounty. Through Christ, our lord. Amen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，保佑我们，保佑我们即将从你的慷慨中得到的礼物。通过我主基督，阿门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B8E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what brings you to Canyon Cove?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹来峡谷湾了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B8E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? All right, I'll take you at your word. Meet me outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?好吧，我相信你的话。外面等我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on urgent business concerning the Legion. We need to speak in private.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来处理军团的紧急事务的。我们需要私下谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, but it can wait until we're done with dinner. Are you some sort of merchant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但可以等我们吃完晚饭再说。你是商人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is sort of awkward, but my business is with you. Any chance we can talk somewhere else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然有点尴尬，但我是来找你的。我们能换个地方谈谈吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't want it to play out like this, but the NCR sent me to put you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不希望变成这样，但NCR派我来放倒你

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill you and your entire family. Just kidding! Actually, that's the truth. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要杀了你和你全家。只是开个玩笑!对不起，这是事实。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? You... {Recognizes player's intentions}Sandra, David - run!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,什么?你......{意识到玩家的意图}桑德拉，大卫-快跑!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with the portrait of Caesar? You all must really love the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒的肖像是怎么回事？ 你们一定真的很喜欢军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unsure, nervous} We honor the spirit of our late father, the Son of Mars, Conquerer of 87 Tribes. Surely Lanius will avenge him and conquer all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不确定，紧张}我们尊敬我们已故的父亲的精神，火星的儿子，87个部落的征服者。拉尼尔肯定会为他报仇，征服一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unsure, nervous} We love our great father, the Son of Mars, Conquerer of 87 Tribes, may he guide our every action.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不确定，紧张}我们爱我们伟大的父亲，火星之子，87 个部落的征服者，愿他指导我们的每一个行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, you're not from the east, are you? {Sighs in relief}I thought you were a speculator from Flagstaff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你不是从东方来的吧?(如释重负)我还以为你是来自弗拉格斯塔夫的投机者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what are you doing here?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you always talk about Caesar like that? He's just a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是这样谈论凯撒吗？ 他只是一个普通人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Shocked and dismayed}You... you don't know what you're saying! Are you mad? Is this some sort of test? {Tone steadies}Wait, you're not from the east, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {震惊和沮丧}你...你知道你在说什么吗！ 你疯了吗？ 这是某种测试吗？ {语气稳定}等等，你不是来自东方，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what are you doing here?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the dinner, but I really should be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你请我共进晚餐，但我真的该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So soon? Well, if you insist. It was nice of you to stop by. Please be sure to take some food with you. Vale et bonam fortunam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么快?好吧，如果你坚持的话。你能来真是太好了。请一定带上些食物。再会，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3B9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, it's just us now. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，现在只有我们了。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR has a price on your head, and I'm here to collect. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在悬赏你的人头，我是来收走它的。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be on a cross, profligate!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I brought you out here so that your family won't see you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把你带出来是为了不让你的家人看到你死去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E99_1.ogg

NPC : Bo Harper [020AED1B] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult05\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3E99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a price on your head, Calhoun. I'm here to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人悬赏要你的人头，卡尔霍恩。我来收钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Genuinely cannot hear}What? Rice on the shed? I can't understand you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {真的听不到}什么?棚子里有米饭吗?我不明白你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing more rewarding than watching your grandchildren grow up. Do you have any kids, stranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比看着你的孙子长大更有意义的了。你有孩子吗，陌生人?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whisper> I'm gonna bleed you slow, old man. Payback from the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: <耳语> 我要慢慢放掉你的血，老头。这是NCR的回报

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Flustered, unable to hear}I can feed myself, thank you very much. I'm old, but not helpless!
ESP.TRADUIT: {慌张，听不清}我可以自己吃饭，非常感谢。我老了，但并不无助!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to hear. They're such a blessing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到这些。 他们真是太幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我能为您做点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. {Awkward shift in tone}So, what's your business with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。(语气很尴尬)那么，跟我有什么关系?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, that's actually a matter of contention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这其实是个有争议的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. {Awkward shift in tone}So, what's your business with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。(语气很尴尬)那么，跟我有什么关系?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll be on my way now.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said I am going to kill you!
Phil Yute? Oh, he died back in 68', year of the drought. You should have seen it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 菲尔·尤特？ 哦，他在 68 年，也就是干旱年去世了。 你应该已经看到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna cut out your heart and mail it to Lanius, then I'll piss on your grave and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你的心挖出来寄给拉尼尔斯，然后在你的坟墓上撒一泡尿......

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you so upset about? You need to learn to speak up, enunciate, project!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么难过？你需要学会说话，发音，计划！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EAF_1.ogg

NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EB3_1.ogg

NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EB4_1.ogg

NPC : John Calhoun [020AEDA9] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B3EB5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一百个手指可以上交。
