ESP.TRADUIT: 我有两个手指可以上交。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullFingerGe_000B6004_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have one finger to turn in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个手指可以上交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to ask you about the bounty on Henry Helm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问问你关于亨利·赫尔姆的赏金问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, things sure have gone from bad to worse up in Valle del Hierro since you dusted Sergio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，自从你清扫了塞尔吉奥之后，瓦尔耶德罗的情况就越来越糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't know much about this Helm character, except that he's stepped in and gotten the place stirred up again, drawing in raiders from all over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们对这个赫尔姆不太了解，只知道他又来搅乱了这个地方，吸引了来自各地的掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor is he used to run with the 80's, but ended up splitting to form his own band down here. {Sarcastic}Apparently he's quite charismatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说他以前和80帮的人混在一起，但后来解散了在这里组建了自己的组织。(讽刺)显然他很有魅力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, uh, his band of savages are raiding up north, hitting caravans and... {disgusted}eating people. Yeah, you heard me right - it's Helm's trademark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，他的野蛮人正在向北袭击，袭击商队和...{厌恶}吃人。你没听错，这是赫尔姆的标志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of it all, he's shipped in new talent: Fiends, 80's, Vipers, anyone and everyone who wants in on that action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，他还在引进了新人:恶魔帮、80帮、毒蛇帮，以及任何想要参与其中的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's 1,000 caps on Helm, and we want him dead. Brass wants to make an example out of him in his own backyard. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赫尔姆的人头值1000瓶盖，我们要他死。布拉斯想在自家后院拿他杀鸡儆狗。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6638_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to collect the reward on Henry Helm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想领取亨利·赫尔姆的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see... yep, that's him. Cannibal bastard was practically begging us to come after him. Guess he got his wish, huh? Great work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看...是的,就是他。那个食人杂种简直是在求我们去追他。看来他如愿以偿了?伟大的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([020B4618]aaEpilogue08) All The Devils Are Here EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaEpilogue_aaEpilogue08Scu_000B6992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mission in Canyon Cove was a success. Tullius is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在峡谷湾的任务成功了。 图留斯死了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B6998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is simply no precedent for this... I doubt anyone else could have pulled it off. On behalf of the Republic and the Agency, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是没有先例的。我怀疑没人能做到。我代表共和国当局，感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B6998_2.ogg

NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B6998_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if aaEstherNVBIIRef.Killed != 1 set SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus to 2 aaEstherNVBIIREF.disable aaEstherNVBIIREF.markfordelete endif
Solid work. As promised, here's a bonus. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 扎实的工作。如我承诺的，这是奖金。还有别的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solid work. As promised, here's a bonus. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 扎实的工作。如我承诺的，这是奖金。还有别的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699B_1.ogg

NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther cut another deal with us. Seems she was saving her trump card for last, pretty damn shrewd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯帖又跟我们做了一笔交易，看来她把王牌留到最后了，相当精明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She offered to ID a mole in the agency in exchange for safe passage to Reno. We accepted - she's gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她愿意指认局里的内奸以换取安全前往新里诺。我们接受了，她走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever business you had with her will have to wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你和她有什么关系，都得等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Esther? Where can I find her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯帖呢？ 我在哪里可以找到她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure if you were going to work out, but I'm glad we reached out to you. I'm hoping this is the beginning of a long partnership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你能不能成功，但我很高兴我们联系了你。我希望这是我们长期合作的开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as another job opens up that requires your unique skillset, we'll get in touch with you. Take care, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦有新的工作机会需要你的独特技能，我们就会联系你。保重，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to free some of the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法解放了一些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent work. {Sardonic}Now we just have to figure out what to do with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 优秀的工作。{讽刺}现在我们只需要想想怎么处理它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent work. {Sardonic}Now we just have to figure out what to do with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 优秀的工作。{讽刺}现在我们只需要想想怎么处理它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B699D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to free a few of the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法解放了几个奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you'll regret letting her go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你会后悔让她走的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, maybe not. Her intel was good, so we honored the deal. Something tells me she'll get hers in good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是,也许不是。她的情报很可靠，所以我们遵守了协议。直觉告诉我，她会及时得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A2_1.ogg

NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is bullshit. I want that bitch's head on a platter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是胡说八道。 我只想把那个婊子的头放在盘子里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen closely. She offered to give up a Legion mole inside my agency. Do you know how many lives I saved by making the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请听清楚。她提出供出我局里的一个军团内奸。你知道我做了这笔交易救了多少人的命吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn bounty hunters only think about the here and now, don't care about the big picture. Esther is an asset now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的赏金猎人只考虑眼前，不关心大局。以斯帖现在很有价值
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a drink, a smoke, get laid, whatever it takes to forget about Esther. Sometimes you just have to let them go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喝酒，抽烟，躺下，不惜一切代价忘掉以斯帖。有时候你得放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A3_3.ogg

NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B69A3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you come to kill us, Courier? We will bathe in your blood, we will grind your bones, we will show you pain. Welcome to hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你是来杀我们的，邮差？ 我们将沐浴在您的血液中，我们将磨碎您的骨头，我们将向您展示痛苦。 欢迎来到地狱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B781C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are strong, Courier. I will honor your strength by feasting on your flesh! You will beg for mercy when my hounds rip you apart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很强大，邮差。我会以你的力量为荣，吃你的肉!等我的猎犬把你撕成碎片，你就会求饶!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B7824_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are close, so close. Yet you have so far to go. Do you have the courage to follow me into the darkest depths? I will take your soul!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很接近了，很接近了。但你还有很长的路要走。你有勇气跟随我走进最黑暗的深处吗?我要带走你的灵魂!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B782F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I almost forgot - I have some good news. Since you've made such a dent around here, the brass has approved generic bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我差点忘了，我有个好消息。既然你在这里取得了这么大的成就，上级批准你执行通用赏金任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullExtraBou_000B7B28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What that means is that you can submit fingers from raider captains or other bigwigs. The payout isn't as good, but it's steady income.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着你可以交出掠夺者队长或其他大人物的手指。虽然收益不高，但收入稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullExtraBou_000B7B28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, just bring them in, and we'll cash you out, sort of like a casino. But with, you know, bloody, rotten fingers. Oh, well. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，把他们带进来，我们会把你的钱兑现，就像赌场一样。你知道的，带血的，腐烂的手指。哦,好吧。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry Scull [0201AF2C] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleOld01\aaScullDia_aaScullExtraBou_000B7B28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Adam Calhoun, Explorer, Tenth Cohort, Second Century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是亚当·卡尔霍恩，第二百人队第十组，探险家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Calhoun [020AFA0A] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters

ESP.ORIGINAL: You murdered my family, and now I will bury my sword in your guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了我的家人，现在我要把剑插进你的内脏!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Calhoun [020AFA0A] (mod) Quest : ([0200A1FB]aaEncounters) Ambushes & Random Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult02\aaEncounte_aaEncountersAda_000B8133_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laughing}You are a fool to come here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B846E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too many of our brothers and sisters have fallen at your hands. Motor-Runner, Eileen, Lobo, Queenie, all gone because of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有太多的兄弟姐妹死在你手中。摩托车手，艾琳，罗波，奎尼，都是因为你而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B846E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more, Courier. I will dine on your living guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用了，邮差。我要用你的内脏下饭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B846E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we move this along? I'm on a schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能继续吗？我有个计划

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you too good to speak? You'll scream soon enough, worm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好得说不出话来？ 你很快就会尖叫，蠕虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B8470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Considering some of my past daliances, you might contract something from eating my guts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我过去的一些习惯，你可能会因为吃了我的内脏而患上某种疾病。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a figure of speech, you imbecile, I meant... fuck, I'll, I'll roast your skin and make a malt out of your capillaries!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种修辞，你这个笨蛋，我是说...妈的，我要烤了你的皮肤用你的毛细血管做麦芽!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B8472_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you've done so far is growl like a jackass. Can you even use that hammer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，你只会像驴子一样咆哮。你会用那把锤子吗?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blood-Hammer [02090B7D] (mod) Quest : ([0208BEAE]aaNVBIISomeguy01) New Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaBloodHammerVoiceType\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000B8473_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Born and raised in Shady Sands, I've got the bear in my blood. Grandfather and father both served, so I enlisted at seventeen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在林荫沙地出生长大，我的血液里流淌着熊的血液。祖父和父亲都当过兵，所以我十七岁就入伍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamYourBa_000BAD69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did tours all over, even down in Baja, before they sent me out here with the Rangers back in '75.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在75年游骑兵把我派到这里之前，我去过很多地方，甚至巴哈岛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamYourBa_000BAD69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion ambush ruined my leg, so I've been with the agency since. Seen a lot. Done a lot. I do miss the... clarity of front-line combat sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团伏击毁了我的腿，所以我就一直在局里工作。见过很多。做了很多。我很想念...前线战斗的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamYourBa_000BAD69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's simple out there in the bush, just kill the enemy. This game is a damn web of secrecy, lies, mistrust... it can make you cynical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在丛林里很简单，杀了敌人就行了。这个游戏是一张该死的秘密、谎言、不信任的网络......会让你变得愤世嫉俗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamYourBa_000BAD69_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd love to be out there with you, kid. It's just not in the cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想和你一起，孩子。只是不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wickham [02095997] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\aaWickhamVoiceType\aaScullDia_aaWickhamYourBa_000BAD69_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going after Tullius. Can you tell me anything about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要追捕图留斯。 你能告诉我关于他的任何事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprised}I expected you to kill some frumentarii, not raid Arizona. I suppose I can't criticize you for taking full measure, can I?
ESP.TRADUIT: {惊讶}我没想到你会去杀几个军团特务，而不是去袭击亚利桑那。我想我不能因为你采取了全面措施而批评你，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000BBBF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tullius is famous for his methods of pacifying and indoctrinating fresh slaves, ensuring they're docile and pliable before shipping them east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 图利乌斯以安抚和灌输新生奴隶的方法而闻名，在把他们运往东方之前确保他们温顺听话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000BBBF8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are the usual treatments - whipping, crucifixion, having slaves ripped to pieces by hounds... but his trademark punishment is unique.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有常见的惩罚方法--鞭打、钉十字架、让奴隶被猎犬撕成碎片...但他标志性的惩罚是独一无二的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000BBBF8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tullius supposedly lives on a perch overlooking the canyon, from which he will personally throw unruly slaves to their deaths
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说图利乌斯住在俯瞰峡谷的高处，他会亲自把不守规矩的奴隶扔到那里处死
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000BBBF8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Tullius would be a major blow to the Legion, as well as the slave trade in the Mojave. You have my respect, if only for your audacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死图利乌斯对军团和莫哈韦的奴隶贸易来说都是沉重的打击。我尊敬你，即使只是因为你的大胆
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [02096241] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaNVBIISom_aaNVBIISomeguy0_000BBBF8_5.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [0209D9BD] (mod) Quest : ([020911BD]aaNVBIISomeguy02) Enemy of My Enemy EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, hey Captain, this here ain't the only bounty hunter around. You know about that time I caught one-eyed Juanito?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，他不是这里唯一的赏金猎人。你还记得那次我抓到独眼胡安尼托吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2793_1.ogg

NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I smell... entitlement. Yeah, I'm talking about you, fancy pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我闻到了...津贴。是啊，我说的是你，漂亮的裤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279D_1.ogg

NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain, I tell you I went down to Karl's Kandy? Ain't much surprises me anymore, but when that hooker jammed her finger up my ass...
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，我告诉过你我去了卡尔·康提?我已经没什么好惊讶的了，但是当那个妓女把手指塞进我屁眼里时...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Captain, I'd like to put in a formal request for transfer to some place where there ain't so many pussies around. Like... anywhere but here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，我想提交一份正式申请调到一个没那么娘娘腔的地方去。就像......除了这里的任何地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was it somebody dangerous this time? A hooker with a pistol in her cooch? Maybe a hobo with a rusty spoon. You must draw that hazard pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次是什么危险人物吗?一个阴道里藏着手枪的妓女?也许是拿着生锈勺子的流浪汉。你必须领取危险津贴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can smell that nasty finger from here. Almost as rank as you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这就能闻到那几乎和你一样恶心的手指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2794_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gonna have to get you a special commendation for stomping the fuck out of retards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得给你个特别的嘉奖因为你把白痴们都揍得稀巴烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2795_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you masturbate to them posters, don't you? Don't deny it, you know you do. I can see you getting jumpy like a dog in heat when you eye 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你对着海报手淫，对吧?别否认，你知道的。当你看着他们的时候，我能看到你像发情的狗一样兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2796_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill another hobo? I feel safer already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死另一个流浪汉？ 我已经感觉更安全了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain, you ever been to the Ultra-Luxe? I went there once but got myself banned after I shit in their fountain. Fucking mime freaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，你去过超美多赌场吗?我去过一次，但因为在喷泉里拉屎被禁了。该死的哑剧怪人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you at least do something good with them caps... like having a hooker stick her tongue in your ass. That's money well spent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你至少用这些瓶盖干点好事......就像让妓女把她的舌头插进你的屁股，这钱花得值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you gonna do if we run out of hobos for you to shoot? Shit, you might have to get a real job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果流浪汉都没了，你要怎么办?靠，你得找份正经工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotta keep them retards in line. Taxpayer dollars hard at work right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得让这些弱智守规矩。花着纳税人的钱在这里努力工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back tomorrow and we'll have another one. Shit don't never change around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明天再来，我们会有另一个。这里的情况永远不会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain, who sings Johnny Guitar? We need to put a bounty on that twat. Fuck Johnny and his shitty guitar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，Johnny Guitar是谁唱的?我们得悬赏那个混蛋。操约翰尼和他的烂吉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain, sometimes... I wish them buttfucker lesbianaries from over the river would come over and wipe us out, just so I wouldn't have to work here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉,有时......我真希望河那边那些该死的女同性恋能过来把我们干掉，这样我就不用在这里工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assholes of the world are getting richer while I twiddle my dick here in Shitheel City. No fucking justice, Captain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上的混蛋们越来越有钱了而我却在恶棍之城鬼混。没有正义可言，上尉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D279F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, when you gonna starting sharing some of that bounty money? Stingy motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你打算什么时候开始分享赏金?吝啬的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2797_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this war is done, I'm gonna find that asshat top who put me here, and I'm gonna choke that fucker till he shits his pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等这场战争结束，我会找到那个把我关在这里的混蛋，我要掐死那混蛋，直到他尿裤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Captain, you ever wonder what it would be like to fuck a Lakelurk? I mean, just... thinking. Bet they got good lubrication, but the claws...
ESP.TRADUIT: 上尉，你有没有想过和湖沼蟹上床是什么感觉?我的意思是,只是......想想。肯定润滑得很好，但爪子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27AA_1.ogg

NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want a reward? How about this carrot down here in my pants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要奖励吗?我裤子里的胡萝卜怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27AD_1.ogg

NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D27AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You out there killing half of creation and I'm stuck in this fuckhole of jail. God hates me, that's what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在外面杀了半个世界的人而我却被困在这该死的监狱里。上帝恨我，就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2799_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like carrying them nappy fingers around like some kind of psycho?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢像疯子一样拿着沾尿的手指到处走吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joaquin [0201CBEA] (mod) Quest : ([0201AF2F]aaScullDialogue) Scull and Co.'s Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NewVegasBountiesII.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaScullDia_aaJoaquinBounty_000D2798_1.ogg

Badass Quick Draw makes all of your weapon equipping and holstering 100% faster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拔枪和收枪的速度提升了100%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've found undeniable proof of Arthur Ribben's identity. You should confront him and present this evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了关于阿瑟·里本真实身份的不可辩驳的证据。你须要与他当面对质并展示给他看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mongol Kid has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蒙格尔·基德向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Emmett Curry, a known leader in the Vipers organization. He is wanted for murder, armed robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted at El Dorado Gas & Service, along with several Vipers. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Emmett Curry's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 埃米特·卡里，他是一个毒蛇帮组织的头。他因为谋杀、军火抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人在某个汽修站见到。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有拥有执照的专业人士才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The meeting site for Red Bear and Mather is strangely empty. You have the distinct feeling that you're being watched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊和马瑟的会见地点空无一人。你突然感到自己正在被人监视。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The victim is heavily drugged, and unable to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 受害者已经神志不清，一句话也说不出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc Friday has returned to the Short Stick Saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 星期五医生回到了短棍沙龙

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find Janie's corpse, and it's apparent that she suffered torture, abuse, and sexual assault at the hands of her captors. There also appears to be a small, crumpled note inside her pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了珍妮的尸体，很明显，她在死前受到过来自绑架者的折磨、凌辱、强奸。在她的口袋里，你摸出一份褶皱的小笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sam Burrow has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆·伯罗向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The slavers have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子把俘虏绑起来准备运输。绳子扎进了他的手腕。他显然遭受过虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to his fate.
The slavers have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子把俘虏绑起来准备运输。绳子扎进了她的手腕。她显然遭受过虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to her fate.
With Aaron Flagg dead, you've lost your best source for information on Red Bear. You should gain entry into his quarters and scour the room for possible leads on Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着艾伦·弗拉格的死，你失去了关于红熊的最佳信息来源。你应该到他的屋子里去找找，看看有没有什么新的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hastily-written note was apparently written by a captive of Red Bear. It prompts you to search under the bedroll for a holotape, and after a quick sweep you discover the document. You glance over the notes and see a reference to Slade, the local Viper leader. As you continue to scan the letter, you hear someone approach...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张字迹潦草的笔记是一个红熊的俘虏写的，它提示你在床下寻找一份磁带。经过仔细搜寻，你很快找到了它。你接着往下读，笔记上提到了当地毒蛇帮的领导人--斯雷德。你正想继续看下去的时候，你听到了从远处传来的脚步声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ledger details Shadow Company's recent transactions, and indicates Red Bear will be delivering a shipment of weapons to the Jackals at a location north of the Highway Patrol Station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这跟总账记录着暗影公司最近的交易情况，并指出红熊正在向豹狼帮交付一箱武器，地点在高速公路巡逻站的北面某处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's apparent that something went wrong in the meeting between the Jackals and Red Bear. You should investigate the corpses for information on what transpired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来豹狼帮和红熊的会面发生了一些问题。你应该调查一下尸体，看能否找到有用的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This caravan was recently ransacked, and it appears several of the victims were apprehended by an unknown party. You should investigate further and determine the origin of the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这支商队最近被洗劫过，看来有几名受害者被不明人士逮捕了。你应该进一步调查并确定袭击的起因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The captive, while initially shocked, embraces you for your kindness and then flees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 俘虏们很震惊，在反应过来后一个接一个与你拥抱，向你表示感激，然后就都快速逃离了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have sold the captive to a nearby mercenary company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把奴隶卖给了附近的一个雇佣兵公司。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You slit the helpless captive's throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你割断了无助的俘虏的喉咙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you approach the shack, you discern the sound of several men engaged in an intense argument. After listening for a few tense seconds, you hear one man shout, "Where's the Legion gold? We want our cut, goddamit!", and then gunfire ensues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着你靠近小屋，你听到几个人正在强烈地争吵。不一会儿，只听一个人喊道：“军团的金子在哪？我们要我们的份，操！”然后枪声就响起来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Pancho Cortina. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near the southern passage. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Pancho Cortina's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 潘乔·科迪纳。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在南方通道附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking your advice to heart, Matt Jackson drifts away, his fate uncertain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的建议牢记在心，马特·杰克森渐渐离去，去面对他未知的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As Matt Jackson ambles away from the graves of his father and brothers, he signals Red Bear's destination: Mt. Charleston. Jackson then drifts into the horizon, his fate uncertain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正当马特·杰克森离他父母的坟墓越走越远时，他转身告诉了你红熊的目的地：查尔斯顿山。然后杰克森渐渐消失在地平线，去面对他未知的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Palo Peto. He is wanted for murder, arson, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Monte Carlo Suites. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Palo Peto's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 帕罗·佩托。他因为谋杀、纵火和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在蒙特卡洛宾馆附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've killed Allen Rogers, and without evidence to justify your actions, it is tantamount to murder. This voids any chance of collecting a reward for the bounty on Arthur Ribben.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀死了艾伦·罗杰斯。由于没有足够的证据证明你的判断，你的行为等同与谋杀。因此你无法领取阿瑟·里本的任何赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Trigger. He is wanted for rape, assault, and other felonies. He was last sighted near his shack south of Cottonwood Cove. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Trigger's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏特里戈。他因为强奸、袭击和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在科特伍德洞穴南面他自己的小屋附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By helping Doc Friday, you've earned his friendship. He may now be recruited at any time at the Short Stick Saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过帮助“星期五”医生找回他兄弟的警徽，你赢得了他的友谊。你可以随时在“短棍”沙龙邀请他与你同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Alvord has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·奥尔沃德向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True to his word, Red Bear has escaped the Mojave, and he will never return. Instead of facing justice, he will live out the rest of his days in relative leisure and tranquility. You will have to live with your decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊信守诺言，他彻底离开了莫哈维，而且永远也不会回来了。逃离了法律的审判，他剩下的日子将活得轻松而平静。而你不得不沿着你的决定走下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮已把俘虏绑起来准备运送。绳子扎进了她的手腕。她显然遭受过她们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to her fate.
The Fiends have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮已把俘虏绑起来准备运送。绳子扎进了他的手腕。他显然遭受过她们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to his fate.
Uncle Chuckles has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丘克尔斯叔叔已经向NCR当局自首，你可以找拉里·斯卡尔上尉领取赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of "Four-Fingered John" Alvord. He is wanted for armed robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Mole Rat Ranch accompanied by multiple gang members. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit John Alvord or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏“四指”约翰·奥尔沃德。他因为抢劫军火和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在鼹鼠农场附近，与他一起的还有多个多个来自不同帮派的成员。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Queenie, the new leader of the Fiends. She is wanted for murder, armed robbery, and other felonies. She was last sighted at Duckwater Cavern, along with numerous Fiends. She is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Queenie's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 奎尼，恶魔帮的新领导人。她因为谋杀、军火抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。她上一次被人见到是达克沃特洞穴，旁边还有大量恶魔帮成员。她持有武器，是个危险分子，只有拥有执照的武器专业人士才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Doug Rude. He is wanted for manslaughter resulting from dueling. He was last sighted near Goodsprings. He is to be considered armed and extremely dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Doug Rude or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 道格·鲁德。他因为在决斗中杀人被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在清泉镇附近。他持有武器，是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arthur Ribben has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿瑟·里本向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the capture of "Bloody Brad" Jamison. He is wanted for Robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Harper's Shack. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Brad Jamison or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏“血腥的”布拉德·杰米森。他因为抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在哈珀的小屋附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While cautiously checking beneath the deck of cards, you discover a brass key. Perhaps it will open the gate in to the next chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在仔细检查一副纸牌下方时，你发现了一把黄铜钥匙。也许它能打开通向下一个房间的门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doug Rude has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 道格·鲁德向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The note indicates that Red Kelly and his brothers will soon be returning from a raid. It would behoove you to set up an ambush outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔记的内容指出，莱德·凯莉和她的兄弟们马上就会从抢劫的路上归来。给他们设个埋伏看来是个相当好的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Powder Gangers have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮已把俘虏绑起来准备运送。绳子扎进了他的手腕。他显然遭受过的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to his fate.
The Powder Gangers have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮已把俘虏绑起来准备运送。绳子扎进了她的手腕。她显然遭受过的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to her fate.

The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the capture of George Hardin. He is wanted for murder and other felonies. He was last sighted en route to Valle del Hierro. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit George Hardin or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以1000个瓶盖悬赏 乔治·哈丁。他因为谋杀和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在瓦尔德耶罗。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1,000 caps for the capture of Albert Quisling. He is wanted for High Treason and sharing state secrets with Caesar's Legion. He was last sighted at Cottonwood Cove. He should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Albert Quisling or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以1000个瓶盖悬赏 艾伯特·奎斯琳。他因为叛国、通敌和向凯撒军团投降被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在科顿伍德洞穴。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。
通缉: 艾伯特.奎斯琳

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You discover the passage empty, and with little sign of Pancho's presence. You do notice a teddy bear nearby, which has been cruelly skewered with a combat knife. Perhaps you should investigate the note pinned to the bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现走廊空空如也，没有任何关于潘乔踪迹的迹象。你看到附近有一个泰迪熊，它被刀严重划伤。或许你可以调查一下钉在熊身上的那张笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This slave is wearing a slave collar rigged with powerful explosives. It will take considerable skill to disarm the device.
(Explosives of 35 or higher or Science of 45 or higher required to disarm.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个奴隶戴着一个装有强力炸药的奴隶项圈。拆除这个装置需要相当的技巧。
(接触炸药需要爆破35或科学45以上)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to his fate.

This slave is wearing a slave collar rigged with powerful explosives. It will take considerable skill to disarm the device.
(Explosives of 35 or higher or Science of 45 or higher required to disarm.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个奴隶戴着一个装有强力炸药的奴隶项圈。拆除这个装置需要相当的技巧。
(接触炸药需要爆破35或科学45以上.)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to her fate.

With the collapse of the Mojave's private bounty hunting firms, the market now favors individuals with the skill and fortitude to collect bounties alone. Short on manpower and at the fringes of its territory, the NCR is actively sponsoring bounty hunters who can bring the Mojave's most notorious outlaws to justice. Anyone can acquire a license, regardless of their affiliation, karma or creed. Speak to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail to become a NCR-sponsored bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在莫哈维的私人赏金公司瘫痪之后，市场开始需求具有熟练技巧的独立个人来完成赏金任务。由于领地内缺少足够的人手，NCR开始大力资助赏金猎人们捕捉那些尚未受到法律严惩的罪犯之徒。任何人都可以获得一张执照，而不管他们从属于什么样的机构，或有着怎样的品行。在巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉负责办理此事。祝你早日成为NCR官方批准的赏金猎人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A small inscription reads: "Gnome #3 is a knave."
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面刻着:“侏儒#3是个无赖。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Red Kelly. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Spring Mountain Ranch. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Red Kelly's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 莱德·凯莉。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在春泉山农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A small inscription reads: "Gnome #1 is a loyal gnome."
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面刻着：“侏儒#1是一个忠诚的侏儒。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find a harmonica that has been jammed into Mr. Fisk's throat. It is engraved with the intials "S.B.". Since it was undoubtedly inserted post-mortem, you should submit this evidence to Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现在菲斯克先生的喉咙里卡着一个口琴。上面雕刻着“S.B.”。毫无疑问这是他死后被塞进去的，你应该把这个证据交给斯科尔上尉检验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A small inscription reads: "I am the spy!"

The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the termination of the Viper chief known as "Rolo". He is wanted for murder and terrorism. He was last sighted near the Raided Farmstead. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Rolo's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR 悬赏 1000 瓶盖，干掉名为“罗洛”的毒蛇帮首领。 他因谋杀和恐怖主义而被通缉。 他最后一次出现在遭劫的农庄附近。 他被认为是武装和危险的，只能由武装专业人士追捕。 要领取赏金，请将罗洛之死的证据提交给巨石城监狱的拉里·斯卡尔上尉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is scant indication of Red Bear's presence. Perhaps you should continue up the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于红熊所在的线索并不明确。或许你须要重新上路了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Jake Burns. He is wanted for the murder of an NCR Ranger. He was last sighted near Crescent Canyon. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Jake Burn's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail. Bounty Hunters are strongly advised to consult with Captain Scull before undertaking this bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 詹克·彭斯。他因为杀害一位NCR游骑兵被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在新月峡谷附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。强烈建议赏金猎人在执行任务前先向斯科尔上尉进行必要的咨询。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guts has returned to the Short Stick Saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 古茨又回到了短棍沙龙

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guts has returned to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 古茨又回到了幸运38赌场

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 2,000 caps for the capture of Arthur Ribben. He is wanted for genocide, conspiracy, and other crimes. His current whereabouts are unknown. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by licensed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Arthur Ribben or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以2000个瓶盖悬赏 阿瑟·里本。他因为集体屠杀、同谋反叛和其他罪行被通缉。现在下落不明。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 2,500 caps for the capture of "Red Bear" a known criminal and raider of dangerous repute. He is wanted for murder, theft, kidnapping, rape, and other crimes against the state and humanity. He was last sighted south of Goodsprings, in possession of several women from the surrounding territory. He is extremely dangerous and should be pursued only by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Red Bear or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以2500个瓶盖悬赏“红熊”，一个臭名昭著的罪犯。他因为谋杀、偷盗、绑架、强奸和其他触犯法律和人性的罪行被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在清泉镇南面，周围有几名女性被他占有。他是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find the offices empty, save one note resting near the radio. Perhaps it will give some indication of Lobo's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现办公室空空荡荡，只有在收音机旁的一张笔记。也许它能告诉你关于洛勃的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: George Hardin has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔治·哈丁向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Billy Jack Gibson. He is wanted for murder and hate crimes against ghouls. He was last sighted near the Yangtze Memorial. He is an accomplished hand-to-hand combatant and former ranger, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Billy Jack Gibson or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 比利·杰克·吉布森。他因为谋杀和针对食尸鬼的犯罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在扬子纪念碑附近。他是个职业的一对一高手，前游骑兵，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。
通缉: 比利·杰克·吉布森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear is dead. Collect the finger from his corpse and submit it to Captain Scull to claim your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊死了。去取他的手指，然后交给斯科尔上尉就可以换取你的赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the capture of "Uncle Chuckles". He is wanted for kidnapping, cannibalism, and murder. He was last sighted near Freeside. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Uncle Chuckles or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR悬赏1000瓶盖捉拿“丘克尔斯叔叔”。他因绑架、食人和谋杀而被通缉。最后一次看到他是在自由城附近。他应该被认为是有武器的危险人物，只有有武器的专业人员才能追捕他。为了获得赏金，把咯咯笑叔叔或他死亡的证据交给巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've recovered Blake's diary recording his dealings with other frumentarii. Apparently, most of the slaves acquired in the Mojave are being shipped to Canyon Cove, a heavily-guarded town on the Colorado River. You should share this data with Wickham at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了布雷克的日记，上面记录了他和其他女人的往来。显然，大部分在莫哈韦得到的奴隶都被运往峡谷湾，科罗拉多河上一个戒备森严的小镇。你应该马上把这个消息告诉维克汉姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As Scull predicted, Valle de Hierro is a bustling haven for Raiders and other outlaws. You must look for Lt. Ramsey, and also check for any signs of Sergio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如斯科尔预料的那样，瓦尔德耶罗是土匪和前科们的天堂。你必须尽快找到拉姆齐中尉，同时搜寻任何与塞尔吉奥有关的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the capture of "The Mongol Kid", leader of "The Mongols", a radical offshoot of the Great Khans. He is wanted for kidnapping and other crimes against the state. He was last sighted at Lone Wolf Radio, accompanied by several well-armed gang members. He is extremely dangerous and should be pursued only by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit The Mongol Kid or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 蒙格尔·基德，一伙可汗帮分支--蒙格尔人的首领。他因为绑架和其他触犯州法律的罪行被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在独狼电台，身边有全副武装的帮派成员。他持有武器，是个极端危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of Frank Elko. He is wanted robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near the Emergency Service Railyard, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Frank Elko's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 弗兰克·埃尔科。他因为抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在紧急服务铁路广场附近，身边还有别的同伙。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The captive's tongue has been cut out, and she is unable to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 俘虏的舌头被割掉了，她无法说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团把奴隶绑起来运送。绳子扎进了她的手腕。她显然遭受过虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to her fate.
Legionaries have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团把奴隶绑起来运送。绳子扎进了他的手腕。他显然遭受过虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to his fate.
You've discovered a rough map that points to "Faust Cavern", located northwest of Searchlight. Scribbled notes indicate that the cavern is host to Rolo and his clan of Vipers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一张指向“浮士德洞穴”的潦草地图，它位于探照灯营地的西北方向。潦草的笔记表明罗洛和他的毒蛇帮是这个洞穴的主人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target has escaped from the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您的目标已逃离莫哈韦废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 150 caps for the termination of Marlo Barksdale. He is wanted for drug trafficking, murder, conspiracy, and numerous felonies. He was last sighted outside Westside. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以150个瓶盖悬赏 马洛·巴克斯代尔。他因为非法毒品交易、谋杀、和其他大量重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是西区外。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。
通缉: 马洛·巴克斯代尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Boulder City Jail is processing your request...
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨石城监狱正在处理你的请求

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have 72 hours to terminate your target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您有 72 小时的时间来干掉目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jacob Powers' death has triggered the release of his feral ghouls. Run!
ESP.TRADUIT: 雅各布·鲍尔的死触发了机关，那些野生食尸鬼被放出来了。快跑！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lt. Ramsey's corpse has been exhibited for the amusement of Valle de Hierro's denizens, and as a warning to representatives from the NCR. A small inscription indicates the saloon's owner, Gary, is responsible for this act. Since all personal effects have been stripped from Ramsey's body, it's likely that Gary is keeping them as trophies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉姆齐中尉的尸体被做成了展览品，既为了娱乐当地的群众，也为了警告NCR的来客。一篇小的题字指明了始作俑者是沙龙的店主，加里。由于拉姆齐中尉身上的所有个人特征均被刨去，这个加里有可能想把它们作为战利品收藏起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Convinced that he must face justice, Red Bear silently sets out for the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于被你成功说服，红熊沉默地开始了前往巨石城监狱之旅。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
With Red Bear, Fisk, and Sergio gone, organized crime in the Mojave Wasteland has been rebuffed - for now. The work of a bounty hunter never stops, however; outlaws, raiders, and other targets remain to test your skill.
In spite of your recent success, you cannot help but feel frustrated, as you harbor an unpalatable truth: Marko is alive, and beyond your reach. Perhaps in time a means to find Marko will manifest, but until then you must look to your duty in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT:
随着红熊、菲斯克和塞尔吉奥的死，莫哈维有组织的犯罪已经基本被扫荡干净--至少是现在。但是，赏金猎人的工作永远不会停止，还有一些逃犯、强盗和其他漏网的目标可以测试你的技巧。
尽管你近期取得一系列成功，但你依然有种沮丧的感觉，因为你不得不接受这样一个事实：马尔科还活着，而且远在天边。也许将来终有一天你能找到发现马尔科的办法，但到那一天到来之前，你必须尽你的职责，来维护莫哈为这片土地的安宁与寂静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The unconscious target is at your mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意识的目标任由你摆布。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target has turned himself/herself into authorities at the Boulder City Jail. You may now collect your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标在巨石城监狱自首了。你现在可以领取奖励了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of Bryan Claiborne. He is wanted for murder and armed robbery. He was last sighted near Hell's Motel. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Bryan Claiborne's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏布莱恩·克莱本。他因为谋杀和抢劫军火被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在地狱旅店附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。
通缉: 布莱恩·克莱本

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the termination of the fiend leader known as "Lobo". He is wanted for murder and other felonies. He was last sighted at Zapp's Neon Signs. He should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Lobo's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏恶魔帮的领导人，洛勃。他因为谋杀和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在扎普霓虹灯。只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tired of feeling famished, fatigued, and flaccid? Try an Albert Breach brand muffin, and you'll soon find yourself feeling sated, virile, and energetic. Breach brand muffins utilize only the finest wasteland ingredients, which are scientifically proven to enhance your quality of life! Breach brand researcher Dr. John Goodman says, "These tasty morsels have improved the libido and eyesight of test subjects, as evidenced by the exceptionally fecund mole rats used in experiments." Side effects may include paranoia, priapism, satyriasis, and anal leakage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 饿了吧，累了吧，浑身没有力气了吧？试试艾伯特·布瑞奇的小松饼，你会感到轻松、愉快、重新充满了活力。布瑞奇牌小松饼只采用最上等的废土谷物成分，是你健康生活的有力保证！布里奇牌的研究专家--约翰·古德曼博士说：“我们经过99道严格控制的程序，新鲜的口感可以带给你非一般的感受。每天一块布里奇，强壮每一个废土人。”还在等什么，快来品尝吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've performed the rites of sacrifice. You should return to Flagg and complete the initiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你执行了一系列献祭的仪式。你返回到弗拉格那里，完成入会典礼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Sam Burrow. He is wanted for Robbery and other felonies. He was last sighted near Mountain Shadows Campground. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Sam Burrow or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 山姆·伯罗。他因抢劫、和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在山影野营地附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨岩城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you kill the last assailant from the returning patrol, you hear the heavy foosteps of the Mongol Kid approaching...
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着你杀死最后一个巡逻的攻击者，你听到蒙格尔·基德的沉重脚步声在慢慢迫近......

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 1000 caps for the death of Henry Helm. He is wanted for murder, cannibalism, robbery, and kidnapping. He was last sighted near Valle del Hierro. He is to be considered armed and extremely dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Henry Helm's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR悬赏1000瓶盖杀死亨利·赫尔姆。他因谋杀、食人、抢劫和绑架而被通缉。他最后一次出现在耶罗瓦附近。他应该持有武器，极度危险，只有专业武装人员才能追捕他。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Albert Quisling has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾伯特·奎斯琳向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Captive's fate is now in your hands. You can release her, sell her, or kill her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个俘虏的命运现在在你手里。你可以释放她，卖了她，也可以杀了她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The parchment reads, "Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn". A sharp chill seizes your body as you finish uttering the words. You hear a rock shift behind you, and realize you're not alone...
ESP.TRADUIT: 羊皮纸上写着，“Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn”。在你把它念出来后，感到浑身一阵冷颤。随后你听到了巨石挪动的声音，你意识到这里并非只有你一个人...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 750 caps for the termination of Jacob Powers. He is wanted for terrorism, treason, and other felonies. He was last sighted near the old nuclear test site, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Jacob Power's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以750个瓶盖悬赏雅各布·鲍尔。他因为恐怖行动、煽动骚乱和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在旧核辐射测试基地附近，有大量同伴随行。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 500 caps for the capture of Adam Rzeznik. He is wanted for conducting slavery and human trafficking. He was last sighted near Wolfhorn Ranch. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit Adam Rzeznik or proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以500个瓶盖悬赏 亚当·泽尼克。他因为经营奴隶和人的非法贸易被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在狼角农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交目标本人，或提供其它有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 50 caps for the termination of Dynamite Danny. He is wanted for robbery, Brahmin rustling, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Hunter's Farmhouse. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of Dynamite Danny's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以50个瓶盖悬赏“炸药”丹尼。他因为抢劫、偷盗双头牛和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到的地点在猎人农场附近。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam Rzeznik has turned himself into NCR authorities. You can now collect the reward from Captain Scull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当·泽尼克向NCR当局自首。你可以从斯科尔上尉那里取得你的酬金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have tripped a motion-sensing alarm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你触发了动作感应警报！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered an intriguing note with details on a hidden stash of Legion gold. Perhaps it would behoove you to examine this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一张秘密的笔记，上面记载了军团金币的隐藏点。或许你该仔细查看一下这张笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of "Prometheus". He is wanted for terrorism, sedition, murder, and numerous felonies. He was last sighted at Black Mountain. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of his death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 普罗米修斯。他因为恐怖行动、煽动骚乱、谋杀和其他大量重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在黑山。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crude map suggests that the Powder Gangers have been transferring captives to a nearby cave to the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张潦草的地图表明炸药帮一直在将俘虏转移到东边附近的一个洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear a deep voice bellow, "Wake up courier", and realize that someone is upon you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仿佛听到远处有一个声音，“醒来，邮递员”，然后你意识到有人就在你面前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As Yama falls dead, the extent of Flagg's betrayal becomes readily apparent. You should confront him immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着亚马倒下，弗拉格背叛的意图开始明显。现在，你须要立刻来亲自面对他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is offering a bounty of 250 caps for the termination of John Dunn. He is wanted for murder, robbery, and other felonies. He was last sighted near Lucky Jim's Mine, along with multiple accomplices. He is to be considered armed and dangerous, and should only be pursued by armed professionals. To collect the bounty, submit proof of John Dunn's death to Captain Larry Scull at the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR以250个瓶盖悬赏 约翰·杜恩。他因为谋杀、抢劫和其他重罪被通缉。他上一次被人见到是在幸运吉姆矿场附近，身边有多名同伴随行。他持有武器，是个危险分子，只有熟练的武器专家才允许追捕此人。赏金的领取，须要向巨石城监狱的拉里·斯科尔上尉递交有效死亡证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This finely-written note details Bentley's contact with a Legion frumentarius named Proculus, who is apparently operating in Goodsprings under the alias of "Blake".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张写得很好的笔记详细描述了宾利与一个名叫普罗库勒斯的军团士兵的接触，他显然以“布莱克”的别名在清泉镇工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered a note that reveals the fate of Ethan's niece, Polly. Far from being a hapless slave, she's been turned into a hardened raider. You will have to decide how to break the news to Ethan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一张笔记，上面透露了伊桑的侄女--波利的命运。令人惊奇的是，她没有成为不幸的奴隶，反而变成了一个冷酷的土匪。你需要决定如何向伊桑透露这条消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered Blunt's notes regarding the Crimson Caravan. The ledger includes a detailed log of caravans carrying supplies to NCR posts in the Mojave. A cursory glance reveals no reference to Legion activity, though it could be encrypted in code. You should share this data with Wickham at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经发现了布朗特关于赤红商队的笔记。 该分类帐包括一份详细的日志，记录了将物资运送到莫哈韦沙漠 NCR 哨所的商队信息。 粗略一看，没有提到军团活动，尽管它可以用代码加密。 您应该立即与维克汉姆 共享该信息。
埃尔·多拉多服务加油站
内华达高速公路服务站
飘零希望营地指挥中心

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa's House of Love, First Floor

ESP.TRADUIT: 前往瓦尔德耶罗的通道
迪安船长的小艇租借室
凤凰城的奥勒留的办公室
